1a1(dkon brtsegs): (ca) @#/ ! /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2(dkon brtsegs): (黃) 大寶積經第五部
1b1(dkon brtsegs): @##/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong
1b2(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu pa ste glog thob kyis zhus pa/ bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/
1b3(dkon brtsegs): Ar+ya bi d+yu ta prA p+ta pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa glog thob kyis
1b4(dkon brtsegs): zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
1b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
1b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad
1b7(dkon brtsegs): k yang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa stong
1b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu
2a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med par gyur pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa mngon sum du byas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pa/ ting
2a2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin rnams dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa/ sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub
2a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin du mtho gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang
2a4(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i yon tan 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rkyen dang ldan pa dang /
2a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' sred dang / byang
2a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'khor lo mos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang / byang chub sems dpa'
2a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgyal ba'i spobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i nga ro dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sad byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa sgyur ba la mkhas pa dang /
2a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni gtso bor gyur to/ /gzhan yang brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig rten
2b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang / mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i lha dang / glu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i
2b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor tshad med pa rnams dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ces bya bas 'khor mang po rab tu zhi zhing yongs su dag pa dag 'dus par gyur ba mthong ba dang stan las langs
2b3(dkon brtsegs): te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la the
2b4(dkon brtsegs): tshom cung zad cig mchis te deng zhu bar 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rjes gsan par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' glog thob la bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs
2b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod la skabs phyes/ khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' glog thob
2b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur na sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing skyon rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba
2b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dbang po dang rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pas sems can de dag drangs te lus zhig pa'i 'og tu ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing gdon mi 'tshal bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /
2b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na gnas kyang pad ma bzhin skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du rgyu zhing rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong ba dang
3a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa gsum la rab tu gnas kyang snyoms par mi 'jug par sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa yongs su sbyangs nas
3a2(dkon brtsegs): skad cig ma gcig la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog thob kyis bcom ldan 'das
3a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa/ bla na ma mchis mi yi gtso/ /mkhyen dang gzigs pa tshad ma mchis/ /ma 'dres chos la bzhugs nas ni/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/ /sems
3a4(dkon brtsegs): can kun la snyoms par gzigs/ /'jig rten kun gyi mgon skyabs mdzad/ /log dang yang dag lam bstan nas/ /mthar thug bde la 'god par mdzad/ /yon tan mchog ni rab bsags pas/ /rin chen
3a5(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs phung po 'dra/ /'jig rten shes rab nyi ma khyod/ /khams gsum mchod 'os gtso bo lags/ /theg pa chen po bkas bshad nas/ /byang chub lam ni rdzogs par mdzod/ /zhal mtshan zla ba nya ba 'dra/ /
3a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas dag ni phun sum tshogs/ /nyer zhi chos ni rab bstan nas/ /nyon mongs rnams ni zhi bar mdzad/ /byang chub spyod pa bkas bshad nas/ /sems can rnams la phan mdzad gsol/ /sangs rgyas zhing dang sku
3a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang / /gzugs sku dang ni 'khor rnams dang / /phrin las gsum dang chos rnams kyang / /thams cad kun ni rnam par drag /bcom ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /rnam dag spyod pa bkas bshad gsol/ /
3a8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bdud ni gdul bar bgyi/ /ji ltar chos ni bstan par bgyi/ /ji ltar dran pa nyams mi 'gyur/ /khyod kyi bkas ni bshad du gsol/ /ji ltar dpa' bo dag gis ni/ /'khor ba kun du zhugs gyur kyang / /
3b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig la gnas bgyid cing / /chos la rtag tu g.yo mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams la ni/ /bsten cing mchod pa bgyis nas ni/ /rtag par sangs rgyas sku bltas kyang / /mthar ni mtshan ma spong
3b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags/ /rnam thar gsum po mngon bgyis kyang / /mkha' la bya ni 'phur ba bzhin/ /yon tan phun tshogs ma gyur par/ /nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' lags/ /dbang po rang bzhin yongs rtogs nas/ /
3b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa ma mchis rjes 'brang zhing / /mngon par zhen pa ma mchis bar/ /sems can de dag smin bgyid lags/ /sngar ni 'jig rten bde btang nas/ /slad kyis dang ba'i sems bskyed de/ /ye shes gya nom
3b4(dkon brtsegs): phun tshogs pas/ /bla med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di 'dra'i zab mo gya nom don/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bkas bshad gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
3b5(dkon brtsegs): po glog thob la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can tshad med pa rnams la phan zhing bde bar bya ba dang / da ltar gyi lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs
3b6(dkon brtsegs): su bzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu zhus pa legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir glog thob shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /byang chub sems
3b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' glog thob kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gter chen po
3b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / kun du zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i gter phun sum tshogs par gyur bas rgud pa rnams gtan/
4a1(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed la tshegs chung ngus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lnga
4a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter dang / zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter dang / gti mug spyod pa'i gter dang / cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter dang / chos thams cad kyi gter gang yin pa'o/ /glog thob byang chub
4a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'thun zhing phyin ci log gis bcings pas mtshan
4a4(dkon brtsegs): ma rnams kyi rjes su gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la sogs pa'i yul dag la rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par brtags nas brtan pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa dang / bde ba la chags shing myos
4a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur ba yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can dag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas sems can de dag gang la mos shing 'dun pa dang / spyod yul gang la
4a6(dkon brtsegs): chags shing goms pas mthu can du gyur ba dang / dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan zhing phun sum tshogs par gyur ba dang / sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu bskyed pa dang / theg pa gang la gzhol bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed
4a7(dkon brtsegs): yod pa dag nam zhig na yongs su smin par gyur ba yang rab tu shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir dang / de dag gi dge ba'i sems rtag par rgyun mi 'chad
4a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir shin du legs par brtags nas yongs su gso bar byed de/ glog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / spyod pa'i bye brag ni shin du shes par dka' bar rig par bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang
4b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rig par mi nus na so so'i skye bo dang / mu stegs can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ glog thob sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa rnams la mngon par zhen par gyur kyang bla na med pa yang
4b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa yang yod do/ /sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa'i yul la reg pa tsam 'am/ 'dod pa'i sems kyis tshig smras pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
4b3(dkon brtsegs): chub yongs su smin par byed pa yang yod do/ /sems can kha cig ni gzugs sdug gu dag mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa las gzugs de rnam par 'gyur zhing zhig par mthong ba nyid kyis gzugs mi
4b4(dkon brtsegs): rtag par khong du chud par gyur nas 'dod pa'i gdung ba nye bar zhi ste/ mi rtag pa nyid shin du yid la byed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa yang yod do/ /sems can kha
4b5(dkon brtsegs): cig ni bud med mthong ba na mngon par zhen pa skyes ba med kyang phyis yid la dran pa'i dbang gis 'dod chags kyi sems skyes nas de'i kha dog dang dbyibs yid la byas nas rjes su chags pa skye bar 'gyur ba yang yod do/ /
4b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can kha cig ni rmi lam na gzugs yid du 'ong ba rnams mthong ba'i dbang gis 'dod chags kyi mngon par zhen pa skyes nas yid la byed cing yongs su gnyer bar byed pa yang yod do/ /sems can kha cig ni bud
4b7(dkon brtsegs): med kyi sgra thos pa tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sred pa skyed par byed la/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sems dang bral nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed
4b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang yod pas de'i phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi sman gang yin pa de dag thabs mkhas pas legs par khong du chud kyang
5a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma yang med la/ chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur ba'i sems can de dag la yang snying rje chen po skyed par byed do/ /glog thob 'dod chags dang /
5a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i chos cung zad tsam yang dmigs su med pas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis mthong ba ltar na sems can rnams
5a3(dkon brtsegs): ni mtshan ma med pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dben pa/ btags pa tsam du rnam par gzhag pa tshogs shing 'dus pa'i chos 'di la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skyed par byed pas bdag gis 'di
5a4(dkon brtsegs): dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas 'dod chags kyis rmongs par gyur ba'i sems can de dag gi ched du snying rje chen po la gnas nas sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /chos kyi
5a5(dkon brtsegs): dbyings las ma g.yos par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du sems so/ /skyes pa gang zhig bud med dag la yang dag pa ma yin pas sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas 'dod chags
5a6(dkon brtsegs): lci ba skyes par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpas bud med shin du sdug cing mdzes pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang ldan pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab
5a7(dkon brtsegs): tu brgyan pas lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar gyur ba sngon ma mthong ba dag tu bsgyur nas sems can de dag gis ji ltar sred cing rjes su chags pa dang / shin du mngon par zhen par gyur ba ston par byed de/ de dag gi
5a8(dkon brtsegs): n us pa dang sbyar nas thabs kyis 'dod chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du rang dbang du gyur ba'i mthus bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur nas de'i mdun du snang bar byas nas chos bstan pa nyid kyis sems
5b1(dkon brtsegs): can de dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs par byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang zhig skyes pa dag la 'dod chags kyi sems skyes par gyur na byang chub sems dpas skyes pa'i lus bstan nas 'dod chags
5b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du chos bstan pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings la zhugs par byas nas mi snang bar byed de/ glog thob 'dod chags kyi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang / spyod pa gzhan de dag kyang gtogs
5b3(dkon brtsegs): par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur ba de dag byang chub sems dpas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi sgo mo bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa bskyed de/ sems can rnams kyi sems khong du chud par byas nas
5b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par grol bar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can dag la 'di lta bu'i chos bstan to snyam du sems pa yang med la/ sems can rnam par grol bar gyur ba yang mi dmigs so/ /glog thob 'di
5b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na mtsho ma dros pa'i klu'i rgyal po ni las kyi mthu'i dbang gis de'i pho brang gi nang nas chu klung chen po bzhi byung nas sems can chu dang skam la gnas pa dag dbyar tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe bsil ba dang / rlan
5b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis me tog dang / 'bras bu dag rgyas shing 'bru rnams 'phel bar gyur nas sems can mang po shin du bde bar byed kyang / klu'i rgyal po de bdag gis chu bo 'di dag phyung ngo / /dbyung bar bya'o snyam du mi sems
5b7(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ 'on kyang chu klung bzhi po dag rtag tu 'bab cing sems can rnams nye bar spyod par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur ba'i dbang gis
5b8(dkon brtsegs): r tsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan nas 'khor ba'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad bsal te lha dang mi rnams la 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i bde ba sbyin par byed kyang byang chub
6a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de bdag gis chos bstan to/ /bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang rang gi ngang gis snying rje chen po'i bsam ba la gnas nas sems can rnams la so
6a2(dkon brtsegs): sor brtags te ci rigs par chos ston par byed do/ /gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste dper na brgya byin lha'i dbang po la lha'i bu mo khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod pa de dag brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i rang dbang gi mthu'i dbang gis
6a3(dkon brtsegs): lus mang po bstan nas lha'i bu mo de dag de dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs par myong bas de dag so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu ni/ deng lha'i dbang po dang lhan cig rtses so snyam du sems kyang
6a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par lha'i dbang po de la mngon par zhen par gyur ba ci yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sems can gang yongs su bzla ba'i 'os su gyur ba de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs
6a5(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par zhen par gyur ba med do/ /gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ri mthon po'i rtse mo la shar ba'i tshe 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling
6a6(dkon brtsegs): kun du snang bar byed pas gang du snang bar byas pa'i gnas de dag tu kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams pa sna tshogs rab tu ston par byed kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de ni kha dog gcig
6a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'od gcig pa nyid de tha dad pa'i mtshan ma med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings snang bar byas nas sems can gyi mngon par zhen pa'i
6a8(dkon brtsegs): ri'i rtse mo de dag tu shar ba na dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur cing de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su gyur ba'i mtshan nyid med de/ glog thob 'di ni byang
6b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/ /byang sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can
6b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa bstan nas tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su gyur ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ /gzhan yang glog thob
6b3(dkon brtsegs): ' di lta ste dper na gser yang dag pa ni mgar ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i mthu'i dbang gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs su byas te mtshan nyid tha dad par gyur kyang gser gyi rang bzhin la ni tha dad du gyur
6b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ci yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings shin du legs par brtags nas sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa dag bstan nas tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
6b5(dkon brtsegs): chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la ni gnyis su gyur ba'i mtshan nyid med de/ 'di ni rtag par chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di lta
6b6(dkon brtsegs): b u thob par gyur na sems can gyi ched du rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas chos ston par byed pas de dag gis chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'phags pa'i nor phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan par gyur bas 'khor ba'i
6b7(dkon brtsegs): rgud pa dag gtan du yongs su spong bar byed do/ /gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams ni nga rgyal dang
6b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/ bdag dang bdag gi mtshan ma la gnas pas yun ring po nas byams pa dang / bzod pa ma bsgoms pa zhe sdang gi gdung bas rang gi sems bshig
7a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran par ma gyur pa/ zhe sdang gi gdug pas g.yogs pas chos nyid la rmongs par gyur ba yin yang byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe
7a2(dkon brtsegs): sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la nam yang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba skyed par mi byed kyi/ 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni gti mug gis rmongs pas chos rnams gzod ma nyid nas rab tu dben zhing zhi ba/
7a3(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang rnyog pa med pa/ 'dum pa med pa/ rtsod pa med pa/ rab tu dben pa'i chos nyid la phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan par gyur ba'i dbang gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i zhe sdang dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa rgyas par gyur
7a4(dkon brtsegs): to snyam du sems pa kho nar zad do/ /de snyam du bsams nas kyang snying rje chen po la gnas te rtag par bdag nyid 'gyod cing bshags par yang byed la/ gal te lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa zhig yong na yang
7a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir bzod pa la rab tu gnas par byed do/ /gal te zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can tshad med pa de dag phan tshun gcig la gcig rgyab kyis phyogs shing zhe sdang dang /
7a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khon du 'dzin pa'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis sbrul gdug pa ngan 'gro'i lus su ltung bar gyur ba dag la ni byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa la rab tu gnas pa des 'di ltar byams pa dang / dran pa'i stobs
7a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems can de dag btul nas ngan 'gro'i rnam par smin pa len par mi 'gyur zhing / gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas sems can
7a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa yongs su bsal bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te sems can zhe sdang can dag mthong bar gyur na/ 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
7b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa yin na/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brangs nas yang dag pa ma yin pas rnam par rtog pa bskyed nas mnyam zhing rtsod pa med pa'i chos nyid 'di la zhe sdang gi bsam pa bskyed pas
7b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag chos kyi dbyings nyid ma rtogs par gyur to/ /gal te sems can 'di dag chos nyid mthong bar gyur na ni gzhan dag la gnod sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ma rtogs
7b3(dkon brtsegs): pas de'i phyir zhe sdang skyes par gyur to zhes byang chub sems dpa' des zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la lhag par snying brtse ba bskyed nas snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sngon gyi smon lam yang yongs su rdzogs par byed
7b4(dkon brtsegs): la/ rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir chos kyi sgo mo rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed kyang bdag gis sems can gyi zhe sdang bsal ba'i phyir chos
7b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan to snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin du legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan
7b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid la gnas nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa rab tu bsal ba zhes bya'o/ /glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na mun pa bsal nas snang ba 'thob par 'gyur yang mun pa sel bar byed pa med de/ 'di ltar mun pa dang snang ba ngo bo nyid
7b7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dbyer med pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i ye shes de la brten nas thabs mkhas pas chos bstan te/ zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can
7b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul zhing zhi bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la tha dad du gyur ba med do/ /glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar nas 'od kyis gang dang gang du snang bar byas pa de dag thams cad ni nyi
8a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zhe sdang gi spyod pa gdul zhing bsal ba'i phyir ji tsam du tshig tu brjod pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo yin yang
8a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur ba med do/ /'di ltar zhe sdang gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang / spyod pa gzhan gtogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes yongs su
8a3(dkon brtsegs): grub pas sems can de dag gi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su chos ston par byed kyang bdag gis sems can la chos bstan to/ /ston to/ /ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med do/ /'di ni byang
8a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can gyi mos pa rnam
8a5(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang zhe sdang spyod pa'i mtha' rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang /
8a6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang glog thob byang
8a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di ni shin du dka' ba'i dngos po yin te/ 'di ltar
8a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ gzhan la gnod pa byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mngal gyi sgo ngas kun du dkrigs pa dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid bcings pas chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i thabs
8b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ bya ba dag la legs par so sor mi rtog pa bdag tu lta ba la mngon par zhen pa/ lam log par zhugs pa/ byis pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa/ nges par 'byung ba dka' ba yin pas 'di lta bu la sogs pas rmongs
8b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur ba'i sems can dag gi ched du dang po sems bskyed pa nas sbyor ba chen po bskyed de/ ngal zhing sdug bsngal ba yang med/ le lo yang med par rkyen gang dang / mos pa gang dang / chos bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis
8b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la btsud de rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon chos kyi dbyings legs par so sor brtags par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes
8b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur bar rig nas ci nus ci lcogs kyis chos bstan nas rab tu dul bar byed kyang bdag gis chos bstan to/ /ston to/ /ston par
8b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med de/ 'on kyang de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba legs par so sor brtags nas rang gi ngang gis chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan te/ sems can de dag
8b6(dkon brtsegs): gi ma rig pa'i las kyi 'du byed bsal nas rnam par grol ba 'thob par byed do/ /glog thob 'di lta ste dper na sman pa bzang po nad mang po gso ba la mkhas pa/ sngar sman dpyad rnams la shin du goms par gyur ba
8b7(dkon brtsegs): ni nad kyi mtshan ma mthong ma thag tu sngags dang sman btang ba thams cad rab tu rtogs par gyur bas des gsos pa gang yang mi sos pa med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings shin
8b8(dkon brtsegs): du legs par rtogs pas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis gti mug gi spyod pa bsags pa'i sems can de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan nas thams cad rab tu
9a1(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar rtogs par byed de/ glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par
9a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin du legs par so sor brtags nas gti mug spyod pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de dag gi rang bzhin dang / 'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin
9a3(dkon brtsegs): du tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / rjod pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang gti mug spyod pa'i mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa yang gtugs par
9a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/ /'di ltar gti mug gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang / spyod
9a5(dkon brtsegs): p a gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur ba de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma rab tu phye nas yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gti
9a6(dkon brtsegs): mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o/ /gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor
9a7(dkon brtsegs): s hin du dag cing yongs su gsal ba dri ma med pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag na gzugs brnyan rnams der snang zhing 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de bdag gis gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna
9a8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'di dag ston par byed do zhes mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de shin du legs par byi dor byas na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de
9b1(dkon brtsegs): b zhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings kyi me long gi dkyil 'khor shin du legs par byi dor byas pas rtsol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas sems can rnams kyi spyod pa'i bye brag ji lta
9b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma rnam par phye ste bstan nas de dag thams cad rab tu rtogs shing rnam par grol ba thob par byas kyang chos kyi mtshan ma dang sems can gyi mtshan ma skyed par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na
9b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin du legs par rtogs pa'i phyir dang / spyod pa bzhi po 'di dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs
9b4(dkon brtsegs): pas de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog par byed pas gnyis su 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyang
9b5(dkon brtsegs): med de/ chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag gnyis su med cing tha dad pa med par gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa rnam pa sna
9b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi mtshan ma yang med la rnam par gzhag pa yang med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings shin du legs par so sor brtags nas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu
9b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par rtogs pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur ba med do/ /glog thob cha mnyam pa'i
9b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa 'di la nyi khri chig stong yod pa dang / spyod pa gzhan gtogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpas so sor brtags nas thams cad gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste
10a1(dkon brtsegs): d per na sman pa mkhas pa nad dang sman gtong ba rab tu shes pa bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
10a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na sems can rnams kyi ched du bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de dag mos pa
10a3(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang spyod pa de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/
10a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o// // bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ gzhan yang glog thob
10a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' des de lta bu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur bas sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa yang thabs mkhas pas rab tu rtogs pas gal te 'dod chags mang ba'i
10a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can mthong bar gyur na de dag rab tu gdul zhing de dag gi nad gso ba'i phyir so so'i skye bo dang 'thun par 'dod pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / khyim gyi so chis phun sum tshogs pa
10a7(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed kyang pad ma bzhin du des gos zhing mngon par zhen par gyur ba med do/ /sems can gang gti mug cing blo dang mi ldan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa mi shes pas 'di snyam du blo dang
10a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa su zhig so so'i skye bo dang tha mi dad par 'dod pa rnams nyams su len par byed ces byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di ni byang chub spangs pa yin no snyam du sems par byed do/ /sems can de lta bu de dag ni
10b1(dkon brtsegs): s ems yongs su mi gtsang ba'i phyir zhe sdang chen po skyes nas gus par mi 'gyur bas las de'i dbang gis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar gyur kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems
10b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' shin du gsang bas gdul ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam pa yongs su zad nas gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa la rab tu 'god par byed do/ /glog thob 'di lta ste dper na me rab tu 'bar ba
10b3(dkon brtsegs): ni rtswa dang shing dang phrad par gyur ba na thams cad rab tu 'bar zhing me'i phung po nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi me 'bar bar gyur ba na sems can rnams kyi 'dod
10b4(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig 'grogs shing thams cad rab tu 'bar nas shes rab nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/
10b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos shes bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste/ rin po che sna bzhi las mngon par grub pa yin te/ sems
10b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyang de'i rjes su kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid du gyur bar byed de/ gal te bai dUr+ya'i ngos su phyin na ni thams cad kyang bai dUr+ya'i kha dog gcig pa nyid
10b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur bar byed do/ /gser gyi kha dog gi ngos su phyin na ni thams cad gser gyi kha dog nyid du 'gyur bar byed do/ /dngul dang / chu shel gyi kha dog tu 'gyur ba yang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
10b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang ma 'dres pa'i chos thob pas sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin cing lhan cig
11a1(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs par gyur na thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed kyang / de'i sems mi gtsang zhing rang gi sdig pa'i las kyi dbang gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i
11a2(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung bar gyur bas 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i yon tan dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa zad pa'i 'og tu gdon mi za bar bla na med
11a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba la 'god par byed do/ /glog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med/ dpag tu med/ grangs med pa na snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa
11a4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
11a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i phung po yon tan gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu tham par gyur te/ da ltar nga ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
11a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gti mug shin du che ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pas pha ma dang / phu nu dang / grogs po'i yid dang 'gal bar byed pa/ mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi rjes su mi 'brang ba/ byas pa drin du mi
11a7(dkon brtsegs): gzo ba/ rtag par gnod sems dang bcas pa/ g.yo sgyu dang rkun bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ phan tshun gcig la gcig gnod pa byed pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la
11a8(dkon brtsegs): gus pa med pa/ ser snas zil gyis non pas yi dags kyi chos spyod pa'i sems can de lta bu sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas par gyur bas ni shin du gdul dka' bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan
11b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus dus ngan pa de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos chen po'i tshogs ni nyi khri
11b2(dkon brtsegs): nyis stong mnga' bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgya cher byin pa zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan ba/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems shin du dang bar gyur ba zhig yod pa des
11b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par dbyar zla ba gsum spyan drangs te mchod pa rgya cher bshams nas mchod cing rim gro byas so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba spobs pa phun sum
11b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa/ chos ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pas 'khor mang po rnams nyan par spro ba/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la rtag par ngal ba med pa/ re ba med par chos ston pa/ mdog gsal zhing gsong por smra ba/
11b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa/ byang bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa/ sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar byed cing bsngags pa brjod pa zhig yod de/ dge slong
11b6(dkon brtsegs): gsar bu dag kyang rtag par dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la thogs pa med par gyur bas gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos
11b7(dkon brtsegs): sman rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang rim gro byas par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'khor mang po de las dge slong phal cher lus gyi sdom pa dang / sems kyi shes rab bsgom pa mi shes pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
11b8(dkon brtsegs): la gus pa med pa/ rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur ba 'debs pa/ rnam par g.yeng zhing gdul dka' ba/ dbang po rnams mi sdom
12a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ chos bzhin ma yin pa la gnas pa/ dge sbyong gi tshul med par bdag nyid dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad log par zhugs par sha stag gnas par gyur to/ /
12a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de dbyar 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po rgya cher byin pas tsan dan dmar pos sku zhugs la gzhen nas mchod pa byas te ring bsrel gyi mchod rten ngos bzhi kun du tsan dan
12a3(dkon brtsegs): dmar po'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/ pad ma gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu brtsigs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa ni bcom ldan 'das des mang du thos pa'i mchog tu lung bstan pas de bzhin
12a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos rgya cher spel te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal gang dang gang du song ba der sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed yongs su btul nas bla na med pa
12a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe dge slong sdig can mang po rnams rnal 'byor khong du ma chud pa/ rtag par phrag dog dang bcas pa/ bdud kyis bslus pa rnams rgyal po de ga la ba der
12a6(dkon brtsegs): dong ste 'di skad du rgyal pos bkur ba'i dge slong dri ma med pa ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thags thogs ma mchis te/ dge slong 'di 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags la/ dus ma lags par
12a7(dkon brtsegs): yang zas 'tshal te/ spos dang phreng ba dag gis kyang lus brgyan par bgyid pas yang dag par tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pas mchod pa mdzad pa'i mi rigs so/ /bdag cag ni don 'di'i slad du 'dir mchis nas
12a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la gsol ba lags kyis/ slad kyis 'gyod par yang ma mdzad cig /sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i bstan pa la thugs mi ches pa yang mi bskyed du gsol zhes smras so/ /de'i tshe bdud sdig can zhes
12b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba zhig kyang bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su bsgyur nas rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste snga ma bzhin du smras so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin pas yang dang yang du de skad smras pa thos kyang 'di snyam du dge slong dri ma med
12b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rab tu brtson zhing blo dang ldan pas bdag gis bla mar bkur ba yin te/ dngos po 'di lta bu byed pa ni gnas med do snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe bdud kyi 'khor rnams par snang las lus phyed bstan nas rgyal po de la
12b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal po bzo yi sgyu rtsal slobs/ /dus tshod dag la mkhas par gyis/ /rgyal pos de ni ma shes na/ /mi rgyal rtags dang ldan ma yin/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos dgra bcom pa/ /ye shes
12b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po ldan pa yi/ /tshig dag la ni mi rten par/ /ci yi phyir na chad par lta/ /dge slong rnams ni phan gdags phyir/ /khyod la bden tshig smra ba yin/ /chad smra ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i mi/ /yang dag tshangs spyod ma yin
12b5(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /btsun mo dag dang lhan cig rtse/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yis/ /legs par rtogs la the tshom sol/ /rgyal pos dngos po 'di thos pas/ /sems la skrag cing mya ngan
12b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes/ /'khor rnams dang ni lhan cig tu/ /myur zhing rings par pho brang dong / /de tshe dri med pho brang nang / /chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa dang / /bdag dang sems can med pa yi/ /dam pa'i don ni ston par byed/ /
12b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dmag 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /thams cad bdud kyis bslus pas na/ /pho brang nang gi btsun mo rnams/ /dge slong yongs bskor mthong ba dang / /zhe sdang glang chen myos 'dra bas/ /gshed ma dag la
12b8(dkon brtsegs): rab bsgo ba/ /dge slong nga yi btsun mo bslus/ /sdug bsngal chos kyis chad pas chod/ /blon po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /thams cad bdud kyis zin pas na/ /dge slong nyes pa med pa la/ /sems kyis
13a1(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa bya bar bsams/ /gshed ma mtshon thogs 'ongs pa dang / /dri med snying brtse mchi ma byung / /rgyal pos khyod ni chos min na/ /ci yi phyir na mchi ma byung / /dri med rgyal po la smras pa/ /dngos
13a2(dkon brtsegs): po 'di ni yid ches dka'/ /re shig skad cig sdod cig dang / /bdag gsang ba yi long yod do/ /rgyal pos dge slong tshig thos nas/ /gshed ma dag la sdod cig bsgo/ /bden pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod/ /khyod kyis
13a3(dkon brtsegs): myur du smra ba'i rigs/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ldan gyur cing / /snying rjes 'jig rten phan 'dogs pas/ /sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te/ /bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /rgyal po chen pos mkhyen par mdzod/ /
13a4(dkon brtsegs): gal te yang dag nyes med na/ /sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /mkha' las me tog char phob shig /de skad tshig ni smras ma thag /sa chen rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /mkha' las lha yi me tog bab/ /bdud
13a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor mya ngan skyes par gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po dang ba skyes/ /rkang la phyag byas bzod pa gsol/ /bdag ni dmyal bar ltung 'gyur na/ /mgon med bdag la skyabs mdzod cig /kye hud sdig pa'i grogs phrad pas/ /
13a6(dkon brtsegs): gdug pa'i sems ni skyes par gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po rjes 'brangs pas/ /mgon dang skyabs byed su yang med/ /ston pa chen po ma gtogs par/ /phyogs bcu bdag gi mgon byed med/ /bdag gis rgyal
13a7(dkon brtsegs): srid spangs nas ni/ /nam 'tsho'i bar du skyabs su mchis/ /dge slong des ni rgyal po dang / /g.yog 'khor bsam pa rig gyur nas/ /dam pa'i don ni rab tu bshad/ /rgyal pos thos nas dang ba thob/ /'khor ni bye ba
13a8(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong dang / /rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung / /sbyangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pas na/ /gzhan gyis 'gron gnyer yong mi len/ /de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang / /btsun mo 'khor bcas brgyad khri rnams/ /dam pa'i don ni
13b1(dkon brtsegs): thos pas na/ /phyir mi ldog la gnas par gyur/ /rgyal pos sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar/ /nyin mtshan rtag par sdig bshags kyang / /'on kyang sdig pa'i las ma zad/ /
13b2(dkon brtsegs): lo ni bye mang sdug bsngal myong / /sdig zad de bzhin gshegs dang phrad/ /sngon ni skrag par byas pa'i rgyus/ /rnam smin lhag ma rtag par dman/ /mthar gyis rnal 'byor rab bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas bye ba
13b3(dkon brtsegs): stong mchod nas/ /so sor zhing khams gzhan dag tu/ /thams cad mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thams cad kun kyang mtshan 'thun par/ /yon tan grags pa zhes byar gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin/ /
13b4(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong byams bzod de la ni/ /gdug pa'i sems ni bskyed pas na/ /lo ni bye ba mang por yang / /sngon gyi sdig las mngon gyur pas/ /ngu 'bod chen por lhung bar gyur/ /rnam smin de ni zad nas kyang / /slar
13b5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi lus thob gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun spyan phrang / /rtag tu bsnyen bkur rim gro byas/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag /brgyad bcu dag la rim gro byas/ /de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas pa/ /
13b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni nga bdag nyid yin no/ /chos smra nyes pa med pa la/ gnod pa byas pa'i dge slong ni/ /ma 'ongs mngon par 'tshang rgya ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yin/ /de tshe rgyal po pho brang nang / /btsun
13b7(dkon brtsegs): mo'i 'khor ni brgyad khri rnams/ /shin du dang bas dge rtsa bskyed/ /sangs rgyas tshad med rim gro byas/ /de ltar spyod pa rab bskyed nas/ /sems can phan gdags smon lam btab/ /sangs rgyas bye ba
13b8(dkon brtsegs): stong mchod nas/ /so sor mngon par 'tshang rgya yang / /ngas deng khyed la bsgo ba ni/ thams cad gnod sems ma skyed cig /gang zhig byams bsgoms sangs rgyas bsngags/ /myur du byang chub chen po 'thob/ /de lta bas na glog
14a1(dkon brtsegs): thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / rang bzhin dang / bsam pa dag la mi mkhas pa dag gis dus thams cad du gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /glog thob 'di lta ste dper na ri
14a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi nang na ri rab mchog tu gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog dang gtso bo dang / bla na med par gyur ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dper na chu bo thams cad kyi nang na
14a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho mchog tu gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog tu zab cing rgya che bar gyur ba yin no/ /gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rnams kyi nang na 'khor los sgyur
14a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal po mchog dang / gtso bo dang / bla mar gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na gong na med par gyur ba yin no/ /glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i
14a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spyod pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug cing 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas
14a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen cing se gol gtogs pa gcig la thams cad yongs su sdud par mdzad do/ /glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu mig
14a7(dkon brtsegs): d ang ldan pas rtsol ba la mi ltos par rang gi lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing the tshom med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi sems can gyi spyod pa ji
14a8(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen pas 'khor mang po'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na 'dod
14b1(dkon brtsegs): c hags kyi spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs nas nyin mtshan du yid la byed cing don med par dus las 'da' bar byed pa yang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs
14b2(dkon brtsegs): so/ /'dod chags kyis gdung bas lus dang ngag gi las rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so/ /zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag zhe sdang gis zil gyis non nas gcig
14b3(dkon brtsegs): la gcig zhe sdang gis phrag dog byed pa dang / gnod pa byas pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so/ /gti mug spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams
14b4(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa'i mun nag gis bsgribs shing rmongs pas mngon par zhen pa dang / log par lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba la mos par 'gyur ba dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /'os su 'gyur ba dang / 'os su mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phel zhing
14b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang / ldog cing nyams par gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par dge ba'i
14b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du bzhugs nas sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu mkhyen pas gal
14b7(dkon brtsegs): te dus la ma bab par rig par gyur na ni cang mi gsung zhing btang snyoms su bzhag nas sems can 'di dag ni chos la rmongs par gyur pas/ khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbang
14b8(dkon brtsegs): po dang stobs khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing dus rab tu mkhyen pa'i phyir gdul ba'i 'os su gyur ba dang / bsam pa mchog tu gyur ba dang / bzod par nus pa'i 'os su gyur ba dang / tshig legs
15a1(dkon brtsegs): par nyan par gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen te/ de ltar mkhyen par gyur nas kyang sems can de dag yongs su sdud cing phan 'dogs par byed do/ /de lta bas na glog thob byang chub sems
15a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' las dang po pa yang dag pa'i gnas skabs su ma zhugs pa sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa legs par khong du ma chud pa dag gis khyim na gnas pa'am/ rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/ thams cad kun
15a3(dkon brtsegs): la smod cing gnod sems bskyed nas yun ring por bdag nyid la gnod par 'gyur ba mi bya'o/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas theg pa chen po la gnas pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi
15a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can gzhan dag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na yang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu sems can gang rnam
15a5(dkon brtsegs): par dkar zhing yongs su dag pa'i chos las cung zad cig nyan par gyur na nam yang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te 'dod chags spyod pa'i
15a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can mthong bar gyur na sems can 'di dag 'dod chags kyi gdung bas bsregs par gyur ba yang bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so/ /zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis gdung bas bsregs par gyur ba de dag
15a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong na yang 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad na ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan par gyur ba dag mthong bar gyur na sman yongs su
15a8(dkon brtsegs): btsal te thabs mkhas pas yongs su gso ba'i rig pa las/ bdag sngon sems can gyi nad bsal bar yid dam bcas nas deng yal bar bor ba 'di nyid bdag gi nyes pa yin no snyam du sems pas so/ /
15b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid kyi nyes pa la lta zhing sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems skyed par byed do/ /gal te gsod pa 'am/ lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod cing gtub
15b2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig dang phrad par gyur na yang pha rol gnod pa byed pa de dag la lan bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa med do/ /glog thob byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yang dag par sgom pa na 'das pa'i mi dge ba'i las ji snyed pa dag kyang gtan du zad
15b3(dkon brtsegs): cing ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur la/ ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba rnams ni yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /glog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi yang ches snga rol na de
15b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
15b5(dkon brtsegs): ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog tu skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'od zer can zhes bya ste/ rgyal po'i grong khyer rab tu bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /
15b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe shan pa 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba khro gtum che zhing gsod pa la dga' ba/ bzod pa dang byams pa'i sems med pa/ lag pa khrag gis bskus pa/ mthong ba thams cad skrag par 'gyur ba zhig yod de/
15b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe shan pa des glang zhig khang pa'i nang du bcings te nang du zhugs nas bsad par byas pa las glang des de mthong nas shin du skrag pas thag pa bcad de bros nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa bzhugs
15b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshal ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe shan pa de yang mtshon thogs nas phyi bzhin du bsnyags pas glang de skrag nas g.yang sa zab mo zhig tu lhung bas srog chad la thug pa tsam du na zhing sdug bsngal bas sgra
16a1(dkon brtsegs): phyung ngo / /de'i tshe shan pas glang de mthong nas zhe sdang cher skyes te/ g.yang sa zab mo de nyid du zhugs nas mtshon thogs te bsad par byas pa las mtshon ma btab pa'i bar skabs su/ de'i
16a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa tshal der 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas yongs su bskor ba dag la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed
16a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rkyen gyi rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/
16a4(dkon brtsegs): sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams
16a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig go zhes rgya cher rnam par phye ste/ ston par mdzad pas/ glog thob rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di
16a6(dkon brtsegs): la ma rig pa yang 'du byed la mi sems mi rtog la/ 'du byed kyang ma rig pa la mi sems mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du skye ba yang rga shi la mi sems mi rtog la/ rga shi yang skye ba la mi sems mi rtog pas de ltar na chos
16a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni rang bzhin dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/ dran pa med pa/ bdag dang bdag gi ba med pa/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa/ phan tshun gcig gis gcig mi rig pa yin no/ /so so'i
16a8(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams 'di lta bu'i chos ma thos pa'i phyir gzugs ni bdag yin no/ /bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no/ /gzugs ni bdag gi yin no zhes 'dzin par byed de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
16b1(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar la yang de bzhin no/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dzin par byad/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'dzin par byed/ mi sdug
16b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la sdug pa nyid du 'dzin par byed/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'dzin cing phyin ci log bzhi skyed par byed do/ /phyin ci log tu lta ba'i phyir ma rig pas rmongs nas yang dag par tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing sems kyi
16b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mngon par zhen par gyur bas srid pa'i sred pa 'ching ba gcod par mi nus shing 'khor ba'i 'khor bar rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid la shin du legs
16b4(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par byed pa'i phyir bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can zhes bya ba nas srog ces bya ba'i bar du cung zad tsam yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / gsod
16b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gnod pa byed pa dag kyang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs pa dang / glog thob de'i tshe shan pa 'jigs su rungs bas rgyang nas de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa'i sgra thos nas go bar gyur bas de ma thag tu
16b6(dkon brtsegs): gsod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur nas mtshon cha spangs te g.yang sa nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te phyogs
16b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom
16b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de rigs so/ /dge slong legs par 'ongs so zhes gsungs ma thag tu dge slong gi dngos por gyur nas rdzogs par bsnyen par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu
17a1(dkon brtsegs): skyes pas de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas mthar gyis yongs su smin par mdzad cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa 'jigs su rung ba
17a2(dkon brtsegs): thos pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to/ /slar de yang de bzhin gshegs pa des rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i gsung sgra
17a3(dkon brtsegs): shin du gya nom pa thos nas sems la rab tu dga' ba skyes pas shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu dga' ldan lha'i gnas su skyes nas tha mar byams pa dang phrad de yang dag pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /glog thob de ltar na
17a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni shin du zab pa dang / rnam par rig par dka' zhing shes par dka' ba yin te/ de'i phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs
17a5(dkon brtsegs): su gnyer bar 'dod pas sems can gyi dbang po dang / spyod pa dag la shin du mkhas par byas nas sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems la rab tu gnas te chos
17a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la rtag tu mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o/ /ci bdog pa rnams yongs su spangs te tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /bzod pa la gnas par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus bskyed par
17a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la so sor brtag par bya'o/ /glog thob byang chub sems dpa'
17a8(dkon brtsegs): gang chos drug po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/
17b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten nas mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpas
17b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs shing / gzod ma nyid nas skye ba med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mthong ba gang yin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni gzugs la mkhas
17b3(dkon brtsegs): pa thob pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig
17b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de la don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi don rnams la thogs pa med par gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gzugs kyi don gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don dam pa
17b5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa'o/ /don dam pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dmigs su med pa gang yin pa ste/ don dam pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /chos
17b6(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /nges
17b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs rnams la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi thabs la mkhas pas nges pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i
17b8(dkon brtsegs): tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi chos rnams sems can gyi dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye ste ston par byed kyang kun nas
18a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas gzugs kyi chos la rmongs shing
18a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen par gyur ba'i sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis ci rigs par chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur ba med de/ sgra dang /
18a3(dkon brtsegs): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi bar la yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gter zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di
18a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur na spyod yul rnams la rmongs par gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag yongs su gdul bar 'dod pa'i phyir de dag gi mos pa ji lta bu bzhin du de dag re re la yang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par tshig rnam pa sna
18a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis thabs la mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab la yang 'grib pa med cing chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'gal bar gnyis su med cing dbyer med pa'i rjes
18a6(dkon brtsegs): su 'brang ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pas 'thob pa'i chos kyi gter zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi gter 'dis sems can dag la ci rigs par chos
18a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gter phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ 'khor ba'i rgud pa gtan du spong ba gang yin pa 'di ni glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gter chen po dang / zad mi shes pa'i
18a8(dkon brtsegs): gter dang / kun du zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gter 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
18b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir tshegs chung ngus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi gter bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ni gzungs
18b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /lha'i bu sum khri drug stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /
18b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rtsol ba ma mchis pa'i ye shes zhes gang gsungs pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/
18b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis dge ba'i chos rnams la lus dang sems kyi rjes su 'thun pas dmigs shing mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/ /
18b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang sems rab tu dul bar gyur nas dran pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa/ rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bar gyur ba dang / de sngon gyi smon lam dang / ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur bas
18b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams su rnam pa sna tshogs su ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings las g.yo ba med pa dang / rtag tu chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi mtshan ma cung zad tsam yang med pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po
18b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byas kyang sems can gang yang yongs su bzlas pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / rtag par
18b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams rjes su dran par byed kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du mi lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du rgyu bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes
19a1(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang gang byas pa de dag la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /de'i tshe
19a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes 'di bstan pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang bcas par
19a3(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang las me tog man dA ra ba dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dang / pun da ri ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /lha'i rnga rnams kyang rang sgra byung bar 'gyur to/ /ngo
19a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshar rmad du byang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang kun du snang bar byas te/ sems can gang la reg par gyur ba de'i lus kyang shin du bsil bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' glog thob la bka' stsal pa/
19a5(dkon brtsegs): glog thob 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs so/ /ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du
19a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i tshe yang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad
19a7(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer chen po 'gyed par mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
19a8(dkon brtsegs): su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ bdag gis ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
19b1(dkon brtsegs): bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes kyang bya ste/ khyod kyis de ltar ming yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
19b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
19b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste 'dus pa nyi shu pa rdzogs so// //
19b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ste sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa/ bam po gcig pa/
19b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra mA yA kA ra byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
19b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
19b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par grags pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lnga stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge dang /
19b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
20a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'od gzi brjid dang ldan zhing nga ro snyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
20a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kha lo sgyur ba dul ba dang ldan pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
20a4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang yang thabs gcig go/ /mi mjed
20a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang yang thabs gcig go/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang yang thabs gcig go/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po du mas
20a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang yongs su bskor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la rten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams
20a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni gus par byas/ bla mar byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod pa byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong ni brnyes/ bcom
20a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcas pa rgya chen po ni mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
20b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa ste/ thams cad
20b2(dkon brtsegs): ni mkhyen/ thams cad ni gzigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
20b3(dkon brtsegs): bcwa brgyad dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ kun rdzong pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjes su
20b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so/ /bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang
20b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/ rtswa dang / shing dang rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas kyang
20b6(dkon brtsegs): lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis 'dzin par mdzad do/ /yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po zhes bya ba bstan bcos la shin du mkhas pa/ gsang sngags la shin du mkhas pa/ bzo
20b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rig pa la 'byam pa/ las kyi mtha' byas zin pa/ rab tu byed pa byas pa/ sgra grags pa/ yul ma ga d+hA na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ji snyed pa de dag gi mchog tu grags pa/ phul du grags pa zhig
20b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ des yul ma ga d+hA ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dun par byas/ rmongs par byas/ mgo 'khor bar byas nas ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/ bden pa thob pa rnams dang / dang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su
21a1(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyem ma rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /des sgyu mas rmongs par byed pa'i rig pa'i stobs bskyed pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcas pa yang lhag par rnyed do/ /
21a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcas pa lhag par mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
21a3(dkon brtsegs): su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa ste/
21a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni mkhyen/ thams cad ni gzigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
21a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/
21a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so/ /bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas
21a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/ rtswa dang shing dang rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par
21a8(dkon brtsegs): skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la 'dzin par mdzad do zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ yul ma ga d+hA ril kyi skye bo thams cad bdag gis 'dun par byas/ rmongs par byas/ mgo 'khor bar byas
21b1(dkon brtsegs): nas ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bdag gi ming gis rab tu mgu par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gcig pu da dung
21b2(dkon brtsegs): ma bgams/ rmongs par ma byas/ mgo 'khor bar ma byas kyis/ ma la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o/ /song nas kyang bgam par bya ste/ gal
21b3(dkon brtsegs): te rmongs pa'am/ mgo 'khor ba bya nus pa lta na/ de lta na yul ma ga d+hA thams cad bdag la gcig tu 'dul/ bdag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti yang ches stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang
21b4(dkon brtsegs): po sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /song nas kyang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos
21b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba/ zhal zla ba bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag par dri ma med pa/ sku shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ mdzod spu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od dag bltar
21b6(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba/ spyan pad ma dang / ud pa la sngon po kha phye ba lta bu'i bkrag yod pa/ spyi gtsug tshangs bas kyang bltar mi mthong ba/ 'khor gyi nang na gsung dbyangs yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pas chos ston pa mthong ngo / /mthong
21b7(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang de'i sku de lta bu mthong / gsung gi phrin las de lta bu thos nas sems dang bar gyur cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis 'di ci thams cad mkhyen la thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhig yin nam/ 'on
21b8(dkon brtsegs): te ma yin pa bgam par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bgam pa'i bsam pas sang gi gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren to zhes gsol
22a1(dkon brtsegs): to/ /'di snyam du yang sems te/ ci 'dis bdag gi sems shes sam/ 'on te mi shes zhig gu/ gal te shes na ni der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ci ste mi shes na ni 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas
22a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad nas mkhyen bzhin du sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
22a3(dkon brtsegs): bcas te cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di bdag rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa la 'dir khas len pa dang sbyar na 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma
22a4(dkon brtsegs): yin la thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin no snyam nas de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
22a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos ni sgyu ma'i za ma tog gis dge 'dun 'di la 'tho 'tsham par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu
22a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod snying las chung bar gyis shig dang / ngas yun ring po nas spyad pa bsgrubs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dir dus mkhyen pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang mtho brtsam bar mi
22a7(dkon brtsegs): nus so/ /maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang 'dod chags ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin/ zhe sdang ni mtho 'tsham bar byed pa yin/ gti mug ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin na/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bag la nyal dang bcas
22a8(dkon brtsegs): te zad bral yongs su gyur/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can yin te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang mtho brtsam par mi nus so/ /maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang sgyu ma mkhan
22b1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i sgyu ma ni phyogs gcig pa yin pas sgyu ma yang dag pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ni yang dag pa yin te/ des na chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /maud gal gyi bu
22b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams su gdags par 'dogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma la brgya'i char
22b3(dkon brtsegs): yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ bye ba 'bum gyi char yang / grangs su yang / char yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang
22b4(dkon brtsegs): pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par kun du ston nus sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na
22b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgyan cing de thams cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la kun du ston par mdzad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ril kyis bstan par ni mi 'gyur ro/ /maud gal gyi bu phyogs
22b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gcod byed ces bya ba gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
22b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gcod par byed cing yongs su bcad nas kyang 'jig par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun du 'thor byed dang / rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi bar na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun
22b8(dkon brtsegs): nas yongs su 'jog pa zhes bya ba srid pa'i rtse mo na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/ ri phal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gang dag
23a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bar byed ces bya ba sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe ldang zhing gang gis na me lce de dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par sgrub byed
23a2(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba gang gis sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me de zhi bar byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu tshim byed ces bya ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sprin gyi dra ba gcig gis kun du khebs par byed pa
23a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor chus 'debs shes bya ba gang gis na sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe char 'bebs par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor lhag par skems shes bya ba gang gis na chus 'jig pa de lhag par skems par
23a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yod do/ /maud gal gyi bu ngas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te chos bstan pa la
23a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' thug pa med do/ /maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag gi nang du 'dug par nus sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
