23a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ maud gal gyi bu nga ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi nang du spyod lam bzhis gnas par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du 'jog par mdzad/ 'jug
23a7(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad la/ yungs 'bru de yang rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing / yungs 'bru de'i nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad kyang nye bar ston par mdzad la/ rlung de dag phan tshun thug par yang mi
23a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ ltung bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /maud gal gyi bu nga ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid de lta bu dang de ma yin pa gzhan yang tshad med pa dang ldan no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
23b1(dkon brtsegs): de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dag 'thun par tshig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/ ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che
23b2(dkon brtsegs): bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas mos par bgyid cing mos par bgyis nas kyang bla na
23b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/ de nyid kyi
23b4(dkon brtsegs): nub mo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyogs gang na grong khyer thams cad kyi btsog dgu dang / mi mthun pa thams cad 'bab pa dang 'byung ba'i sa phyogs der 'khor gyi khyams chen po dar gyi lda ldi dang / gdugs
23b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas brgyan pa/ gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ me tog bkram pa/ spos bzang po mchog gis bdugs pa/ steng du bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to/ /
23b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas
23b7(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad stong mngon par sprul to/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du yang seng ge'i khri ras bcos bu du mas g.yogs pa rin po che'i ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mngon par sprul to/ /seng ge'i khri'i
23b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yas g.yon du yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa bzhi bzhi mngon par sprul to/ /bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i zhal zas
24a1(dkon brtsegs): ro brgya dang ldan pa yang mngon par sprul to/ /rim gro byed pa gos dkar po bgos pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya yang mngon par sprul to/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bkod pa de lta bu sprul ma thag tu de nas
24a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i mod la rgyal po chen po bzhi lus chen por sprul nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams gyi bkod pa ga la ba der song nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas yongs
24a3(dkon brtsegs): su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bzang po gzhan yang kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i las bya ba la bcom ldan
24a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la bstang ba'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis shig /da nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin du ngo mtshar
24a5(dkon brtsegs): du gyur nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la gnang ba dang / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams de lta bu zhig mngon par sprul to/ /de nas yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
24a6(dkon brtsegs): byin lha'i bu sum khri dang lhan cig bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der song nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan
24a7(dkon brtsegs): drangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bzang po kho bo cag kyang / de bzhin gshegs
24a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la mchod pa'i las bya zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la bstang ba'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis
24b1(dkon brtsegs): shig / de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin du ngo mtshar du gyur nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la gnang ba dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba sum bcu
24b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba dang / yongs 'du sa brtol bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'khor gyi khyams zhig mngon par sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams des sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i bkod pa dang /
24b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bkod pa yang mog mog por byas par gyur to/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las bya ba'i
24b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mngon par brtson te lhags pa dang sbyar na/ sems can 'di ni tha mal pa ma yin pas bdag gis sems can mchog de lta bu la mtho brtsams par gyur na mi rung gis bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag dor gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas
24b5(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sprul pa'i bya ba de dag 'dor bar byed/ de dag med par byed de/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par byed cing mi snang bar bya bar brtsal kyang zhal zas dang / rim
24b6(dkon brtsegs): gro dang / 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri yang de kho na bzhin du snang ste/ gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par bya ma nus pa dang / de shin du ngo mtshar du gyur
24b7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sngon chad ni 'dod na sgyu ma ston par yang byed/ 'dod na sgyu ma med par yang byed na/ da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa med par byed ma nus so snyam
24b8(dkon brtsegs): mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po ji ltar khyod kyis
25a1(dkon brtsegs): d e bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa 'di med par bya mi nus pa de bzhin du bzang po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam thob pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa
25a2(dkon brtsegs): de yang med par mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po dga' mgu yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo
25a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod la bab pa skul bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags pa'i dus dang tshod la bab na da gdugs tshod la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gsol to/ /de
25a4(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs mnabs/ chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dang la gshegs te/ rgyal
25a5(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der gshegs te/ gang gis na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na
25a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs so snyam du shes/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul
25a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na gzhan mu stegs can dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang
25a8(dkon brtsegs): bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag gis thos pa de dag ni ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'khor gyi khyams der dong ste/ de ring dge sbyong gau ta ma la mtho 'tsham pa blta bar bya'o snyam mo/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na dad
25b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dong nas de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la bgam pa yang mnyan par bya/ cho 'phrul chen po yang blta
25b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / khengs pa nges par bcom nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
25b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i bsam pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir gshegs su gsol ba gang lags pa'i nongs pa 'chags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang zhal zas sprul pa dang /
25b4(dkon brtsegs): rim gro bgyid pa sprul pa dang / seng ge'i khri sprul pa dang / 'khor gyi khyams sprul pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems can mchog de lta bu de la bslus par gyur na mi rung gis bya ba 'di ma mchis par bgyi snyam ste shin du
25b5(dkon brtsegs): spangs kyang ma mchis par ma btub/ gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis kyang ma mchis par bgyi rngo ma thog nas zhal zas dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / seng ge'i khri dang /
25b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa yang de kho na bzhin du gda'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzang po sems can thams
25b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa yang 'di lta ste/ las kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang po dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di yang 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang po nga
25b8(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang
26a1(dkon brtsegs): po chos thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ rkyen tshogs pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang po 'on kyang nga de'i dus la bab par shes na ji ltar sprul pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang /
26a2(dkon brtsegs): bldag pa dag khyod kyis phul cig /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sprul pa'i rim gro pa de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhan cig sprul pa'i bza' ba dang /
26a3(dkon brtsegs): bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa des bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yang dag par tshim par byed do/ /de nas de'i tshe gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /sbyin
26a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni ci 'dra dang / /len par byed pa ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i chos nyid thob 'gyur bar/ /yon ni rnam par sbyong gyur cig /maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ /gdan ni ji ltar bshams pa dang / /de la gang dag
26a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa rnams/ /mi mnyam ma mchis mtshungs pa ste/ /mchod sbyin dge ba bla na med/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ rim gro byed pa'i sems gang dang / /len par byed pa'i sems gang dang / /sbyin par byed pa ji
26a6(dkon brtsegs): lta bar/ /yon ni myur du sbyong bar shog /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ gtong med sbyin pa 'di btang ba/ /len pa med pa rnams kyis blangs/ /gang dag 'dir ni gshegs pa rnams/ /de dag yon sbyong byed pa
26a7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ /kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'di ni nam mkha'i sbyin pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyis spyad/ /gang dag sems lus grol ba de/ /'jig rten dag na yon sbyong mchog /byang chub sems dpa'
26a8(dkon brtsegs): 'od tog gis smras pa/ ji lta bur na sgyu ma'i mkhan/ /bzang pos bkod pa sprul byas pa/ /dngos kun de dang 'dra ba ste/ /byis pas de ni mi rtogs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od bkod pas smras pa/
26b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar gdan dang ljon shing dag /du ma mngon par sprul byas pa/ /yid kyi sgyu ma lta bur stong / /'di la khyad par 'ga' yang med/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgras smras pa/ seng ge'i sgra ni ma thos na/ /
26b2(dkon brtsegs): wa ni nags tshal nang na sgrogs/ /de yis seng ge'i sgra thos nas/ /phyogs bcu dag tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sgyu mkhan bzang po yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong na/ /mu stegs nang du rgyal ba
26b3(dkon brtsegs): bas/ /bdag nyid mchog ces sgrogs par byed/ /bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /sgyu mas sgyu mar rtogs byed pa/ /tshad mar gyur ba gsungs nas ni/ /de la bdud kyi gting mi dpogs/ /byang chub sems
26b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ zhal zas 'di ni sprul pa ste/ /bsnyen bkur byed pa'ang sprul pa yin/ /spyod par byed pa'ang sprul pa ste/ /sbyin pa dge ba bla na med/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas
26b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ /me ni mar dang til mar gyis/ /phyi phyir zhing ni rab tu mched/ /de bzhin bzang po'i sgyu ma yis/ /sangs rgyas sgyu ma nges par bstan/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas smras pa/ /ji ltar 'di ni
26b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gnas pa/ /thams cad byed pa med pa ltar/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad ni/ /sngon gyi mtha' nas rtag tu mnyam/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin du gdul ba'i
26b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang du mdzad nas khyim bdag cig sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du zhugs nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol
26b8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /des smras pa/ bzang po thong de skad ma zer de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi de 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol zhing bzhugs so/ /sgyu
27a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol bar mthong ngo / /de nas
27a2(dkon brtsegs): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gnyis pa zhig mngon par sprul nas de nang du zhugs te/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol ba byed
27a3(dkon brtsegs): do/ /des smras pa/ thod de skad ma zer de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu kun du rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing bzhugs so/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi
27a4(dkon brtsegs): mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu kun du rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar mthong ngo / /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gzhan zhig sprul te/ de nang du
27a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do/ /des smras pa/ bzang po thod de skad ma zer de bzhin gshegs
27a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni 'tsho byed kyi bskyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston cing bzhugs so/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho byed kyi bskyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston
27a7(dkon brtsegs): par mthong ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sgyu ma mkhan bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di gdugs
27a8(dkon brtsegs): tshod gsol bar byed do/ /des smras pa/ bzang po thod de skad ma zer de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston cing
27b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs so/ /bzang pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na chos ston par mthong ngo / /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos shing ljon pa sprul pa ji snyed pa de thams cad
27b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lo ma thams cad dang / me tog thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo / /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag
27b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo / /rgyal
27b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na rtsig pa'am/ khyim 'am/ khang bzangs sam/ srang ngam/ lam po che ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin
27b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po bdag nyid phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa 'chags par mthong zhing / de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang
27b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i mig lam na gang cung zad ci snang ba de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan cung zad kyang ma mthong nas de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur to/ /de
27b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis dad pa rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /de ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
27b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /bzhed na brgya phrag stong las lhag gyur cing / /dper na gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas mang po sprul par mdzad pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul de la mos/ /bdag
28a1(dkon brtsegs): gis sngon bslabs sgyu ma'i sa ma lags/ /'dzam bu'i gling na bdag 'dra med snyam na/ /de ring rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'di mthong nas/ /'di yi grangs dang char yang ma phod do/ /bdag gi sha yi mig gis
28a2(dkon brtsegs): gang mthong ba/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /chos kyi rgyal po la ni 'di dag zhus/ /rgyal ba yang dag gang lags bka' stsol cig /gang zhig mchod na legs par mchod pa lags/ /gang la
28a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba lags/ /gang gi byang chub 'thun par gzung ba 'di/ /kun du spyan gyis bdag la bka' stsol cig /de ring 'jig rten mgon bgam bgyis pa yi/ /nongs pa gang lags de 'dir kun du 'chags/ /
28a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sems can mchog la gus mi gnas/ /sems can de dag rgyal ba'i bde las nyams/ /bdag la lha dang brgya byin tshangs pa dang / /'khor 'dus gyur ba 'di dag kun gson cig /sems can thams cad rab tu
28a5(dkon brtsegs): dgrol slad du/ /byang chub sems ni bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer/ /bdud rtsi bde bas yang dag tshim par bgyi/ /gnyid kyis rab log sems can shes rab kyi/ /
28a6(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang sgrub pas rnam par sad par bgyi/ /rnam par 'phrul ba 'di 'dra mthong gyur cing / /bde bar gshegs bka' yid 'ong ye shes dang / /chags pa med pa'i spyod mchog thos nas ni/ /su zhig dag pa'i rgyu sems
28a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed mi bgyid/ /byang chub sems mkhas ji ltar spyod pa yi/ /byang chub lam ni bdag la bshad du gsol/ /gang la nyan thos rnams kyis mi dpogs pa'i/ /de dag rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta bu/ /mnyan par 'dod
28a8(dkon brtsegs): la gus pa ji lta bu/ /des pa rnams kyi spyod lam ci 'dra ba/ /bdag la the tsom ma mchis de bzhin gsungs/ /ji ltar thos pa tshol la goms pa lags/ /thos pa snying por bgyid pa'i dang po gang / /gzhan la
28b1(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar ston pa ji lta bu/ /srog chags thams cad ji ltar chos la dad/ /ji ltar 'di dag shes kyi khe mi tshol/ /zang zing med pa'i sems la ji ltar gnas/ /byas pa shes shing rab tu phan 'dogs dang / /sems can
28b2(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed gnas par ji ltar 'gyur/ /grogs po gang dag bsten bgyi ji lta bu/ /sdig pa'i grogs rnams ji ltar rnam par spong / /ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur/ /de dag mthong nas ji ltar mchod par bgyi/ /ji
28b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar bslab pa dag la gus pa lags/ /de yi bslab pa bca' ba gang zhig lags/ /tshul khrims ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin rnam par dag pa ji ltar 'thob/ /ji ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba
28b4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ /tshul bzhin ma lags ji ltar spong ba lags/ /ji ltar shin du nges par bsams yid dang / /nyon mongs bdud kyi 'ching bas mi thub lags/ /ji ltar dad ldan don ni sems bgyid cing / /sems kyis
28b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni mi gtong lags/ /ji ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid cing / /nor mchog 'dzin pa med la dpa' ba lags/ /ji ltar sems can spyod la 'jug pa dang / /thabs dang byams pa'i snying rje gnas
28b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/ /mngon par shes pa ji ltar yongs rdzogs 'gyur/ /dran dang blo gros gang gis rnam dag cing / /so so yang dag rig gzungs bzod par 'gyur/ /smon lam rnam dag spyod las mi ldog cing / /zab mo shes
28b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan don dam mkhas pa lags/ /smon lam thams cad ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar de dag pha rol phyin 'phags shing / /de bzhin byang chub rjes su 'thun par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun
28b8(dkon brtsegs): shes shing / /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa mi ldog pa/ /kun mkhyen legs par don bsams shes rab mtsho/ /ye shes 'byung gnas 'di ni bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan phan yon bdag la bstan du gsol/ /
29a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis nan tan snying por bgyi bar 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la slar tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos kun sprul bar gang gis shes pa de/ /sangs rgyas bye
29a2(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag stong sprul par byed/ /sprul pa de dag zhing rnams bye bar 'gro/ /de dag song nas sems can bye ba 'grel/ /ji ltar bzang po khyod kyis gzugs med las/ /sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs ni ston byed cing / /de dag
29a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med cing 'gag med la/ /'gro med 'ong med gnas pa med pa ltar/ /bzang po skyes bu khyu mchog rgyal ba yis/ /phung po dge 'dun tshogs bcas sprul de 'dra/ /de dang ye shes med par mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas
29a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yin/ /ji ltar sgyu mas rmongs byas skye bo ni/ /sems can yod min de la nga rgyal med/ /'di la grub pa med cing rdzas yod min/ /phyin ci log gi sems kyis mthong ba ltar/ /de bzhin sangs
29a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gzugs med kha dog dang / /dbyibs min spyod pa ston yang spyod lam med/ /'jig tshogs lta bas kun nas bslang ba yin/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas snyam du 'du shes shing / /sangs rgyas gzugs su mi blta mtshan
29a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ni/ /na tshod rigs su ma yin sgra dang ni/ /'chang bar 'gyur ba ma yin sems dang ni/ /rnam shes yid kyis rab tu phye ba min/ /chos nyid gang yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /dus gsum stong zhing mtshan yang
29a7(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes pa/ /rtag tu sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol/ /de la bgrang bas rab tu phye ba med/ /sangs rgyas 'byung gang chos nyid 'byung ba med/ /de la phung po yod min khams mi 'byung / /chos de gnas pa mi g.yo
29a8(dkon brtsegs): ston pa med/ /de ni mig lnga'i gnas kyang ma yin no/ /gang zhig bdag gis sangs rgyas blta snyam sems/ /des ni gzhar yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/ /'dren pa mthong ba med pa mthong ba ste/ /
29b1(dkon brtsegs): dper na nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /bzang po gang khyod cung zad sangs rgyas lta/ /de kun don gcig yin par shes par gyis/ /nga dang gzhan gang yin pa de kun mtshungs/ /bar snang mthong dang 'dra bar mnyam pa yin/ /
29b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ting 'dzin mnyam zhing shes rab mnyam/ /de dag rnam par grol bar mnyam pa yin/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong dang stobs dang ni/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan kun gyis mnyam pa yin/ /de dag stong don go 'phang gnas par
29b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam/ /thams cad chags pa med pa'i chos nyid gnas/ /kun kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol/ /de dag 'byung ba med par 'gyur ba yin/ /bzang po rgyal ba gcig la mchod byed na/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs
29b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la ni mchod 'gyur te/ /'di ltar de dag nga yi chos dbyings dang / /tha dad bya ba nam yang yod ma yin/ /de dag thams cad yon bzhes sbyong bar mdzad/ /kun la phul ba'ang 'bras bu che bar 'gyur/ /de kun chos nyid
29b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa mnyam pa brnyes/ /sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad bya ba'ang med/ /rgyal ba yang dag gang yin bshad bya yis/ /rtse gcig sems dang dran pa nyer gzhag cing / /chos tshul rtogs pa rnam par lta bas de/ /legs
29b6(dkon brtsegs): par nges bsams sems kyis nga las nyon/ /bzang po de kun ma bskyed yang dag min/ /phyin ci log gis de kun mthong bar zad/ /gal te dngos po'i ngo bo yang dag na/ /dngos po thams cad du ni zad mi 'gyur/ /de
29b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir shin du ma skyes yang dag min/ /de dag skye med zad la gnas pa med/ /des na bltar med ngo bo de dag snang / /rnam par bltas na gnas pa yod ma yin/ /ji ltar bzang pos rgyal ba mthong ba dang / /ji ltar phyogs su
29b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul mthong ba/ /gang dag phung po rgya chen rten stobs dang / /phung po lnga po'ang de dang 'dra bar ltos/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste/ /sems can dang ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid med/ /mtshan
30a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid med la mtshan du 'dod pa de/ /sangs rgyas las ni shin du ring bar 'gyur/ /chos yod ma yin kun du rtog pas bslad/ /dngos po med par yang ni brten nas shes/ /byed pa med cing byed pa
30a2(dkon brtsegs): po las 'das/ /ming du 'dzin pas stong pa rab tu ston/ /gang gis rgyu dang byed po rkyen min shes/ /des ni chags bral gyur ba'i chos kyang shes/ /'dod chags bral ba'i chos ni shes gyur na/ /des ni rnam
30a3(dkon brtsegs): dag mig gis sangs rgyas mthong / /yang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag brjod de bstan pa na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po chos la nges par rtog pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa chung ngu skyes so/ /srog chags lnga stong ni bla na
30a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sngon ma bskyed pa skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas
30a5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa de gsol nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i yon yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang gis sbyin dang gang la sbyin/ /sbyin pa ji ltar mi rtog pa/ /sbyin pa mnyam
30a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de nyid ni/ /bzang po la ni yongs rdzogs shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams 'di rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du dgung bdun du
30a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing mi gda' bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyis khyams de ji ltar rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du zhag bdun du gnas shing mi snang bar mi 'gyur bar
30a8(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlab par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos bstan pa'i
30b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir bzhugs so/ /dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za de dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo / /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang
30b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig
30b3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur
30b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bshad du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzang po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
30b5(dkon brtsegs): zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di
30b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang /
30b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la ngoms mi shes pa nyid dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
30b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa yin te/
31a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / gnas yongs su dag pa dang / shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di
31a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni gang la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting mi dpogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam gtan zlog pa dang / sems kyis rnam par 'byed pa dang /
31a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / spobs pa dang / skad sna tshogs pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phags pa'i spyod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
31a4(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang / de na gnas na sems can rnams la byams pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes pa ste bzhi po de dag yin no/ /
31a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sri zhu che zhing gus pa la gnas pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems rtag du dga' ba dang /
31a6(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal dang / dregs pa spong ba dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du sgrub pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dus
31a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / tshod shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / yang dag pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na the tshom med pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyod pa kun
31a8(dkon brtsegs): nas ldang ba rnam par gnon pa dang / mkhas pa dang shes rab chen po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / thos pa'i don sems pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing gleng pa gang yin pa yang byams pas gleng gi skyon
31b1(dkon brtsegs): gtsor byed pas ma yin pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na thos pa tshol bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag dang gzhan gyi shes rab sbyong ba dang /
31b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom gcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa zad mi shes pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems
31b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ thos nas chos bye brag tu shes pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no/ /thos nas bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no/ /thos nas gzhan
31b4(dkon brtsegs): la ston par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no/ /thos nas don de nyid rnam par grol ba 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la gtod par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin te/ bzhi po de dag
31b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ las byas nas kyang zas la yongs su spyod pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
31b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed pa dang / gzhan gyi phyogs mthu chung bar byed pa dang / chos 'dod pa'i lha rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing de dag gis bsrungs pas bdud kyis
31b7(dkon brtsegs): glags mi rnyed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag la chos ston par byed cing 'di'i tshig gi
31b8(dkon brtsegs): lam gzung bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / ngang tshul bzang zhing mnyen pa dang / bdag nyid kyi chos sgrub pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang
32a1(dkon brtsegs): po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes kyi khe las 'byol zhing zang zing med par chos ston pa yang yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba las 'jigs bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang
32a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du 'dzi don du gnyer ba dang / pha rol rjes su srung ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba dang /
32a3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan byang chub yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang / las byas pa chud mi gzon pa dang / bdag nyid la byams pa ltar gzhan la yang byams pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i
32a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsal don du gnyer ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bzod pa'i stobs kyi go bgos pa dang / lan du phan
32a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs par cung zad kyang re ba med pa dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba dang / log par zhugs pa rnams mi spong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /
32a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par bya ba'i grogs po yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gang dag 'di'i byang
32a7(dkon brtsegs): chub nye bar ston par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi dge ba'i grogs po yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ theg pa dman pa ston pa dang / byang chub kyi
32a8(dkon brtsegs): sems la 'dun pa zlog par byed pa dang / gang dag bstan na mi dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos
32b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dran pa rtse gcig pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du sgrogs pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag
32b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam 'debs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/ yon gnas mchog la
32b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mchod na byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i
32b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa mngon sum du mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzang po byang chub sems dpas phan yon bzhi po de dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur ro/ /bzang po
32b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas don gyi dbang bzhi mthong na bslab pa lhur len par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde 'gro 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang / smon lam yongs
32b6(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba dang / pha
32b7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa mnyan pa la mi sgrag pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
32b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi spong ba dang / lta ba bag la nyal dang bcas par yang dag par 'joms pa ste/ bzang po bzhi
33a1(dkon brtsegs): po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzi med pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang /
33a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rnyog pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar rton pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin
33a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes nas byang chub kyi sems mngon du byed pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dag la 'dris par byed pa dang / nges pa la mi 'jug pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
33a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang / rnal
33a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor spyod pa dag la ma mos pa dang / dgongs pa dag la mi dga' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'du mi byed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog pa bya ba yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di
33a6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems kyi nges par bsam pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa dang
33a7(dkon brtsegs): po yin no/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams shes par bya zhing de dag gi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o/ /snyam pa 'di ni sems
33a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis nges par bsam pa gnyis pa yin no/ /bdag gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud kyi dpung pham bar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag
33b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gsum pa yin no/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig gis go bar byas te chos bstan par bya'o snyam
33b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa bzhi pa yin te/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin no/ /bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul
33b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyor ba dang / chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa ste/ bzang po chos bzhi po de dag ni bdud 'dul ba yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
33b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang zag med pa'i phyir chos rnams brten nas skye ba yin gyi chos 'ga' yang rgyu med par ni mi skye ba dang / brten nas skye ba'i chos gang yin pa de ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med
33b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir chud mi za ba ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams mi gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
33b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam mi 'dor ba dang / yongs su skyo ba bzod pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin
33b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su smin pa la chos ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang / dus dus su skul bas dran par byed pa yongs su gtong ba dang / bdag nyid kyi
33b8(dkon brtsegs): bde ba spangs nas gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ston pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
34a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na ma bsdus pa sdud par byed pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la yang mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzhan gyi don byed par spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / nges
34a2(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug
34a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / ye shes thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen por gyur ba tshad med pa la 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid sgom zhing rnam par grol ba dang ma
34a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ tha na nyon
34a5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i sems la yang rung na dge ba'i sems la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / sems can thams cad chos kyi snod nyid yin par lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud pas chos thams cad log pa nyid du nges pa yin par lta ba
34a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par grol bar 'dod pas snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i 'du shes sgom par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par
34a7(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab par bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag
34a8(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskul bar bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya
34b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan las bzla'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa ste/ bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje yin te/
34b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan song du skyes pa rnams bde 'gro'i lam la 'god pa'i snying rje dang / sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje dang / theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par
34b3(dkon brtsegs): len du 'jug pa'i snying rje dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa 'thob
34b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dang sems yang ba dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la gus pa dang / rim gro'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhi gnas la rtse gcig tu gyur bas rnam
34b5(dkon brtsegs): par g.yeng ba med pa yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang / chos la
34b6(dkon brtsegs): rton pa yin gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge mi zad par shes nas chags pa med cing thogs pa med par ston pas ston par byed pa ste bzhi po de dag yin
34b7(dkon brtsegs): no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du thos pas ngoms mi shes pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la chos bzhin du gus par bsnyen bkur byed
34b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rtag du gzhan dag la chos ston par brtson pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa la 'jug pa yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
35a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshogs pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa'
35a2(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas
35a3(dkon brtsegs): par chos nyan pa dang / thos pas khengs pa med pa dang / thos pa nyung ngu rnams la brnyas par mi byed pa ste bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgyur ba ste/ bzhi
35a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug sgyur ba dang / nyan thos las sgyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas las sgyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos la 'du shes sgyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /
35a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rtogs par byed pa dang / dgongs pa rtogs par byed
35a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang / 'di ltar stod pa'i don du chos de dag thams cad don gcig par rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor
35a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na smon lam 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims dang bslab pa yongs su dag pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / g.yo
35a8(dkon brtsegs): sgyu med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa la sems dbang byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na pha rol tu phyin
35b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa gcig gi nang du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan thams cad kyang sdud
35b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pas de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyang shes pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos rnam par dag pa gcig gi tshul rtogs
35b3(dkon brtsegs): pas chos gzhan dag gi rnam par dag pa yang shes pa dang / chos nyid yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu mos pa ste/ bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na pha rol du phyin pa thams cad
35b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa 'di bshad pa na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing
35b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / yid bde bar gyur nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'dzum pa mdzad
35b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer grangs med dpag tu med pa bkye pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer des khyab par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan
35b7(dkon brtsegs): las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
35b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyu ma mchis pa dang / rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to/ /ye shes 'byung gnas gzi brjid gzhal yas shes rab grags/ /
36a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum du yon tan pha rol phyin brnyes grags/ /rgyal ba rang byung gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan pa/ /mi yi dbang pos de ni bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /phyogs rnams na ni 'gro bar sems can ji snyed gnas/ /de dag kun
36a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams dang ni/ /dman dang mchog dang tha ma bar ma rgyu ldan mkhyen/ /ji slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bdag la bstan du gsol/ /lha dang de bzhin zhugs 'bar sgra ni gang lags dang / /mi 'am ci dang mi dang brgya byin lha min dang / /
36a3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding lto 'phye tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra gzhan rnams/ /sangs rgyas rdul bral gsung sgra'i char yang ga la spyod/ /'od bzang nyi ma'i 'od dang nor bu'i 'od rnams dang / /brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od rnams ji snyed pa/ /ji ltar sangs
36a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od kyis khyab par gda' pa ltar/ /'od rnams de dag thams cad rnam par gsal ma lags/ /sangs rgyas zhing de zab mo'i chos ni rjes su thob/ /stong pa bdag med sems can gang zag med mkhyen nas/ /yod dang med
36a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas su/ /dus gsum chu zla 'dra bar rab tu mkhyen pa po/ /deng 'dir su zhig theg pa'i mchog la sems btud de/ /su zhig sangs rgyas rigs dang chos kyi rigs la gnas/ /su zhig dkon
36a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog gsum po rgya cher skyed par bgyid/ /gang gi ched du 'dzum pa mdzad pa legs par gsungs/ /gal te rgyal ba nyan thos rnams la don ldan gsung / /de tshe bde gshegs 'dzum pa zhabs kyi pus mor nub/ /gal te rkyen gyi theg
36a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gsung na phrag par nub/ /gal te sangs rgyas theg gsung de tshe spyi bor nub/ /ji ltar khyod kyis 'od zer 'bum snyed rab btang ba/ /bde bar gshegs kyi gtsug tu nub par gyur lags na/ /phan mdzad lha yi lha ste
36a8(dkon brtsegs): phan pa mdzad pa po/ /'di ni sangs rgyas theg par lung ston dgos ma mchis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang
36b1(dkon brtsegs): po mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu bzang po 'di ni bskal pa dgu khri nyis stong na bskal pa legs par sprul pa la 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen por de bzhin
36b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
36b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po de ni 'byor par 'gyur/ rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / mi dang skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam
36b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ka tsa lin di ltar reg na 'jam pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa dang / rol mo sna tshogs sgrogs pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng
36b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo bza' ba dang / btung ba ni dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod ltar bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ mi de dag gi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo
36b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po de rtag tu bkod pa thams cad nye bar ston par byed de/ des na 'jig rten gyi khams de bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag
36b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa de dag thams cad rgya chen po la mos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag tu 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po'i tshe'i tshad ni lo khrir 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan
36b8(dkon brtsegs): las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par grags pa'i
37a1(dkon brtsegs): ' og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi khyab bdag ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par grags pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya
37a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'da'o/ /de nas rigs kyi bu bzang po bar snang de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs
37a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin nyid las slar ma log pa'i de bzhin gshegs
37a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / dbyer ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma tshang ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin nyid
37a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba bzhin du bdag kyang de skad mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rigs kyi bu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob bam ci na khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
37a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba ltar khyod de skad smra/ bzang pos smras pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid thob pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin
37a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid dbyer med pa nyid du thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa gang yin pa der kho bo yang chud cing ji ltar kho bo chud pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chud la/ ji ltar sems can thams cad chud pa de bzhin
37a8(dkon brtsegs): du chos thams cad kyang chud pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo gnyis su med pa ni gang na kun du shes pa med pa nyid dang / yongs su
37b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa med pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su shes pa'i shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bzang po ni lha dang bcas
37b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ sngon yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyis mgo rmongs par bgyis so/ /da yang shes rab dang / ye shes kyis mgo rmongs par bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi spobs pa ni de lta bu lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas
37b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzang po khyod lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par byed pa bden nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mgo rmongs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag kyang mgo rmong
37b4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs par bgyid pa chen
37b5(dkon brtsegs): po lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi/ 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/
37b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par gsung ba bka' stsol ba lta lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi yul ga la lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba
37b7(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /khyod ji skad smra ba de kho na bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa
37b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni mgo rmongs pa chen po yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi/ 'chi 'pho ba dang 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/ 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am/
38a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang med do/ /de nas rigs kyi bu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
38a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung shig /de nas byams pas rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so/ /rab tu rdzogs
38a3(dkon brtsegs): par bsnyen nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha dog dang / rtags dang / tshul gyis rab tu byung ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe
38a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mtshan ma thams cad la chags pa ma mchis la sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du khams gsum na yang mi gnas na de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu byung ba lags
38a5(dkon brtsegs): so/ /yang de'i tshe bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags lnga stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam
38a6(dkon brtsegs): par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di'i ming ji skad gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
38a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig /rim gyis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig /kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
38a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa bya bar 'dod pa de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya bcad par bya bklag par bya gzhan dag la yang bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang gis 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan pa des ni de bzhin gshegs
38b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong ba yin/ des ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i
38b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig / chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /kun dga' bo chos gang dag gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di yang yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni theg pa
38b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di las yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes/ kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o/ /khong du chud par bya'o/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du byed pa 'am/ lus
38b4(dkon brtsegs): la srel ba de'i lus la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yin na gang dag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
38b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skul ba zhes bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa thams cad
38b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du gyur ba'i slad du lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi bu bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
38b7(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa
38b8(dkon brtsegs): las sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
39a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ste cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa/ bam po dang po/
39a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pra te hAr+ya nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
39a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong
39a4(dkon brtsegs): stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i bu ded dpon zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te
39a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
39a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa cho 'phrul du zhig gis sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu nga ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul
39a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rdzod pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/
39a8(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum po rnams la ma dad pa rnams
39b1(dkon brtsegs): dad par mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag gang la da ltar byung ba na nyes par spyad pa'i gzhi ngan song dang / ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba dag skye
39b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no/ /zhes kun rdzod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus ngan song rnams las thar nas lha dang mi dag tu
39b3(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur zhing / theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang na nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
39b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing
39b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyes bar byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no/ /zhes de kho na bzhin du kun rdzod par mdzad pa dang
39b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'dod pa'i khams rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi skye mched gang yang rung ba dag
39b7(dkon brtsegs): tu skye bar 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta
39b8(dkon brtsegs): bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba di dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de kho na bzhin du
40a1(dkon brtsegs): kun rjod cing lung ston par mdzad pa dang / dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ dman pa 'am/ bar ma 'am/ mchog gam/ tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi gda' ste/
40a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ bslab pa bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang
40a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba'o/ /'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /'di ni bsten par bya ba'o/ /'di ni bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /'di ni sgrub pa'o/ /'di ni log par sgrub pa'o/ /chos 'di dag ni
40a4(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di dag ni rnam par byang ba'i cha dang 'thun pa'o zhes de ltar yon tan thams cad yang dag par blang ba rjes su ston pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad sbang
40a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rjes su ston pa dang / dge ba'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad rjes su ston pa dang / lam 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /lam 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs
40a6(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /lam 'di ni theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes rjes su ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na gnas gang yin pa de rjes su 'thob
40a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin/ skabs ma yin te/ de ni gnas med do/ /las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su khrid par byed do/ /las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni dud
40a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su khrid par byed do/ /las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su khrid par byed do/ /las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni lha rnams su khrid par byed do/ /las 'di
40b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blangs na ni mi rnams su khrid par byed do/ /de la gang dag mi dge ba spangs nas dge ba yang dag par blang ba'i phyir 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams su
40b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / tshul de lta bus kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / rmongs pa med pa rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs
40b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas
40b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kun tu ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ gcig tu gyur nas du mar 'gyur ro/ /du mar gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro/ /rtsig
40b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang thad kar 'gro'o/ /ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro'o/ /ri la yang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o/ /sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul byed de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la yang mi nub
40b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste dper na mdab chags bya ba bzhin no/ /lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed cing lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun bab par byed do/ /lus
40b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed cing lus kyi stod nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/ /nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang lag pas 'dzin cing
40b8(dkon brtsegs): kun du nyug par byed do/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang kun tu 'bar bar ston te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya
41a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par ci dang ci lta bus sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dag mngon par sgrub par byed do/ /de ni de
41a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no/ /lha'i bu nga ni cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad
41a3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ci zhig mnga' lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu yod do/ /de nas bcom ldan
41a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang thos na zab mo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
41a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyang shin du tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya
41a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs la khyod spobs par gyis shig de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
41a7(dkon brtsegs): p a ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i chab kyi phung po gang lags pa de thams cad phyag gi khyor ba ya cig tu stsal kyang chab kyi sems can rnams la yang gnod par
41a8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni cho 'phrul 'di mnga' lags so/ /yang 'di ni cho 'phrul dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma
41b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma mchis pa dang / dbyangs ma mchis pa dang /
41b2(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi lam ma mchis pa dang / rgyu mtshan ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa dang / spyod pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam pa rig ba
41b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang / byang ba dang / phra ba dang / mthong bar
41b4(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba dang / brtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yi ge dang / nges ba'i tshig dang / brda dang / tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis
41b5(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag gzhan dag la rnam par rig par mdzad pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de'i gting mi rtogs shing / dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma
41b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / yongs su rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze thams cad dngang zhing 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de
41b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhal gyi sgor stsal kyang gling chen po bzhi pa'i sems can rnams dang / dgung zla dang / gdugs dag dang / khor yug rnams
41b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / ran dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang / slar phyung ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod kyang sems can rnams kyis 'di ltar bdag cag yul gang
42a1(dkon brtsegs): du bkod pa dang / bdag cag yul gang nas bton pa yang ma 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/ /'di ni cho 'phrul chen
42a2(dkon brtsegs): po dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / de
42a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sbyar te/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang / byang ba dang / phra ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / brtag
42a4(dkon brtsegs): tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dang / tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis
42a5(dkon brtsegs): chos de bstan pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul de dag thams cad ni mtshan ma'i
42a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kun nas 'dren par mdzad pa lags so/ /'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu tha snyad
42a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / srog ma mchis pa la srog tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gso ba ma mchis pa la gso bar tha snyad 'dogs pa
42a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zag ma mchis pa la gang zag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed las skyes ma mchis pa la shed las skyes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa la shed bur tha snyad 'dogs
42b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ming ma mchis pa la ming du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa la gzugs su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa la tshor bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du
42b2(dkon brtsegs): shes ma mchis pa la 'du shes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa la 'du byed rnams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa la rnam par shes
42b3(dkon brtsegs): par tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / phung po ma mchis pa la phung por tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / khams ma mchis pa la khams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / skye mched ma mchis pa la skye mched du tha
42b4(dkon brtsegs): snyad 'dogs pa dang / mig stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo / snyam du mi sems pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang gzugs
42b5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa
42b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus dang / reg bya dang /
42b7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / chos rnams stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang
42b8(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag cag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems te/
43a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bems po dang / sems pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag sems can gzhan
43a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zag gzhan dag la yang dag par go bar mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni mig dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs dang ldan
43a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ rna ba dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sgra dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/
43a4(dkon brtsegs): sna dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ dri dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lce dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ ro dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lce'i rnam par
43a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ reg bya dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid dang ldan pa yang ma lags/
43a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags te/ de lta bu'i cho 'phrul de ni yul ma mchis pa'i cho 'phrul lags so/ /de ni yul dang bral ba'i cho 'phrul
43a7(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni lus dang ldan par blta ba ma lags/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang ldan par blta ba ma lags te/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba
43a8(dkon brtsegs): mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni phung po lnga po dag lags te/ phung po lnga po mi rtag pa de la byis pa rnams mngon par zhen cing / de dag gis phung po
43b1(dkon brtsegs): lnga po dag rtag par bzung ba'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag rtag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag
43b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bde zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi
43b3(dkon brtsegs): ches lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag bdag ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po
43b4(dkon brtsegs): dag sdug ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag mi sdug go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag gi zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag bdag
43b5(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag yang dag pa zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag yang dag pa ma lags so zhes bshad na
43b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so/ /cho 'phrul de la ni sems rangs par mi 'gyur
43b7(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/ /cho 'phrul de ni mig tu bgrang ba ma lags/ gzugs su bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul
43b8(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/ /cho 'phrul de ni rna bar bgrang ba ma lags/ sgrar bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar
44a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid du bgrang ba ma lags/ chos su bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid dang chos kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/ /cho
44a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul de ni shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags/ rangs par bgyid pa ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /stong pa nyid ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na stong pa nyid rjod pa de
44a3(dkon brtsegs): ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mtshan ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa
44a4(dkon brtsegs): lags na smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /
44a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na skye ba ma mchis pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /'byung ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na 'byung ba ma mchis pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags
44a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ /dngos po ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na dngos po ma mchis pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni
44a7(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul lags so/ /'gag pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na 'gag pa ma mchis pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mya ngan las
44a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /'di lta ste/ bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems can du kun du 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum
44b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /'di lta ste/ lus g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang / ngag rjod pa ma mchis pa dang / sems rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i
44b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /'di lta ste/ sred par sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems skad cig tu 'jig pa dang / lus dang sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs
44b3(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'i bzod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /'di lta ste/ blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus de ni cho
44b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul lags so/ /'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang / phyi rol tu rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / sems bsags pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan de ni cho 'phrul lags
44b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ /'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa bor ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i shes rab de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos
44b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni rnam par bral ba ma mchis pa lags na de dag rnam par bral bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags na rang gi ngo bo dang bral bar bshad pa de ni cho
