44b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na yi ges kun du phye ste/ bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags na 'ong
44b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang 'gro bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa lags na 'byung bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni mngon par rtogs pa gcig pa
45a1(dkon brtsegs): lags na 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni ro gcig pa lags na theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos
45a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings dbyer ma mchis pa lags na chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas gcig pa lags na sangs rgyas dpag tu ma mchis par bshad
45a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ zhing thams cad ni zhing gcig pa lags na zhing sna tshogs bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig pa lags na sems can gyi
45a4(dkon brtsegs): rim pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni chos gcig pa lags na tha ma dang mchog dang bar mar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni rnam par bsgrubs pa ma mchis
45a5(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa lags na gzhan la rnam par rig par bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /
45a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na ji tsam du brjod pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni cho 'phrul yin
45a7(dkon brtsegs): no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin pas de dag la rjod pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad
45a8(dkon brtsegs): pa na lha'i bu khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus
45b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu ci khyod cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ lha'i bu smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo nyid kyang cho 'phrul yin na de la kho bo
45b2(dkon brtsegs): skrag par 'gyur du ci yod/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad smras/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni 'pho ba med pa yin na de la dge
45b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mi dge ba'i chos 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis kho bo lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di yang thob pa'i
45b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de ni sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed do/ /de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi
45b5(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /
45b6(dkon brtsegs): klu rnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yang
45b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/ de lta bas na chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ /yang gnas brtan shA ra
45b8(dkon brtsegs): dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du lha'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa de thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ zhes zer ba ni btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa
46a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa des nam mkha'i khams skrag par 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa des
46a2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i khams skrag par mi 'gyur na kho bo yang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu ci khyod nam mkha' yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni nam mkha' yin no/ /smras
46a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi nam mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams
46a4(dkon brtsegs): su gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid nam mkha'i khams ma yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni yin no/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi
46a5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin can yin no/ /smras pa lha'i bu ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin du khyod nyid kyang ring po mi thogs par cho 'phrul de dag nyid nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu cho 'phrul
46a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni nye bar bstan par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ cho 'phrul de dag ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
46a7(dkon brtsegs): bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu ded dpon 'di de lta bu ston pa las na 'dis ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis shing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la yang bsnyen
46a8(dkon brtsegs): bkur bgyis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas
46b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byas pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyur ba de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa mngon par dga' ba zhes
46b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
46b3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams bde
46b4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can rnams bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas shing sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam yang med la 'jig rten gyi khams de
46b5(dkon brtsegs): yang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang / dngul dang / bai dur+ya dang / shel las grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar reg na 'jam zhing mi khom pa dang / ngan song rnams dang bral la lha dang
46b6(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyis kun du gang zhing yid la bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag 'byor la bde ba tshad med pa dang ldan pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
46b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig ste/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ shes rab kyi snang ba thob pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa/ spobs pa mi tshod pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed
46b8(dkon brtsegs): cing ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par shes pa khong du chud pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang
47a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du chos kyi sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags
47a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang /
47a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtan pa dang / blo rgya mtsho'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / shes rab la shin du
47a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas shin du zhugs
47a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
47a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i gsung rab la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/ gling bzhi'i dbang phyug /
47a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/ mi'i dbang por gyur ba zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de'i bu stong du tshang bar gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag
47a8(dkon brtsegs): go/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de yang btsun mo'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
47b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang / mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu stong
47b2(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig / btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu chos la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
47b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo 'bum tshang bar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman
47b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas rtag par rgyun du de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon sum du nyin gcig mi
47b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chad par rang gi lag nas gus par phul zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos nyan pa la yang 'jug par gyur to/ /de bu dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lo 'bum 'das nas kyang yang dang yang
47b6(dkon brtsegs): du sangs rgyas mthong zhing yang dang yang du de la chos mnyan pas rjes su dran pa bzhi thob par gyur to/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / sbyin pa dang ldan
47b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ste/ rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag thob par gyur to/ /rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pas nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos
47b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ba dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /de nas du gzhan zhig na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de chos
48a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
48a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas rjes su gdams pa mdzad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
48a3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan mchis
48a4(dkon brtsegs): lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka'
48a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po cho 'phrul de dag ma yin pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan yang yod do/ /de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa rnams bshad pa dang /
48a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang sems las byung ba 'gags pa rnams bshad pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa dang / ma skyes ma byung ba'i lam bshad pa dang / rnam par
48a7(dkon brtsegs): thar pa'i sgo ro gcig pa dang / yan lag gsum du smos pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam pa med pa dang /
48a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang / phyin ci log dang / nyon mongs pas grub pa'i
48b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / byas pa med pa'i chos
48b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod pa dang / 'byung ba med cing skad cig pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / lus dang sems dben ba'i chos rnams la brtson
48b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yengs pa med pa'i chos rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod pa dang / pha rol dang tshu rol med pa'i chos rnams
48b4(dkon brtsegs): la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod pa dang / brtag pa dang bsal ba med pa'i chos rnams la thabs la mkhas pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / rton pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pa sgom pa dang / bya
48b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang / gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams la snying rjes sbyor ba dang / dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dga' ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms sgom pa dang / shes
48b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang / thos pa med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / dmigs pa dang
48b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yod pa dang / sems dang
48b8(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / sgra dang / brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
49a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i spong ba sgom pa dang / dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po bstan pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam chung ba med pa'i chos rnams la
49a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs yongs su rjod pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang / khyad par med pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang / zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams
49a3(dkon brtsegs): la zhi gnas skyed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das
49a4(dkon brtsegs): pa smos pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de dang / bu stong po de dag dang / btsun mo'i
49a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs de dag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te de lta de ltar chos bstan pa dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /rgyal
49a6(dkon brtsegs): po dge ba'i bkod pa dang / de'i bu stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de dag gis bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gis spobs pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
49a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni/ /lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar/ /de
49a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni/ /chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes/ /ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba yis/ /mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzod spu yang / /sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar bgyid/ /
49b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar zla ba nya ba yi/ /zla ba yongs rdzogs lhad de ltar/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa yi/ /'jig rten mgon yang lhad de lags/ /ji ltar me tog pad ma ni/ /chab kyi nang du mi gos ltar/ /de bzhin
49b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po yang / /'jig rten chos kyis mi gos lags/ /ji ltar seng ge ri dgas rgyal/ /nags na sgra skad sgrogs pa ltar/ /de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang / /stong pa nyid kyi sgra skad sgrogs/ /mchis
49b3(dkon brtsegs): sam yang na ma mchis dang / /mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang / /mthar ltar ba las rnam 'das pa/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /skye ba'am yang na 'jig pa'ang rung / /de dag mtshan mar bstan mdzad
49b4(dkon brtsegs): cing / /mi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /pha rol dang ni tshu rol dag /de dag rnam par rtog par bstan/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas pa/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /
49b5(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs rnams byang ba/ /de gnyis mtshan nyid ma mchis te/ /shin du dri ma ma mchis chos/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhe bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni/ /yongs su rtog las byung ba ste/ /rtog
49b6(dkon brtsegs): bral rnam rtog ma mchis pa/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /de dag lam du gzhug pa ste/ /chos rnams shin tu gsog lags pa/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /skye dang 'chi dang
49b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba ni/ /phyin ci log las byung ba ste/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med don/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /lta dang dmigs pa gnas lags te/ /de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'jug /chos rnams stong
49b8(dkon brtsegs): par rab bshad pa/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /'jig rten mgon pos cho 'phrul ni/ /gang dag ji snyed bstan mdzad pa/ /de dag thams cad bshad pa ni/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /sems ni mnyam
50a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid slad du/ /rjes su mthun dang mi mthun pa/ /gang la'ang sems ni mi 'jug pa/ /de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa'i/ /zad cing zhi la 'thun bgyid
50a2(dkon brtsegs): cing / /de la rtsod pa mi bgyid pa/ /de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/ /mi dge thams cad ma gtogs par/ /dge chos rnams la 'jug 'gyur zhing / /de la'ang gnas par mi bgyid pa/ /de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/ /
50a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i sgra dang sems can sgra/ /de bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni/ /sgra rnams kun la ma chags pa/ /de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/ /sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs sgra/ /rnam mang chos kyi sgra rnams dang / /gang gi
50a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra la'ang mi rtog pa/ /de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab dang / /de bzhin kun la brtson bgyid pa/ /de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/ /
50a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dag la sems mnyam zhing / /byang chub sems ni mi spong la/ /byang chub lam ni ston bgyid pa/ /de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la/ /de 'dra'i chos ni bstan mdzad
50a6(dkon brtsegs): de/ /de la som nyi ma mchis pa/ /de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/ /bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing / /seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni/ /ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i/ /cho 'phrul nges par bstan
50a7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi/ /zhing 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /bla med bsod nams zhing de la/ /bdag gis sa bon btab pas na/ /bdag ni slar ldog ma mchis lags/ /dog sa thams cad rdol 'gyur zhing / /rgya mtsho 'dabs par
50a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gda' yi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskrun pa yi/ /sa bon nam yang chab mi 'tshal/ /sems can rnams kyi sems 'tshal cing / /nam mkha' gzhal bar rdo thog gi/ /byang chub tu ni bskrun pa'i sems/ /de yi
50b1(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams tshad ma mchis/ /bdag gis bsam pa ci 'dra ba'i/ /dpung du lha dang dri za dang / /mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag gi dpang / /'dren pa bdag ni longs spyod dang / /
50b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang mtho ris mi 'tshal gyi/ /mi mchog khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /ci 'dra de ltar bdag gyur cig /byang chub la ni dmigs bgyis nas/ /bdag gis dgung lo 'bum du ni/ /ma chags sdang ba ma mchis
50b3(dkon brtsegs): par/ /bdag gis bde gshegs bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /bdag gi byis pa stong rnams dang / /mchis brang yongs su smin bgyis pa/ /gang lags 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi/ /byang chub slad du spro bar mdzod/ /bdag
50b4(dkon brtsegs): gis bde gshegs legs mthong zhing / /chos 'di legs par thos pa dang / /byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba/ /bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /gang zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa/ /de ni chos la'ang rtag tu
50b5(dkon brtsegs): dga'/ /chos rnams spong bar mi bgyid pa/ /sems can kun la rtag dga' lags/ /de nas 'khor de nyid du chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur ba des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod
50b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dang 'thun par ma byas kyi mi mthun par byas pas na khyod ni gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal
50b7(dkon brtsegs): po chen po byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas la gnas pas 'jug pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni tshor ba thams cad med pa shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni blangs
50b8(dkon brtsegs): pa med cing bor ba med pas blang ba med la dor ba med pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni nam mkha' la bris pa dang 'dra bas gzugs med pa/ kha dog med pa/ rtags med pa/ dbyibs med pa yin no/ /rgyal
51a1(dkon brtsegs): po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas gnyen po med pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos thams cad dang mnyam pas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no/ /rgyal po
51a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas g.yo ba med pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas zhi ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni brtag pa dang bsal ba dang
51a3(dkon brtsegs): bral bas nye bar zhi ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mi mthun pa med pas lhag par g.yo ba med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yongs su grub pa med pas sems mnyam pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang
51a4(dkon brtsegs): chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas skye ba med pas rab tu phye ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni sems dang /
51a5(dkon brtsegs): yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par rig pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas rgyu ba med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa
51a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mtshan ma med pa'o/ /rgyal
51a7(dkon brtsegs): po chen po byang chub ni smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral
51a8(dkon brtsegs): bas 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang / ngo bo nyid de lta bu la sgrub par byed pa dang / gang dag smon lam 'debs par byed pa dang / gang dag mngon par dga' bar
51b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni log par rtsol ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ci 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang de 'dra ba yin pas na
51b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ / // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras
51b3(dkon brtsegs): so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig /de skad ces smras pa dang / chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po dge ba'i
51b4(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
51b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no/ /tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems
51b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'chab pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba
51b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'byin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang / zhum pa med pa ni byang
51b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa ni
52a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems
52a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /mngon par shes pas rlom
52a3(dkon brtsegs): sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /don dang chos la nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa
52a4(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rton pa la mos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /yang dag
52a5(dkon brtsegs): par skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /don 'thun pa mnyam pa
52a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang dag par 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la sems
52a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /nam mkha' yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / zhing yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
52a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub
52b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /lus dang / ngag dang / sems mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang / ngag dang / sems brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can
52b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi ci zhig bya snyam du spro ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
52b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems
52b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /chos sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi go cha bgos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sdug bsngal skye ba
52b5(dkon brtsegs): med par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /mdza' bshes dang mdza' bshes ma yin pa la sems snyom pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
52b6(dkon brtsegs): mdza' ba brtan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /lan re ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /thos pa dang / sgrub pa
52b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa mnyam pa nyid kyis chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni byang chub
52b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /don dam pa'i bden pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bden
53a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can la shin du 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis nga rgyal nges par bcom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
53a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no/ /yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pas rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'du ba yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod
53a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa de dag thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga'
53a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing yid bde ba skyes nas gos dang / rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mngon par bkab po/ /bu stong po de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong
53a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal mtshan la bkab nas tshig 'di skad du gang bdag cag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /
53a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag thob par gyur cig ces kyang smras so/ /de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po
53a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste gos dang / rgyan tsam gyis mchod pa de ni mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi/ de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dag
53a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang yod kyis de dag khyod kyis sgrubs shig / de yang gang zhe na/ de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang dag stong chen sems can de dag
53b1(dkon brtsegs): kun/ /byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing / /ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa rdzogs par ni/ /bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa bas/ /gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas/ /de bzhin
53b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pa dang / /rab 'byung sems kyis gom pa gcig bor ba/ /de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ /gang dag sngan chad byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / /gang dag
53b3(dkon brtsegs): ma byon byung dang bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag skyon mang khab ni ma spongs par/ /bla med byang chub zhi ba thob pa med/ /rab 'byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rab tu bstod cing bsngags
53b4(dkon brtsegs): la bkur ba ste/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab 'byung gzung bar gyis/ /gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i/ /gang gA'i bye snyed sangs
53b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing byin dang / /gang zhig rab 'byung nyin dang mtshan gcig tu/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na/ /gang zhig rab 'byung bag yod gyur ba yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang / /
53b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin du bcom byas shing / /dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin/ /rab 'byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang / /lam gyi rjes 'thun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod/ /de ni
53b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba chud za ma yin zhing / /de ni yongs su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin/ /khyim las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing / /nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med/ /rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad
53b8(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod/ /spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / longs spyod dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dag la
54a1(dkon brtsegs): mi lta bar gyur cing skyo la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba skyes par gyur te rab tu 'byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di
54a2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
54a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rab tu 'byung ba ni dgag pa med pa ste/ sems can thams cad la yang bar du mi gcod cing skabs yod do/ /khyim na gnas
54a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyis/ /gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la gdams shing rjes su bstan gyis khyod kyis kyang gtams shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas
54a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas bu stong po de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag las rgyal srid sgrub pa dang / sems can rnams chos yang dag
54a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin du 'jug par spro ba su yod/ de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ yab bdag cag kyang dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags kyis/ bdag cag mi dor bar gsol/ rgyal
54a7(dkon brtsegs): pos smras pa/ gal te khyed cag thams cad rab tu byung na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rab tu chud zos par 'gyur gyis khyed cag las gang sems
54a8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la brtan pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ba des rgyal srid bsgrubs la sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin tu chug shig / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gi nang nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying
54b1(dkon brtsegs): rje cher sems shes bya ba des rang gi pha de dang / rgan rabs de dag la tshigs su bcas de smras pa/ rab 'byung yon tan du ma bsag pa zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyi/ de
54b2(dkon brtsegs): lta lags kyang snying rjer gyur bas na/ /'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub/ /ji srid 'tsho bar bdag ni tshangs spyod cing / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi/ /me tog rnams dang dri
54b3(dkon brtsegs): dang byug pa dang / /de bzhin chang yang myang bar mi bgyi'o/ /lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi thogs shing / /mchil lham mi 'tshal rin chen gtsug phud min/ /khri rkang gser las bgyis par
54b4(dkon brtsegs): mi nyal zhing / /rgyal po'i rkyen gyi gos kyang mi 'tshal lo/ /sil snyan glu dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing / /rma bya dang ba'i sgra la'ang dga' mi bgyid/ /skye bos mdun bdar bud med gnas spong zhing / /
54b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu mal na mchis nyal rlung mi g.yab/ /bdag ni gling nas gling du mchi bgyi zhing / /dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi/ /khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing / /rab tu 'byung
54b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bgyi/ /gzugs dang longs spyod dbang phyug dregs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrod mi bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par mi bgyi zhing / /rtag
54b7(dkon brtsegs): tu yid byung srid gsum spyad par bgyi/ /sbyin dang snyan smra don spyod don 'thun bas/ /sems can bsdu ba la ni brtson bgyi zhing / /bla med theg chen dam pa 'di la yang / /srog chags bye ba mang po
54b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs smin bgyi/ /chos don mnyan cing bshad par bgyi slad du/ /nyin mo dus gsum mtshan mo dus gsum du/ /ri rab lta bu'i spyan sngar nyer mchi zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod pa'ang
55a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so
55a2(dkon brtsegs): legs so/ /bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan des na khyim par gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu byung ba dang / yon tan mtshungs pa yin no/ /
55a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi snying rje chen po des na rab tu byung ba'i yon tan yang sgrub par byed pa yin no/ /de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas bu stong du gcig
55a4(dkon brtsegs): gis ma tshang ba dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /de dag rab tu byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa des cho 'phrul
55a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di nyid kyis de lta de ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan pas de dag gis ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to/ /gzungs dang / dran ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i
55a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yang bskyed par gyur to/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems kyang rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas zla ba nya'o cog na gling chen po bzhi po dag tu rjes su ston par byed de/ ci nas kyang srog chags
55a7(dkon brtsegs): dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur to/ /de dag thams
55a8(dkon brtsegs): c ad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas theg pa chen po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
55b1(dkon brtsegs): las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag tu gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur cing / dad pa bskyed par
55b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba'i gsung rab de la ltos/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis
55b3(dkon brtsegs): za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ lha'i bu ded dpon 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe
55b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin bsnyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam
55b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur ba
55b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gzhan zhig yin bsnyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi sangs rgyas stong po dag de'i tshe de'i dus
55b7(dkon brtsegs): na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid
55b8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub
56a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bag yod pa rnams ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / shes bzhin gyi spyod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung ba yin no/ /bcom
56a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /
56a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod ni lha'i bu ded dpon 'di dang lhan cig tu yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa
56a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i yan
56a5(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dgas yin la/ lam ni 'dus byas yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yin pas de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa
56a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi/ kho bo ni spyod pa med pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /
56a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su sbyor ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyis su sbyor ba yang ma yin la/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun
56a8(dkon brtsegs): ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring
56b1(dkon brtsegs): po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni
56b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par
56b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma
56b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/ kho bo ni dge ba dang sdig pa la nges par sbyor bar mi byed de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po
56b5(dkon brtsegs): nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa yin gyi/ kho bo ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon
56b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa thob pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya de ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'khor ba las
56b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni mya
56b8(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen
57a1(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas pa yin no zhes zer ba ni/ btsun ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs
57a2(dkon brtsegs): med cing bstan du med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba med cing tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin
57a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni 'du shes med cing 'du shes kyi mdung pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams med cing 'dus ma byas brnyes pa yin
57a4(dkon brtsegs): pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa med cing yid gnas pa med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang
57a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi yul ma yin zhing stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan ma med pa'i yul yin pas de la
57a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sna dang dri'i yul ma yin zhing gnyis dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lce dang ro'i yul
57a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhing rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de la
57a8(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yid dang chos kyi yul ma yin zhing chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
57b1(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang 'thun par zhugs pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de
57b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid la zhugs pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar
57b3(dkon brtsegs): mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin pas
57b4(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni dmigs pa med pa la zhugs pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa
57b5(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
57b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa
57b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar
57b8(dkon brtsegs): mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du ma smad cing kha na
58a1(dkon brtsegs): ma tho ba med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya
58a2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus pa dang / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du skur ba gdab tu med cing nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa
58a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no zhes zer ba la/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni 'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa
58a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / srid pa'i sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phung po lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched
58a5(dkon brtsegs): drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / log pa brgyad rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems
58a6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi gnas dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa rtsa
58a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes
58a8(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi bslab pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / dbang po lngar 'du shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug la
58b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sgro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mthar
58b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lta ba skyed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos bcu la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /phung po'i bdud
58b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /sgrib pa rtsa ba ma
58b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / chod pa dang kun nas ldang ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'gyod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /bdag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin
58b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / srog tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gso ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /'byung bar lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba rtsa ba ma
58b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / chad par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'du
58b7(dkon brtsegs): byed rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshor ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
58b8(dkon brtsegs): sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / len pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rga shi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nad dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
59a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /'dod pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
59a2(dkon brtsegs): khams rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /sbyin bas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan
59a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed
59a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin
59a5(dkon brtsegs): no/ /byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs
59a6(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rtsa ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang / bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len pa'i rtsa ba dang /
59a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba yang mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nges pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdag dang / gzhan la yang mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang /
59a8(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rtsom pa'i rtsa ba dang / dman pa'i chos yang dag par mi sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar mi byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi rtsa
59b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / btang snyom kyang ma yin pa'i rtsa ba dang / thabs kyi rtsa ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum
59b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i rtsa ba dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa
59b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ /lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyun gyi rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i
59b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yin no/ /spobs pa mi chod pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa thob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa
59b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba byin gyis rlob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / lan gsum
59b6(dkon brtsegs): du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas don gyi gzhi rnam par nges par
59b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la me
59b8(dkon brtsegs): tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba gnas pa der ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis byung ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /
60a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dan don dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /de dag
60a2(dkon brtsegs): gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa ma yin no/ /de ni theg pa chen po 'di la snang ba thob pa yin no zhes kyang smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
60a3(dkon brtsegs): des smras pa la rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad nas lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas bshad pa de thos nas mos par 'gyur
60a4(dkon brtsegs): ba de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin te/ de dag ni de las gzhan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams kyis skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams
60a5(dkon brtsegs): la mi rtag par bshad pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams la bdag med par bshad pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug
60a6(dkon brtsegs): par bshad pa dang / dngos por 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po med par bshad pa dang / lta bar 'du shes pa rnams la stong par bshad pa dang / mtshan mar 'du shes pa rnams la mtshan ma med par bshad pa
60a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / khams gsum par 'du shes pa rnams la smon pa med par bshad pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi
60a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa chen po yin te/ gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag par dul ba yin pas na yang dag par dul ba rnams ni gang la yang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
60b1(dkon brtsegs): de gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yongs su ma bzung bas yongs su bzung ba la rten med
60b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rten med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa la 'gul ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa la blang ba med pa dang / blang ba med pa la dor ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa la 'dzin pa med pa
60b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dzin pa med pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa la phyin ci log med pa dang / phyin ci log med pa la log pa nyid med pa dang / log pa nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag
60b4(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub pa yin pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la
60b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / sems rnam par mi g.yeng ba la gnas pa med pa dang / sems mi gnas pa la gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa la rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang /
60b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa med pa la brtag cing bsal ba med pa dang / brtag cing bsal ba dang bral bas dmigs pa spangs pa dang / dmigs pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / sgrib pa med par gnas
60b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la rlom sems med pa dang / gang gis tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par rlom pa med pa dang / gang gi tshe lhag par rlom ba med pa de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan du mthong ba med pa dang / med pa la yongs su
60b8(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sgyid lug pa med pa la nyon mongs pa'i rgyu med pa dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems la gsal ba snang ba dang / gsal
61a1(dkon brtsegs): ba thog pas ye shes mthong ba dang / ye shes mthong ba la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba dang / sems kyi shes pa rgya chen po gnas pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa dang /
61a2(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa la sgrib pa med pa mngon du gyur ba dang / sgrib pa med pa la gnas pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu gang byas pa med cing
61a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa'i chos rnams la chos kyi go rims kyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon gyur ba la 'di skad
61a4(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la ci dang ci 'dri ba de dang de nyid kyi tshig gi mtshams las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
61a5(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin
61a6(dkon brtsegs): du ston par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du brjod par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma
61a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'jog par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par dgod par byed do/ /
61a8(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni btang snyoms pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chad par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos de dag ni gang nas kyang ma blangs/ gang du yang ma khrid
61b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ de dag ni bsags pa yang ma yin/ spungs pa yang ma yin no/ /de dag ni bshad kyang rung / ma bshad kyang rung ste/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid mi 'dor ba yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi
61b2(dkon brtsegs): yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa'i yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa'i yi ge de dag thams cad ni lus las kyang ma byung / sems las kyang ma byung ba ste/ rgyu
61b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rkyen nyid las byung ba yin no/ /ji ltar yi ge rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la yang bsags pa med do/ /ji ltar sems dang sems las
61b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i chos rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la yang bsags pa med do/ /ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bsags pa med pa de
61b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du shes pa gang gis nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i shes pa de la yang bsags pa med de/ btsun ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang mi gnas pa'i shes pas mi gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams
61b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa gang yin
61b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'i shes pa dang / phung po yongs su spangs pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / dge ba'i
61b8(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / skye ba shes pa dang / 'byung ba shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa rnam par bcad pa shes pa dang / rgyu shes pa dang /
62a1(dkon brtsegs): chud mi za ba shes pa dang / 'bras bu shes pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba shes pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / tshogs bsags pa shes pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang / sangs
62a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ye shes la lta zhing thob par bya ba shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa med pa shes pa dang / phung po shes pa dang / phung po'i bdud spang ba shes
62a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / khams shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang / grong stong pa lta bur so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / sbyin pa shes pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin
62a4(dkon brtsegs): pa las mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / bzod pa shes pa dang / sems can rjes su srung
62a5(dkon brtsegs): ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus shes pa dang / legs pa'i las bya ba shes pa dang / bsam gtan shes pa dang / bsam gtan las ldog pa shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa dang / lta ba yongs
62a6(dkon brtsegs): su shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / byams pa shes pa dang / sems can bskyab pa shes pa dang / snying rje shes pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba
62a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / dga' ba shes pa dang / chos la dga' zhing rab tu dga' la mchog tu dga' ba shes pa dang / btang snyoms shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa shes pa dang / sems
62a8(dkon brtsegs): can gzhug pa shes pa dang / tha snyad shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa dang / gnas med pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba shes pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba
62b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba
62b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mi
62b3(dkon brtsegs): brjed pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams
62b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag shes pa dang / rang byung gi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam thams cad las yang
62b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / snying rje chen po la lhag par dmigs pa shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang / skye ba med pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba'i
62b6(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa shes pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba
62b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par 'du ba shes pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sems can thams
62b8(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su mi gtong pa shes pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi
63a1(dkon brtsegs): bya bar shes pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa dang / rim pa rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / thos pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / tshogs
63a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang / sman thams cad shes pa dang / rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pa shes pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / gnas ma yin pa mi bya bar
63a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / stobs bcu shes pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa shes pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang / bar du
63a4(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa ma yin pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs
63a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa dang / chos thams cad las yang dag par mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / rab tu gnas pa med pa shes
63a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lus sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi las 'jug pa dang / ngag sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang /
63a7(dkon brtsegs): yid sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul
63a8(dkon brtsegs): pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang / mi brjed pa'i shes pa dang /
63b1(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang / dgongs pa rab tu 'dzin pa shes pa dang / sems can le lo can yongs su gzung ba shes pa dang / sangs rgyas
63b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos ma 'dres pa shes pa dang / gdul ba'i sems can 'dul ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
63b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ shes pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa 'thob bo/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes
63b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni ngo mtshar to/ /shes pa de ni go cha dan don dang ldan pas yang dag par bsdu bar mi nus so/ /'jam dpal
63b5(dkon brtsegs): gang de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin/
63b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' ni go cha
63b7(dkon brtsegs): legs par bgos pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas kyi rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /smras
63b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu brtsams pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sems dpa' chen po
64a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu shes rab kyis gzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / thabs kyis chos thams
64a2(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag par bsdus pas de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dang lhan
64a3(dkon brtsegs): cig mi gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par yang byed pas de'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can
64a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar sems can thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyong bar byed pas de'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam
64a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar de la gnas nas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su smin par byed pas de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/
64a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar gdul ba'i sems can rnams shin du 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par byed pas de'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/
64a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu ji tsam gyis bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir srid pa len par byed pa
64a8(dkon brtsegs): de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thul bar dka' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang / sngon gyi
64b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag la 'dod par mi byed pa de lta bu ni thul bar dka' ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
64b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzungs
64b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir kun du snang ba de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
64b4(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig gis sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra ba zil gyis gnon par byed pa de lta bu ni chos smra ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na 'dul
64b5(dkon brtsegs): ba smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag tshul khrims la gnas la sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par bsal ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de lta bu ni
64b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba smra ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na don smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe thos pa thams cad la nan tan snying por byed cing don rjes su rtogs pa de lta bu ni don smra ba
64b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par
64b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa thams cad sems can rnams la stobs par byed pa de lta bu ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
65a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' drang po yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa mi 'chab pa de lta bu ni drang po yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa yin/ smras
65a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gya gyu can rnams la khong khro bar mi byed pa de'i phyir dam pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na g.yo
65a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji skad smras pa'i tshig las mi 'da' ba de lta bu ni g.yo med pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sgyu med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu
65a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe ji ltar sems kyis mngon par sgrub pa de bzhin du tshig tu rjod pa de lta bu ni sgyu med pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na nga rgyal med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe
65a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la 'dud par byed cing mi dge ba mi byed pa de lta bu ni nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin bdag yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
65a6(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe yongs su 'dus pa'i byang chub kyang gtong bar byed na dngos po gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang tshul
65a7(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal pa mthong na srog gi phyir yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bzod pa smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe gnod pa bzod cing gzhan
65a8(dkon brtsegs): la gnod pa mi byed pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang rnam par bsams na chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam
65b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal ji ltar na bsam gtan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khams su phyis mi snang ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i
65b2(dkon brtsegs): bu gang shes rab kyi bya ba sbyin par mi byed pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byams pa la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams la stong pa nyid du rnam
65b3(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na snying rje la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur shes nas/ byang chub la brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yin
65b4(dkon brtsegs): no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe thub cing zhi la rab tu zhi ba thob cing chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bas mi ngoms pa yin no/ /smras pa/
65b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no/ /smras
65b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'thun par ston pa
65b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na ngag yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa yin no/ /smras
65b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams rab tu shes pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal
66a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong la gzugs dben par yang ston pa yin no/ /smras
66a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na lha'i rna ba thob pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sgra thams cad thos la sgra dben par yang ston pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na pha rol gyi
66a3(dkon brtsegs): sems la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems skyes pa zhig par gyur ba rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun rab tu shes pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sngon gyi
66a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sngon gyi mtha'i mu rjes su dran zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' las kyang mi g.yo ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na rdzu
66a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang bdud thams cad kyang ston la bdud kyi las rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dul ba yin/
66a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsrungs pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu dbang po thams cad mi g.yeng ba yin no/ /smras pa/
66a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na rnam par dul ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe mi 'khrugs pa'i chos su gyur ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na zhi ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu nyon
66a8(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad kyis gdung ba med la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dad pa yin/
66b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs kyis phye yang mi phyed pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/
66b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la byang chub la rag las par mthong ba yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag
66b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba
66b4(dkon brtsegs): la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming bshad pa de dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan de dag legs par
66b5(dkon brtsegs): smras te/ gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do/ /lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
66b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas na khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ma sprul pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed 'gags pa de
66b7(dkon brtsegs): snyed la'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa nyid la yang sems dang sems las byung ba dag med na ma sprul pa la lta ci smos/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid
66b8(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin la/ de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang de lta bu yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ smras pa/
67a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig la khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyad ces dris na ci de lan ldon par byed dam/ smras pa/
67a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de ni cung zad kyang lan ldon par mi byed do/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo yang sprul pa de nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas na kho bos ji skad du kho bos yun ring po 'di tsam zhig nas sbyin pa'i pha
67a3(dkon brtsegs): rol du phyin pa la spyad do/ /zhes lan gdab par bya/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci khyod ser sna can yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni ser sna can yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam
67a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang yongs su mi gtong ba de ser sna can ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci zhig yongs su mi gtong / smras pa/ lha'i bu
67a5(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni ser sna can yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho
67a6(dkon brtsegs): bos shes pa ltar na khyod ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te/ de skad smras/
67a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal pa de ngan song gsum po de dag tu ltung ba ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo yang sems can yongs su smin par bya
67a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du ngan song rnams su 'gro ste/ de'i phyir kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de
67b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/ kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa de rjes su chags
67b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / byis pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad
67b3(dkon brtsegs): la rjes su chags pa med de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod le lo can yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni le lo can
67b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu le lo can zhes bya ba ni gang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi rtsom pa yin la/ kho bo yang rtsom pa med
67b5(dkon brtsegs): cing rnyed par mi byed pa dang / len pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni le lo can yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin nam/ smras pa/
