67b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi sems rnam par grol ba la mi gnas pa de
67b7(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo yang 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la sems mi gnas pa dang / sems can yongs
67b8(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod shes rab 'chal pa yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu
68a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/ kho bo ni shes rab 'chal pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te/ de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang 'khor bas mi skrag cing sems can
68a2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba de shes rab 'chal ba ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo yang 'khor bas mi skrag cing de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i
68a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir sems can rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni shes rab 'chal ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten na sbyin gnas su yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag
68a4(dkon brtsegs): gsad pa gsod pa'i sems skyed pa rnams so/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gsad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
68a5(dkon brtsegs): mug rnams te/ gang dag gsod par byed pa de ni gsad pa gsod par byed pa yin pas de ni 'jig rten na sbyin gnas yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu ni 'jig rten gnas pa
68a6(dkon brtsegs): skrag par 'gyur ba yin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' skrag par 'gyur na ni 'jig rten gnas pa yang skrag par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten yang dag pa'i mtha' la
68a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de dag ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
68a8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu pha rol gyi sgra nyan pa ma spangs par ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyon med par
68b1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa la ni yi ge'i 'jug pa med pas gang dag mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i
68b2(dkon brtsegs): bu rnam par grol ba ni yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag rnam par
68b3(dkon brtsegs): grol ba de dag thams cad sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni gnyen po med pa yin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
68b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / smon pa med pa la ni gnyen po brjod par mi nus so/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni sems can
68b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la byams par gnas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can ma gtogs par stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi
68b6(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar mthong zhing de la rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar lta bar yang mi ltung ba de lta bu ni byang
68b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gyi khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can gyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings
68b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam
69a1(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal yul gang sangs rgyas
69a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul/ smras pa/ lha'i bu mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mig dang / gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no/ /rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas
69a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rna ba dang / sgra dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no/ /sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sna dang / dri dang / rnam par
69a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i yul ma yin no/ /lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lce dang / ro dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no/ /lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/
69a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lus dang / reg bya dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no/ /yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni yid dang / chos dang rnam par shes pa'i
69a6(dkon brtsegs): yul ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gzugs su rung ba'i yul ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi
69a7(dkon brtsegs): yul ni myong ba'i yul ma yin no/ /'du shes kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni kun du g.yo ba'i yul ma yin no/ /'du byed kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/
69a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i yul ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rnam par rig pa'i yul ma yin no/ /ma rig pa'i
69b1(dkon brtsegs): yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi yul ma yin no/ /rga shi'i bar dag gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te sangs rgyas kyi yul ni nyin mtshams sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no/ /'dod
69b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags so so'i rnam par rig pa'i yul ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin te/ sangs
69b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'i yul ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lta ba las rnam par grol ba'i yul ma yin
69b4(dkon brtsegs): no/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gnyis su sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no/ /'dus byas kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs
69b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin no/ /lha'i bu de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir yul der ni yul thams cad 'dus shing khongs
69b6(dkon brtsegs): su chud pa yin no/ /lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni yul de lta bur zhugs shing don gyi yul thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang bdud kyi yul thob pa yang ma yin te/ des ni bdud kyi yul dang sangs rgyas
69b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul yang mnyam zhing dben pa'i yul du mngon par rdzogs par khongs su chud do/ /lha'i bu gang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da'
69b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ de la mnyam pa nyid ni gang / mi mnyam pa nyid ni gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /gang dag stong pa nyid la mi
70a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa de ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid las yang mi g.yo'o/ /chos thams cad
70a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par
70a3(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang mtshan ma med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /chos thams cad smon pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa
70a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang smon pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed
70a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed
70a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'byung ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gag pa med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'dod
70a7(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid dang / dben par mnyam pa nyid dang / dngos po med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gog par mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mnyam pa nyid
70a8(dkon brtsegs): du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mya ngan las 'das
70b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo ste/ lha'i bu de ltar mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu ded dpon
70b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
70b3(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i
70b4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa
70b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /gti mug gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
70b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shes rab kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /ser sna med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
70b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin te/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i
70b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /le lo med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
71a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
71a2(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /'chal pa'i shes rab med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyis rlom sems
71a3(dkon brtsegs): su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /nang dang phyi'i dngos po yongs
71a4(dkon brtsegs): su gtong bas brtse ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yongs su gtong bas mngon par dga' ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod
71a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /'dod pa'i yon tan la smod pas rtag tu gnod sems kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pas mi lta ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
71a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /lus dang srog la mi lta bas lta ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su gtong bas tsham tshom med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
71a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /'khor ba dpag tu med pas mi skrag pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi khur sgrol bas khur chen po
71a8(dkon brtsegs): sgrol ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sngar dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /rjes su 'gyod pa med
71b1(dkon brtsegs): pas yid la gcags pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /theg pa thams cad zil kyis mnan pas mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
71b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /yid dam ma zhig pas go cha rdo rje lta bu'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems la nges par sems pas rang gi sems la nges par sems
71b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /las byas pa chud mi za bas chud mi za ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas tha dad
71b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /dgra thams cad nges par bcom pas dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bo dang /
71b5(dkon brtsegs): 'thun par 'jug pas ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /gshe ba dang sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pas rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
71b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /sangs rgyas blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog tu dga' bas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
71b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no/ /lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan par byed pas rgyan gyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i gnyen por gyur bas
71b8(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mi non pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /skye bo mkhas shing mdzangs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pas ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
72a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /tshul bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams shin du nges par brtags pas mi rdzi ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /khur blangs pa
72a2(dkon brtsegs): nyams su lon pas skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /brtson 'grus brtan pos phyir mi ldog par khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
72a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sdud pas chos spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pas byas pa shes
72a4(dkon brtsegs): shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum 'bri bar mi byed pas dkon mchog gi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /
72a5(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa dang yongs su gcod pas shes rab dang thabs kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na spyod pa la zhugs pa'i
72a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis byang
72a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de ni legs par smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyod pa de dang ma bral ba de dag ni de nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan
72a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe spyod pa de dang ma bral bar gyur ba de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me
72b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad kyis nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ der ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /lha'i bu gang spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid
72b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de lta bu de dag rab tu 'byed par byed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
72b3(dkon brtsegs): la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ 'jug pa gang gis na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i
72b4(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu mi skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i mu'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dgas yin te/
72b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni sngon byung bar gyur la phyis ma byung bar gyur ba ma yin te/ de nas gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon srid par gyur la phyis mi srid par gyur ba ma yin te/ de ni gzod
72b6(dkon brtsegs): ma nas mi srid pa nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon skyes par gyur la phyis ma skyes par gyur ba ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon mngon par 'dus byas
72b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin la phyis mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas 'dus ma byas pa nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon yod par gyur la phyis med par gyur ba ma yin te/ de ni bzod ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon gang zag tu bgrang bar gyur
72b8(dkon brtsegs): la phyis gang zag tu mi bgrang bar gyur ba ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas stong pa nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon mtshan mar bgrang bar gyur la phyis mtshan mar mi bgrang bar gyur ba ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mtshan ma med pa nyid yin no/ /gang gis de ltar rjes su rtogs pa dang / sems kyis skye ba dang /
73a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa med par rtogs pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o/ /de la bzod pa gang zhe na/ de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag ji ltar mi
73a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba de bzhin du zhing thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag ji ltar mi skye ba
73a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang
73a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /bzod pa de yang skad cig pa yin te/ gang gis skad cig pa yin zhe na/ skad cig pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/ /stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/ /mtshan ma med pa ni
73a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin no/ /ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/ /ji ltar
73a6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/ /
73a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/ /ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /
73a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du skye mched thams cad kyang skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/ skad cig pa gang yin pa de ni ya ma brla yin no/ /
73b1(dkon brtsegs): ya ma brla gang yin pa de ni gsog yin no/ /gsog gang yin pa de ni gsob yin no/ /gsob gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags med pa yin no/ /'dod chags med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no/ /'dod
73b2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid med pa yin no/ /ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa yin te/ de ni chos thams cad stong pa dang / skad cig pa dang / ya ma brla dang / dben pa dang / gsog ces bya ste/
73b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad de ltar bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /bzod pa de yang bzod pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/ de ltar mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lung bstan pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la
73b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob pa yin no/ /bzod pa de ni yang dmigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyis gar dmigs na de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can dang / srog dang / gsob dang /
73b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zag dang / bzod pa gnyis kar dmigs na de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o/ /de la dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyis kar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can dang /
73b6(dkon brtsegs): srog dang / gsob dang / gang zag dang / bzod pa gnyis kar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin
73b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni ngo bo nyid gtan med pa yin no/ /ngo bo nyid gtan med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin te/ ngo bo nyid de dang / bzod pa de la gnyis su rjes su rtog par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes
73b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /lha'i bu bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa yin no/ /bzod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na stong gsum
74a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'jig rten 'di snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to/ /sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra 'khrol bar gyur to/ /me tog gi char dag
74a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu bab bo/ /srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod
74a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can du zhugs par gyur ba de lta bu yang kun du snang bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
74a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
74a5(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
74a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba dag gis 'od kyang zil kyis mnan nas yang phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas
74a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs ste chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de'i tshe bcom
74a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /thub pa ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad gyur pa/ /mi mnyam gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ /'od kyi bkod pa mdzad pa khyod la zhu/ /
74b1(dkon brtsegs): rab rib nyon mongs spong ba khyod la zhu/ /bde gshegs ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa/ /pha rol tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod la zhu/ /bdud dpung tha mar mdzad pa khyod la zhu/ /stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa khyod
74b2(dkon brtsegs): la zhu/ /rgyal ba ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis yon tan mtshan brgyan pa/ /bde gshegs rab dga' bde ba mdzad pa po/ /gzugs kyi dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ /bcom ldan ci slad
74b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa/ /mkhyen pa mtha' yas yon tan ston pa po/ /ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba shes mdzad pa/ /ye shes ljon shing mkhyen pa khyod la zhu/ /'jig rten gsum grags grags pa mtha' yas pa/
74b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum rig dri gsum tha mar mdzad pa po/ /'jig rten gsum rig rnam thar gsum mthar byon/ /ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa/ /sman pa dam pa skye rga mthar mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan zhabs
74b5(dkon brtsegs): la dra mchog 'khor lo mnga'/ /sred med sras po rdo rje mkhrigs pa po/ /thub pa 'dzum mdzad sbyor ba bka' stsal gsol/ /gang gis spyod pa de ni rnam sbyangs sam/ /gang 'dir bzod pa de dag yongs
74b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs sam/ /gang sems sangs rgyas yon tan nges gyur tam/ /ci yi slad du thub chen 'dzum pa mdzad/ /bde gshegs zla med rgyu zhig mi mnga' bar/ /bcom ldan 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi ston pas/ /
74b7(dkon brtsegs): de thos sems can glo ba rangs 'gyur gyis/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs can legs par gsung dbyung gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di
74b8(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /byang chub
75a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo gzhan yang khyod kyis lha'i bu ded dpon 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /
75a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu ded dpon 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/
75a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zhu ba byas/ yongs su dri ba byas shing sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/ /kun dga' bo lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni bskal
75a4(dkon brtsegs): p a grangs med pa sum brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
75a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med
75a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rgyal po 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo 'jig rten khams yongs su dag pa de yang rin po che sna bdun
75a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai d+'ur+ya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po las grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis mig mangs ris su kun nas bkab
75a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dag dang / bdud rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i
75b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi ming yang med cing mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad po dag kyang med la bza' ba dang / btung ba dag kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
75b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de na ltung ba dang / 'khrul pa'i nyes pa dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can dag gi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
75b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / phal cher bla na med pa yang dag par
75b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od
75b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bar mdor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i
75b6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun ni dung phyur phrag drug dang bye ba phrag gnyis su 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur ba dang / gang dag gis mi skye ba'i
75b7(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob par gyur ba de dag 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
75b8(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rgyal po 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba zhig
76a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus te 'dug par gyur ba des bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
76a2(dkon brtsegs): d e bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa der skye zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i
76a3(dkon brtsegs): r gyal por gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der
76a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs
76a5(dkon brtsegs): ' di ni gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'di yang der 'khor los
76a6(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba'i rgyal po legs mthong zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas shing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bcom ldan
76a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
76a8(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun du 'od ces bya
76b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong de yang dus gzhan zhig na bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
76b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de la byang chub sems dpa' legs mthong 'di ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
76b3(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i
76b4(dkon brtsegs): 'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan tam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lung bstan pa ltar lung
76b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan te/ da ltar gyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu yin pas de bzhin nyid de la ni 'phel ba yang med la yongs su 'grib pa yang med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
76b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /shod cig /kun chub par gyis shig /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /

76b8(dkon brtsegs): bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bzung lags na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
77a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig /'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi le'u
77a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar yang zung shig / kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzin pa dang / mos pa dang / mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa
77a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa de dag ni bsod nams thams cad kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
77a4(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
77a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las cho
77a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul chen po bstan pa lha'i bu ded dpon gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi
77a7(dkon brtsegs): lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa
77a8(dkon brtsegs): ste byams pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po bstan pa/ bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tre ya ma hA sing ha nA da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i seng ge'i mdo/

77b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba
77b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom

77b6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /
77b7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang
77b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am
78a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal bas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar rnal 'byor tu
78a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung legs so legs so/ /'od srung khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po
78a3(dkon brtsegs): la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rjes su snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la
78a4(dkon brtsegs): don de lta bu yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs so/ /'od srung de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos
78a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yongs
78a6(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang /
78a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te bslab par bya'o/ /brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos
78a8(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang / gzhog slongs med pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa med pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa dang /
78b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzem pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /'khor ba la yid skrag pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / 'khor ba la rtag tu yid skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba la
78b2(dkon brtsegs): phan yon du blta bar bya zhing shing drung na 'dug kyang rung / ri la 'dug kyang rung / gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung / des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste/ 'di ltar bcom
78b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na
78b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdung rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med
78b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dpag tu med pa/ yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis
78b6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ bden pa gsung ba/ yang dag pa gsung ba/ ji skad gsung ba de bzhin du mdzad pa/ mi slu bar mdzad pa/ 'phags pa/ sman pa chen po/ zug rngu
78b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa/ ma gsol bar bshes gnyen mdzad pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ ded dpon chen po yin te/ de ni chos mya ngan las 'das pa/ zab pa zab par snang ba/ zhi ba zhi ba ston pa/ stong pa/ sems can med
78b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'khrul pa med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma yang dag par chad pa/ smon pa med pa/ smon pa dang bral ba/ spros pa med pa/ spros pa dang bral ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ nye bar gtod pa/
79a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dang bral ba/ dben pa/ dben pa dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa/ dngos pos ma gos pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ rgyu ba yang dag par chad pa/ 'gro ba dang bral ba/ brjod du med pa/ brjod pa dang bral ba/
79a2(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems med pa/ kun du bstan pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ rnyog pa dang bral ba/ blang ba med pa/ dor ba med pa/ sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba/ sred pa yang dag par chad pa ston par mdzad pa/ yang dag par
79a3(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad pa yin no zhes rnam pa las yid la bya'o/ /'od srung de la dge slong gcig pu dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pas ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid
79a4(dkon brtsegs): la bya ste/ bdag gis mi'i lus thob cing rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po yang thob/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yang mnyes par byas pas na bdag le lo byed
79a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis g.yen spyo zhing gnas pa ni bdag gi mi cha'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la 'bras bu ma thob pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de lta bu yang
79a6(dkon brtsegs): yod la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas de lta na bdag gis da ltar byung ba dang / ma byon
79a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /zhes de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya'o/ /'od srung de la dge slong gis ni khyod dang /
79a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi rjes su bslab par bya ste/ 'od srung 'di ltar khyod nga ma mthong ma thos par 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de
79b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gi rjes su slob pa na rab tu byung ba ni 'od srung khyod chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la mdzes par gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing mthong nas kyang nye bar 'ongs te/ rab tu
79b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol bar byed pa de dag gi rab tu byung ba ni de'i 'og tu yang de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo don gyi dbang
79b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mthong bas ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar khas blang bar bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ tshe 'di la 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis sangs
79b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'od srung de la skyes bu blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gos ngur smig dag bgos shing rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos
79b5(dkon brtsegs): po khas blangs te bslab pa rnams blangs nas gnas khang du song ngam/ phug tu song ste sgo bcad nas 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing / gnod sems kyi rnam par
79b6(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dag dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos kyi rnam par rtog par rtog pa dag dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rnam par rtog pa dag
79b7(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rtog par yang byed la/ de dag 'di snyam du yang sems te/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mi mkhyen mi rig rnam par mi rtogs so/ /snyam du yang sems so/ /'od srung gang gi
79b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dge slong gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung / 'chag sa na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ rnam par
80a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa de'i tshe gnas khang ngam / phug gam/ 'chag sa de na lha gang dag gnyug ma gnyug mar
80a2(dkon brtsegs): g nas pa de dag gis dge slong de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de dag 'di snyam du dge slong 'di gang gi phyir legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag
80a3(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rtog par byed pa ni mi rigs so snyam nas yi ma rangs pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bar 'gyur te/ 'od srung de la lha de dag las kha cig ni skul bar yang byed/ kha cig gis ni snod ma yin
80a4(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas khyad du bsad de 'khod par yang byed do/ /'od srung ltos/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / shes pa chung ngu dang ldan pa'i lha de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi sems shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
80a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag grangs med pa nas legs par spyod pa spyad pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ mngon sum du
80a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mdzad pa ci yang mi mnga' ste/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus las rnam par grol ba dang / brjod par mi bya ba'i shes bya rnam pa lnga la ye shes thogs pa
80a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang ldan zhing the tshom dang bral ba yin no/ /'od srung de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bas bdag nyid rang la rag lus par shes nas
80a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen la/ gang dag phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
80b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen pas na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas dge sbyong gi chom rkun mi bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o/ /'od srung de la dge sbyong gi chom rkun gang zhe na/ bzhi po 'di
80b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge slong dge sbyong gi kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs la gnas shing / de yang tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / sdig pa'i chos can yin par gyur na de ni
80b3(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi chom rkun dang po yin no/ /dben pa'i gnas su song ste gnas pa na mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gnyis pa yin no/ /bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing
80b4(dkon brtsegs): so so skye bo yin par shes bzhin du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil kyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun
80b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa yin no/ /bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod par byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun bzhi pa yin te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin no/ /'od srung mi gtum pa/ brlang ba/ drag shul gyi las
80b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ nyam stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung skyes bu des 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon
80b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham bar byas sam/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dU r+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul
80b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag
81a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang
81a2(dkon brtsegs): du skyed lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob
81a3(dkon brtsegs): cing so so skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid rgyun du zhugs pa yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / tha na bsod
81a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom
81a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas dpe bstan pas bsdam pa'i gnas bka' stsal pa de ni ngo mtshar lags te/
81a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dpe rin po che de lta bu thos na su zhig 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas stsal pa chab snod gang tsam yang len par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de de bzhin no/ /
81a7(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ mgo dang gos la med 'bar ba lta bur gnas par bya zhing 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas byin pa chu snod gang tsam yang blang bar mi bya'o/ /'od srung mi gnyis pa ches gtum pa/ ches
81a8(dkon brtsegs): brlang ba/ ches drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches nyam stobs dang ldan pa/ ches stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung mi des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi
81b1(dkon brtsegs): khams na mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon kyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
81b2(dkon brtsegs): bai dU r+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa
81b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ci snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam
81b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong
81b5(dkon brtsegs): du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil kyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid lan cig
81b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'ong ba yin par khas 'che bar byed cing tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung
81b7(dkon brtsegs): po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no/ /'od srung gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyis khams na mi gang ji snyed pa thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs skyod rnams lta zhog gi/ 'od srung mi gsum pa ches shin du gtum pa/ ches shin du brlang
81b8(dkon brtsegs): ba/ ches shin du drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin du nyam stobs dang ldan pa/ ches shin du stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung mi des stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
82a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dU r+ya dang /
82a2(dkon brtsegs): dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang /
82a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol
82a4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig
82a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil kyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid phyir mi 'ong ba yin par khas 'che bar
82a6(dkon brtsegs): byed cing tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa
82a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /'od srung stong chung ngu phra mo'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi/ 'od srung mi bzhi pa ches shin du rab tu gtum pa/ ches shin du rab tu
82a8(dkon brtsegs): brlang ba/ ches shin du rab tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin du rab tu nyam stobs dang ldan pa/ ches shin du rab tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung mi des stong
82b1(dkon brtsegs): gi 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dbyug
82b2(dkon brtsegs): pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dU r+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa
82b3(dkon brtsegs): le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i yo byad ji snyed
82b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed
82b5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo
82b6(dkon brtsegs): yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil kyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar byed cing ci nas kyang gzhan dag gis
82b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dgra bcom pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /snyam nas dgra bcom pa steng du 'byung bar yang byed/ dgra bcom pa'i dpe ston pa ltar dpe ston par yang byed la/ de ltar sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/
82b8(dkon brtsegs): tha na gzhan gyis byin pa'i dad pas byin pa bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma
83a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no/ /'od srung de bas na gang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'phrog par mi spro ba de ni sdig can gyi 'dod pa
83a2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu des dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed de/ 'od srung ngas ni sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de las gzhan pa rab tu byung ba'i chos shin du tha chad gcig shos gzhan ma mthong ngo / /'od srung bzhi po
83a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang rgyal
83a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi rigs dag 'dod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs dag 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin no/ /gang du 'ga' zhig la smon par byed na/ cher na mya ngan las 'das pa
83a5(dkon brtsegs): la smon par byed na de yang de'i sdig pa 'dod pa nyid yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas dge slong dag nga ni cher na phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/ skad cig
83a6(dkon brtsegs): tsam skye ba la yang bsngags pa mi brjod do zhes ston to/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ rab tu byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig rten sa la mngon
83a7(dkon brtsegs): bar zhen pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa las 'da' ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma yin te/ rab tu byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams
83a8(dkon brtsegs): cad du mi bya'o/ /'od srung dge sbyong dang / bram ze 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/ sdig pa 'dod pa med pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ drang po'i rang bzhin can g.yo med pa/ sgyu can ma yin pa/ khengs pa ma yin pa
83b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'dod pa rnams kyi ched du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na 'od srung de dag dbugs 'byin par byed pa brjod par bya ste/ de thos
83b2(dkon brtsegs): na rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dag dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed yod
83b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas ni yang dag par zhugs pa/ tshul khrims yongs
83b4(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhig gis sbyin pa po gang gi dad pas byin pa tha na chu snod gang tsam zhig bdag gir byas par gyur na de nyid de la bsod nams kyi phung po ches rgya che bar 'gyur gyi/ gling chen po bzhi
83b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa de la ni de lta ma yin no/ /
83b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung ji ltar mi blun po sdig pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa des gang gi drung nas chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod pa de'i don de yongs su nyams par byed pa de ltar ni dgra bo dang / gshed ma dang / phyir rgol
83b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / phas kyi dgras kyang yongs su nyams par byed mi nus so/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs pa cha phra ba rnams yin te/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba de dag dang ldan na 'di lta ste/
83b8(dkon brtsegs): dper na mda' 'phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog gi chos nyid dang ldan pa dang / sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thos
84a1(dkon brtsegs): nas tshul khrims kyi nyes pa 'byin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das sam/ bslab pa las 'das na lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'chab par byed cing rnam par 'byed par mi byed/ 'chags
84a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa dang / shes shing rtogs bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs pa cha phra ba rnams yin te/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba de dag
84a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na 'di lta ste dper na mda' 'phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims 'chal
84a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin no/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/ rab tu byung
84a5(dkon brtsegs): ba rgyags shing bag med pa de dag dang ldan na sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du thos pas rgyags shing de mang du thos pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang /
84a6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pas rgyags shing de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas zil kyis non pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyis rgyags shing de mdza' bshes
84a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyis spags pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags shing de sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags pas bdag
84a8(dkon brtsegs): la bstod par byed/ gzhan la smod par byed pa de ni bag med pa zhes bya ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/ rab tu byung ba rgyags shing bag med pa de dag dang ldan na sems can
84b1(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge sbyong ltar bcos pa
84b2(dkon brtsegs): n gur smrig 'tshal ba gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nub par bgyid par 'gyur ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung
84b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la gtam 'di yongs su dris pas khyod la
84b4(dkon brtsegs): ci byas thong shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung gal te de bzhin gshegs pas mi blun po de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / g.yo dang / chom rkun dang / phyin ci log dang / bdud kyi nyes pa dang /
84b5(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi skyon yang dag thams cad brjod cing yang dag par bshad par gyur na/ 'od srung khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi sdig pa kun spyod pa de dag thos na yang dag pa ma yin yang snang
84b6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba 'di ci nas kyang /
84b7(dkon brtsegs): yun ring du gnas par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs par yongs su
84b8(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par
85a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs su gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung gal te sangs rgyas stong snyed cig gis mi blun po de dag
85a2(dkon brtsegs): la cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos bstan du zin kyang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag sdig pa 'dod pa dang / sdig pa 'dzin pa de dag las phyir gzung ba 'am/ bzlog par mi spyod do/ /'od srung gzhan yang khyod phyi ma'i
85a3(dkon brtsegs): dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos bsrung bar spro 'am/ sems can bsam ba dge ba gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa la gus par nyan pa skyed par 'gyur ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /

85a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par phrag pa 'am/ spyi bo la 'tshal bar ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag
85a6(dkon brtsegs): gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rgya shug gam/ til lam/ 'bras bu gcig gis bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par 'tsho bar ni spro lags kyi/ bcom
85a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bskal
85a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhugs chen po 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar bar gyur ba'i nang du spyod lam bzhi po dag gis dgung lo bye ba snyed du gnas par ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
85b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can thams cad la khro ba dang / skyo ba dang / smad pa dang / bshung ba dang / bsdigs pa dang /
85b2(dkon brtsegs): brdeg btsog dag bzod pas dang du len par ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mi blun po chos kyi rkun po/ chos kyi chom rkun po/ chos la mu cor smra ba/ chos ltar bcos pa ston pa dag gi log par smra ba'i sug
85b3(dkon brtsegs): las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni nyi tshe bar spyod pa nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa lags pas de lta bu'i khur 'deg pa'i rdo mi thogs lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni
85b4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i khur 'deg par rdo thog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di la bdag dper brjod par spobs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi la la zhig rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs
85b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cing de yang na tshod dgung lo brgya nyi shu tsam lags par gyur la/ mi de bro nad kyis thebs shing glo ba mi bde nas mchis mal gyi khri steng du mchis nyal bar gyur na mi shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can phyug la nor
85b6(dkon brtsegs): mang ba/ longs spyod che ba la la zhig der mchis nas mi mchis mal gyi khri steng na mchis nyal ba de la kye skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyis kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu 'am/ nyi shu tsam na yul gzhan nas
85b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis gter 'di kho bo la phyir byin cig ces de'i sug par gter 'doms par bgyid cing de ltar gtams nas yul gzhan du mchis par gyur la/ mi mchis mal gyi khri stengs na mchis nyal
85b8(dkon brtsegs): ba de bu yang ma mchis/ bu mo yang ma mchis/ 'khor kyang ma mchis la/ de nas mi de yul gzhan du mchis nas ring po ma lags par de yang 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na nor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad
86a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang chab 'tshal bar gyur ba'i slad na/ mi de slar mchis na su la ji skad bgyid yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang zhig nyan thos nyi tshe bar spyod pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa/ zla bo ma

86a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pa/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du zhugs pa/ rtul ba brtan pa
86a8(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig mchis par gyur la/ skyes bu dam pa de'i gan du mi la la zhig mchis nas 'di skad ces skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyis khyod kyis gter 'di legs par sba ba dang /
86b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par bsrung bar gyis shig /kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu 'am/ nyi shu tsam na yul gzhan nas phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis gter 'di kho bo la phyir byin cig ces smras te/ de'i sug par gter de gdams na mi de ni gter
86b2(dkon brtsegs): de blangs nas legs par sbed pa dang / srung bar bgyid cing mi de slar mchis nas kyang gter de slar stsol bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la dam pa'i chos kyi gter

86b8(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
87a1(dkon brtsegs): b skur ba'i bu thu bo gang lags pa de ni rgyal po'i 'og tu rgyal srid bgyid du stsol par 'gyur ba lags pas de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nyid mchis bzhin du yang rgyal srid la spro bar

87a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyag 'jam pa/ mchog tu mnyen pa/ ka tsa lin di ltar reg na bde ba rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bsgos pa'i

87a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir

87b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lan gsum du rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten du snang

87b7(dkon brtsegs): mu'i bar du 'khor ba na 'khor bar yang spro lags na dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par
87b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun du bsrung ba dang / rgyas par bgyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas pus mo g.yas pa'i
88a1(dkon brtsegs): lha nga sa la btsugs ma thag tu de nas yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
88a2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni su la yang 'gran par mi bgyid/ nga rgyal mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba 'di dag ni

88a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpar mchid kyis 'che ba/ dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che ba/ glen pa/ blun po/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la gdu ba/ mdza'
