88b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis rgyu de dag thos nas de dag rtogs pas myur ba myur bar spong bar bgyid cing / nongs pa de dag las bdag 'di srung bar bgyid pa dang / skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag las kyang la la de bzhin gshegs pas
88b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag mkhyen cing de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rtogs so/ /rab tu rtogs so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
88b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi nyes pa'i gnas gang yin pa
88b4(dkon brtsegs): cung zad tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/ byams pa de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' khas 'che ba mang po 'byung ba de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa gang dag yin pa de dag bshad par bya'o/ /
88b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khas 'che bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa dang / g.yo byed pa dang / yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar
88b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /byams pa de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems
88b7(dkon brtsegs): dpar khas 'che ba/ khyi'i chos kun du spyod pa mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa 'di lta ste dper na khyi ni sngon lan 'ga' phyin pa'i khyim gzhan zhig tu khyi gzhan zhig rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong na khyim
88b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas de la zugs par byed/ 'khren skad 'byin/ khro bas lta bar byed/ gnod sems kyi nyes pa skyed par byed de/ gzhan gyi khyim bdag gir byed cing bdag gi yin par 'du shes skyed
89a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ /byams pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba/ khyi'i chos kun du spyod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang gzhan gyi khyim dang /
89a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi grong dag la bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed cing / bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes bskyed nas kyang yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ dge slong des sngon phyin pa'i khyim der dge slong gzhan
89a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'ong ba mthong na de khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas khro bas lta bar byed/ gnod sems skyed par byed/ thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa skyed par byed/ phan tshun dbyen gyi tshig smra
89a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ tshig rtsub po rdzod par byed/ gcig la gcig dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do/ /dge slong ma dge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do zhes mi snyan par rjod par byed
89a5(dkon brtsegs): cing khyim bdag la yang gal te khyod kho bo dang bsten par 'dod na/ dge slong che ge mo zhig dang bsten par mi bya zhing dge slong mang dge mo zhig dang yang ma sten cig ces zer te/ de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur gyur pa/
89a6(dkon brtsegs): ring du mi gnas pa/ smad par bya ba'i kha zas tsam gyi phyir bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyed pa yin no/ /de dag ni yi dags kyi chos kun du spyod cing dbul ba dang / sems dman pa dang / ser sna dang ldan
89a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag nyid gso bar byed pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis byang chub sems dpa' yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa dang
89a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / sdig pa kun du spyod pa yin bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsngags pa brjod cing byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan dag gi bsngags
89b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang brjod nas zas dang gos sgrub par yang byed do/ /byams pa 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra bsgrag cing seng ge'i las rnams bya ba'i rigs ba wa'i sgra sgrogs shing wa'i las rnams byed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs
89b2(dkon brtsegs): su gtong ba'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing 'jig rten gyi zang zing yun mi ring ba yongs su gtong bar mi byed la/ ser snas zil gyis non cing yo byad kyi dri mas spags pa de dag gis gtong ba phyi rol du byas pa dang /
89b3(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing gnod sems dang / thab dang / khong khro ba'i nyes pa mang po dang / bzod pa'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing gcig tu gnod sems kyi sems su byed pa dang /
89b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing sems can 'ga' yang sbyin pa 'am/ snyan par smra ba 'am/ don spyod pa 'am/ don 'thun par sdud par mi byed pa de dag ji tsam du mi zad par 'gyur ba la ltos/
89b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos por 'gyur ba yin gyi/ de dag yon tan yang dag par blang ba dang / 'dres pa'i spyod pas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa'i rjes su slob par byed pa ni ma yin no/ /byams pa
89b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin du grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe
89b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo
89b8(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste dper na da ltar nga bzhin du snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa
90a1(dkon brtsegs): kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo / /byams pa de'i tshe na dge slong brtson 'grus mos shes bya ba dran pa dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab
90a2(dkon brtsegs): la nan tan byed pa zhig byung bar gyur te/ de grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / yul 'khor de dag tu song ste phyin pa dang / chos ston par byed cing rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / skye bo phal po che
90a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gis kyang ri mor byas mchod pa byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ shes par byas/ yongs su shes par byas so/ /de khyim gang du zhugs shing gang las tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la gus par nyan pa dang /
90a4(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / btung ba thob par gyur ba'i khyim der ni lan gnyis su 'gro bar sems skyes par mi byed do/ /de 'jungs pa dang / ma dad pa dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gzhan dag tu song zhing de dag tu son pa
90a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / de la de dag 'ongs pa legs so zhes kyang mi zer/ de dag tshig snyan pa yang mi brjod pa'i steng du de la khro bar byed/ gshe bar byed na yang de bzod pa'i go bgos shing snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'gro la khyim de dag
90a6(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos des khyim gang dag dad par byas pa de dag ni 'di lta ste chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
90a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis dge sbyong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de khyim de dag tu yang 'gro bar mi byed cing 'gro bar sems
90a8(dkon brtsegs): skyed par yang mi byed mod kyi/ 'on kyang de de dag la phrag dog dang / ser sna'i sems skyed par byed snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/ /
90b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de khyim gang dag nas tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la gus par nyan pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnyed pa'i khyim de
90b2(dkon brtsegs): dag mngon par dad par byas shing dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar byas nas/ de dag tu lan gnyis su 'jug par mi byed pa dang / 'jungs pa dang / ma dad pa dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gang dag yin
90b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag dad par byed cing de dag khro zhing gshe na yang yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang / 'dod pa chung ba nyid dang / chog shes pa nyid dang /
90b4(dkon brtsegs): nges pa nyid dang / snying rje dang ldan pa nyid la ltos/ byams pa de ltar na sngon gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni khyim bdag dad par byas shing gzhan gyi nye bar 'tsho bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang / bsod
90b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no/ /byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos shes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang / the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar
90b6(dkon brtsegs): mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos shes bya bar gyur to/ /byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni byang chub sems dpa'
90b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus mos de'i rjes su bslab par bya/ de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag gi rjes su yang bslab par bya zhing de dag gi chos kun du spyad par yang bya'o// //
90b8(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa/ byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba'i dge slong kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'di lta ste rnyed pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
91a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi don du khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ khyim pa rnams dad pa la dgod pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /de dag ni gcig la gcig bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang / 'byed pa dang / rtsod pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /
91a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yi rangs par 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin la/ ji ltar gzhan dag gis rnyed pas yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed pas ni de ltar
91a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag nyid kyi bde ba'i yo byad de dag thams cad la mi blta bar gzhan dag la sbyin par bya ba yin na/ de dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba la ltos/ de ci'i phyir
91a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar des ni bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bdag cig la
91a5(dkon brtsegs): bu gcig pa sdug pa phangs pa yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur ba de la lan 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal pos btson rar bcug par gyur na byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de yid la byed pa'i
91a6(dkon brtsegs): sems ji lta bu dag gis rgyal po'i btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur snyam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
91a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bu gcig pa de thar par bgyi ba'i bsam pas bdag gis bu gcig pa 'di btson ra 'di nas myur du thar par bgyi'o/ /snyam nas bu gcig pa yid la bgyid pa kho na dag gis btson ra der 'jug par
91a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid de/ thar pa yid la bgyid pa dag gis 'jug cing 'byung bar bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa ngas dpe de ni don shes par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin te/ 'dir don kyang gang
91b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin par blta bar bya zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po'i btson ra de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni 'khor ba'i btson ra blta bar bya'o/ /byams pa 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni
91b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o/ /byams pa 'di lta ste dper na bu gcig pa ji lta ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ba blta bar bya'o/ /
91b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi phyir ma yin zhing ched ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi/ bu gcig pa de'i don du btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byams pa byang chub
91b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas chos gos kyi ched dang / bsod snyoms kyi ched du khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/ 'di ltar sems can de dag nyid 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya ba blta bar bya'o/ /
91b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag
91b6(dkon brtsegs): ni chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi ched du me tog gi skyes dag dang / 'bras bu'i skyes dag dang / lo ma'i skyes dag dang / yo byad kyi skyes dag dang / byas pa'i lan gyi skyes dag gis khyim rnams su 'gro bar
91b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas byams pa dge slong gis ni me tog phreng rgyud lta bur mi bya zhing bran dang las mi lta bur yang mi bya'o/ /byams pa dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya ba
91b8(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par skyes gzhan bskur bar mi bya ste/ des ni mang du thos pa dang / gzhung la shin du zhugs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang /
92a1(dkon brtsegs): kha gsag med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing chos la dga' ba bskyed nas khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o/ /khyim rnams su song nas kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags
92a2(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod par bya ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs par khang khyim
92a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi ched dam/ zhing las kyi ched dam/ rnyed pa'i ched dam/ reg pa bde ba'i gtam 'am/ rgyal po'i gtam 'am/ chom rkun gyi gtam 'am/ grong gi gtam 'am/ grong khyer gyi gtam 'am/ ljongs kyi gtam
92a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ bu'i gtam 'am/ bu mo'i gtam 'am/ gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o/ /byams pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/
92a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo zhig la byin pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus te/
92a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur na nor gyi phung po de tsam dang / bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni des rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la snying brtse ba 'am/ phan btags par mi 'gyur gyi/
92a7(dkon brtsegs): de tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug ste/ de de'i rna ba'i rnam par rig par grags shing thos pa tsam kho nar zad kyi/ re shig dad pa thob par ma gyur du zin kyang de ni rigs kyi bu 'am/
92a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyas pa dang / phan 'dogs pa dang / snying brtse ba ches shin du mang du byed pa yin no/ /byams pa dge slong de dag khyim rnams su zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs te 'jig rten pa'i
92b1(dkon brtsegs): gtam nye bar sbyor bar byed cing ji tsam du don med pa chen pos khyim der mngon par brtson par byed pa la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar gser ram/ dngul lam/ nor bu dag gam/ rin po che dag gam/
92b2(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dag gam/ bai dU r+ya dag gam/ dung dag gam/ man shel dag gam/ byi ru dag gam/ bde ba'i yo byad dag gis ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur/ sems
92b3(dkon brtsegs): can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang nad rnams las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
92b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur gyi/ chos thos
92b5(dkon brtsegs): pas ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyang skye ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur la/ sems can na ba'i chos can rnams na ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
92b6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de las dgongs te de bzhin
92b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'di skad ces/ stong chen 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis/ /bkang ste gang la sbyin par byed pa ni/ /tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig brjod pas/ /ji ltar phan 'dogs de ltar 'gyur ma
92b8(dkon brtsegs): yin/ phan 'dogs byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten gsum na sems can thams cad kyi/ /bde ba gang dag yod pa de dag kun/ /sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa bas/ /gang gis de la
93a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas lugs kyi ni/ /tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bsgrags na/ /de ni shin du phan 'dogs mchog yin te/ /des ni sdug bsngal dag las grol bar 'gyur zhes ston to/ /byams pa byang chub
93a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas ni snying rje chen po bskyed de sems can gcig la
93a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig cig bsgrags par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang gis ni gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /'jig rten khams mchog
93a4(dkon brtsegs): rin chen gang byas te/ /dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang / /gang gis sems can gcig la tshigs bcad byin/ /rin chen sbyin pa shin du rgya chen des/ /tshigs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrubs de la/ /char
93a5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi phong grangs su'ang ma yin na/ /gnyis sam gsum la bsam du ga la yod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de
93a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g.yas pa'i dkyil na bsod nams thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyu 'thun pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mngon par grub pa yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na phyag g.yas
93a7(dkon brtsegs): pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kun du yog par mdzad nas sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub par mdzad cing zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/
93a8(dkon brtsegs): gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che rnams dang / gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin par yang spyod mod kyi/ de tsam gyis sems can de dag 'khor ba'i
93b1(dkon brtsegs): r gya mtsho thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas chu srin 'dzin khri'i sdug bsngal chen po de las thar par mi 'gyur bas byams pa nga ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de lta bu dag rnam par spangs nas 'jig rten
93b2(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i bde ba chos rin po che yang dag par ston par mdzad de/ de thos na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gtan du nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang nga'i rjes su
93b3(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bya zhing khyod zang zing la gdu bar mi bya'i/ khyod chos la gdu bar bya'o/ /byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i
93b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe na byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ltung ba lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lus ma bsdams pa dang / ngag ma bsdams pa dang / yid ma bsdams pas
93b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i las lhag par spyad nas nyes pa bshags pa tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems kyi phyin cad sdom par yang mi byed la/ phyin cad yang dag par bsdam pa'i phyir sdom par yang mi byed do/ /
93b6(dkon brtsegs): ngas ni sngon byas pa'i sdig pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag ni lhag par ltung ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du
93b7(dkon brtsegs): byas nas nyes pa bshags shing sbyang ba tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems shing phyin cad sdom par ni mi byed do/ /byams pa gzhan yang ngas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
93b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo rnams kyi las yongs su bsags shing byas pas na mi dge ba'i las chung ngus ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
94a1(dkon brtsegs): nam dbul por skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag tu yang ltung bar mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpas ni myur du med par bya zhing 'dze mdog dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa 'dod pa dang / 'jig
94a2(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rtag tu yid skyo ba dang / srid par 'gro ba'i skye ba'i gnas thams cad la yid skrag par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni rgal nas khyed cag
94a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsgral bar bya'o/ /grol nas dgrol bar bya'o/ /dbugs phyin nas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /zhes sems can thams cad nye bar bzung ba'i phyir
94a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ byams pa ngas ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na byang chub sems dpa'i las ji snyed pa dang / khur
94a5(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa dang / dgos pa ji snyed pa dang / don bya ba ji snyed pa dang / bya ba ji snyed pa de snyed ni sems can 'ga' la yang ma mthong ngo / /byams pa 'di lta ste dper na la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
94a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams brag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di mi la la zhig gi spyi bo 'am/ phrag pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces kye skyes bu khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
94a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa 'am/ bskal pa rgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du
94a8(dkon brtsegs): gdeg par bya zhing gzhag par mi bya/ ngal bso bar mi bya'o zhes kyang bsgo bar gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i khur de che ba dang / spro ba mthu dang ldan pa dang / mthu stobs mthu dang ldan pa dang / brtson
94b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus mthu dang ldan pa yin snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthu dang ldan pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthu dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
94b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa de bas kyang gang zhig gis kye sems can rnams ngas khyed cag mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes sems can
94b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad nye bar bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i khur dang / spro ba dang / mthu stobs dang / brtson 'grus ni ches stobs dang ldan par blta bar bya'o/ /byams pa 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig gi las stong
94b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las ji tsam pa de tsam du gyur la/ des sems can thams cad kyi las de dag thams cad kyang se gol gtogs pa
94b5(dkon brtsegs): tsam gcig gis yongs su sgrub par byed cing las kyi mtha' 'ga' tsam yang yongs su nyams par ma gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i las de stobs dang ldan pa yin snyam 'am/ byams
94b6(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stobs dang ldan pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa stobs dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom
94b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'di skad du bdag gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i
94b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal las dgrol bar bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod nas las su bya bar byed pa de ches stobs dang ldan pa yin no/ /byams pa 'di lta ste dper na khyim bdag la la zhig bu gcig pa sdug pa/ phangs pa
95a1(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba/ mthong na mi mthun pa med pa zhig bdog par gyur la/ khyim bdag de nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi le lan gyis bu gcig pa dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba
95a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang bcas/ nor dang / dbyig dang / yo byad thams cad dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bkug par gyur cing / de nas rgyal po des khyim bdag de la 'di skad du kwa'i khyim bdag khyod 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum
95a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi pha rol na grong khyer che go mo zhes bya ba zhig yod par don 'di'i phyir zhag bdun gyis phyin par song la cha khyer te phyir yang zhag bdun gyis nga'i drung du phyin par shog shig dang / de lta bas na khyod kyi bu gcig
95a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dang / chung ma 'di dang / 'khor 'di dag thams cad dang / nor dang / dbyig dang / yo byad 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la phyir sbyin par bya zhing / gzhan yang khyod la rgyal srid phyed kyi sbyin pa yang lhag par
95a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par bya'o/ /gal te khyod song nas grong khyer de nas cha blangs te nyin mtshan bdun gyis phyir ma 'ongs na khyod la cung zad kyang sbyin par mi bya'i steng du/ khyod bu gcig pa dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/
95a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas te/ chad pas bcad pa dang / srog dang bral zhing bsad par bya'o/ /zhes bsgo bar gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag de de skad bsgo ba na bdag phangs pa dang / ldan pa dang / bu
95a7(dkon brtsegs): phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / chung ma phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'khor phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / nor phangs pa dang ldan pas stobs dang ldan pa'i rtsom pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa'i mgyogs pas grong khyer der
95a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na
95b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni don de yongs su ma grub kyi bar du sems rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyid/ zas kyi 'du shes skyed par mi bgyid/ rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sems skyed par mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
95b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar de'i slad rol gyi dngos po gzhan lta zhog lags kyi/ bdag nyid phangs pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gal te sems can thams cad de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen
95b3(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan par gyur kyang sems can de dag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba
95b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum gyi cha dang / dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
95b5(dkon brtsegs): ni rgyun phyogs su ded pa'i sems can thams cad rgyun las bzlog pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa 'di lta ste dper na mi 'di tsam
95b6(dkon brtsegs): du stobs dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du shugs dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du mthu dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la la zhig skyes par gyur la/ des rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag la chu'i phung po gang ji snyed pa
95b7(dkon brtsegs): d e dag thams cad chu klung chen po'i rgyun gang dang gang dag nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur ba'i chu klung chen po'i rgyun de dag nyid nas chu'i mtha' phyir bzlog nas rgyun las bzlog thabs kho nar mtsho chen po
95b8(dkon brtsegs): ma dros pa'i nang du phab par gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de dka' bar byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba dang / brtson 'grus che ba yin snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /
96a1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ de bas kyang gang dag lhag pa'i
96a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po kun du bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo
96a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag sangs rgyas yod do/ /chos yod do/ /dge 'dun yod do/ /legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do zhes
96a4(dkon brtsegs): nges par rtog par byed pa de dag ches shin du dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang gi sems skyes pa sel bar
96a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / gti mug gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa de dag ches shin du dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag mdza' bshes dang / gros grogs dang / nye du dang / rgan
96a6(dkon brtsegs): rabs rnams la mi lta bar spangs shing longs spyod chung ngu dang / longs spyod chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang yongs su spangs nas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kyis khyim
96a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin du dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
96a8(dkon brtsegs): ba la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar byed pa de dag ches shin du dga' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag de ltar rab tu byung nas gdams ngag la
96b1(dkon brtsegs): nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag la slob par byed pa dag ches shin du dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag 'du 'dzi'i gtam la 'jigs par lta zhing dben pa
96b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin du dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes mos par byed pa de dag ches
96b3(dkon brtsegs): shin du dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag chos zab mo rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob pa de dag shin du dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang
96b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon sum du byas nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par byed pa nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su thob par byed pa de dag ches
96b5(dkon brtsegs): shin du dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad cing dang ba dang / rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos
96b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / 'bras bu 'thob pa de ni shin du dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa de la yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na byang chub sems
96b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa ba legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas byang chub sems dpa'i las spangs te byis pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa de la
96b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las gang zhe na/ nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te/ de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por
97a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar mi nus so/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ ser sna'i sems tshar bcad par bya ba dang / gtong ba chen po spel bar bya ba dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung
97a2(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gnod sems dang tha ba'i skyon rnam par spang bar bya ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas par bya ba dang / le lo'i sems rnam par gnon par bya ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po
97a3(dkon brtsegs): brtsam par bya ba dang / brjed ngas pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyis bsam gtan rnams la mi rten par bsam gtan du bya ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /
97a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pas gnas par bya ba dang / smon pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / smon pa med pa'i yul
97a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang bar bya ba dang / snying rje chen pos gnas par bya ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dga' ba'i sems yid la mi
97a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing nem nur med pa dang yid ches par bya ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te/ las de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na
97a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus so/ /byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dam bca' ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi bde ba spong ba
97a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos kyis ngoms mi shes pa dang / chos yongs su tshol bas bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'khor ba thog ma dang / tha ma med pa las
97b1(dkon brtsegs): thar par bya'o/ /sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o/ /zhes yang dag par dam bca' ba ste/ byams pa bzhi po
97b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag par dam bca' ba yin no/ /byams pa 'di lta ste dper na mi sman mkhas la gsang sngags la mkhas shing dug dang rtsi la mkhas pa gnyis shig
97b3(dkon brtsegs): yod par gyur la/ de gnyis las mi gcig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dug za bar byed cing zos nas kyang / yan lag dang nying lag rnams shig shig por gyur
97b4(dkon brtsegs): bas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur ba las yang gsang sngags sngon du btang ba'i sman za bar byed cing de gsang sngags yang dag pa dang / sman des dug gi nyes pa de dag dang bral bar gyur la/ de nas mi des
97b5(dkon brtsegs): dus gzhan gyi tshe na sman de ma rnyed cing gnyen pa ma rnyed pas dug des shi bar gyur la/ de nas mi gcig shos des 'di skad ces smras te/ kho bos ni sman gyis dug zhi bar byed nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo la ni
97b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi dgos/ yan lag dang nying lag shig shig bor 'gyur ba mi dgos pas dug kyang mi za/ sman kyang mi 'thung ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du byams pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma
97b7(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba kha cig 'di skad ces sdig pa'i las ni nyes pa bshags pas ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer zhing de dag sdig pa mngon par 'du bya
97b8(dkon brtsegs): ba mngon par 'dus byas nas yang bshags par bya'o zhes ltung ba lhag par 'byin par byed cing phyis sdom pa 'dzin par ni mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'chi ba'i chos can yin no/ /zhes smra
98a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'chi ba yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dug za ba'i mi de dang 'dra bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas log par ltung ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam
98a2(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag la ni dug kyang mi dgos/ sman yang mi dgos kyis/ bdag cag ni 'das pa'i dus na sdig pa'i las byas pa zad par bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa
98a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / da ltar byung ba na mngon par 'du mi bya ba ma gtogs par sdig pa'i las kyang mngon par 'du mi bya zhing ltung ba yang 'byung bar mi bya la bshags par yang mi bya'o/ /zhes zer te/ byams pa 'phags pa'i chos
98a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba 'di la dug ces bya ba de ni 'di lta ste/ bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag las 'da' bar byed pa yin pas khyed cag gis ni dug bza' bar mi bya 'o/ /byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'di lta ste/ byang
98a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na byang chub sems dpas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bzhi gang
98a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dang / g.yo la sten pa nyid dang / brdzun gyi tshig smra ba nyid dang / bslab pa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid yin te/ bzhi po de dag ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad
98a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na byang chub sems dpas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ byams pa byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi
98a8(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag las dpag chad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas dang / gnas gang
98b1(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan zhig kyang 'dug par gyur la/ gal te de dag lhan cig tu mgu ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes la/ 'thab pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /
98b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa med pa dang ldan par gnas na ni des der gnas par bya'i/ gal te de de la tha na tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig skyed par byed na yang des de nas dpag tshad brgyad 'byol bar bya ste/ byang chub
98b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas ni byang chub sems dpa' la tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems cad du bsdu bar
98b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdus pa'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la spyos sam/ brgyad dam/ dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab par gyur na byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'
98b5(dkon brtsegs): des sems can de snyed cig la spyos pa 'am/ brgyad pa 'am/ dbyug pas brdegs pa 'am/ mtshon gyis btab pa'i gzhi de las sdig pa dang / rmas pa dang / nyams pa mang po skyes par 'gyur snyam 'am/
98b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig cig la spyos sam/ brgyad dam/ dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab na yang bsod nams ma lags pa mang du skyes lags na
98b7(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa thams cad lta la smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni sems can 'ga' tsam
98b8(dkon brtsegs): la yang tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gnod sems bskyed par mi bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka'
99a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal to/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la spyos sam/ brgyad dam/ dbyug pas brdegs sam/
99a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshon gyis btab pa gang yin pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la tha na tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig bskyed par gyur ba de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' de rmas pa dang / nyams par
99a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' gcig shos de la tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems skyed par byed na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba zhig na/ sems
99a4(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed bskyed pa de snyed kho na'i bskal par byang chub kyi phyir yang go cha bgo bar bya dgos so/ /byams pa 'di lta ste dper na lcags ni lcags nyid kyis gcod par byed pa ma gtogs par bong pa'am/ shing ngam
99a5(dkon brtsegs): rtswas gcod par mi nus pa de bzhin du byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang byang chub sems dpa' gcig shos la tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pas zad par byed pa ma gtogs par gzhan gyis zad par mi 'gyur te/ byams pa de lta
99a6(dkon brtsegs): bas na khyed cag gis gcig la gcig zhe sa dang bcas pa dang / gcig la gcig gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bya'o/ /zhes de ltar bslab par bya zhing sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la
99a7(dkon brtsegs): yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can
99a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la yang zhe sa dang bcas pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bgyid lags na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta la smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
99b1(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems la dpa' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bzod pa'i stobs dang / mthu phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni g.yo la sten par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum
99b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan gyi khyim la lhag par chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
99b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni zang zing lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos lhur len par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zas dang gos lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni pha'i nor yongs su tshol bar bgyid pa dang /
99b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni phrag dog dang ser snas kun nas dkris par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni gzhan gyi 'byor pa dag la yid dga' ba dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
99b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni dge sbyong gi ming lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni dge sbyong gi yon tan dag la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smra ba lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sgrub pa snying por bgyid pa
99b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la lhag par chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni don nyung ba dang / bgyi ba nyung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su tshol bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
99b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis grong dang grong khyer du 'jug par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yid la bgyid pa la mngon par brtson pas grong dang grong khyer du
99b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi slad du tshul 'chos bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis cho ga
100a1(dkon brtsegs): shes par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byis pa'i spyod pa la slob par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan dag gis bgyis
100a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ma bgyis pa dag la so sor rtog par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ltung ba 'ga' yang gleng bar mi bgyid
100a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ bdag ni ngag gi las kyi mtha' sdom bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bslab pa thag ring du mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni so sor thar pa la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs
100a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pas 'tsho bar sems par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod cing de la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bgyid pa dang / bdag ni chos kyi bsngags
100a5(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod cing chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bdag ni dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la rten par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
100a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis mthong ba bskyed pa'i slad du tshul 'chos pas mchi ma 'byin par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byin par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyi pa sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis
100a7(dkon brtsegs): sbags te gnas par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba la dga' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni 'jig rten las 'das
100a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sog 'jog gi zas dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis par kun du spyod par bgyid pa dang /
100b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnas dang yul gcig yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni ri dgas ltar kun du rgyu bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsod snyoms la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson
100b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su tshol ba la brtson bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis nyal bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha
100b3(dkon brtsegs): smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'du 'dzi'i spyod pa la brtson bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni dben pa la dga' bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan
100b4(dkon brtsegs): cung zad tsam gyis chog shes par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni yon tan yongs su tshol bas ngoms ma 'tshal bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni khyi'i chos rnams la kun du spyod par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni seng
100b5(dkon brtsegs): ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni cung zad bshes pa dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni mdza' bshes shin du brtan par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyis pa mi gzo
100b6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bgyis pa gzo ba dang / bgyis pa tshor bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sbyin pa'i lan gyis mdza' bshes su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pas mdza' bshes
100b7(dkon brtsegs): su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa bcos mar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dman pa la mos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni
100b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa lhur blang ba rgya chen po la mos par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa ma mchis pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa ma mchis par mi
101a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyi/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang bcas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems kyang gzhan la/ smra ba yang gzhan pa'i lce gnyis su
101a2(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshul 'chos pa'i byang chub sems dpar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang
101a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal skyed par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni gdol pa'i bu dang 'dra bar nga rgyal nges par 'joms par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan
101a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni chags pa dang bcas pas bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / dad pas stsal pa la lci ba'i 'du shes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan
101a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni tshul bzhin du ma lags pa'i rnam par rtog pa yid la bgyid pa sngon du btang bas gdugs bas ma thag kho nar mchis nyal ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyi bar gyis non par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni
101a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag tu lta ba la rten par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas par bgyid
101a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam par rtog pa dang / 'khrul pa smra bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus kyis tshul 'chos par mi
101a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis na chos ston par mi bgyid kyi/
101b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos ston par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gi sbyin pas mdza' bshes su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos kyi sbyin pas mdza' bshes su bgyid pa dang / bcom
101b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni bdag dang gzhan la yongs su gdung bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag la sman pa dang / gzhan la sman pa'i slad du sgrub par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dgon par gnas pa la tshul
101b3(dkon brtsegs): 'chos par mi bgyid/ bsod snyoms la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid/ phyag dar khrod la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid de/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par blangs te gnas
101b4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid cing / de yang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la rten pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
101b5(dkon brtsegs): po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa legs so legs so/ /khyod ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su chol ba la brtson pa de ltar seng ge'i sgra 'di sgrogs par byed pa ni khyod sngon gyi rgyal
101b6(dkon brtsegs): ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / chos de dag dang / yon tan de dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin te/ legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
101b7(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de nas dge slong lnga brgya stan las langs te dong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge sbyong chen po
101b8(dkon brtsegs): dag khyed cag yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam brjod pa'i tshe stan las langs te gar 'dong / de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'od srung
102a1(dkon brtsegs): c hen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam de lta bu bstan pa'i gnas de dag ni srid par dka' ba lags pas bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni yo byad
102a2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyungs pa'i yon tan de dag la yang dag par mi snang bas bdag cag phyir khyim du 'dong gor ma chag go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dad pas byin pa ni rig par dka' zhing sbyang par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /snyam du sems pa'i
102a3(dkon brtsegs): slad du'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/ /gang dag dad pas byin pa la yongs su longs spyod par mi spro ba dag
102a4(dkon brtsegs): gis ni de ltar 'dzem pa dang ldan pa dang / 'gyod pa dang ldan par bya ste/ nyin gcig la lan brgya rab tu byung ba phyir spangs pa ni bla'i/ tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pas dad pas byin pa la yongs su longs spyod
102a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas stsal pa ji ltar rjes su gnang bar mdzad
102a6(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ngas ni rigs pa dang / grol ba la dad pas byin pa rjes su gnang ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag
102a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sbyor cig /rtsol cig /'bod cig /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni rnyed par bka' ba yin gyis/ khyed cag rab tu byung ba las phyir ma sdog shig /de nas 'jam dpal
102a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur ba la dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal bdag cag gis ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis ji lta ji ltar
102b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba dang / 'bad pa dang / brtson par byed pa na chos 'ga' yang sbyor bar mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'byed par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang skyed par mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'gog par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang thob par mi byed/
102b2(dkon brtsegs): chos 'ga' yang spong bar mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang 'bri bar mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'phel bar mi byed pa de ltar sbyor bar gyis shig /dge slong gang de ltar sbyor ba de ni chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang chos
102b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo / /gang la 'gro ba med pa de la yang ni 'ong ba yang 'ga' yang med do/ /de ni 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa'i dge slong zhes bya ste/ gang du yang rten pa yang
102b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ mi rten pa yang ma yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di
102b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung gang dag
102b6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ste/ zas dang gos lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dag ni mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od
102b7(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du gnas gang dag dang / spyod pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam
102b8(dkon brtsegs): chung ba dang / tshul 'chos pa legs par 'tshol bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag legs pa legs par bshad du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnas de dag thos na byang chub sems dpa'
103a1(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag nyid srung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od
103a2(dkon brtsegs): srung phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
103a3(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / mar me'i sbyin ba dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung ngas ni shes pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa
103a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir mchod pa bshad pa yin na mi blun po de dag ni de la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dge slong dag khyed cag ni bdag nyid du dul ba dang / zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson
103a5(dkon brtsegs): pas gnas par gyis shig / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa dag yod na de dag ni nga'i sku gdung rnams la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes de skad gsungs na/ 'od srung mi blun po de dag rnal 'byor yang spangs/ spong ba yang spangs/
103a6(dkon brtsegs): lung nod pa yang spangs/ kha ton bya ba yang spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur zhing de dag la brten nas 'tsho bar sems par byed pa de dag la ltos/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong
103a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du 'bru mar gyis yongs su bkang ste/ mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam btsugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i
103a8(dkon brtsegs): las kyi phyir mar me bus pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa gcig shos kyis mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon gyi drung nas tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
103b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig lung mnos te kha ton byed cing gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
103b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / spos kyis rab tu bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lo 'bum gyi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum phul ba bas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi'i
103b3(dkon brtsegs): g tam gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa gzhan zhig khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs shing sems can gyi don mngon par sgrub pa na dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de de bas che bsod
103b4(dkon brtsegs): nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyal ka'i ched dam/ brjod pa'i ched du de skad gsungs pa ma yin grang snyam na/ 'od srung khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
103b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni de la mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin du grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu
103b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur
103b7(dkon brtsegs): ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po ni bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu gyur to/ /'od srung
103b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung bar gyur te/ 'od srung rgyal po mu khyud de la bu ni dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi
104a1(dkon brtsegs): sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yod par gyur to/ /'od srung rgyal po mu khyud de'i bu stong po de dag gi rjes la de'i pang par chos shes bya ba dang / chos bzang zhes bya ba'i khye'u gnyis shig rdzus te skyes par gyur to/ /'od srung rgyal po mu
104a2(dkon brtsegs): khyud des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par khyim gyi yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
104a3(dkon brtsegs): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la yang zhag bdun bdun 'das shing chos gos yid du 'ong ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang phul lo/ /gang dag ci dang
104a4(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dod pa de dang de dag la kha zas kyi rnam pa yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang phul lo/ /gang dang gang dag ji lta ji lta bu 'dod pa de dang de dag gi gtsug lag khang yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang brtsig tu bcug go/ /dge slong re re la yang
104a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chags dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / bsnyen bkur ba bdun bdun dang / ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas dag kyang phul lo/ /'od srung 'di ltar rgyal po mu khyud des khang bzangs kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad bcu yod pa ngos bzhi khang /
104a6(dkon brtsegs): mig can shin du 'brel pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ legs par byas pa/ legs par zin par byas pa/ 'khrul 'khor gyi srad bus yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dag kyang byed du bcug ste/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi
104a7(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun dang bcas pa khang bzang de dag na bzhugs pa de'i tshe 'khrul 'khor gyi srad bu de dag gi shugs kyis khang bzangs de dag gi steng nas me tog kha dog rnam pa du ma'i char dag kyang 'bab bo/ /me tog de dag gis khang bzangs de dag
104a8(dkon brtsegs): pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/ /'od srung de ltar rgyal po mu khyud des de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du yon tan bkod pa bsam gyis mi
104b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa dag dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so/ /'od srung de nas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag 'das pa'i phyi de nyin par de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal zas
104b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bya ba mdzad lags pa'i 'og tu khye'u chos dang / chos bzang gnyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
104b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas me tog sna tshogs de'i spyan sngar btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la yid kyi zhu ba 'di skad ces yongs su zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po mu khyud 'dis yun ring po 'di srid du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun
104b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam pa mang po 'di lta bu thams cad zil kyis gnon cing yongs su gtugs te gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dang / longs spyod dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan zhig mchis lags sam/
104b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rab tu g.yos shing 'jig rten dus g.yos pa chen po yang
104b6(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur to/ /'od srung de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i bsnyen bkur ba thub dka' zhes bya ba zhig yod par gyur ba gang yin pa de stan las langs te chos gos
104b7(dkon brtsegs): p hrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la
104b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten du dog sa cher g.yos pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ ci'i slad du na khye'u 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs par
105a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur lags/ 'od srung de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des bsnyen bkur ba thub dka' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu gtam de lta bu yongs su zhus pas khyod la ci bya/ gal te
105a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas khye'u 'di gnyis kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu dang / zab mo la bzod pa sgom pa ji lta bu dang / snying rje chen po ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa'i gnas de bshad par gyur na
105a3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di rmongs par 'gyur ro/ / // bam po gsum pa/ 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des nyan thos chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba
105a4(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu khyod longs la khye'u 'di gnyis slong ste rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ston cig /'od srung de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des de las khye'u gcig lag pa g.yas pas blangs la/ khye'u gcig
105a5(dkon brtsegs): shos lag pa g.yon pas blangs te gyen du 'phang ngo snyam na gdeg par ma nus so/ /des yang rgya cher mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po yang dag par bstan cing gyen du 'phang ngo snyam
105a6(dkon brtsegs): na tha na de gnyis skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang bskyod pa 'am bsgul bar ma nus so/ /'od srung de ltar de khye'u de gnyis shin du gyen du 'phang bar bskyod pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang /
105a7(dkon brtsegs): ri dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / chu dang bcas pa de rab tu g.yos shing bla 'og tu 'gul bar gyur kyang khye'u de gnyis bslang bar ni ma nus so/ /'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i tshe nyan thos chen po
105a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems yang dag par rab tu gzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar sgrub pa mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar bsgrubs pa des dge slong sred med kyi bu des 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'gul ba dang /
105b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yos pa dang / kun du 'khrugs pa dang / bla 'og tu 'gul bar byas kyang tha na khye'u de gnyis skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang g.yo ba 'am/ 'gul bar byed ma nus so/ /'od srung de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des
105b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
105b3(dkon brtsegs): stobs las yongs su nyams pa 'am gcig tu ma gyur lags grang / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis khye'u skyes nas ring po ma lags pa/ byis pa'i gzugs su mchis pa/ lus bong
105b4(dkon brtsegs): chung ngu 'di gnyis kyis dog sa la gtugs pa yang bslang bar rngo ma thog pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des dge slong sred med
105b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sred med kyi bu khyod ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las su yongs su ma nyams mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di ni
105b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par dkrug pa 'am/ bsam bar sla ba ma yin te/ sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
105b7(dkon brtsegs): ' jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste dper na ngas da ltar khyod nyid nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
105b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur cing de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / de tsam du mthu che ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rnam
106a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'phrul ba byas kyang de dag gis khye'u 'di gnyis bslang ba 'am/ bsgul bar mi nus so/ /'od srung de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des tshig de skad gsungs pa na 'khor
106a2(dkon brtsegs): de la srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams
106a3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa kho na yin yang / gang la nyan thos chen po 'di dag rdugs par byas te bkod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ bdag cag
106a4(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang byin gyis brlabs de lta bu thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang thob par bya'o snyam du sems shing de ltar yang dag par shes pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis bla
106a5(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /'od srung de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par
106a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
106a7(dkon brtsegs): ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bslang bar mdzad cing khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhus pa rab tu rnam par dbye ba yang bstan
106a8(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i tshe se gol gyi sgra mdzad de/ se gol gyi sgra des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mngon par
106b1(dkon brtsegs): grags par gyur to/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du se gol gyi sgras mngon par grags par gyur ba de snyed kho na rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par yang gyur to/ /ji snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par
106b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba de snyed kho na snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par yang gyur to/ /'od srung de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis sgra de thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi drung nas langs par gyur to/ /'od srung khye'u de gnyis
106b3(dkon brtsegs): l angs par gyur ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang mi'i sil snyan gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ma gsil ma dkrol bar rol mo'i sgra dag 'byin par gyur cing me tog gi char
106b4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to/ /'od srung de nas khye'u de gnyis langs nas kyang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te
106b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal du lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs
106b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nga'i zhabs kyi drung du gtugs nas nga la yid kyis zhu ba 'di skad ces yongs su zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po mu khyud 'dis sbyin pa bya ba'i chos sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i
106b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa gang lags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / yongs su gtong ba gang lags pa de zil kyis gnon cing yongs su gtugs te gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa mchis lags sam/ yongs
106b8(dkon brtsegs): su gtong ba mchis lags sam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mchis lags sam zhes khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nga la zhu ba de skad yongs su zhus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/ /'od srung
107a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
107a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhus pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ 'od srung de skad ces

107a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu rgyal po mu khyud 'dis bsod nams kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pa zhig dgon pa dang / rab tu dgon pa dag la gnas shing
107a5(dkon brtsegs): se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o zhes bzod pa thob pa gang yin pa de bsod nams kyi phung po ches che bar rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu rgyal po mu khyud 'di'i sbyin pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum
107a6(dkon brtsegs): g yi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji tsam pa sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can re res kyang so so nas rgyal po mu khyud 'di'i sbyin pa ji snyed pa
107a7(dkon brtsegs): de snyed cig byin par gyur na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben bar gnas pa yang
107a8(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam du zhugs pa/ tshul bzhin la rab tu brtson pa zhig chos thams cad stong pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa zhes bya bar se gol gtogs pa
107b1(dkon brtsegs): tsam zhig bzod cing gnas par gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phu po snga ma des ni se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig bzod pa la gnas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /
107b2(dkon brtsegs): stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang /

107b4(dkon brtsegs): gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can re res kyang skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud

108a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ mkhas pa mngon par

108a3(dkon brtsegs): d u dpag tu med cing de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma de ni khye'u 'di gnyis kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
108a4(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la gtugs shing phyag 'tshal ba 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /
