134b5(dkon brtsegs): kun du 'dzin pa'i phyir nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sa bon yin pa dang / zhe sdang ni myur du yongs su spong ba'i phyir ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur ba yin pa dang / gti mug ni rnam par 'grol
134b6(dkon brtsegs): bar dka' ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du rab tu ltung ba'i rgyur gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpas nyes pa dang po'i lci pa ni tshogs bcu la drang por
134b7(dkon brtsegs): bshags par bya'o/ /bud med kyi lag pa nas 'dzin pa'i lag pa'i nyes pa lci ba ni tshogs lnga la bshags par bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis mig gis bltas pa'i nyes pa ni gang
134b8(dkon brtsegs): zag gcig gam/ gnyis kyi mdun du bshags par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i nyes pa dang / bud med kyi nyes pa dang / khyi'u'i nyes pa dang /
135a1(dkon brtsegs): lag pa'i nyes pa dang / mchod rten gyi nyes pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nyes pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i nyes pa lci ba rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa lnga'i spyan
135a2(dkon brtsegs): sngar gcig pus nyin mtshan du bshags par bya'o/ /de la bshags pa ni 'di yin te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /
135a3(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa la phyag
135a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ /rin chen 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal dgyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen me
135a5(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthong ba don yod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpas
135a6(dkon brtsegs): byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal bzangs
135a7(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mya ngan med pa'i dpal la
135a8(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par
135b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dran pa'i
135b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan dpal shin du yongs bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin du rnam par gnon
135b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yul las shin du rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun nas snang ba
135b4(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen pad ma rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i
135b5(dkon brtsegs): pad ma la rab tu zhugs pa ri dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
135b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di dang / skye ba
135b7(dkon brtsegs): thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sdig pa'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba 'am/ mchod
135b8(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi dkor ram/ dge 'dun gyi dkor ram/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor phrogs pa dang / 'phrog tu stsal pa 'am/ 'phrogs pa la rjes su yi rang ba 'am/ mtshams
136a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba 'am/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blang ba la zhugs pa dang /
136a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug tu stsal ba dang / 'jug pa la rjes su yi rang ba 'am/ las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ yi
136a3(dkon brtsegs): dgas kyi yul du mchi ba 'am/ yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba 'am/ kla klor skye ba 'am/ lha tshe ring po rnams kyi nang du skye ba 'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ lta ba log pa 'dzin par
136a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba 'am/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par mi bgyid par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes su gyur pa/ spyan du gyur pa/ dpang
136a5(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa/ gzigs pa de dag gi spyan sngar 'thol lo 'chags so/ /mi 'chab bo/ /slad chad kyang sdom par bgyid lags so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
136a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di dang / skye ba thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sbyin pa tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la zas kham gcig
136a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam stsal pa gang lags pa dang / bdag gis tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis
136a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
136b1(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bzlums te bsdoms nas bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong mar yongs su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag
136b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su bsngos pa dang / ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
136b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar yongs su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar
136b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ /sdig pa thams cad 'chags so/ /bsod nams thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ngo / /sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs so/ /bdag gi ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog tu gyur cig /
136b5(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa dang / /gang dag 'das pa dag dang de bzhin gang ma byon/ /yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas rgya mtsho 'dra kun la/ /thal mo sbyar ba bgyis te skyabs
136b6(dkon brtsegs): su nye bar mchi'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa lnga po de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sdig
136b7(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o/ /de ltar sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid kyang sems can rnam par thar par bya ba kho na'i phyir zhal nye bar ston
136b8(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo 'khrul pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par mdzad kyang chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo la sems can
137a1(dkon brtsegs): mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongs su rdzogs par yang mdzad do/ /shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa'
137a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
137a3(dkon brtsegs): rten dang / lha ma yin gyi 'gro ba nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
137a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
137a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par
137a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can
137a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can
137a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su
137b1(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
137b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs nye bar ston par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
137b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir la lar ni brgya byin gyi gzugs/ la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /de ci'i phyir
137b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par rig pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar
137b5(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed kyang de la bdag tu dmigs pa yang med/ sems can du dmigs pa yang med la sems can rnams la 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i
137b6(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sgra skad gang yin pa de byi las bzod par nus snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lags
137b7(dkon brtsegs): so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ spos kyi glang po che'i khal gang yin pa de bong bus bzod par nus snyam 'am/ shA ri'i
137b8(dkon brtsegs): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag gi gzi brjid kyi bdag po gang yin pa de
138a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dbul pos bzod par nus snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/
138a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de bya rgod kyi phrug gus bzod par nus snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin
138a3(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems dpa' ba dang / dge ba'i ba'i stobs bskyed pa las byung zhing shes pa las nges par byung ba'i nyes pa gang yin pa dang / nyes pa'i 'gyod pa'i gnas/
138a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pas rnam par sbyong ba gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis rnam
138a5(dkon brtsegs): par sbyong bar mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan 'dzin cing yongs su brjod pa dang / phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyin lan gsum mtshan
138a6(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum brjod pas nyes pa bgyid pa'i gnas las nges par 'byung zhing ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ / // bam po gnyis pa/
138a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
138a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad
138b1(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gcig pu dben par mchis te nang du yang dag bzhag pa na sems la yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan
138b2(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa bcas la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
138b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa ba rnams kyis ni srog gi phyir yang bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ngo / /zhes gsungs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam bzhugs kyang rung ste/
138b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ theg
138b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog
138b6(dkon brtsegs): legs par bka' stsal na/ ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las 'dul ba la mkhas pa mngon sum du thos shing mngon sum du bzungs nas mi 'jigs pa thob cing 'khor rnams la rgya cher yang dag
138b7(dkon brtsegs): par ston par 'gyur ba de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan du gsol bar bgyi lags so/ /snyam ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dben par
138b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis nas nang du yang dag par bzhag pa na/ sems la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar mchis la 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa yongs su zhu'o snyam pa de lta bu'i
139a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur lags na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong gi 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa la 'dul ba rnam par gtan
139a2(dkon brtsegs): la dbab pa rgya cher legs par bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nye bar 'khor de'i phyir khyod kyis
139a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams kyi bslab pa ni sbyor ba gzhan dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smros shig /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
139a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bslab pa yang sbyor ba gzhan dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smros shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams kyi sbyor ba yang
139a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang gzhan/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan yin pa'i
139a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ /nye bar 'khor de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su
139a7(dkon brtsegs): ma dag pa nyid dang / shin du 'chal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa
139a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin du 'chal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye ba len par
139b1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ /de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid yin la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin
139b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'chal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /nye bar 'khor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa
139b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin du 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal
139b4(dkon brtsegs): p a tshad med grangs med par srid par skye ba len kyang sems yongs su mi skyo zhing yid yongs su mi skyo ba de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa
139b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin la/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin du 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no/ /nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyis theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
139b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su srung ba dang bcas pa yin par smros shig / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su srung ba med pa yin par smros shig /theg pa chen po
139b7(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su yod pa yin par smros shig / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su med pa yin par smros shig /theg pa
139b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin par smros shig / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags pa yin par smros shig /
140a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor de la ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa rjes su srung ba dang bcas pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams kyi bslab pa rjes su srung ba
140a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyi rjes su 'jug par bya dgos
140a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams la ni mi dgos te/ nye bar 'khor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su srung ba dang bcas pa
140a4(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su srung ba med pa yin no/ /nye bar 'khor ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bcos
140a5(dkon brtsegs): su yod pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa bcos su med pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/
140a6(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa byung la gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na
140a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /gal te gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe na nyes pa byung la phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
140a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no/ /gal te phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe na nyes pa byung ba la mtshan mo'i thun dang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par
140b1(dkon brtsegs): byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no/ /gal te mtshan mo'i thun dang po la nyes pa byung la mtshan mo'i gung thun
140b2(dkon brtsegs): la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no/ /
140b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te mtshan mo'i gung thun la nyes pa byung la mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
140b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no/ /nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su yod
140b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ de la ni byang chub sems dpas 'gyod pa'i kun nas ldang ba ha cang bskyed par mi bya zhing ha cang yid la gcags par yang mi bya'o/ /nye bar 'khor de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yang dang yang du nyes pa byung na ni
140b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang / rab tu nyams pa dang / yongs su gtugs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spang
140b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su med pa yin no/ /
140b8(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa mthar chags pa
141a1(dkon brtsegs): yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la gal te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis rtse ba dang / dga'
141a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dga' mgur spyad pa byas kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o/ /
141a3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems de nyid kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni rmi lam na yang nyon mongs pa rnams
141a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis kun du reg par mi 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yod/ skabs kyang yod par 'gyur ba dang / nye bar 'khor yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni srid pa gcig gis nyon mongs pa thams
141a5(dkon brtsegs): cad zad par mi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag ni rim gyis zad par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa mgo dang gos
141a6(dkon brtsegs): la me 'bar ba lta bur byed pas ni de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye ba bskyed par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
141a7(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa ni ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags pa yin no/ /nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyis theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
141a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su srung ba dang bcas pa dang / bcos su yod pa dang / ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin par smros shig /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni
141b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su srung ba med pa dang / bcos su med pa dang / mthar chags pa yin par smros shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni tshogs chen po dang ldan pa yin
141b2(dkon brtsegs): pas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu skyo bas ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa yang mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor bar sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir te/ nye bar 'khor de bzhin
141b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gcig tu skyo ba'i gtam mi gsung / gcig tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gtam mi gsung /
141b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu yid 'byung ba'i gtam mi gsung bar dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ngo / /zab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can
141b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / phra ba dang / brtags pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa dang / kun nas ldang ba med pa'i gtam gsung ngo / /thogs pa med pa dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi gtam gsung ste/ de dag gi gtam
141b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag thos nas mngon par dga' zhing 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
141b7(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nongs pa gang lags pa de dag las kha cig ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags/ kha cig ni zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags/
141b8(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni gti mug dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag las ci 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'am/ 'on te zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'am/ 'on te gti mug dang mtshungs
142a1(dkon brtsegs): par ldan pa 'am/ gang zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nongs pa shin du lci bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
142a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nye bar 'khor gal te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa bskal pa gang
142a3(dkon brtsegs): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byung bar gyur la/ zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa ni gcig cig byung bar gyur na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa tshad mar byas na zhe sdang dang mtshungs par
142a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa de dag pas ches nyes pa lci bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor zhe sdang ni sems can yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba
142a5(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ 'dod chags ni sems can sdud par 'gyur ba yin te/ nye bar 'khor de la sems can sdud par 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang 'jigs pa med la/ sems
142a6(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang 'jigs pa yod pa'i phyir ro/ /nye bar 'khor yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags ni 'bral ba bul la
142a7(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba dang / bcas pa chung ba dang / zhe sdang ni 'bral ba myur la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che ba dang / gti mug ni 'bral ba bul la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che bar gsungs pa gang yin pa de la/ nye bar
142a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'bral ba bul la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa ma yin par blta'o/ /'bral ba myur la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub
142b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa yin pas rmi lam na yang 'dod par mi bya'o/ /nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang nyes pa med pas de dag
142b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni nyes pa ma yin par smros shig / zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang nyes pa yod pas de dag thams cad ni nyes pa yin par smros shig /nye bar 'khor de la byang chub sems dpa' gang
142b3(dkon brtsegs): dag thabs la mi mkhas pa de dag ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa dag gis 'jigs par byed la/ zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag gis ni 'jigs par mi byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thabs la mkhas pa de dag ni zhe sdang dang mtshungs
142b4(dkon brtsegs): par ldan pa'i nyes pa dag gis 'jigs par byed la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag gis ni 'jigs par mi byed do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
142b5(dkon brtsegs): to/ /bcom ldan 'das shin du dul ba'i chos thams cad la 'dul ba pa ci zhig mchis/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal gal te byis pa so so'i skye bo
142b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi chos thams cad shin du dul bar shes na ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang yang dang yang du 'dul ba 'cha' bar mi mdzad pa zhig na/ gang gi phyir sems can rnams kyis mi shes pa de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos thams cad shin du dul ba
142b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rim gyis bya ba'i 'dul ba 'cha' bar mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'di 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan
142b8(dkon brtsegs): pa bshad pa 'di la ci yang mi ston lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'di bstan pa 'ga' zhig legs par ston par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad
143a1(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal dge slong nye bar 'khor 'di 'dul ba la mkhas pa nyan par 'dod kyis shin du dul ba las rtsoms te khyod slobs par gyis shig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad
143a2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /btsun pa nye bar 'khor chos thams cad ni shin du dul ba te/ rang gi sems gdul ba'i phyir shin du dul ba kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste bdag mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'gyod pa 'dul ba kun du ston to/ /
143a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni phyin ci ma log pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shin du dul ba kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtha'i sgo yin te/ bslab pa la rlom sems med par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa yongs su dag pa kun du ston
143a4(dkon brtsegs): to/ /chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa ste bsam gyis mi khyab pas chags pa med pa nyid kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni chags pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa ste/ yun ring du mi gnas pa'i
143a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag pa kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtha' la gnas pa ste/ dngos po dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin med pa nyid kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba med par gyur ba ste/ sngon gyis mtha'
143a6(dkon brtsegs): dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni gdags pa dang bral ba ste/ sems mnyam pa nyid du spyod pa'i phyir the tshom spang ba kun tu ston to/ /btsun pa nye bar 'khor de ni
143a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rjes su rtogs pa chos kyi dbyings shin du dul ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos nyid 'di la mnos pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las ring du gyur ba yin no/ /
143a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan par nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba ni gang dang gang ston pa de dag thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa kho na las brtsams te ston lags so/ /
143b1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nye bar 'khor 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i chos ston pa ni rnam par grol ba'i rgyu 'thun pa yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la ma brten par
143b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba med pas na/ de'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / sems pa la mos pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
143b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong sems gang dang / mtshungs par ldan na lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
143b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor 'di la dge slong gal te 'dod chags spang bar sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te zhe sdang spang ba dang / gti mug spang bar sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'dod chags kyi chos kyang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi
143b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang gzhan no zhes de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te zhe sdang gi chos kyang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gzhan pa dang / gti mug gi chos kyang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gzhan no zhes de snyam du sems
143b6(dkon brtsegs): na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te dga' ba la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /bya ba la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /rnam par grol ba la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /stong pa nyid la sems
143b7(dkon brtsegs): na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /mtshan ma med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /smon pa med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /
143b8(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te chos rnams yod do snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /chos thams cad ni mi rtag go snyam du
144a1(dkon brtsegs): sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /chos thams cad la stong pa la yang bya ba ci yod ces de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin te/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
144a2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i nga rgyal gang zhe na/ gal te bdag gis thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la sems bskyed do zhes de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o zhes de snyam du sems
144a3(dkon brtsegs): na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin par sems te/ de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'di ni zab pa'o/ /'di ni zab pa ma yin no/ /zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la
144a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'dis ni rnam par dag par 'gyur la 'dis ni rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni nyan thos
144a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos so zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'di ni rigs so/ /'di ni mi rigs so/ /zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can yin no/ /'di ni kun nas nyon mongs
144a6(dkon brtsegs): pa can ma yin no/ /zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'di ni lam yin no/ /'di ni lam ma yin no/ /zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
144a7(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas 'di la bsam par bya ba med do/ /zhes de snyams sems na
144a8(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas bsam par bya ba ci yang med do/ /zhes de snyam sems na dmigs pa chen po yin te/ de ni
144b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ dge slong
144b2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nye bar 'khor dge slong gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu
144b3(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la mngon par zhen par mi byed na de ni shin du lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing de'i tshe tshigs
144b4(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang dag bsam yas chos rnams 'di shes pa'i/ /mi rnams de dag rtag tu bde ba yin/ /chos dang chos min rnam rtog med pa ste/ /thams cad sems kyi spros pas phye ba
144b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ /thams cad bsam yas thams cad byung min bas/ /dngos dang dngos med shes pa rnam par shig /byis pa gang dag sems kyi dbang song ba/ /de dag srid pa bye ba brgyar sdug bsngal/ /dge
144b6(dkon brtsegs): slong gang dag bsam yas yod min pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mi mchog de sems tshul bzhin min/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnam par brtags/ /rtog pa de yang nam yang byung ma yin/ /gang dag chos rnams
144b7(dkon brtsegs): stong la sems byed pa'i/ /byis pa de dag lam ngan zhugs pa yin/ /chos rnams stong pa yi ges brjod pa ni/ /de dag yi ge med par yi ges bstan/ /gang dag zhi zhing rab zhi'i chos sems pa'i/ /
144b8(dkon brtsegs): sems pa de yang nam yang byung ma yin/ /spros kun sems kyi rnam par rtog yin te/ /de phyir chos rnams bsam yas rtogs par gyis/ /chos 'di thams cad sems med sems
145a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ /ji srid mi sems de srid stong pa yin/ /mi gang stong la sems par byed 'dod pa/ /bsam yas kun la phyir zhing sems pa yin/ /mig ni thams cad ldan na mthong
145a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ /mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba gang yin pa'ang / /mtshan mo rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur/ /de phyir ldan dang bral ba rnam rtog yin/ /mig ni snang las brten te
145a3(dkon brtsegs): yid 'ong dang / /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas/ /de ltar ldan las brten te mthong bas na/ /de phyir mig gis nam yang mthong ba med/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grag gang yin pa/ /
145a4(dkon brtsegs): de yang nam yang nang du zhugs pa med/ /der 'gro dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis sgra rnams byung ba yin/ /chos rnams 'di dag yi ge sgra skad kyis/ /grangs dang tha snyad
145a5(dkon brtsegs): gdags par bstan pa yin/ /chos dang chos min nam yang yod min yang / /skye bo byis pa rnams la de mi snang / /sbyin pa'i bsngags pa 'jig rten ngas brjod kyang / /ser sna'i chos de'ang dmigs
145a6(dkon brtsegs): su yod ma yin/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams bsam yas te/ /de yang dmigs med de yang mthong ba med/ /tshul khrims bya ba dag pa ngas bshad kyang / /'chal ba'i tshul khrims mkha' la lag pa
145a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ /tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad mkha' 'dra ste/ /gang dag tshul bzang de yang de dang 'dra/ /bzod pa gya nom nga yis bshad byas kyang / /de yi rang bzhin nam yang mthong ba med/ /'di na chos
145a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' 'ang 'khrug pa yod min yang / /bzod pa de yang rgyal bas rab tu bshad/ /nyin mtshan bag yod bya phyir nga yis ni/ /mi nyal dam pa bsngags pa brjod byas te/ /bskal pa brgya snyed brtson 'grus bskyed
145b1(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang / /'phel bar mi 'gyur zad pa yod ma yin/ /bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin gya nom pa'i/ /ji bzhin sgo dag 'gro la bstan byas te/ /'di la chos 'ga' 'ang zad pa yod min yang / /de
145b2(dkon brtsegs): dag cha shas phye ste rab tu bstan/ /shes rab chos rnams shes par gyis shig ces/ /shes rab lhag mthong blo gros ngas bstan kyang / /rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa nam du yang / /shes par mi
145b3(dkon brtsegs): nus de yang nges par bstan/ /rab dben chog shes sbyangs la dga' gyis shes/ /dka' thub ngan pa 'jig rten ngas bshad kyang / /chos shes yongs su mi 'thob gang yin pa/ /chos de 'di na dmigs
145b4(dkon brtsegs): su yod ma yin/ /sems dmyal 'jigs pa nga yis bstan byas te/ /sems can stong phrag du ma skyo byas kyang / /gang dag shi 'phos ngan song drag 'gro ba'i/ /'gro ba de dag nam yang yod ma yin/ /
145b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ral gri mda' chen mtshon 'byin pa'i/ /gnod pa byed pa yod pa ma yin te/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis ngan song de dag na/ /lus la 'bab mthong de na mtshon cha med/ /sna tshogs yid dga' me tog kha bye
145b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing / /gser gyi khang mchog 'bar ba yid 'ong ba/ /'di na de la'ang byed pa 'ga' med de/ /de dag rtog pa'i dbang gis gzhag pa yin/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnams brtags te/ /'du shes
145b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par phye/ /'dzin dang 'dzin med de yang 'byung min te/ /yongs su rtog pa sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin/ /'gro don byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed ces/ /spyod mchog khyad par 'phags pa
145b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan byas kyang / /byang chub nam yang dmigs su yod min te/ /'dod pa gang yin de yang yod ma yin/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag cing / /rdul med rdul bral dri ma med par gsungs/ /
146a1(dkon brtsegs): byis pa yod pa min la rnam rtog pa/ /chags 'gyur sdang bar 'gyur zhing rmongs par 'gyur/ /mnyam bzhag gya nom chos ni thob gyur na/ /'dod chags yod min sdang med rmongs pa'ang med/ /
146a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags bral zhing rnam par grol ba'i chos/ /kun gzhir ma gyur mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /mkha' 'dra'i chos rnams 'di dag shes gyur na/ /zhing brgya rnams su thogs med 'gro 'gyur zhing / /de dag
146a3(dkon brtsegs): yid kyang chags pa med 'gyur bas/ /de phyir thogs med lam ni bskyed par gyis/ /bskal pa brgya phrag mang por spyad byas shing / /sems can brgya phrag mtha' yas grol byas kyang / /nam yang sems can
146a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su yod min zhing / /zad pa'ang yod min mtha' yas gyur pa'ang med/ /ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'jig rten na/ /sems can brgya phrag mang po sprul byas te/ /sprul pa de dag thams cad bsad
146a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang / /sgyu ma de dag bsad pa yod min ltar/ /'gro ba 'di kun sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ /'di la mtha' ni nam yang dmigs su med/ /gang dag de ltar mtha' yas mos byas pa/ /de dag 'jig rten na ni
146a6(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba med/ /gang dag rang bzhin med chos 'di shes pa/ /dpa' bo de dag 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /'dod pa'i yon tan spyod kyang chags med cing / /chags pa rnams spangs sems can 'dul bar byed/ /
146a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di na sems can 'ga' med srog med kyang / /mi dbang rnams ni sems can phan pa mdzad/ /sems can yod ma yin yang don mdzad pa/ /de dag rnams kyi de ni dka' ba che/ /ji ltar chang ba bcangs te
146a8(dkon brtsegs): byis pa la/ /ston cing lag tu yod ces brjod byas nas/ /de yis chang ba stong ba mthong nas ni/ /byis pa de ni cho nges ngu ba ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /sems can tshul la
146b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas shing mkhyen pa rnams/ /chos rnams 'di dag gsob gsog mkhyen gyur nas/ /'jig rten dag la dngos po bstan pa ston/ /shin tu dga' ba'i bstan pa 'di la ni/ /khyim pa'i rtags
146b2(dkon brtsegs): spangs rab tu byung gyis la/ /'bras bu yod pa'i mchog tu 'gyur gyis shes/ /thugs rje can gyis de skad bstan pa'ang mdzad/ /khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyur nas/ /'bras bu thams
146b3(dkon brtsegs): cad 'thob par 'gyur yang ni/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dag la gzhal byas na/ /'bras bu kun med 'bras bu thob pa'ang med/ /'on kyang 'bras bu thob pa thob gyur pa/ /kye ma mi mchog thugs rje ldan
146b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ /rgyal ba rigs pa shin tu legs bshad ces/ /de dag ngo mtshar che ba skye bar 'gyur/ /de ltar zhi ba'i chos rnams de dag la/ /'di dag dbang po bsam gtan rnam thar dang / /stobs dang byang chub
146b5(dkon brtsegs): yan lag zhi ba zhes/ /ming dang tshig stong snyed kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /dbang po 'ga' yang ma skyes stobs kyang min/ /byang chub yan lag zhi ba'ang ma bskyed de/ /chos 'di gzugs can ma yin
146b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med kyang / /'jig rten dag la shes pa'i stobs kyis bshad/ /'gro ba rnams la thob pa ngas bshad pa/ /de kun mtshan ma rnam par spangs pa yin/ /'di na gang dag bdag gis thob
146b7(dkon brtsegs): sems pa/ /de ni ma thob thob par rlom sems byed/ /'jig rten dag na gang la dngos med pa/ /de la thob pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /thob dang thob med 'gro la bstan mdzad pa/ /gang gis de
146b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar shes des thob pa yin/ /kun las khyad zhugs 'bras bu thob pa yin/ /sems can de ngas sems can med par bstan/ /de la sems can nam yang dmigs med de/ /sems can med na
147a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhing dngos gang la sa bon yod min pa/ /de la myu gu skye ba med pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems can nam yang dmigs med na/ /sems can med la 'thob
147a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ga la yod/ /sems can 'di kun mya ngan 'das pa ste/ /'di la rtsa ba nam yang dmigs su med/ /gang zhig chos tshul 'di la mos gyur pa/ /de ngas lhag med mya ngan 'das par bstan/ /sangs
147a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas brgya mang yang dag 'das gyur pa/ /de dag gis kyang sems can kun ma btul/ /gal te sems can 'ga' 'dir byung gyur na/ /de dag nam yang mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur/ /de ltar lam 'di sgrib
147a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yod min te/ /de la nam yang chags pa yod ma yin/ /gang dag chos nyid 'di la mos gyur pa/ /de dag yid ni srid la chags mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa bsgrub pa bstan
147a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' drug khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /
147a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
147a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa zhes bya bar zung shig /sems can thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /
147a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan
147b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog
147b2(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan
147b3(dkon brtsegs): po dzi na mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA barma dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
147b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa ste lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba/ bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a d+h+yA sha ya san tso da na nA ma ma
147b5(dkon brtsegs): hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
147b6(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI na drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags na/ dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya phal cher dge ba'i rtsa ba
147b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin pa/ las kyi sgrib pa bsal ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'du 'dzi la dga' bar gnas shing gnyid la dga' ba dang / las la dga'
147b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / smra ba la dga' ba dang / spros pa la dga' ba dang / spag pas spags par gyur ba dang / rigs pa med pa dang / mi brtson pa dang / le lo can dang / brtson 'grus dman pa dang / sbyor ba btang bar gnas
148a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yon tan ma yin pa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems
148a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba las yongs su nyams kyis bdag gis byang
148a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'di dag bskul bar bya/ dran par bya gor ma chag go snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phyem red kyi nus kyi tshe nang du yang dag par 'jog las langs nas
148a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i gtam
148a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci rigs kyi bu dag khyed dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel ba 'am/ yongs su nyams par ma gyur tam/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe
148a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa byams pa bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams te 'phel bar ma gyur to/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur snyam pa'i the tshom gyis kyang bdag cag gi
148a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kun nas dkris shing 'dug go/ /bdag cag log pa ltung ba'i chos can yin nam/ log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin zhig gu snyam pa'i 'gyod pas kyang bdag cag gi sems kun nas
148a8(dkon brtsegs): dkris shing 'dug ste/ bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos rnams la yang 'dun pa mi skye'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'
148b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed tshur shog /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs
148b2(dkon brtsegs): pa der 'dong ngo / /de ci'-i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ ye shes sgrib pa mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la
148b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa la mkhas pa ste/ des khyed kyi spyod pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' drug bcu tsam po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
148b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas yang dang
148b5(dkon brtsegs): yang du phyag 'tshal nas gdong la mchi ma zag cing mgo ma bteg go/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
148b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed
148b7(dkon brtsegs): ma ngu ma 'gyod par longs/ khyed nyid kyis rnam par smin pa la mi rtog par dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs pas gzhan la gtse zhing gshe ba byas te/ las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu mngon par 'dus byas pas da
148b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar khyed bsgribs shing tshod de kun nas bskor cing kun nas dkris nas brtson par mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' drug bcu tsam po de dag gis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i
149a1(dkon brtsegs): lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag gis gang thos na rang gi sems zlog par
149a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi cing las kyi sgrib pa gzhan yang mngon par 'du mi bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bdag cag gi las kyi sgrib pa bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
149a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa drug bcu po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa logs par dad sel
149a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi gsung rab la khyed rab tu byung ste 'khod pa na tshul khrims kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang / thos pa'i rgyags pas myos pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par zhen
149a5(dkon brtsegs): bas dge slong chos smra ba gnyis la 'di ltar rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i rgyu dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyi gzhi las phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pas 'khrig pa'i skur bas
149a6(dkon brtsegs): bskur te/ chos smra ba'i dge slong de gnyis kyi mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim du gyur ba gang yin pa de dag kyang khyed kyis phye ste/ the tshom bskyed cing ma dad par byas la/ dge slong
149a7(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba de gnyis kyi mi snyan pa mang po dag kyang smras/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bcad cing dge ba la sgrib pa byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa des khyed lo drug khrir sems can
149a8(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /lo bzhi khrir ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skyes so/ /lo nyi khrir ni sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag tu skyes so/ /lo brgyad stong du ni sems
149b1(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba chen po tsha bar skyes so/ /khyed de nas shi 'phos nas mi'i lus rnyed pa rnyed nas tshe rab lnga brgyar mig med de dmus long du gyur to/ /khyed las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis bsgribs nas gang dang gang
149b2(dkon brtsegs): du skyes pa de dag thams cad du sems rtul ba dang / brjed ngas par gyur to/ /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgrib pas bsgribs shing dbang chud par grags par gyur to/ /mi stug pa'i skyon gyis zil gyis non pa dang /
149b3(dkon brtsegs): smad pa dang / bshung ba dang / skur ba mang bar yul ngan pa dang / yul 'khor ngan pa dang / ljongs ngan pa dag tu rigs ngan dang / dbul po'i rigs dag tu skyes nas rnyed pa chung ba dang / bkur sti chung ba dang /
149b4(dkon brtsegs): mi bkur ba dang / mi mchod par gyur to/ /khyed 'di nas shi 'phos nas lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe yul ngan pa sha stag tu rigs dma' ba dang / dbul po dag tu skye bar 'gyur
149b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ skur ba mang ba dang / brjed ngas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba spong ba dang / brtson pa byas kyang bar chad 'byung ba dang / snang ba byung yang phyir nub par 'gyur ro/ /khyed lnga brgya pa tha ma la las kyi sgrib pa
149b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zad par 'gyur te/ zad par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med
149b7(dkon brtsegs): des kyang khyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa drug bcu po de dag gis gdong las mchi ma phyis nas skyo zhing skyo
149b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yid kyis yang dag par dga' ste/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
150a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la tha ba'i nongs pa'i sems bskyed pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa dang / gzhan yang las kyi sgrib pa gang ci mngon par 'dus bgyis pa rnams bdag cag gis bshags so/ /
150a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das deng slad chad bdag cag 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yi dam 'di lta bu bca' bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slad chad byang chub sems
150a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gi ltung ba mang ba 'am/ mang ba ma lags pa yang rung ste/ gleng na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bslus
150a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag la brnyas sam/ de la mi snyan pa brjod na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
150a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba yang
150a6(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtse zhing yongs su spyod pa mthong na ma dad par bgyid pas ma gus pa bskyed dam/ de la ston par 'du shes ma bskyed na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus
150a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rgyus byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi lus la gnod pa
150a8(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ sems la gnod pa bgyis na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
150b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig gcig tsam zhig smras na yang bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
150b2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag ma bgyis na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa 'di'i slad du rgyal srid thob pa 'am/ nor thob pa 'am/ lus dang / srog dang yang ma
150b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngos na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag la brnyas te/ bdag cag ni tshes drag gis
150b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni de lta ma yin no snyam na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad dma' ba'i sems dang / gdol ba dang / khyi'i sems lta bur gnas par ma bgyis
150b5(dkon brtsegs): na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad bdag la bstod tam/ gzhan la smod na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
150b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad gnod sems dang / rtsod pa'i 'jigs pas bskul ma thag tu dpag tshad dam dpag tshad brgyar ma byol na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom
150b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad bdag nyid tshul khrims dang ldan par khas 'che ba 'am/ mang du thos pa 'am/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'am/ yon tan gang yang rung ba zhig gis bdag brjod
150b8(dkon brtsegs): na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad dge ba mi spyoms shing sdig pa mi bcab par gnas par ma bgyis
151a1(dkon brtsegs): na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bslus bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
151a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so/ /legs so/ /tshig 'di khyod kyis legs par smras so/ /yang dag par slang ba 'di legs par byas so/ /khyed yang dag
151a3(dkon brtsegs): par blang ba 'di la gnas na las kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
151a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo las kyi sgrib pa sbyang bar 'dod pas ji ltar rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis byas pa de bzhin du yi dam bca'o/ /de nas bcom
151a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci rigs kyi bu 'di dag yi dam 'di yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur lags
151a6(dkon brtsegs): sam/ 'on ti yongs su gtong bar 'gyur lags bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni yi dam 'di lus dang srog gis phyir yang spong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
151a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos du dang ldan na lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par
151a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa'i tshe ma snang cing ma rmas la bde bar yongs su thar bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad
151b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi dang ldan na lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snang cing ma rmas la bde ba yongs su thar
151b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis 'khrul pa la so sor rtog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan gyis nyes pa mi gling ba dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i
151b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim la mi lta ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig spong ba ste/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe
151b4(dkon brtsegs): ma snang cing ma rmas la bde bar yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi dang ldan na lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i
151b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe ma snang cing ma rmas la bde bar yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa nyung ngu'i sems can yongs su spong ba dang / 'khor mi bsdu ba dang / bal mtha'i gnas mal la bsten pa dang /
151b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / zhi gnas kyi sbyor ba la brtson pa ste/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i
151b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe ma snang cing ma rmas la bde bar yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig
151b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe ma snang cing ma rmas la bde bar yongs su thar bar 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par byed par 'dod pas 'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang / dgon pa dang / nags dang / bas
152a1(dkon brtsegs): mthar gnas pa dang / sems can rigs pa med cing mi brtson pa yongs su spong ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la rtog cing gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang / mi smra ba la dga'
152a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas gnas pa la dga' bar bya'o/ /gal te de la sems can gzhan dag la brda sprad par 'dod pa'i sems skyes na des zang zing med pa'i sems la gnas te
152a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /byams pa nyi shu po 'di dag ni zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rnyed pa dang / bkur sti mi 'dod par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa gang yin pa de'i phan yon yin te/ nyi shu gang
152a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
152a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyis de la glags mi rnyed
152a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams de la srung bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams de la gzi byin skyed par 'gyur ba dang / mi
152a7(dkon brtsegs): mdza' ba rnams kyis de la glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i mdza' bshes rnams mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / tshig btsun par 'gyur ba dang / des mi 'jigs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / yid bde
152a8(dkon brtsegs): ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang / mkhas pas bsngags par 'gyur ba dang / de'i chos kyi sbyin pa de yang rjes su dran par bya bar 'os par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin
152b1(dkon brtsegs): p a rnyed pa dang bkur sti yongs su spangs shing gos dang zas la re ba med par phan pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis rgyun mi chad par yang dang yang du chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa gang yin pa de'i phan yon
152b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /byams pa zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la gzhan yang phan yon nyi shu yod de/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ de'i spobs pa ma skyes pa skyes bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i spobs
152b3(dkon brtsegs): pa skyes pa chud mi za bar 'gyur ba dang / gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir de'i sems drang por 'gyur ba dang / tshigs chung ngus sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur ba dang / tshigs chung ngus
152b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams de la gus par rim gro byed par 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ngag gi sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / yid kyi sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gro'i
152b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu dga' bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de'i gzi brjid sems can
152b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs mthon po dag gis kyang mi bzod na phal dag gis lta ci smos pa dang / dbang po zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / zhi gnas dang
152b7(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong thob par 'gyur ba dang / dka' ba spyad pa dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos kun du srung bar 'gyur ba dang /
152b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa myur du non par 'gyur ba dang / byang chab sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la 'thun par gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i chos kyi
153a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i phan yon yin no/ /byams pa phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la ches yi rangs par 'gyur la/ zang zing med pa la ni
153a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba de dag la ltos/ de dag 'di ltar mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim la rten cing ji ltar bdag la dad cing bkur sti byed par 'gyur snyam ba'i sems
153a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bus chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de dag gis zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa bor nas gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang / yo byad kyi phyir gzhan dag la chos ston
153a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig la khyi ro 'am/ mi ro 'am/ spre'u yi ro yang rung ste/ shi ba rul pa mnam po zhig mgul bar btags na gtsang sbra 'dod pa'i phyir ngo tsha zhing mi dga'
153a5(dkon brtsegs): la yongs su spong bar byed do/ /de bzhin du de dag zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas ngo tsha zhing mi dga' bar byed de/ mnog med par shes nas skyo ste 'dor zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi phyir bdag cag la gos dang
153a6(dkon brtsegs): zas mi sbyin par sems pas na bdag cag gi chos kyi sbyin pa ni don med pa yin te/ bdag cag ni 'di na don med par mi dga' zhing 'dug go zhes zer nas de dag lus brgyan pa cher cher bya ba'i phyir slob ma sdud
153a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyi/ sems can bsdu ba cher cher bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /de dag 'di skad du bdag cag ni snying brtse bas 'khor bsdu bar byed kyi bdag cag la ni bsnyen bkur byed pa ci yang dgos pa med do/ /bdag
153a8(dkon brtsegs): cag ni phan pa'i dngos pos sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu 'gro bar zang ngo zhes skye bo mang po dag shes par byed
153b1(dkon brtsegs): de/ de dag gi sems ni gos dang zas la song bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa nga ni sems zang zing dang bcas pa la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bdag nyid kyang
153b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma smin na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa lta ci smos te/ gnas 'di ni thob par sla ba'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa nga ni bsnyen bkur lhur len cing lus kyi bsnyen bkur
153b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi bde ba'i sbag pas sbags par gyur ba la phan pa'i dngos po nyid du mi smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni lus la bde bar bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'khor sdud par zad kyi/ nan tan du sgrub pa la gnas pa'i
153b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa nga ni tshul 'chol ba la dgon pa na gnas pa zhes mi smra'o/ nga ni bsod nams chung ngu la 'dod pa chung ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni kha zas bzang po 'dod pa la bsod snyoms
153b5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni gos sdug gu 'dod pa la phyag dar khrod pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang 'dres pa la ma 'dzis pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni g.yo sgyu can la sangs rgyas byung ba dang phrad pa zhes mi smra'o/ /
153b6(dkon brtsegs): nga ni gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol ba la rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni khong khro ba mang ba la tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni nga rgyal can la mang du thos pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni
153b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs 'dzin pa la 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni rgod pa la chos smra ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni khyim pa dang 'dris pa la zhal ta byed pa yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni yon gnas 'dam pa la zang zing med par
153b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni lan du phan 'dogs su re ba la bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni ma dad
154a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mang pa la rab tu byung ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni pha rol la shes par byed pa la bslab pa 'dod pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni ma gus pa la chos sbyin pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni 'jig rten pa'i gsang sngags la
154a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa la chos la dga' ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni stong pa nyid la mi brtson pa la nges par 'byung ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni mngon par mi sgrub pa la las mngon par 'du byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni de mi sgrub pa la byang
154a3(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni dmigs pa can la mngon par rtogs pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni mthu med pa la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni ma gtses
154a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la bzod pa'i stobs kyi go cha can zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ba la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dka' ba byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni sbyor ba la mi gnas pa la ji skad smras pa de bzhin
154a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa la log par ltung bar 'gro ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni shes rab spyod pa la 'dzings par spyod pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni thabs dang ldan par gyur ba la g.yo sgyu can
154a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti mi 'dod pa la rdzun du smra ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni bar ma dor gnas pa la chos spong ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni dam pa'i chos kun du srung bar 'dod pa la lus dang srog la chags
154a7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni sems zhum pa la nga rgyal med pa zhes mi smra'o/ /byams pa g.yo sgyu'i tshig gang dag lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmu rgod du 'gyur ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpas khong du chud par bya zhing khong
154a8(dkon brtsegs): du chud nas kyang yongs su spong bar bya ba ni de dag yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems
154b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' drug bcu po 'di dag nye tshe las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan dag kyang bsgribs par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
154b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpa' phal cher las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur te/
154b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag las byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni las kyi sgrib pa zad par byed do/ /kha cig ni 'phel bar byed do/ /byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' drug bcu po 'di dag las byang
154b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' nyi shu las kyi sgrib pa chung zhing las kyi sgrib pa phra ba lnga brgya pa tha ma la skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rigs chen po sna tshogs dag
154b5(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhas pa/ khong bzo ba/ yid gzhungs ba/ shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa/ sems mnyen pa/ phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa/ snying rje che ba/ mdzes
154b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ blta na sdug pa/ dge ba mi spyoms pa/ yon tan sped pa/ spyod pa brtan pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /de dag rigs sna tshogs las rab tu byung nas bskal pa grangs med par bla na
154b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrubs pa 'di kun du srung zhing 'dzin par byed de/ lus dang srog dang yang bsngos nas dgon pa dang / nags khrod dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal
154b8(dkon brtsegs): sten cing rnyed pa dang / bkur sti mi 'dod par 'gyur te/ rtag tu brtson zhing rab tu brtson la/ sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ gsang sngags dang bstan bcos la mkhas pa/
155a1(dkon brtsegs): mgo smos pas go ba/ lhag mthong la mkhas pa/ spobs pa chags pa med pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /gzungs mi zad pa thob pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi
155a2(dkon brtsegs): byin gyi brlabs kyis 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston cing de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde
155a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gling gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin du rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung
155a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde'i mdo dag la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /deng byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa nyi shu po gang yin pa de dag slob dpon gyi lung rjod cing
155a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po'i lung rjod par 'gyur te/ slob dpon che ge mo zhig dang / mkhan po che go mo zhig las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis kun chub par byas so zhes rjod cing skyes bu dam pa de dag gi sems kun nas
155a6(dkon brtsegs): dkris te 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/ /der byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni dge ba spyoms pas gnas shing spobs pas de la mi lta bar skye bo mang po dag shes
155a7(dkon brtsegs): par byas de/ de dag gis dam pa'i chos 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di skad du yang 'phya bar byed de/ khyed ni rang gi spobs pas chos ston par byas kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni ma
155a8(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /chos 'di khyed kyis rang dgar byas pa yin no/ /khyed kyis chos gang dag bstan pa ni rang bzor gzhung du byas pa yin gyis/ khyed kyis 'di la ni gus par bya ba yang med/ ri mor
155b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yang med do zhes zer te/ der sems can mang po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar byed de/ de skad smras pas skye bo mang po 'dun pa las zlogs par 'gyur ro/ /'di skad du yang dge slong de dag ni
155b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa la sogs pa zang zing kun du spyod pa yin gyi/ mdo las 'byung ba dang / 'dul ba las 'byung ba'i chos mi ston to/ /'di ni chos ma yin gyis 'di la ri mor bya ba ma skyed cig ces zer te/ skyes bu
155b3(dkon brtsegs): blun po de dag gis ni legs par smras pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin par de ltar mi shes so/ /de dag gis bdud kyi byin gyi brlab kyis dge slong chos 'dzin pa de dag
155b4(dkon brtsegs): gi chos de spangs pas chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed do/ /chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
155b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kun du srung bar 'dod pas thabs la mkhas par bya ste/ ci nas sems can mos pa tha dad pa de dag gi khong khro ba'i sems mi skye
155b6(dkon brtsegs): bar kun du bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lnga brgya pa
155b7(dkon brtsegs): tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'chal ba de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spobs pa yang tshol la spobs pa la mos par yang mi bgyid pa dang / gzungs kyang tshol la
155b8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong chos 'dzin pa rnams kyi chos la yang sun 'byin par bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na mi la la zhig gis chab mig gam/ khron pa 'am/ mtsho las chab 'tshal bar 'tshal la/ des der sla tshwa bor te/ sla tshwa bor
156a1(dkon brtsegs): nas chab 'tshal bar bsams te/ de'i sna'i dbang pos chab de bsnams nas bdag nyid kyis nongs par glo bar ma chud de/ 'di ltar kye mchu 'di ni mnam mo zhes chab la skyon 'dogs par sems so/ /bcom ldan 'das
156a2(dkon brtsegs): de la sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi tshul 'di la spobs pa'i dge slong chos smra ba gang lags pa de dag ni chab mig gam/ khron pa 'am/ mtsho ji lta ba de bzhin du blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang
156a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams ni ji ltar byis pa'i rang bzhin can gyi chab mig gam/ khron pa 'am/ mtsho'i nang du sla tshwa bor nas chab 'tshal bar 'tshal la/ de chab la skyon 'dogs pa bzhin te/ shes rab
156a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can de dag chos smra ba de dag dang / chos la yang sun 'byin par bgyid de/ sun phyung nas kyang de dag nyid las chos kyi ro 'tshal bar sems te/ bdag nyid kyis nongs par glo bar ma chud nas rna ba'i
156a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po skyon dang ldan pas dge slong chos 'dzin pa de dag la sting zhing khyad du gsod la/ 'di skad du 'di ltar dge slong chos smra ba 'di dag ni nyes pa mang pos sun phyung ba yin no zhes mchi ste/ dge slong chos smra ba de dag gi chos kyi
156a6(dkon brtsegs): ro la sun 'byin cing 'khrul pa tshol te/ skyon sa 'dor zhing mchi bar sems lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
156a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa legs so/ /legs so/ /ji ltar yang 'khrul pa mi tshol zhing skyon thams cad dang bral ba khyod kyis bshad pa 'di'i dpe de legs par smras so/ /byams pa gzhan yang rgyu bzhi sa na spobs pa thams cad
156a8(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs par rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la spobs pa don dang ldan pa yin gyi don dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang / chos dang ldan pa yin gyi
156b1(dkon brtsegs): chos dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa ma yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ston pa yin gyi 'khor ba'i nyes pa 'phel
156b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa ma yin pa ste/ byams pa rgyu bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na spobs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs par rig par bya'o/ /byams pa dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
156b3(dkon brtsegs): ma gang su yang rung ste/ rgyu bzhi po 'di dag gi spobs pas spobs pa 'am/ spobs par 'gyur yang rung ste/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can dag gis de dag la sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed
156b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya zhing ston par 'du shes bskyed par byas nas dam pa'i chos mnyan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa legs par smras pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin pa'i
156b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ /byams pa de la gang zag la sdang ba'i phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no/ /zhes spobs pa bzhi po de dag spong zhing de dag la ma gus pa skyed par byed pa des ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs
156b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spobs pa thams cad spangs pa yin te/ chos spangs nas chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
156b7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dad pa can gang chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las las yongs su grol bar 'dod pas gang zag sdang ba'i phyir chos la sdang bar mi bya'o/ /byams pa spobs ba bzhi po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis
156b8(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa yin te/ byams pa bzhi gang zhe na/ spobs pa don med pa yin gyi don dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / chos dang mi ldan pa yin gyi chos dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa yin gyi
157a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa ma yin pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa 'phel bar byed pa yin gyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang phan yon mi ston pa ste/ byams pa spobs pa bzhi po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis
157a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs shing ma gnang ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor ba 'phel bar bgyid pa'i spobs pa
157a3(dkon brtsegs): s angs rgyas kyis ma gnang ba lags na byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags par bstan cing
