157a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba yongasu 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang bka' stsal pa 'di ji lta zhig lags te/ bcom ldan 'das spobs pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa lags par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
157a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa phan 'dogs pa yin par ngas bstan cing 'khor ba yongs su
157a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa bstan pa gang yin pa de don dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te don dang ldan pa ma yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par smra bas smra bar bgyid na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi
157a7(dkon brtsegs): yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du nyon mongs pa la dga' ba ni don dang ldan pa lags shing chos dang ldan pa lags shes mchi na yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de
157a8(dkon brtsegs): lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa phan 'dogs par gyur bar bstan pa dang / 'khor ba yongs su
157b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa ni legs par smras pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa don gang la byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbang phyug thabs la
157b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams kyis dbang bya ba dang / gang na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yod pa ma yin pa de ni nyon mongs par blta bar mi bya ste nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa ma yin no/ /byams pa de lta mod kyi nyon
157b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa gzhan dag la phan par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mi 'gyur ba dang / don dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i rgyur yang mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de
157b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog dang yang bsngo bar bya'i/ nyon mongs pa de'i dbang du 'gro bar ni mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'i
157b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa bstan pa yang gzhan yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs bskyed pa ma yin pa'i sa la chags pa rnams kyi yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
157b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal pa ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang las kyi sgrib pa mngon
157b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'du mi bgyid par 'tshal ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang / ma snang cing ma rmas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'tshal bas lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad
157b8(dkon brtsegs): la mos par bgyi'o/ /the tshom ma mchis pa mang bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi tshol pa dang / phan yon yongs su bzung ba dang / snying po btsal bar bgyi'o/ /bka' stsal pa/
158a1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la the tshom med pa mang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams
158a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa dper na rgyun du zhugs pa ni so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa na yang snang la/ byis pa so so'i skye bo'i nyes pa dag gis kyang gos par mi 'gyur te/
158a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang dag gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug de dag nyid kyis rgyun du zhug pa log par ltung bar 'gro bar
158a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig tshogs yongs su rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams ni bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir chags shing spang la rmongs par gyur
158a5(dkon brtsegs): du zin kyang de dag gis yang gzhan la byi pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis yang gzhan no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi bag la nyal ni sems la kun nas dkris shing 'dug pa gang gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams sam/
158a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sems rtul zhing nges par 'byung ba la mi mkhas pa rnams dang mnyam par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab spyod pa rnams
158a7(dkon brtsegs): ni nyes pa thams cad kyi nang na lci ba byung du zin kyang shes rab kyi stobs kyis rdul du rlog par byed de/ de'i rgyus log par ltung bar 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa dper na me'i phung po 'bar ba la ni shing
158a8(dkon brtsegs): gi tshogs chen pos bsnan na ji lta ji ltar bsnan pa de lta de ltar de phyir zhing cher 'bar bar 'gyur gyi me shi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa'i shes rab kyi me
158b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba de la ni nyon mongs pa'i len pa ji lta ji ltar bsnan pa de la de ltar de'i shes rab kyi me 'bar bar 'gyur gyi shi zhing zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar
158b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
158b3(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pas chos gang dag ni yongs su
158b4(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bgyi/ chos gang dag ni kun du bsten par bgyi/ chos gang dag yongs su spong zhing kun du bsten par bgyid na shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa ma skyes pa ni skye par 'gyur la/ skyes pa yang rnam par 'phel
158b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa
158b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti yongs su spang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i
158b7(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /'du 'dzi la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /smra ba la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang smra ba la dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /gnyid
158b8(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang gnyid la dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /las la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang las la dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /spros pa la dga' ba yongs su spang
159a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa yongs su spangs ba des ni 'dod pa chung ba bsgom par bya'o/ /'du 'dzi la dga' ba yongasu
159a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs pas ni gcig pur dga' ba kun du bsten par bya'o/ /smra ba la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni don la rtog pa kun du bsten par bya'o/ /gnyid la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni nam gyi cha stod dang
159a3(dkon brtsegs): nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal ba kun du bsten par bya'o/ /las la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni sems can thams cad la byams pa kun du bsten par bya'o/ /byams pa las dang po pa'i byang chub sems
159a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa rjes su thob par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams ni yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /kun du bsten par bya ba'i chos
159a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni kun du bsten par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa ye shes kyang rkyen la rag las pa yin la/ mi shes pa yang rkyen la rag las pa yin te/ de ni rkyen ma tshogs par thob par sla ba ma yin
159a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro/ / // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub
159a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i skyon ji ltar mthong bar bgyi/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i nongs dmigs ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na 'dod pa chung ngu la dga'
159a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su mi gdung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni 'dod chags skyed pa yin par brtag par bya'o/ /
159b1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dran pa 'jom par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pas khengs pa dang 'dung bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gti mug skyed par brtag par bya'o/ /
159b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bdag gi don sgrub pas khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / chags par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni g.yo skyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni 'phags pa'i rigs
159b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi yongs su spong bas ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa skyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma gnang bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni nga rgyal dang
159b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyags pa dang dregs pa bskyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bla ma rnams la khyad du gsod par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bdud kyi phyogs su brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang
159b5(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti ni gcig tu bag med pa'i rtsa ba yin par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phrog par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni glog dang / 'khor lo dang / lce 'bab pa lta bur
159b6(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni spag pa mang pos spags par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim la lta bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa
159b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bkur sti ni yid mi bde ba skyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni blo rnam par 'khrul bar byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sdig pa'i dngos po 'gyur ba byed pa'i phyir mya ngan
159b8(dkon brtsegs): skyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rjed par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dkar po'i chos nyam chung bar byed par brtag
160a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi yongs su nyams par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni pha rol gyi dad pa'i bar chad byed par brtag par bya'o/ /
160a2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa nyams par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sngar bkur sti byed la phyis bkur sti mi byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur
160a3(dkon brtsegs): sti ni mi mdza' ba dag dang gnas par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni mdza' bo spong bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni pha rol 'drid pa'i phyir smad 'tshong ma
160a4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa yongs su spong bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i
160a5(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung bar byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni lhas byin dang / lhag spyod gyi cho ga dang mthun par brtag par bya'o/ /byams pa
160a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas rnyed pa dang bkur sti la nyes dmigs gang dag brtag par bya ba ni 'di lta bu 'di dag go/ /brtags nas kyang 'dod pa chung bar bya'i yongs su gdung bar ni mi bya'o/ /
160a7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa chung ba la skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag med pa'i phyir te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad med pa yin/
160a8(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba yin/ lha dang mi rnams yongs su dga' bar bya ba'i phyir gnas pas rjes su bsrung bar 'os pa yin/ ngan 'gro log par ltung ba
160b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis skrag pa med pa yin/ bsdigs pa dang bral bas zil gyis mi non pa yin/ bdud kyi yul las yongs su grol bas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ sdug
160b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par 'dod par bya ba yin/ bsam gtan la goms par byed par gnas pas gsal ba yin/ g.yo dang sgyu spangs
160b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la skyon du lta bas bag yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pas ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin/ mkhas pa rnams dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams
160b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dod pa yin te/ byams pa phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mkhas pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti yongs su spangs pas rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad spang ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dod pa
160b5(dkon brtsegs): chung ba la gnas par bya zhing 'dod pa chung ba la kun du bsten par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol
160b6(dkon brtsegs): to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i skyon de dag ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la
160b7(dkon brtsegs): brtags na gcig pur dga' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'du 'dzi'i nyes dmigs ni nyi shu po 'di dag yin te/
160b8(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la lus kyis ma bsdams pa yin/ ngag gis ma bsdams pa yin/ yid kyis ma bsdams pa yin/ 'dod chags che ba yin/ zhe sdang che ba yin/ gti mug
161a1(dkon brtsegs): che ba yin/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam gyis kyang gos pa yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam las yongs su nyams pa yin/ chos la ma gus pa la sten pa yin/ chos yongs su spangs
161a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ de la bdud kyis glags rnyed pa yin/ bag med pa la bsten pa yin/ bag med pa dang ldan pa yin/ de rtog pa dang dpyod pa shas che ba yin/ mang du thos pa las yongs su nyams pa yin/ zhi
161a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang lhag mthong mi 'thob pa yin/ myur du tshangs par spyod par mi 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin/ chos la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin/
161a4(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin te/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na
161a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig pur dga' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dod chags spangs shing zhe
161a6(dkon brtsegs): sdang rab spangs nas/ /rnal 'byor can ni 'du 'dzir mi gnas te/ /de ni de la gzhol zhing de la 'bab/ /nyes pa des na dga' bar byed mi 'gyur/ /rgod dang dgod dang de bzhin rnam rtog pa/ /'di dag
161a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'du 'dzi rnams las byung / /snying po med pa'i 'du 'dzi su byed pa/ /de ni lang long spyod cing ma bsdams yin/ /byis pa dag ni 'jig rten smra la dga'/ /byis pa de dag mchog gi gtam
161a8(dkon brtsegs): las nyams/ /zhe sdang 'phel zhing rnam rtog shas kyang che/ /nyes pa des na de la mi chags so/ /rigs pa ma yin smra la dga' bskyed nas/ /dge slong thos pa rnam par 'phel ni byed/ /
161b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na mi rigs smra spongs la/ /chos la rtag tu dga' ba thob par gyis/ /byang chub mngon par 'dod phyir nga yis ni/ /rang gi yan lag lan stong snyed du btang / /chos nyan pas ni nga la
161b2(dkon brtsegs): ngoms med na/ /de dag chos nyan pa na skyo bar 'gyur/ /tshig bzhi pa yi tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir/ /nga ni chung ma bu la dga' ma gyur/ /rgyal srid dag dang longs spyod ngas spangs na/ /
161b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ji ltar chos ni nyan mi byed/ /rigs mi smra dang dam pa min smra ba/ /rnam pa kun du yongs su spang bar bya/ /bskal pa brgya phrag du mar gang dkon pa/ /chos kyi dam pa de la dga'
161b4(dkon brtsegs): skyed cig / thar pa 'dod pa yon tan don gnyer bas/ /'jig rten bya ba yongs su btsal mi bya/ /gang zhig zas dang gos kyi don tsam 'dod/ /de ni mchog dang gtso bor bsngags ma yin/ /
161b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig 'dri zhing dge slong legs par 'ongs/ /bstan yang gding gis tshur shog 'dug par gyis/ /mi yi rnyed pa rab dkon rnyed gyur gyis/ /gcig la gcig ni chos kyi gtam yang bya/ /
161b6(dkon brtsegs): lung mnod kha ton bya dang bsam gtan rnams/ /khyod kyi dkar po'i phyogs rnams 'phel gyur tam/ /gal te khyod ni 'dod na dri bar gyis/ /khyod la'ang bdag 'dri skabs ni dbye bar gyis/ /
161b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan yongs 'das nas/ /bstan pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ /dge slong dag ni shin du rgod cing khengs/ /dgon pa bor nas 'di 'dzir dga' bar 'gyur/ /rnyed pa dang
161b8(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin zas ched du/ /nyin dang mtshan rnams su yang gtam byed la/ /byis pa dag ni gnyid log gyur na yang / /lo tog skye ba'i rmi lam rmi bar 'gyur/ /byis pa 'di kun shes pa
162a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu nyams/ /ngan song ngan 'gro gsum du gzhol 'gyur gyis/ /dga' ba dang ni mos pa bskyed nas kyang / /bse ru lta bur rtag tu nags gnas gyis/ /yon tan 'dod pa nags
162a2(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa yis/ /pha rol dag gi skyon la brtag mi bya/ /bdag ni khyad par 'phags shing bdag mchog ces/ /de snyam du ni sems bskyed mi bya'o/ /rgyags 'di bag med kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /
162a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dman la brnyas par yong mi bya/ /bskal pa gcig gis thar pa 'thob mi 'gyur/ /'di ni bstan pa 'di la go rims yin/ /de ltas dge slong yon tan 'dod gyur pa/ /dpa' bos
162a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rigs brjod pa spangs nas kyang / /dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba yis/ /bse ru 'dra bar dgon par gnas par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
162a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dkar po'i chos yongs su spong ba'i slad du 'du 'dzi nongs pa mang po'i skyon chags shing yon tan ma mchis la gnod pa dang ldan te/
162a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du 'dzi nyon mongs pa 'phel bar bgyid cing spyod pa bzang po ma lags pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dge ba 'tshal ba su zhig gcig pur dga' ba la
162a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' bar mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas smra ba la dga' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas gang rtogs na don rnam par nges pa la
162a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing don la rtog pas yongs su bdud par yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di
162b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' smra ba la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shu yod par brtag par bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la dge slong smra ba la dga'
162b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ni mang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas gus pa med par 'gyur ba dang / rtsod pa smra ba lhur len pas phyogs la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang / nang du tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang bral bas
162b3(dkon brtsegs): dran pa brjed par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang sems shin du ma sbyangs pas shes bzhin med par spyod par 'gyur ba dang / /chos la bzod pa las nyams pas khengs pa dang 'dud par 'gyur ba dang / zhi gnas
162b4(dkon brtsegs): dang lhag mthong yongs su spangs pas sems kyi rgyud dmu rgod du 'gyur ba dang / smra ba'i spag pas spags pas dus ma yin par smra bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i shes pa ma thob pas ma
162b5(dkon brtsegs): bsdams par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu rnams kyis mi bkur bar 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang / lus mngon sum du gyur ba rnams kyis
162b6(dkon brtsegs): spyo bar 'gyur ba dang / sgrub pa la mi gnas pas yid la gcags par 'gyur ba dang / the tshom ma spangs pas rab tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sgra lhur len pas thos pa dang bye brag phyed pa
162b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul can yin pas 'dod pa'i yon tan la chags par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog par mi byed pas myur du chos
162b8(dkon brtsegs): spong bar byed pa dang / gzhan dang gzhan rtsom pas mi brtan zhing rten med par 'gyur ba dang / sems yongs su ma dul bas bkur sti med par thob par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi dbyings khong
163a1(dkon brtsegs): du ma chud pas gzhan gyi dring 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su ma shes pas nyon mongs pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' smra ba la
163a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing sgra lhur len la don la rtog pa dang bral ba'i nyes dmigs yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /thos pas rgyags nas gus par mi 'gyur te/ /
163a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'gyed pa'i smra ba rnams la chags/ /brjed par 'gyur zhing shes bzhin med par 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /nang gi sems las shin du ring bar 'gyur/ /lus dang
163a4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang rab sbyangs ma yin 'gyur/ /khengs pa dang ni 'dud par mang por 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /byis pa dam pa'i chos bsam rab tu nyams/ /sems ni mi mnyen
163a5(dkon brtsegs): shin du rtsub par 'gyur/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong dag dang rab tu ring / /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /rtag tu bla ma dag la gus pa med/ /spags pa'i gtam dag la ni dga' ba skyed/ /
163a6(dkon brtsegs): snying po med la gnas shing shes rab nyams/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /de ni lha tshogs rnams kyis mi bkur zhing / /de tshe de la'ang 'dod pa mi skyed la/ /so so yang dag rig
163a7(dkon brtsegs): las nyams 'gyur te/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /gang dag lus ni mngon sum mang yod pa/ /mkhas pa 'di dag gis ni spyo bar 'gyur/ /de yi srog ni don med 'gyur ba ste/ /
163a8(dkon brtsegs): smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /bdag ni sgrub nyams nga ni ci bya zhes/ /'chi ba'i dus tshe byis pa mya ngan byed/ /gting rnyed ma gyur shin du sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa
163b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag go/ /rtswa bskyod bzhin du 'gul zhing g.yo ba ste/ /de ni de ltar the tshom 'gyur du nges/ /de ni nam yang blo brtan mi 'gyur te/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /gar la lta ba'i
163b2(dkon brtsegs): khrod na 'dug pa zhig / dpa' bo gzhan gyi yon tan brjod pa bzhin/ /bdag nyid nan tan nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /de yi sems ni rna ba'i rnam shes la/ /
163b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu chags shing sgras rgyags shes rab nyams/ /log par sems shing lam ngan 'gro bar 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /de ni g.yo ldan yang zhing re chad 'gyur/ /phyi phyir zhing ni
163b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'gyed pa rtsom/ /'phags pa'i dam pa'i chos las rab tu ring / /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /mthu chung sti stang gis ni dgar 'gyur te/ /mi shes ldan pa g.yo zhing 'gyur ba
163b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ /spre'u ltar de yi sems ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /rang gi blo ni shes pas dman pa'i phyir/ /rmongs pa de ni gzhan gyi dring la 'jog /de ni nyon mongs
163b6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi dbang du 'gro/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /mig kyang 'khrul cing de bzhin rna ba'ang 'khrul/ /sna yang 'khrul cing de bzhin lce yang 'khrul/ /lus kyang 'khrul cing yid
163b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'khrul par 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ /yun ring dus nas smra la dga' bas na/ /de ni bdag nyid dag pa mi 'thob bo/ /tshig gang dga' ba mtha' yas 'thob 'gyur pa/ /
163b8(dkon brtsegs): tshig gcig tsam zhig bsams kyang mchog yin no/ /bu ram shing shun snying po ci yang med/ /dga' bar bya ba'i ro ni nad na 'dug /shun pa zos pas mis ni bu ram ro/ /zhim po rnyed par nus
164a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin no/ /ji ltar shun pa de bzhin smra ba ste/ /ro lta bu ni 'di la don sems yin/ /de lta bas na smra la dga' spongs te/ /rtag tu bag yod byos la don soms
164a2(dkon brtsegs): shig / smra ba'i nyes pa 'di 'dra rtogs gyur cing / /don gyi yon tan mchog 'di shes nas ni/ /'di na byang chub mkhas pa gang yin pa/ /des ni don bsam pa la dga' bar gyis/ /
164a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar smra ba la dga' ba'i skyon rnams dang / don la sems
164a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan rnams de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' snying po 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni don bsam
164a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gtang ste snying po ma mchis pa'i smra ba la dga' bar bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnyid kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i skyon ji ltar
164a6(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas ji ltar brtags na rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyi nongs dmigs mthong nas brtson 'grus rtsom zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/
164a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la gnyid la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus
164a8(dkon brtsegs): rtsom pa la dga' zhing skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gnyid che ba ni rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non te le lo che bar 'gyur ba dang /
164b1(dkon brtsegs): lus shes che ba dang / mdog yongs su ma dag pa dang / de'i 'byung ba chen po rnams nang bzhis non par 'gyur ba dang / de'i me'i khams chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i kha zas legs par 'ju
164b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i lus la 'bras dang phol mig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / le lo can du 'gyur ba dang / de'i gti mug gi dra ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i shes rab nyam
164b3(dkon brtsegs): chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de kha zas 'dod pa las yi ga 'chu bar 'gyur ba dang / de gti mug gi mun pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams bkur sti mi byed pa dang / sems
164b4(dkon brtsegs): rtul bar 'gyur ba dang / mi ldang ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems bag la nyal gyis kun nas bkris shing 'dug par 'gyur ba dang / de dge ba'i chos la 'dun par mi 'gyur ba dang /
164b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa zhum par gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi spyod pa la smod pa dang / 'khor gyi nang du song na brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/
164b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyid la dga' zhing rmugs pa dang / gnyid mang ba'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus rtsom pa la
164b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig rmugs pa dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /
164b8(dkon brtsegs): de yi lus ni sha che mkhregs ma yin/ /le lo de che blun zhing 'thun mi byed/ /de yi mdog kyang dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /bad kan rlung dang
165a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin mkhris pa rnams/ /de dag de yi lus la shas cher 'byung / /de yi khams rnams rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /kha zas nyes
165a2(dkon brtsegs): pas lto ni ma dag cing / /lus kyang lci la zo bdog bde ma yin/ /de yi tshig kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de yi lus la phol mig mang po 'byung / /
165a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni nyin dang mtshan du bde bar nyal/ /de la rma rnams mi bzang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /le lo byed cing brtson 'grus yongs su nyams/ /de ni bde las nyams shing nor
165a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'gribs/ /de ni rtag tu zhan cing sems kyang rmongs/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /gti mug dra ba chen po 'phel 'gyur zhing / /de ni the tshom can de lta ba thob/ /de ni lta bar
165a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba mang bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de yi shes rab shin du nyam chung 'gyur/ /de yi blo yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur/ /ye shes las ni rtag tu de nyams 'gyur/ /gang
165a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /mi shes le lo snyom las shes rab 'chal/ /mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de/ /nags na gnas pa'i tshe ni 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs
165a7(dkon brtsegs): dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /sems kyang rtul zhing de yi dran pa rmongs/ /lung nod kha ton byed la de mi gnas/ /chos smra na yang de ni rtag tu thogs/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga'
165a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ /de yi nyon mongs kun nas ldang bar 'gyur/ /rnam par 'khor zhing g.yo la rmongs pa dang / /de yi sems ni rtag tu gdung bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de yi
165b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba mang po nyams shing 'gags/ /lus kyang gdungs shing yid kyang yongs su gdungs/ /bag la nyal ba 'phel bar nges mi shes/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de ni dge sems rtag tu mi 'dod de/ /
165b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos la 'dud pa skyed mi byed/ /phyir zhing chos ma yin la de dgar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de ni rmongs shing chos la 'dun pa nyams/ /byis pa yon tan kun las yongs su nyams/ /
165b3(dkon brtsegs): dkar po 'jom zhing mun par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /'jigs par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rab tu zhum/ /de ni rtag par mchog tu dga' mi 'gyur/ /gnyid kyis non pa lus kyang
165b4(dkon brtsegs): lhod par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid mi shes le lo can gyur nas/ /brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan la phrag dog byed/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams la mi snyan smra/ /nyes pa 'di 'dra
165b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag rtogs gyur nas/ /mkhas pa su zhig rmugs gnyid dga' bar byed/ /shin du gti mug lta ba mang po'i rgyu/ /don bzang dam chos yon tan chud gzon pa/ /gnyid 'di brtson 'grus 'phrog par rtogs gyur nas/ /mkhas pa yon
165b6(dkon brtsegs): tan ldan pa su der dga'/ /sdug bsngal kun dang mun pa sel byed cing / /ngan song yongs su spong ba'i gzhir gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i brtson 'grus 'phags/ /gang yin de ni rtag tu brten par gyis/ /'jig rten
165b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bzo gang ci yod dang / /'jig rten 'das bzo gang dag ci yod pa/ /brtson 'grus brtsams la rnyed par mi dka' na/ /mkhas pa su dag brtson 'grus stobs kyis skyo/ /gang dag sangs rgyas byang chub zhugs gyur ba/ /de dag rmugs
165b8(dkon brtsegs): gnyid skyon rnams mthong nas ni/ /rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas par byed/ /'di ni nga yis de dag bskul byas yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
166a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas spong bar mi bgyid cing skyo bar mi bgyid pa de dag dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi skyed pa de dag de
166a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam du rmongs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'tshal ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
166a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'tshal ba su zhig yang dag pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas le lo bgyid cing dge ba'i chos rnams bskyed par mi bgyid/ brtson 'grus kyi yon tan dang / phan yon 'di lta bu thos nas byang chub kyi yan lag
166a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du su zhig brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnyid la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon 'di dag legs par bka' stsal lags so/ /bcom ldan
166a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpas las la dga' zhing 'jig rten pa'i sbag pas sbags pa'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la brtags na 'dod pa chung zhing bgyi ba nyung la/ dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i
166a6(dkon brtsegs): slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos las la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shur brtag
166a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung la dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i phyir rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las
166a8(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i las rnams la brtson pa 'gyur ba dang / las ngan pa thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha don la brtson pa dag gis brnyes par 'gyur ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la dga' ba rnams kyis
166b1(dkon brtsegs): smad pa dang / 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i las rtsom par 'gyur ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyi yon sbyong bar mi byed pa dang / de'i sems dngos por 'dzin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chags
166b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / khyim so rnams la rgyun du sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / zlog byed kyi ngang tshul can yid smon mang po la rgyun du gnas pa dang / khyim gyi bya ba dag la brtson pa dang / de ro dag la shas cher
166b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun cing chags pa skyed pa dang / len pa med par mi dga' ba dang / kun nas mnar sems mang ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rgyun du mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la rton par 'gyur ba dang / de zas kyi rnam par rtog pas
166b4(dkon brtsegs): nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba dag rgyun du 'dri bar byed pa dang / mi rigs pa'i smra ba dag la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / zhal ta byed pa'i rgyags pas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang phyug gis
166b5(dkon brtsegs): tshar gcod par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi 'khrul pa la rtog cing bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog par 'gyur ba dang / don dang ldan zhing rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag la skyen par brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems
166b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' las la dga' zhing zhal ta byed pa'i spag pas spags pa'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung bar 'gyur la 'jig rten pa'i bya ba spangs nas 'jig rten las
166b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de ni las ngan dag la gnas 'gyur zhing / /las mchog dag las de ni rgyang yang ring / /'dir ni rnyed pa che las
166b8(dkon brtsegs): ring bar 'gyur/ /rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag yin/ /dge slong lung nod kha ton dga' rnams kyis/ /de la brnyas shing 'dod par mi byed la/ /bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/ /rtag tu las gnas
167a1(dkon brtsegs): skyon ni 'di dag yin/ /'khor ba'i las la mngon par brtson pa dang / /thar pa las ni rgyang ring bcings par gnas/ /de ni yul 'khor zas la mi rigs spyod/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin/ /rtag tu
167a2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dag ni len par byed/ /yongs su 'dzin pa med la dga' mi skyed/ /nor med nor ni don du gnyer bar byed/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin/ /khyim du rgyu ba dag la chags par 'gyur/ /'du 'dzi dga'
167a3(dkon brtsegs): bas thams cad 'jig par byed/ /gzeb kyi nang du bya bcug bzhin du 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin/ /khyim pa'i las la de rtag mya ngan byed/ /yongs su gdungs par gyur kyang yid mi 'byung / /
167a4(dkon brtsegs): nams kyang tshig ni btsun par mi 'gyur te/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /bla mas bskul nas bka' blo mi bde zhing / /rjes su bstan pa 'thun par 'dzin mi byed/ /de ni myur du tshul khrims nyams
167a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /khyim na gnas pa'i las rnams rtag sems pas/ /de ni rtag tu 'dod par 'gyur ba ste/ /bsam gtan dang ni spong ba de mi byed/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la
167a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i yin/ /de yi 'dod chags shas ni che bar skye/ /de ni ro bro rnams la chags shing zhen/ /de ni ngan ngon tsam gyis dgar mi 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de ni 'khor phal
167a7(dkon brtsegs): che na dga' 'gyur te/ /de nyams na ni shin du sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de ni bong bu bzhin du lang long 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de sems rtag tu gnod sems ldan par 'gyur/ /las rnams
167a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phel zhing zad par mi 'gyur te/ /sred pa'i 'khri shing dag gis dam du bcings/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de ni rtag tu bla ma rnams mi sten/ /phyogs 'dod khyim pa la ni sten par byed/ /tshul khrims
167b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dag la'ang phrag dog byed/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /nyin dang mtshan du sems gzhan med par ni/ /zas dang gos la rgyun du sems par byed/ de ni rtag tu yon tan 'dod ma yin/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la
167b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i yin/ /de ni 'jig rten pa yi bya ba 'dri/ /rigs pa min pa'i smra ba rnams la dga'/ rigs pa'i smra la de ni dga' mi 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /sdom brtson rnams la de ni rtag tu gshe/ /dbang
167b3(dkon brtsegs): phyug nyes pas de dag des tshar gcod/ /mi sdug las rnams mngon par 'du byed de/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de ni rtag tu gzhan gyi skyon rtog cing / /bdag la yod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong la/ /yon tan
167b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams la 'khrul pa tshol/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /byis pa de ni gzhan gyis myur du brnyas/ /de ni pha rol dag la chos ston tshe/ /blo nyams pas na mngon par shes mi 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las
167b5(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i yin/ /gnod 'gyur nyes pa 'di dag mthong nas ni/ /las ngan dag la su zhig dga' bar byed/ /dpa' bo dag ni rtag tu las mchog byed/ /byas pa gang yin chud ni gzon mi byed/ /lan stong brjod kyang tshig
167b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig mi 'dzin pa/ /de ni blo can dag gis spyo ba yin/ /gang zhig las ngan dag ni byed pa la/ /dam pa dag gis de ltar rtag tu smad/ /de lta bas na mkhas mis 'di rtag tu/ /las ngan dag ni rnam par spangs nas kyang / /
167b7(dkon brtsegs): thub dbang rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yi/ /bzang po'i las rnams gang yin de dag bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
167b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin du chung zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
168a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' gsol to/ /byams pa de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog
168a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin du chung zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba yin no/ /byams pa gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang
168a3(dkon brtsegs): dag la sbyor ba med cing bsam gtan med la spong ba med cing 'don pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa yongs su tshol ba med pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no/ /byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
168a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ni bsam gtan dang spong bas phye ba dang / ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang / ye shes kyis mnyam par bzhag pa dang / brtson pas phye ba yin gyi/ khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed pas phye ba ni ma yin te/ 'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i
168a5(dkon brtsegs): las de ni mi rigs pa la sbyor ba rnams dang / 'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya bas spags pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o/ /byams pa gal te byang chub sems
168a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na des ni da mnyes par byas pa ma yin/ ri mor byas pa ma yin/ bkur stir byas pa ma yin
168a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'chang na des ni nga la bkur stir byas/
168a8(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi/ dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i
168b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ /byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa zhal ta byed pa'i spag pas spags par byed na bsod nams 'dod pa des
168b2(dkon brtsegs): ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po skyed par 'gyur te/ las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag thams cad
168b3(dkon brtsegs): ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir ro/ /byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o/ /'dzam
168b4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i gling 'di zhal ta byed pas yongs su gang bar gyur ba'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /
168b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa 'dzam bu'i gling gang bsnyed kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' nang du yang dag 'jog la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de ltar byas
168b6(dkon brtsegs): na de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang ba dang gnang ba yin te/ de dag gi bsnyen bkur ni legs par byas pa yin no/ /gang zhig shes rab spyod pa la mos nas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod
168b7(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi phung po ni tshad med par skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi las ni dka' ba'i las dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du
168b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par brtson pa don du gnyer zhing brtson 'grus rtsom par 'dod pas shes rab la brtson par bya zhing shes rab
169a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'du
169a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzi la dga' ba dang / las la dga' ba rnams kyi nongs dmigs rnams ni bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems
169a3(dkon brtsegs): dpas gang dag la brtags na nye bar zhi ba la gnas shing rtsod pa ma mchis par gnas par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams
169a4(dkon brtsegs): mdor bsdu na nyi shu po 'di dag tu brtag par bya'o/ /rgyas par ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtha' yas par bstan te mthar thug par yang mi 'gyur ro/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' spros pa la dga' ba ni
169a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba mang bar gnas pa dang / bzod pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang / de'i mi mdza' ba rnams yi rangs par 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud kyang mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /
169a6(dkon brtsegs): de la bdud kyi 'khor kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa rnams med par 'gyur ba dang / 'thab ba dang mkhon du 'dzin pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa mang bar
169a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba dang / bag med par 'gyur ba'i lam 'dzin pa dang / de'i lce'i dbang po rtsub par 'gyur ba
169a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / de'i lung mnos pa'i chos rnams legs par gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / mdo sde lung ma mnos pa rnams rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis yongs su
169b1(dkon brtsegs): spangs par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang myur du phrad par 'gyur ba dang / dka' ba'i lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyun mi 'chad par yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig thos par 'gyur ba dang / gang
169b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du skyes pa de dang der the tshom can du 'gyur ba dang / de la mi khom pa brgyad po dag nye bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de'i dkar po'i phyogs la brtson pa la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni
169b3(dkon brtsegs): spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdus pa yin te/ de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de ni tshe 'dir bde bar mi
169b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur to/ /bzod dang ring zhing khro ba'i phyogs la gnas/ /de yi dgra rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba ste/ /spros sbyong de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ /bdud kyang de la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /bdud kyi phyogs kyang
169b5(dkon brtsegs): de la dga' bar 'gyur/ /de yi dge ba'i chos skyes chud zar 'gyur/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ /de ni nams kyang dge ba mi skyed de/ /'chi kar tha dad rgyu la gnas pa dang / /ngan song 'gro ba'i las ni
169b6(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ /mi mdzes pa dang blta na mi sdug dang / /de ni rtag tu dus rigs dma' bar 'gyur/ /de yi lce yi dbang po rtsub 'gyur te/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ /
169b7(dkon brtsegs): lung mnos chos rnams legs par mi gnas shing / /lung mnos ma byas mdo sde thos mi 'gyur/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams yang rnam par spong / /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ /sdig pa'i grogs po dag dang phrad par 'gyur/ /
169b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i theg pas rnam par dag 'gyur zhing / /mi 'dod pa'i tshig rnams rgyun du thos/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ /byis pa'i blo can de ni gar skyes der/ /yin nam ma yin snyam du de rtog cing / /rtag tu des ni the
170a1(dkon brtsegs): tshom rnyed par 'gyur/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ /de ni mi khom brgyad dang ring mi 'gyur/ /de ni dal ba ldan pa'i mchog mi 'gyur/ /de la gnod pa 'di dag rtag 'byung ste/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di
170a2(dkon brtsegs): dag go/ /de yi dge ba dag la bar chad mang / /bgegs su 'gyur bas myur du 'thob mi 'gyur/ /brtson dang ldan yang de la dgra rnams 'byung / /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ /mkhas pas nyes 'di yang dag rig nas ni/ /spros
170a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yongs su spang bar bya/ /spros spyod dag ni gnod pa rnyed par sla/ /de lta bas na spros la gnas mi bya/ /gang la spros pa'am rtsod pa yod pa las/ /dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol 'gro ba mchog /gang na nyon mongs yod pa de
170a4(dkon brtsegs): dag tu/ /yud tsam zhig kyang gnas shing 'dug mi bya/ /rab byung don 'dod yon tan 'dod pa rnams/ /sdang ba'i sems kyis rtsod par ma byed cig /khyed la zhing med zhing las tshong bya med/ /gang la nor phyir 'di dag 'byung ba spros/ /
170a5(dkon brtsegs): khyed la chung ma bu dang bu mo med/ /khyim dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyang yod ma yin/ /bran pho bran mo med cing dbang phyug med/ /rab tu byung nas rtsod par ma byed cig /zhi zhing rab tu zhi bas bsten pa yi/ /ngur smrig gos rnams dang bas
170a6(dkon brtsegs): blangs nas ni/ /zhi zhing rab zhi nye bar zhi bar byos/ /spros pa rnam par spongs la bzod pa skyed/ /mi bzang sems ni sbrul dug 'dra ba srungs/ /spros la spyod pa sems can dmyal ba dang / /dud 'gro gshin rje'i yul dang ring mi 'gyur/ /
170a7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na bzod dang brtson 'grus skyed/ /tshogs pa gzhig phyir spros par byed na ni/ /sdug bsngal gsod dang 'ching ba ci yang rung / /go ra brdeg dang bsdigs pa de dag ni/ /'jig rten 'di na gnas pa rnams la 'byung / /tshogs par gyur la
170a8(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'di dag dkon/ /tshogs gyur bag la nyal ba 'phel ba med/ /tshogs gyur rnams la dga' ba 'byung 'gyur na/ /mkhas pa su zhig tshogs pa skyed mi byed/ /glags tshol dag gis skyon rnams rnyed mi 'gyur/ /nams kyang 'khor rnams
170b1(dkon brtsegs): phyed par mi 'gyur te/ /de yi mdza' bshes dag kyang rgyun du 'byung / /spros pa spangs pa'i phan yon de dag yin/ /theg pa'i stobs 'di yis ni dag 'gyur zhing / /las kyi sgrib pa ma lus byang nas ni/ /stobs dang bcas shing bzhon
170b2(dkon brtsegs): bcas bdud thul cig / brtan pa gang yin des ni bzod pa bskyed/ /spros pa rgyas pa la ni skyon mang chags/ /nyes pa de dag ngas ni bstan mi nus/ /rtag tu spros med bsngags pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /su zhig don gnyer des ni bzod
170b3(dkon brtsegs): pa skyed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs pa de tsam du gling ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs
170b4(dkon brtsegs): te ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ci lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spong bar 'gyur lags sam ba de dag
170b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spong bar 'gyur ba 'byung ba de dag
170b6(dkon brtsegs): mi nyung ngo / /byams pa gang sems kyi rgyud khengs par 'gyur zhing gus pa med pa dang / mngon ba'i nga rgyal la gnas pa dang / gcig la gcig the tshom za ba mang ba dag ni phal che ste/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i
170b7(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde zab mo bstan pa'i yon tan dang phan yon zab pa dag lung nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed de/ de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa shas che bas yon tan de dag dang phan yon de dag 'byung
170b8(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag dad pa med pa des mdo sde de dag la the tshom za bar 'gyur te/ phyis kyang lung nod par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed de/ de dag gi drung du bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha lugs su
171a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug nas 'di skad du mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde 'di dag las yon tan dang phan yon bshad
171a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de dag khyed kyi 'di las mi 'byung zhing med pa'i phyir ro zhes mos pa zlog par byed do/ /de dag de ltar mos pa zlog pas mdo sde zab mo dag mi 'dod cing the tshom du 'gyur te/ lung nod par mi byed/
171a3(dkon brtsegs): kha ton du mi byed de/ mi blun po de dag gis yon tan dang phan yon de dag thos na 'di ltar chos spong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni sbyang bar mi nus so snyam du mi sems so/ /de nas bcom
171a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pas
171a5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa gang lags pa 'di dag las gang gis sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba zhig yid la bgyid cing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yid la bgyid pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar
171a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa de dag gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad
171a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa sems bskyed pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa de dag ni
171a8(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin te/ byams pa sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin no/ /
171b1(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la zhe 'gras pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar mi nus te/ sems can thams cad la byams
171b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'tshe ba yongs su spangs te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zab mo'i bzod
171b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la nges par gyur bas dam pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur stis ma gos pas bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / brjed pa med pas thams cad
171b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid la rin po cher sems bskyed pa dang / zhum pa med pas sems can thams cad la bla ma bzhin du gus pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la nges pas nyi tshe ba'i bsam gtan
171b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi ro myang bar mi bya ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / ma 'dres pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems bskyed pa dang / mtshan ma yongs su spangs te/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i sems bskyed pa
171b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ byams pa sems bskyed pa bcu po ni de dag yin te/ sems bskyed pa bcu po de dag las sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni sems bskyed pa de dag dang ldan na sangs
171b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam
171b8(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kun dga' bo legs so
172a1(dkon brtsegs): legs so/ /kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub
172a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
172a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i le'u zhes
172a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ste nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /'phags pa
172a5(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa ste lag bzangs kyis zhus pa/ / bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bA hu pa ri
172a6(dkon brtsegs): pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
172a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang
172a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs shes bya ba g.yog dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i lab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
172b1(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub
172b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
172b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
172b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir pha rol du phyin pa
172b5(dkon brtsegs): drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
172b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po
172b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang
172b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos kyis longs spyod rnams yongs su tshol gyi chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/ /mnyam pas yin gyi mi mnyam pas ni ma yin no/ /de srog chags gzhan dag dang /
173a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan rnams la gnod pa mi byed/ nyam nga ba mi byed par sbyin pa sbyin te/ brjod pa dang / sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'dzem pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i
173a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma yin/ lan du phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/ tshul 'chos pa ma yin/ kha gsag byed pa ma yin/ brnyas pa ma yin pa'o/ /sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma yin
173a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa ma yin pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ 'dris pa 'am/ ma 'dris pa 'am/ mdza' ba 'am/ mi mdza' ba la yang rung ste/ bkur sti byed/ bla mar
173a4(dkon brtsegs): byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos de nyung ngu bdog na yang nyung du sbyin/ mang du bdog na yang mang du sbyin/ bzang du bdog na yang bzang du sbyin/
173a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa bdog na yang ngan pa sbyin/ gya nom bdog na yang gya nom pa sbyin no/ /lag bzangs ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong sbyin pa dang / rlabs po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de
173a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du kA ka ni tsam yang sbyin zhing rlabs po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin no/ /des zas 'dod pa rnams la sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i stobs
173a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis brtan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir zas sbyin no/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i skom pa thams cad bsal ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir skom sbyin no/ /gos 'dod pa
173a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i gos thob par bya ba'i phyir gos sbyin no/ /bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / rdzogs
173b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bzhon pa sbyin no/ /spos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir spos sbyin no/ /
173b2(dkon brtsegs): me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir me tog rnams sbyin no/ /phye ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sems
173b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad nyes par spyod pa'i dri nga ba'i dri ma gzhom pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir phye ma sbyin no/ /byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyes pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang spyod pa'i
173b4(dkon brtsegs): byug pa thob par bya ba'i phyir byug pa sbyin no/ /gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir gdugs sbyin no/ /lham
173b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lham sbyin no/ /mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad lha dang / tshangs pa dang / 'phags
173b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha'i bde bar sbyar ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir mal cha sbyin no/ /stan 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod
173b7(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dpa' ba'i stan thob par bya ba'i phyir stan sbyin no/ /gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad skyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / dpung gnyen du gyur ba'i lus
173b8(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir gnas sbyin no/ /phru tog dang / bum pa dang / 'tshog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi ji lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir phru tog dang / bum pa dang / 'tshog chas
174a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dka' thub kyi
174a2(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten rnams la rgyan sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams
174a3(dkon brtsegs): cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir mun khrod kyi mchod rten nam lam rnams la mar me'i sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan mtha' yas
174a4(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams sam/ chos la mchod pa rnams sam/ dge 'dun la mchod pa rnams la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad la cha byad dang / tshul
174a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / spyod pa mdzes pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang chos gos sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir snod tshags sbyin pa sbyin no/ /
174a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad shes rab chen po'i tshogs yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir myu gu dang / snag tsha dang / glegs bu dang / chos kyi khri stan sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
174a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nad thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi sa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir sa sbyin pa sbyin no/ /
174a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad slob dpon med pa'i dam pa'i chos mthon po thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten mthon po dang / sku gzugs mthon po byed do/ /bdog pa lta na sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa
174b1(dkon brtsegs): myur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir myur zhing yongs su nyon mongs par ma gyur bar sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad par du gcod pa med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rung ba sbyin gyi rung ba ma
174b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa ni ma yin no/ /sems can thams cad spobs pa chen po yongs su mi 'chad pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su mi gcod par sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad snying rje chen po mtshungs pa med pa thob par bya
174b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad bdud dang mu stegs byed thams cad kyis tshar mi chod pa dang / gnod par mi nus pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
174b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa sbyin no/ /lag bzangs gal te byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin du nor med cing 'byor pa med par gyur na/ de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
174b5(dkon brtsegs): du sems can thams cad la sbyin pa mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa 'di dag sbyin par yid kyis 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debs te/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin pa'i
174b6(dkon brtsegs): nus pa dang ldan yang rung / nus pa dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can thams cad bdag gi bde ba sbyar ba nyid dang ldan pa dang / yang dag par ldan par gyur cing 'bad
174b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / 'dod pa med par brnag pa rnams thams cad kyis thams cad du shin du yongs su rdzogs shing bsam pa ma lus par yongs su rdzogs nas bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur bar bdag
174b8(dkon brtsegs): gi de bzang por gyur cig / bdag gi de dge bar gyur cig ces de ltar yid kyis 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rin po che'i rgya mtsho yang sbyin par 'dod cing
175a1(dkon brtsegs): smon la smon lam 'debs so/ /dbyig gi ri dang / gser gyi ri dang / gos kyi ri dang / yo byad thams cad kyi ri dang / bzang ba rgya mtsho dang / btung ba rgya mtsho dang / gnas legs par byas pa/ legs par gnas

175a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong pa gang yin pa zang zing sbyin pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa 'am/ chos sbyin pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la tha na dus gsum du yang
175a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ngo / /gal te de la bslangs la nor sbyin mi nus na yang rang gi zan skal sbyin pa 'am/ grogs su 'gyur ba 'am/ kun du btsal ba'i thabs kyang de la ston par 'gyur

175a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya

175b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /gal te sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad
175b2(dkon brtsegs): cung zad du yang chags pa dang / ser sna dang / sbyin pas 'jigs pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong

175b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam
175b5(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sbyin pa chen po dang / gtong ba chen po dang / rnam par gtong ba chen po grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
175b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char
175b7(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba thams cad
175b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na mchog yin no/ /de ni dam pa yin no/ /lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang / / ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par
176a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ni slong ba rnams kyis bslangs pa na yan lag dang nying lag gcod dam/ bcad nas slong ba rnams
176a2(dkon brtsegs): la sbyin par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / mi dge ba'i las chen po rgya cher yongs su mi spong ba'i phyir ro/ /sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/
176a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan gyi ched la de rang gi yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su mi gtong ba ni ma yin no/ /lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni slong bas bdog pa thams cad bslangs na pha
176a4(dkon brtsegs): ma la gnod pa byas shing spangs te sdug bsngal bar byas/ bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa byas shing spangs te sdug bsngal bar byas nas bdog

176a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bar yang mi byed pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong ste/ sdug bsngal bar mi byed par sbyin pa yang
176a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gso bar byed do/ /de ni sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi ched la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yang ma yin no/ /lag
176a8(dkon brtsegs): bzangs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsung ba ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag bcad pa lta la de ltar ga la 'gyur/ lag bzangs byang
176b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni srog gi phyir yang srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la mi
176b2(dkon brtsegs): rdeg mi gsod cing gsod pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/ /srog gi phyir yang ma byin par mi len la/ ma byin par len du mi 'jug cing ma byin par len pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/ /srog gi phyir yang
176b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la log par g.yem par mi byed la/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed du mi 'jug cing 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/ /srog gi phyir yang brdzun mi smra la/ brdzun
176b4(dkon brtsegs): zer du mi 'jug cing brdzun smra ba la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/ /srog gi phyir yang chang mi 'thung la/ chang 'thung du mi 'jug cing / chang 'thung ba la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/ /de bslab pa'i gzhi
176b5(dkon brtsegs): lnga po de dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la dam por gnas te mi lhod par gnas shing sgrub bo/ /de bzhin du zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmed du 'jug pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'ching du 'jug pa dang /
