176b7(dkon brtsegs): dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la dam por gnas te mi lhod par gnas shing sgrub bo/ /de bzhin du phra ma'i tshig dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar 'bad par
176b8(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /de srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad ni bdag gi pha ma ji lta ba bzhin no/ /bu gcig pa phangs pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ ji ltar pha ma dang / bu gcig pa phangs pa bdag la 'khu yang
177a1(dkon brtsegs): slar 'khu bar mi bya la/ lag pa 'am/ bong ba 'am/ dbyug pa 'am/ ral gri 'am/ mdas brdegs kyang slar brdegs par mi bya/ gsod kyang slar gsad par mi bya zhing ji ltar pha ma dang / bu gcig pa
177a2(dkon brtsegs): phangs pa 'khu yang slar 'khu bar mi bya ba de bzhin du bdag srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis lag pa 'am/ bong ba 'am/ dbyug pa'am/ ral gri 'am/ mdas brdegs kyang slar brdegs par mi
177a3(dkon brtsegs): bya/ gsod kyang slar gsad par mi bya'o zhes de ltar slob bo/ /dper na pha 'am/ ma 'am/ bu gcig pa phangs pa yun ring por yul rgyus te 'ongs pa mthong na dga' zhing yid bde bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du lag
177a4(dkon brtsegs): bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba dang / yid bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims
177a5(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims
177a6(dkon brtsegs): ma byin par len pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims tshangs par spyod pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /
177a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims brdzun du smra ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems
177a8(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims chang 'thung ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmed du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
177b1(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'ching ba dang / 'ching du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba thams cad gcad pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i go rar 'jug pa dang / go rar
177b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba lnga dgag pa dang bsal ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i rdeg pa dang / rdeg tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad bdud dang
177b3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i bsgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i gcod pa dang / gcod du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad lus
177b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag dang yid kyi las kun du bsrungs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshig rtsub po
177b5(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni yan lag lnga pa'i ngag gi lam dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni tshigs gzung bar 'os pa thogs pa med pa thob
177b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
177b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i gzhan gyi nor dang yo byad 'jig cing chud za ba yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad byang
177b8(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi nor bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i gzhan gyi bud med la 'dzin pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni 'khrul pa med pa'i chos
178a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'gugs pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni rang gi sems la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'ching ba 'grol ba dang / 'grol
178a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud kyi dmag dang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i khyim nas 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni sems rnam par grol ba
178a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i rdeg pa 'chugs pa'i tshul khrims ni mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhis 'jigs pa yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i rtsod pa zlog pa'i tshul khrims
178a4(dkon brtsegs): ni kun du srung ba'i chos bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i mi slu ba'i tshig smra ba'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i chos
178a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i bye ba rnams kyi sdums byed cing mdza' ba brtan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i
178a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig snyan pa dang / 'jam por smra ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi rnar bde zhing snying du 'ong la bden pa'i ngag thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i kun du 'thun pa'i smra ba'i tshul khrims ni tsher mi chod
178a7(dkon brtsegs): cing gzung bar 'os la 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi g.yog
178a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du btogs pa grangs
178b1(dkon brtsegs): m ed dpag tu med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan lag lngas gtugs te phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por mi phyed cing sra la shin du brtan pa'i
178b2(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab mchog gi chos nyid dam pa lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i
178b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bkang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med pa bla na med pa bskor
178b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du dge 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi phyed pa'i g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du dkon mchog
178b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la skyabs bla na med pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dkon mchog gsum dang / byang chub
178b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyis stongs par mi 'gyur bar gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni bde bar 'gyur bar gcig tu nges par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du
178b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad la bskal par chos ston par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang /
178b8(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa thams cad so sor 'dor ba dang / sdig pa thams cad la smod pa'i tshul khrims ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus
179a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yongs su bkang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs
179a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad dang / sems
179a3(dkon brtsegs): can 'gro ba thams cad du song ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul khrims ni byang
179a4(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi tshogs mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa bsags pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa'i tshul khrims ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
179a5(dkon brtsegs): nges pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par yongs su sngo ba'i tshul khrims ni gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi
179a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i pha ma dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /
179a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon med pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul khrims ni dris pa thams cad la mi skyo bar lan 'debs pa la lung bstan pa la mkhas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /
179a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi nang du chud pa rnams yongs su bskyab cing grogs bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gnas dang / sa dang pha rol du phyin pa chen
179b1(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rjes su bsngags pa'i tshul khrims ni de
179b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i pha rol gyi rjes su srung ba dang 'thun pa'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag
179b3(dkon brtsegs): par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang 'thun pa'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar
179b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol gyi sems mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshe 'di'i don dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi don dang / nyan thos kyi
179b5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa'i don dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i don dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa'i don rnams la bag med pa dang / brjed pa rnams kyi dran pa yang dag par skyed pa'i tshul khrims dang / ngan pa 'byung bar byed
179b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ni brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos goms par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nye
179b7(dkon brtsegs): bar ston pa'i tshul khrims ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshul khrims yang dag par len par 'dod pa dang / lhag par sbyang par 'dod na
179b8(dkon brtsegs): yang lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad
180a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / lhag par spyod pa dang / yang dag par
180a2(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa dang / lhag par spyad nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba
180a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /gal te tshul khrims de ma zhig pa dang / ma ral ba dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par
180a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad yang mi dge ba spang pa dang / dor ba dang / bsal par rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang dge
180a5(dkon brtsegs): ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ srid pa gzhan du gyur ba na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzangs
180a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang
180a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de nyid de dag gi dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par sbyong ba grang med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
180a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang /
180b1(dkon brtsegs): mi slob pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa'i mchog yin no/ /de ni dam pa yin no/ /lag bzangs
180b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lag bzangs
180b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan dag gi rang gi lus kyi srog gcod dam/ bdog pa thams cad
180b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrog gam/ chung ma 'phrog gam/ brdzun du smra ba 'am/ phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba smra ba 'am/ gshe 'am/ gsod dam/ 'dzin tam/ rdeg gam/ gcod kyang slar gnod par mi byed cing slar
180b5(dkon brtsegs): mi khro ste shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin par mi byed do/ /de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi srid pa rnams dang / srid pa 'di la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas shing bsags
180b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni 'di yin/ de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu dang / rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gis myong ba la ci'i phyir gzhan la slar gnod par bya zhing
180b7(dkon brtsegs): slar khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin par bya snyam du sems so/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gal te bdag gi srog gcod pa 'am/ bdog
180b8(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad 'phrog pa 'am/ chung ma 'phrog pa 'am/ brdzun du smra ba 'am/ phra ma 'am/ ngag rtsub po 'am/ tshig kyal pa smra ba 'am/ gshe ba 'am/ gsod pa 'am/ 'dzin pa 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/
181a1(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa yang rung ste/ gzhan dag la slar gnod pa byas sam/ slar khro ba 'am/ shar gnyer zhing 'khon du bzung na slar gnod pa byas pa dang / slar khros pa dang / shar gnyer zhing 'khon du bzung
181a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'dod pa/ mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba 'di bas bdag la las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las kyi rgyu 'thun pa brgya gyur tam/ stong gyur tam/ de bas lhag
181a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ srog yod pas srog
181a4(dkon brtsegs): gcod par 'gyur/ rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/ /rna ba'i dbang po yod pas rdzun du smra ba thos par 'gyur zhing / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa thos par 'gyur la/ lus yod pas lus
181a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / rdeg pa dang / gcod par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi dngos po/ sdug bsngal gyi gzhi po/ srog gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / lus
181a6(dkon brtsegs): blangs par gyur na ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / slar khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing 'khon du gzung bar bya snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par
181a7(dkon brtsegs): slob ste/ dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra ba ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no/ /chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gsher ba/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni tsha ba/ rlung gi
181a8(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi mtshan nyid ni yang zhing g.yo ba ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin du srog chags thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos
181b1(dkon brtsegs): can no/ /dbang po thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can no/ /lus thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos / sdug
181b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos te/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin yin no/ /srog gi dbang po zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can/ zad cing dengs
181b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'gog pa dang / dbang po drug po sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can rnams la sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gcod
181b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ slar khro ba 'am/ shar gnyer zhing 'khon du bzung bar bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni ngo bo nyid/ 'di ni chos nyid/ 'di ni rang bzhin yin no snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' di
181b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar yang dag par slob ste/ bdag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi med pa yin la/ gzhan dag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag
181b6(dkon brtsegs): med cing bdag gi med pa yin na/ mkhas pa rig pa dag mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag med cing bdag gi med pa la/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag
181b7(dkon brtsegs): med cing bdag gi med pa dang / ji ltar dga' ba 'am/ rjes su chags pa 'am/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ slar gnod par byed pa 'am/ slar khro ba 'am/ shar gnyer zhing 'khon du
181b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 'di lta ste/ mir skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ni nyung zhing chung gi/ yi dags kyi sdug bsngal ni ches mi bzad la
182a1(dkon brtsegs): ches bzod par dka' ba yin/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ches mi bzad cing bzod par dka' ba yin na/ bdag gis ji ltar sdug bsngal chung zhing
182a2(dkon brtsegs): nyung ba tsam gyi phyir gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / slar khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing 'khon du gzung bar bya snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang
182a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gcig pu'i don 'dod pa dang / bdag gcig pu la phan par 'dod pas gzhan dag la phyir gnod pa byed cing phyir khro ste shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa de yang mi rigs te cha ma yin na/ bdag
182a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi thams cad kyi don 'dod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ yi dam bcas pa chen pos yi dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/
182a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/ mi bzod pa dang / phyir gnod pa byed pa dang / phyir khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin pas ni sangs
182a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs pa dang / 'phel ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur gyi/ bzod pa dang / phyir gnod pa mi byed pa dang / phyir mi khro ba dang / shar gnyer cing 'khon du 'dzin pa mi
182a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs shing 'phel te/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /lag bzangs rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang
182a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod pas mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi reg pas reg kyang gzhan dag la slar gnod par mi bya/ slar khro bar mi bya/ shar gnyer zhing 'khon du gzung bar mi bya na/ mi'i sdug bsngal
182b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis reg pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de spyos sam/ brgyad dam/ smad dam/ mi snyan pa byas kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs shin du dri ma med cing dag la dka' ba thob
182b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de'i drud bshal tam/ bcings sam/ bzung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / skad cig gcig la ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gzhom pa'i
182b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de brdegs kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba bzlog pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de rna ba bcad
182b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la dad par bya ba'i chos kyi rna ba bskyed pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de sna bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems
182b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi yon tan mdzes shing bla na med pa la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de rkang pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang /
182b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de lag pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams
182b7(dkon brtsegs): cad la zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi lag brkyang pa sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de yan lag thams cad bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / pha rol
182b8(dkon brtsegs): du phyin pa drug gi yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de mig phyung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad shes
183a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi mig g.yung drung thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de mgo gcod kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
183a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mgo thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ /de bzod pa 'di dag dang / ji mi snyam pa 'di dag mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid la bya bar 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /
183a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbug dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su
183a4(dkon brtsegs): sngo bar byed do/ /mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can
183a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /gal te bzod pa 'di
183a6(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / ji mi snyam pa 'di dag ma nyams/ skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang
183a7(dkon brtsegs): mi bzod pa dang / ji snyam par mi byed pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang bzod pa dang / ji mi snyam pa la slob pa dang / mngon par
183a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /srid pa gzhan du gyur ba na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams
183b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi bzod pa kun
183b2(dkon brtsegs): du sbyang ba dge ba dang / bzod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa
183b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i bzod pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bzod pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod
183b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni bzod pa kun du spyod pa dge ba dang / bzod pa yang dag par sgrub pa dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no/ /de ni dam pa yin no/ /lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid
183b5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
183b6(dkon brtsegs): du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med de/
183b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sems can mtha' yas so/ /de ltar sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mu med pa la mtha' yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas
183b8(dkon brtsegs): shing mtha' yas pa de la phan pa'i phyir go cha bgos la/ sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa la bde ba'i phyir go cha bgos na sems can thams cad la phan par dmigs pa mtha'
184a1(dkon brtsegs): yas shing mtha' yas pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dag bag med par gyur tam/ sems gzhan du
184a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ gnyid kyis log kyang nyin mtshan du sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i
184a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur na bdag gis 'dir sems kyi
184a4(dkon brtsegs): skad cig sems kyi skad cig dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par 'gyur ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ gzhi de las
184a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dka' bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam mo/ /lag bzangs
184a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i rga ba'i sdug bsngal gcig pu bsal ba dang gzhom par 'dod pa
184a7(dkon brtsegs): de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ gang zhig sems can gyi
184a8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'dod pa
184b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byor pa'i sdug bsngal dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug
184b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang / tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig
184b3(dkon brtsegs): s ems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i sdug bsngal sems kyi skad cig gcig pa'i sems skyi skad cig gcig tsam dang 'brel ba bsal bar 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems
184b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ gang zhig ma 'ongs shing ma phyin pa'i bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med pa rnams su
184b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bar du bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag
184b6(dkon brtsegs): par slob ste/ gang zhig rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan nam/ nyan thos kyi yon tan 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa
184b7(dkon brtsegs): ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yon tan mtha' yas shing yon tan mu med pa/ stobs mtha' yas shing stobs mu med pa mtha'
184b8(dkon brtsegs): dag chub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa dang / mos pa dang / smon pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bag med par gyur tam/ gnyer gyis log kyang rgyu bzhi dang / rkyen bzhi dang / dmigs pa bzhi po
185a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ sems
185a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skye ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skye ba dag gis rdzogs pa'i byang
185a3(dkon brtsegs): chub rnyed par mi dka' na/ bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing
185a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ gzhi de las rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par mi dka' bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus srog gi
185a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam mo/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni shar phyogs kyi mtha' yang mngon zhing mu yang mngon la/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi mtha' yang mngon zhing mu yang mngon
185a6(dkon brtsegs): la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po mtha' yas mu med pa bzhi po de dag la ni mtha' dang mu yod pa ma yin na/ bdag gis sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba byang
185a7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'phel zhing rgyas na rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba la srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang
185a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang dag seng ge dang / stag dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang / bya rgod dang / khrung khrung dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / srin bu dang / sbrang ma dang / sbrang bu
185b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sha sbrang du gyur ba de dag gis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na/ bdag mir gyur bzhin du srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams
185b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ mi brgya 'am/ mi stong gis kyang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs shing thob na bdag gis kyang 'dir ci'i phyir ma rtogs shing /
185b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par mi 'gyur/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rtogs shing brnyes/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
185b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rtogs shing brnyes par gyur na/ bdag gis 'dir srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par
185b5(dkon brtsegs): bya snyam mo/ /lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ sangs rgyas ston pa'o zhes ston na sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyis bshad pa 'am/ byang chub
185b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas bshad pa 'am/ tha na smyon pa rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos gang yin pa dag dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
185b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par 'gyur ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang
185b8(dkon brtsegs): chub thob par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du nyan to/ /nges par byed do/ /rtog go/ /mkhas pa
186a1(dkon brtsegs): le lo med pa ni ngu shing bzhin du byed cing yid la byed pas mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du chos de dag 'dzin to/ /yongs su shes
186a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ /'chad do/ /klog go/ /rjes su sems so/ /gzhan dag la ston to/ /go bar byed do/ /mkhas pa le lo med pa ni ru shing bzhin du byed cing yid la byed pas mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang rung /
186a3(dkon brtsegs): de bcol kyang rung / ma bcol yang rung / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ci bya ba chos can chos dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten 'di la bde ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol du bde ba dag la rang gi lus nye bar
186a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang / yo byad du gyur bar byed do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na 'byung ba chen po bsgribs pa med pa/ yongs su gzung ba med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yo byad du
186a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba rnams yin no/ /lag bzangs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yo byad du gyur bar byed de/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang /
186a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / nad pa dang / mgon med pa rnams la yongs su spyad par bya ba dang / sri zhu bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas bye brag du 'gyur ro/ /de
186a7(dkon brtsegs): mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du gzhan gyi sems dang gzhan gyi snying dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig dang / rjes su 'thun pa dang / 'thun par byed pa dang / yang dag par bged pa dang / grogs byed pa dang /
186a8(dkon brtsegs): grogs su 'gyur ba dang / dge ba 'thun pa dang / don 'thun pas rjes su zhugs nas mngon du dad par byas shing bsdus te nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dzud do/ /'dul lo/ /
186b1(dkon brtsegs): 'god do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la 'dzud do/ /'dul lo/ /'god do/ /
186b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi rgyu dang / dam pa'i chos kyi ched dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug gi ched dang / dge
186b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu dang / dge ba'i ched la grang ba yang khyad du gsod la/ tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyi ngan du smras pa dang / ngan
186b4(dkon brtsegs): du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / ngal ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / gnyid dang / mi dga' ba dang / lus dang srog kyang khyad du gsod do/ /mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de rdzogs
186b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched la lha'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/ /lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/ /mi yi sdug
186b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/ /yi dags kyi sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/ /mkhas pa le lo med pa ni
186b7(dkon brtsegs): mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bkang pa thob par bya ba dang / spyod lam dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir
186b8(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul ba brtan to/ /de'i brtson 'grus 'di dang / rtul pa 'di mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / brtsam par 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can
187a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su
187a2(dkon brtsegs): sngo bar byed do/ /mngon sum du byed pa dang / rtsom pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / brtsams nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams
187a3(dkon brtsegs): cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /gal te brtson 'grus 'di ma
187a4(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren pa ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang snyom las dang /
187a5(dkon brtsegs): le lo spong ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang brtson 'grus dang / rtul pa la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su
187a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /srid pa gzhan du gyur ba na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems
187a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi brtson 'grus dge ba dang /
187a8(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa
187b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus dge ba dang / rtsol ba
187b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no/ /de ni dam pa yin no/ /lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ba dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus
187b3(dkon brtsegs): myur du skyen par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / // bam po gnyis pa/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su
187b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na/ mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir mig gi dbang po sdom
187b5(dkon brtsegs): pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing srung ste/
187b6(dkon brtsegs): mig gi dbang pos mig gi dbang po sdom par byed do/ /de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / snas dri rnams tshor ba dang / lces ro rnams myong ba dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams la reg pa dang / yid
187b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir yid kyi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnab sems dang /
187b8(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing srung ste/ yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po sdom par byed do/ /de 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngam/
188a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug gam/ nyal lam/ cang mi smra bar gyur kyang rung ste/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi gnas mi 'dor ro/ /rnam par mi 'dor ro/ /de lag mi rgod pa dang / mu
188a2(dkon brtsegs): cor mi smra ba dang / tshig mi mang ba dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang / mi rgod pa dang / tom col med pa dang / lus 'khrul pa med pa dang / ngag 'khrul pa med pa dang / sems 'khrul
188a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / dben yang rung / mi dben yang rung / spyod lam mi nyam pa yin no/ /bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ji lta bu yang
188a4(dkon brtsegs): rung ba dag gis chog shes shing gso sla ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / rim gro bya sla ba dang / cho ga dang spyod yul dge ba dang / 'du 'dzi las dben pa'i spyod yul yin/ thob pa dang ma thob pa la mnyam zhing
188a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med de ma khengs ma dud pa yin/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / 'chi ba la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de ma
188a6(dkon brtsegs): khengs ma dud pa yin/ mdza' ba dang / dgra dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang 'thun pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dang mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams
188a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dben pa dang / lang long rnams la yang mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de ma khengs ma dud pa yin/ gzugs sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa rnams la yang 'thun pa dang mi mthun pa med pa yin/ sgra dang /
188a8(dkon brtsegs): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa rnams la yang 'thun pa dang / mi mthun pa med pa yin no/ /de'i 'dod pa rnams ni rang gi sems kyis kun du bslang nas log par rnam par
188b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas ro myong ba yin pas keng rus lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni dgra mang ba'i phyir sha snag gu lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni blangs na sdug bsngal la yongs su btang na bde ba'i phyir
188b2(dkon brtsegs): rtswa me lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni gnod pa mang ba'i phyir shing gi rtse mo'i shing tog lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir slong ba lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams
188b3(dkon brtsegs): ni skad cig tsam zhig nor bas dga' ba'i phyir rmi lam lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i phyir mdze lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa
188b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi dngos po yin pa dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i mtha' yin pas mchil pa lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni ngoms par mi
188b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / skom pa 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir tshwa chu lta bur yid la byed do/ /de 'dod pa dag las dben pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/
188b6(dkon brtsegs): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bral zhing nad yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur bas rtog pa
188b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la
188b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ bsam gtan
189a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang
189a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas byams pa tshad med pa rdzogs par byas
189a3(dkon brtsegs): te gnas so/ /de sems can thams cad la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba
189a4(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal yang med bde ba yang med pa yid la byed pas btang snyoms tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de gzugs la
189a5(dkon brtsegs): rags pa'i 'du shes yid la byed cing nam mkha' la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam par shes pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed
189a6(dkon brtsegs): pas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de ci yang med pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /
189a7(dkon brtsegs): de 'du shes med 'du shes med min la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rang gi dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba ji ltar gnas shing
189a8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin du rgyun thung ba rnams la yang rgyun thung ba'i 'du shes dang / rgyun ring ba rnams la yang rgyun ring ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba dran pa rdzogs par
189b1(dkon brtsegs): byas te gnas so/ /de sems can gyi lus rnams la mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas 'chi ba'i 'du shes
189b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de na ba dang rga ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de kha zas yongs su tshol ba dang 'gyur ba la nad kyi rgyu dang / gnod pa'i
189b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyur yid la byed pas kha zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi 'jig rten thams cad la 'byor pa dang bral ba'i mtshan mar yid
189b4(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa dang / nags tshal rmad du byung ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba rmad du byung ba dang bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas
189b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ /de nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po rdzogs par byas te
189b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ /de nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs tshad med pa kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skyed mched gnyis pa
189b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de shi ba'i lus bsregs pa de la rlung ngam chus thal ba yang med par byed pa'i 'du shes dang / zhigs pa la phye ma yang med pa dang / rdul du gyur ba la rdul kyang
189b8(dkon brtsegs): m ed pa'i 'du shes su rnam par 'jigs pa bsgoms shing bsgrubs te nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la
190a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs tshad med pa kha dog
190a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs
190a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs
190a4(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /des 'di
190a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par sar rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par
190a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byas par zad par chu dang / zad par me dang / zad par rlung dang / zad par sngon po dang / zad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang / zad par dkar po dang / zad par
190a7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dang / zad par rnam par shes par rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de snyoms par 'jug pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs te/ snying rje chen po la dmigs
190a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzungs pa la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang rgyan la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas
190b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs la dmigs pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par sbyang ba la dmigs pa dang / byang
190b2(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi snying po'i bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzhom pa la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs so/ /de bsam gtan
190b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa na rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan byed do/ /sa'i khams la mi gnas/ chu'i khams la mi gnas/ me'i khams la mi gnas/ rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ nam mkha'i
190b4(dkon brtsegs): khams la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas par bsam gtan byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bla na med
190b5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan la gnas shing bsam gtan la dga'o/ /de bsam gtan de dang / ting nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod pa dang / snyoms par 'jug par
190b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs
190b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /bsam gtan byed pa dang / bsam gtan byas pa dang / langs nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /
190b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo
191a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /gal te bsam gtan de dang / ting nge 'dzin de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sems rnam par
191a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba dang / ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / sems mnyam par bzhag par slob
191a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /srid pa gzhan du gyur ba na zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzangs byang chub sems
191a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de
191a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi sems mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la
191a6(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa yang dag par
191a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba mtha' yas mu med
191a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
191b1(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang gang zag gang dag thos pa mang ba/ thos
191b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ don shes pa/ bshad pa shes pa/ dpyod pa can/ ji ltar thos pa'i don yongs su rtog pa de dag la snyen cing sten te bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de thos pa'i ched dang / bshad pa'i ched dang / don
191b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi ched dang / don la yongs su brtag pa'i ched dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i ched la grang ba yang khyad du gsod/ tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang /
191b4(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du smras shing ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / lus kyi tshor ba drag pa/ rtsub pa/ mi bzad pa/ srog 'chang bar 'gyur ba yang khyad du gsod do/ /de
191b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la ni rin po cher 'du shes nye bar gnas/ chos smra ba rnams la rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/ chos nyan pa la ni dkon pa rnyed par 'du shes/ chos 'dzin pa la ni don yod par srog sogs
191b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'du shes/ chos kyi yon tan mang du byed pa la ni srog don yod par 'du shes/ chos la yongs su rtog pa la ni tshe rabs brgyar mi rnyed par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ der chos de dag nyan cing
191b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na khams rnams kyang rab tu shes/ phung po rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / dus dang /
191b8(dkon brtsegs): theg pa rnams dang / dge ba bsags pa yang rab tu shes so/ /khams rnams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ khams ni gnyis te/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ste/ khams gnyis po de dag go/ /
192a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kyi khams ni gang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'gag pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams shes bya'o/ /gang ci yang rung ste/
192a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ste/ de ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams rab tu shes so/ /gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu
192a3(dkon brtsegs): shes te/ dge ba'i khams dang / mi dge ba'i khams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i khams te gsum po de dag go/ /dge ba'i khams ni gang / mi dge ba'i khams ni gang / lung du ma bstan pa'i khams ni gang zhe na/
192a4(dkon brtsegs): gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ zhe sdang med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ gti mug med pa dang / gti mug med pa
192a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i khams shes bya'o/ /gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ gti mug dang /
192a6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang ldan pa de ni mi dge ba'i khams shes bya'o/ /de gnyis la ma gtogs pa ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid de/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so/ /gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/
192a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams so/ /'dod pa'i khams gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dags
192a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa
192b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams shes bya'o/ /gzugs kyi khams gang zhe na/ tshangs ris
192b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod
192b3(dkon brtsegs): nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin du mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa
192b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gzugs kyi khams shes bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i khams gang zhe na/ nam mkha' mtha'
192b5(dkon brtsegs): yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes
192b6(dkon brtsegs): med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du
192b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i khams shes bya ste/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so/ /gzhan yang khams bzhi rab tu shes te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs
192b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ba khams bzhi po de dag ste/ de ltar khams bzhi rab tu shes so/ /gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/ drug gang
193a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gnod sems kyi khams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i khams dang / mngon par 'byung ba'i khams dang / gnod sems med pa'i khams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba med pa'i
193a2(dkon brtsegs): khams te/ khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so/ /gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/ drug gang zhe na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams
193a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams te/ khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so/ /de la sa'i khams ni mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o/ /
193a4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa'o/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/
193a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o/ /sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa ste/ de ltar khams drug rab tu shes so/ /de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du
193a6(dkon brtsegs): byed cing yongs su rtog pa na gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ phung po lnga rab tu shes so/ /gzugs la dbu
193a7(dkon brtsegs): ba rdos pa lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / tshor ba la ni chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / 'du shes la ni smig rgyu lta bu dang / ngan pa
193a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / 'du byed rnams la ni chu shing lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / rnam par shes pa la ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang /
193b1(dkon brtsegs): ring du mi gnas par de ltar phung po lnga rab tu shes so/ /de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na nang gi skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig nang gi skye mched dang / rna ba
193b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sna dang / lce dang / yid nang gi skye mched ces bya ba nang gi skye mched drug po de dag go/ /de la mig nang gi skye mched ni na ba'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag
193b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me kun du 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
193b4(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyis kun du 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun du 'bar bar rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched la yang na ba'i
193b5(dkon brtsegs): chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me kun du 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
193b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams kyis kun du 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun du 'bar bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar
193b7(dkon brtsegs): nang gi skye mched drug po dag rab tu shes so/ /gzhan yang phyi'i skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs rnams phyi'i skye mched dang / rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba
193b8(dkon brtsegs): sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba
194a1(dkon brtsegs): chos phyi'i skye mched rnams shes bya ba ste/ skye mched drug po de dag go/ /de la mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs phyi'i skye mched la skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang /
194a2(dkon brtsegs): nyams chung ba ste/ de la rtag pa 'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zug gam/ de bzhin nyid dam/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/ sgyu ma de ni yod/ sgyu mar byas pa de ni
194a3(dkon brtsegs): yod/ sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de/ gang ci yang yod pa dang / de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro
194a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba chos phyi'i skye mched la yang skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam chung ba
194a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de la rtag pa 'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zug pa 'am/ de bzhin nyid dam/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/ sgyu ma de ni yod/ sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/ sems
194a6(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de/ gang ci yang yod par phyi'i skye mched drug po de ltar rab tu shes so/ /de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab tu shes so/ /
194a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa
194a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag go/ /phung po lnga rnams dang / khams drug po dang / nang gi skye mched drug po dag dang / phyi'i skye mched drug po dag gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal zhes bya ste/ sdug bsngal de ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug
194b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / bdag med pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i chos nyid du blta'o/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam du mngon
194b2(dkon brtsegs): bar zhen pa dang / bdag gi bdag ni 'di yin no snyam du bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /
194b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin la/
194b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / phung po rnams bdag go snyam pa dang / phung po rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / phung po rnams la bdag snyam pa dang / bdag la phung po rnams so snyam pa
194b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams bdag go snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams la bdag go snyam pa dang / bdag la skye mched
194b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams so snyam pa dang / tshor ba bdag go snyam pa dang / tshor bar byed pa bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang /
194b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang / bdag rtag go snyam pa dang / bdag mi rtag go snyam pa dang / rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag
194b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi rtag go snyam pa dang / rtag par yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod do snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod pa ma yin no snyam pa dang / mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha'
195a1(dkon brtsegs): med kyang med do snyam pa dang / mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa
195a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung yang mi 'byung ngo snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung ba yang ma yin mi 'byung ba yang ma yin no/ /snyam pa dang / srog de lus de yin snyam pa dang / srog kyang gzhan lus
195a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzhan no snyam pa dang / sems can 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / sems can yod pa las chad de 'jig cing med par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /
195a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de myong ba de yin no snyam pa dang / byed pa yang gzhan/ myong ba yang gzhan no snyam pa dang / bdag yod pas bdag gi yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / bdag gi yod pas bdag yod par 'gyur ro snyam
195a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'di na bdag de lta bu 'am/ bdag gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ de bzhin du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de ltar 'byung bar
195a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ram/ gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 'dir bdag sngon byung ngam/ bdag da lta byung ngam/ bdag gzhan du byung ngam / snyam du de dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen te/ 'jig
195a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / sems kyi gnas dang / mngon par zhen pa dang / nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal ba dang / snyems pa dang / nga rgyal byed pa dang / bdag tu smra ba'i len pa
195a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal gang yin pa thams cad dang / lus sam/ ngag gam/ sems kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ bsod nams ma yin par nye
195b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gro ba 'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ 'dod par gtogs pa 'am/ gzugs su gtogs pa 'am/ gzugs med par gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags
195b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /gang 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / nga rgyal zad pa dang / bdag tu mngon par zhen pa spangs pa dang / bdag tu smra ba'i len pa spangs pa de ni
195b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /gang sdug bsngal la yang sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba la yang kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa la yang 'gog pa dang / lam la yang lam
195b4(dkon brtsegs): du yid la byed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la nyes dmigs su lta zhing gnas pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta zhing gnas pa dang / ji ltar mthong ba dang / byas pa la so sor rtog pa yang dag pa'i lta
195b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
195b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag la dpyod cing rtog la khong du chud
195b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing rnam par 'jig pa na 'dus byas kyi khams la ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par mthong ngo / /'dus ma byas kyi khams la ni skyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang
195b8(dkon brtsegs): dpung gnyen du yang mthong la/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams mngon sum du yang mi byed de/ de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag rab tu shes so/ /de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing
196a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rab tu shes te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming
196a2(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa dang / reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen gyis len
196a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rten cing 'brel
196a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'byung ba mi shes pa dang / mi mthong ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ /gang cung zad lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ bsod nams ma yin par nye bar
196a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ gzugs kyi khams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ gzugs med pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba de dag ni 'du byed
196a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams shes bya'o/ /gang cung zad de las byung ba sems shes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de las byung ba gang ci yang rung tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg
196a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yid la byed pa de ni ming zhes bya'o/ /gang ci yang rung lhan cig byung ba mer mer po'i gzugs dang / rdzus te byung ba'i gzugs dang / rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs de ni gzugs zhes
196a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ de gnyis ni ming dang gzugs shes bya'o/ /de las byung ba mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de ni skye mched drug ces bya'o/ /mig la brten cing gzugs la yang brten te mig
196b1(dkon brtsegs): gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang / gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos rnams la brten te yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang / gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa ste de ni reg
196b2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o/ /de las byung ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa de dag ni tshor ba gsum zhes bya'o/ /de las byung ba 'dod chags dang / chags pa dang / dga' ba de ni
196b3(dkon brtsegs): sred pa zhes bya'o/ /de las byung ba kun du chags pa dang / lta ba dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang / bdag tu smra ba de ni len pa zhes bya'o/ /de las byung ba gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
196b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni srid pa'o/ /gang srid pa de 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'grub pa de ni skye ba zhes bya'o/ /gang srid pa de 'gyur ba dang / 'jig pa dang / nye bar khrid pa
196b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni rga ba zhes bya'o/ /gang srid pa de 'chi 'pho ba dang bral ba de ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o/ /de de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la dpyod cing yongs su rtog la khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig pa na
196b6(dkon brtsegs): sa rlom sems su mi byed/ sas rlom sems su mi byed/ sa ni bdag gi'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do/ /chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par
196b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pas rlom sems su mi
196b8(dkon brtsegs): byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gi'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do/ /de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes
197a1(dkon brtsegs): su mthong ba na rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jog go/ /de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
197a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba na 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs
197a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gag / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag /tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa
197a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pas len pa 'gag / len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'gag pa khong du chud par byed
