197a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i 'gog pa rab tu shes so/ /de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na dus gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da
197a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar byung ba'i dus te/ de dag ni dus gsum rnams shes bya'o/ /'du byed gang la la 'gag pa de ni 'das pa'i dus shes bya'o/ /'du byed gang la la ma 'ongs shing ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus shes
197a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /'du byed gang la la da ltar byung ba da ltar du gyur ba de ni da ltar byung ba'i dus shes bya'o/ /de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rjes su dran na smod cing gshung ste nges par spong ngo / /
197b1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rdul tsam la yang gcig tu rnam par smin par mthong / mi sdug par rnam par smin par mthong / yid du mi 'ong bar rnam par smin par mthong / 'jigs par mthong zhing
197b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba'i skabs mi 'byed de/ lus sdom pas bsdams/ ngag sdom pas bsdams/ yid sdom pas bsdams/ dbang po drug sdom pas bsdams so/ /
197b3(dkon brtsegs): de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la smon pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la smon lam 'debs pa rjes su dran zhing 'dun pa
197b4(dkon brtsegs): drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
197b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed
197b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa yang 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad
197b7(dkon brtsegs): dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /mos so/ /yid
197b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis smon to/ /da ltar byung ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang / sems kyi rgyud kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs
198a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun tu mi 'dor ro/ /nyams par mi byed do/ /brjed par mi byed do/ /
198a2(dkon brtsegs): bag med par mi byed do/ /gang 'das pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni 'das pa/ 'gags pa/ med pa/ yod pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni da ltar bdag med pa/ bdag gi med pa'o/ /gang ma 'ongs pa'i
198a3(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ yod pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni da ltar bdag med pa/ bdag gi med pa'o/ /gang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de
198a4(dkon brtsegs): ni mi gnas pa/ mi 'dug pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten ni skad cig las lhag par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /skad cig pa de'i skye ba'i dus kyang gzhan/ gnas pa'i dus kyang gzhan/
198a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa'i dus kyang gzhan gang yin pa'i skad cig gnas pa med pa/ 'dug pa med pa'o/ /skad cig gi dus gang yin pa de ni nang dang phyi'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched do/ /nang dang phyi'i phung
198a6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni dus so/ /da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni skad cig tsam yang mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa ste/ mi gnas pa mi
198a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa la ni bdag gam bdag gi ba med do/ /de yang gang gi tshe ma 'ongs par gyur ba de'i tshe ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba yod pa ma yin pa'o/ /bdag tu ma gyur cing bdag gir ma gyur pa'o/ /gang gi tshe 'das
198a8(dkon brtsegs): te 'gags pa dang / ma byung ste yod pa ma yin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang bdag med pa dang / bdag gi med pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gang yang dus gsum dag tu bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de ni ma byung zhing yod pa ma yin
198b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir mkhas shing rig pa rnams kyis 'di ni bdag gi'o/ /'di ni nga'o/ /bdag gi 'di ni yod do zhes bdag tu lta bar 'os pa ma yin no/ /de srid pa thams cad dang / /'du byed thams
198b2(dkon brtsegs): cad la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / spangs pa'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes can du gnas te/ 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin no/ /gang de
198b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar dus gsum rab tu shes pa de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lha'i theg pa dang / tshangs pa'i theg pa dang / 'phags
198b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i theg pa ste/ de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o/ /bsam gtan dang po ni lha'i theg pa ste/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa yang lha'i theg pa'o/ /byams pa ni tshangs pa'i
198b5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa ste/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyang tshangs pa'i theg pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
198b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o/ /
198b7(dkon brtsegs): de dus dus su lha'i theg pa sgom ste sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus dus su tshangs pa'i theg pa sgom ste/ sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus dus su 'phags pa'i theg pa bsgom zhing sems
198b8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyang de la 'god la/ rnam par grol ba 'phags pa mngon sum du yang mi byed do/ /gzhan yang theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
199a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po ste/ de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o/ /mos pa dman pa dang / dbang po dman pa skad cig tsam yang srid pa la mos par mi byed/ sred par mi byed kyi
199a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dor te/ skad cig de la de ma thag tu mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phan yon mthong bas mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag khong du chud pa dang / rtog par bya ba'i
199a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'dun pa dang / rtsol ba'i shas che ba de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya'o/ /mos pa 'bring dang / dbang po 'bring dang / dben par dga' ba dang / rang gi don lhur len pa dang / bsam
199a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / snyom par 'jug pa la gnas par brtson pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / rang byang chub tu smon pa dang / rang byang chub tu smon lam
199a5(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya'o/ /mos pa khyad par du 'phags pa/ dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol
199a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bkang bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug
199a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bkang bar 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi don du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la mi lta ba dang / 'khor ba'i bde ba la yang dmod pa mang ba yin na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la dmod pa mang ba lta
199a8(dkon brtsegs): smos kyang ci dgos te/ tshul khrims dang spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa la rnam par gnas pa dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa can gyi mdo sde rnams klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang /
199b1(dkon brtsegs): lung nod pa dang / yid la byed pa rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pa dang / de dag gi byin gyi
199b2(dkon brtsegs): brlabs bzhi po bden pa dang / gtong ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / shes rab la slob pa dang / shes bya thams cad nyan pa dang / len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / dpyod par dga' ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
199b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa thams cad yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / rang gi don la mi lta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi don lhur len pa dang / stobs ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad theg pa gsum
199b4(dkon brtsegs): po dag la dgod par 'dod pa dang / dgod par spro ba dang / bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi theg pa la shin du gnas pa dang / mi phyed pa dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang / rtag par rgyun
199b5(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub tu smon cing byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bya ste/ de ltar theg pa gsum po dag rab tu shes so/ /de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa mang du byed cing yongs su rtog
199b6(dkon brtsegs): pa na dge ba'i thabs rab tu shes te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang
199b7(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes dmigs par byed do/ /de phyag lan gcig 'tshal ba na mtha' yas shing
199b8(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med par phyag 'tshal bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de byang chub tu smon pa na sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams
200a1(dkon brtsegs): cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de bzhin du skyabs su 'gro
200a2(dkon brtsegs): ba na yang sems bskyed do/ /de 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / za ba dang / 'thung ba dang / zhing rmed pa dang / sa bon 'debs pa dang / las thams cad byed pa
200a3(dkon brtsegs): na yang mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes sems bskyed do/ /mang du byed do/ /snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa na yang sems can thams
200a4(dkon brtsegs): cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
200a5(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab bo zhes sems bskyed do/ /mang du byed do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams
200a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mchog dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad
200a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gdab bo zhes sems bskyed do/ /
200a8(dkon brtsegs): mang du byed do/ /de dge ba gang ci spyod kyang de sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / ngan 'gro'i rgyud gcad pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs
200b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa
200b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
200b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar
200b4(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams bskal par bzhugs pa dang / bskal par chos ston pa dang
200b5(dkon brtsegs): bskal par dge 'dun 'thun par gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /mtho ris kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ rdzogs
200b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ sbyin pas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ snyan par smra bas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ don spyod pas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ don 'thun pas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/
200b7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ji ltar gzhan dag dge ba'i phyogs yang dag par skyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/ /de chos kyi tshigs 'di dag la nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du
200b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go/ /yid la byed do/ /de 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad na/ /yang dag bzhugs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /chos dang dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' la/ /
201a1(dkon brtsegs): gan 'gro mgo bos mtha' yas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'gro ba'i nang na yon tan mnyam med cing / /mi mnyam mnyam pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas po/ /yon tan dpag med de dag thams cad
201a2(dkon brtsegs): la/ /bdag ni mgo bos mtha' yas skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang tshogs rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten khams/ /gang yang brgya lam stongs par mi
201a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar/ /de ltar gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs/ /zhi ba'i chos ni rab tu ston mdzad cing / /bskal pa ma lus rnams su bzhugs par yang / /'jig rten khams rnams kun gyi
201a4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs la/ /mgo bos gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs/ /sngon dang 'di dang skad cig tsam yang rung / /bdag gis sdig pa gang dang gang bgyis pa/ /sdig pa de dag thams cad
201a5(dkon brtsegs): smad par bgyi/ /sdig pa thams cad bdag gis spang bar bgyi/ /skad cig tsam yang bdag gis dge ba 'di/ /ma lus par ni yang dag gzung bar bgyi/ /tshe yis ji tsam thub kyi bar du ni/ /
201a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba kun la gnas par 'gyur bar 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas dag dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /'jig rten 'dir ni byung dang byung gyur dang / /
201a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung 'gyur rnams kyi dge ba thams cad dang / /rgyal ba rnams dang 'phags pa thams cad kyi/ /tshul khrims dang ni ye shes ting 'dzin dang / /rnam grol tshe dang chos rnams gang yin pa/ /de
201a8(dkon brtsegs): dag 'jig rten rnams la phan gyur cig / 'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad dag /byung dang byung gyur 'byung bar 'gyur rnams kyi/ /dge ba dag la bdag ni phyi phyir zhing / /mgo bos mtha'
201b1(dkon brtsegs): yas rjes su yi rang ngo / /yon tan yang dag dge ba mtha' yas pa/ /de dag thams cad 'gro ba ma lus pas/ /sems can re re dang ni bdag nyid la'ang / /yod par bdag ni smon lam mtha'
201b2(dkon brtsegs): yas 'debs/ /bdag gi dge ba dag ni 'das pa dang / /ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar thams cad kyis/ /'jig rten dag gi khams ni thams cad du/ /dkon mchog gsum po rtag tu 'byung bar
201b3(dkon brtsegs): shog / dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bskal par bzhugs pas phongs par ma gyur cig /bar du gcod pa med par byang chub dang / /pha rol phyin pa rnams ni rdzogs
201b4(dkon brtsegs): par shog / sems can dag ni thams cad bde ba dang / /'jigs pa med cing ngan 'gro 'das pa dang / /mi dge thams cad dang ni bral ba dang / /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs gyur cig /theg pa
201b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag la ci rigs par/ /de dag la ni smon lam mthar phyin cing / /tshe ring ba dang rnam par grol ba dang / /khyad par can gyi don kun rdzogs par shog /rdzogs pa'i byang chub smon lam
201b6(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa na/ /mtha' yas dpag tu med par rab tu 'debs/ /sems can thams cad dag gi sdug bsngal dang / /nyon mongs dag ni nye bar zhi gyur cig /chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba
201b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi phyir/ /'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /rgyal ba kun dang byang chub sems dpa' la/ /rang gi lus ni nges par dbul bar bgyi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang
201b8(dkon brtsegs): chub thob par gyur ba du/ /ma 'ongs pa na smon lam mtha' yas gdab/ /skye dang skye bar dkon mchog gsum po la/ /bdag ni yongs su spyad par bgyid par shog /'jig rten
202a1(dkon brtsegs): dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' la/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i lha yi spos mchog dang / /phreng ba me tog chun pos
202a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod byed shog / lhun po mnyam pa'i gser dang dngul dag dang / /gos dang rin po che yi phung po dang / /gzhal med khang bcas gzhon dang mal cha dang / /bza' ba mtha' yas dag ni sbyin par
202a3(dkon brtsegs): shog / 'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyis rdzogs byed cing / /skyabs dang lus dang pha 'drar gyur bar shog /bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang ba dang / /'gro la chos ni rab tu ston gyur
202a4(dkon brtsegs): cig / byang chub theg pa mchog ni rnyed pa dang / /dkon mchog gsum phyir go cha sra ba bgo/ /pha rol phyin pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing / /sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs su rdzogs byed shog /
202a5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa kun dang bral zhing lus ngag dang / /yid kyi las mtha' dge ba mchog gyur cig /byang chub las ni mi ldog bdag gyur cing / /byang chub dga' dang byang chub sems dpar gyur/ /
202a6(dkon brtsegs): srid dang srid par byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba kun la slob/ /bdag gis chos rnams de dag kun la yang / /'jig rten thams cad rab tu dgod par
202a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ /de de ltar bdag dang gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rab tu shes so/ /de shes rab de dang ye shes de mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid la bya bar 'dod pa na yang
202a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /
202b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas
202b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs
202b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /gal te shes rab de dang / ye shes de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag
202b4(dkon brtsegs): par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / mi shes pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo 'bad do/ /dus dus su
202b5(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang shes rab dang ye shes la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /srid pa gzhan du
202b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su
202b7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dge
202b8(dkon brtsegs): ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod
203a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa
203a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no/ /de ni dam pa yin no/ /lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing
203a3(dkon brtsegs): tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yongs su
203a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i sems can
203a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag theg pa gsum dang / mtho ris su skye ba'i don byas par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
203a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
203a7(dkon brtsegs): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
203a8(dkon brtsegs): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lag bzangs kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang / dzi na mi tra dang /
203b1(dkon brtsegs): zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
203b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ste des pas zhus pa/ bam po gcig pa/ @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su ra tA pa re pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
203b3(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/ 'phags pa des pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa
203b4(dkon brtsegs): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
203b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis
203b6(dkon brtsegs): bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod par byas so/ /de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer na grong khyer gyi mi dbul po des pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa
203b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ chos la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/
203b8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa la gnas te sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ snying rje la gnas te yid yongs su skyo ba med pa/ dga' ba la gnas te chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/
204a1(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms la gnas te bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs
204a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smyin par byed cing dbul por ming du chags pa zhig gnas te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas
204a3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa shin du 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pa/ yid 'khrugs pa med pa/ rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa/ gzhan gyi
204a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa dag la skyon du mi lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems srung ba/ brkam pa med pa/ shes bzhin du spyod pa/ chog shes shing dgang sla la gso sla ba/ bsam pa phun
204a5(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa/ g.yo med pa/ nga rgyal med pa/ dka' blo bde ba/ 'thun par 'dzin pa/ rtag tu gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ lag na shing lo'i snod thogs pa/ rtswa bting
204a6(dkon brtsegs): ba la nyal ba/ gos ngan pa gyon pa/ rnyed kyang mi len pa/ bzang yang rung ngan kyang rung bgo bsha' byas nas za ba/ dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ chos nyan par
204a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa/ gtam sna tshogs 'byung ba la spobs pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de mthong ngo / /mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ci grong khyer
204a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbul po 'di yi dam la brtan nam mi brtan bdag gis brtag go snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang po mngon par sprul nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa la tshig
204b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa dag gis gshe zhing spyo bar byed do/ /bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon cha dag kyang bstan na nges de bzod pa'i stobs kyis dang du len par byed de/ mi 'khrug cing gnod sems mi bskyed
204b2(dkon brtsegs): do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi gzhan dag cig sprul nas des pa'i mdun du bzhag ste/ des pa de la dga' ba'i tshig gis kho bo cag ni khyod kyi don byed par 'dod pa yin gyis/ ci ste khyod 'dod pa lta
204b3(dkon brtsegs): na khyod la sdigs pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dag kho bo cag gis tshar bcad par bya'o zhes smras so/ /des bas smras pa/ grogs po dag thong de skad ma zer cig /gal te mi 'di dag gi kho bo'i lus
204b4(dkon brtsegs): dum bu brgyar dum bu dum bur gtubs su zin kyang kho bo ni mi 'di dag la sdig pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /grogs po dag 'jig rten dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i phyogs gnyis la gnas la de'i 'gro
204b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gnyis kho na ste/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro'o/ /mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o/ /de bas na kho bo ni sems can pha rol tshig pa za bar byed par nga mi 'dod na gtse ba lta ci smos/
204b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sa bon tsha ba rnams kyi ni/ /'bras bu tsha ba skye bar 'gyur/ /sa bon mngar ba rnams kyi ni/ /'bras bu mngar ba skye bar 'gyur/ /
204b7(dkon brtsegs): dpe zlar bya ba 'di yis na/ /sdig pa'i rnam smin tsha ba dang / /dkar po'i 'bras bu mngar ba dag /mkhas pa'i mis ni shes par 'gyur/ /rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /
204b8(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa rnam gsum mi bya zhing / /gzhan dag byed kyang mkhas pa yis/ /rjes su dga' bar mi bya'o/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /dkar po rnam gsum rtag tu bya/ /
205a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dge ba spyod byed pa/ /gzhan dag la yang yi rang bya/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na des pa la dbyig dang / gser mang po bstan nas 'di skad
205a2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /des pa 'o ni las khyer la sbyin bdag byin cig /bsod nams dag gyis shig /gos dang rgyan dag kyang thogs shig /khyod ngan cing dbul bas ci zhig bya/ des pas smras pa/ grogs po
205a3(dkon brtsegs): dag sngon sems can rnams la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pas 'dir dbul po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de bas na kho bo ni ma byin par len pa byed par mi 'dod
205a4(dkon brtsegs): do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ des pa khyod da ltar je bde bar 'tsho bar gyis shig /'jig rten pha rol bsam pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ des pas smras pa/ grogs po gang tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa 'di
205a5(dkon brtsegs): ni byis pa'i chos yin gyis mkhas pa rnams ni tshe phyi ma ched cher 'dzin to/ /'dod pas zil gyis non pa dang / zhe sdang gis zil gyis non pa dang / gti mug gis zil gyis non pa dang / 'dod chags
205a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis zil gyis non pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyis mkhas pa dag ni brkam pa ma yin no/ /sogs 'jog ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni sogs 'jog
205a7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ /bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni bdag tu mi 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do/ /lus
205a8(dkon brtsegs): dang srog la lta ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o/ /ngoms mi shes shing chog mi shes pa ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni ngoms shes shing chog shes
205b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /'tsho ba yongs su ma dag dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin no/ /las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni las mthong ba yin no/ /
205b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni rnam par mi 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin to/ /byams pa'i sems med pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni byams
205b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang ldan no/ /phyin ci log bzhis sems bslad pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni sems phyin ci ma log pa yin no/ /gzhan yang sems can dbul po gang yin pa de dag kho bos
205b4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bshad kyis nyon cig / bye ba phrag stong gter yod kyang / /gang dag la ni gtong med pa/ /de dag 'jig rten 'dir dbul zhes/ /thos mang rnams kyis de skad bshad/ /
205b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la zan cig med bzhin du/ /de ni gtong la rab gnas na/ /de ni 'jig rten nor che zhes/ /yang dag gzigs pa rnams kyis bshad/ /gang la sdig med 'phags pa ni/ /rnam pa kun gyis
205b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa yin/ /byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni/ /shin du brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin/ /mkhas pa dag gis spyos sla yi/ /byis pas bsngags pa de lta min/ /byis pa sdig pa bsngags par
205b7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /mkhas pa dag ni sdig la smod/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na mi gzhan zhig sprul to/ /de nas mi des gser mang po khyer te des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye des pa
205b8(dkon brtsegs): gser khyer la kho bo mi gzhan zhig dang rtsod pa de la khyod gcig pus che bzhi bya bar kho bos byas kyi der kho bo'i che bzhi gyis shig / des pas smras pa/ grogs po thong khyod de skad ma zer cig /
206a1(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni brdzun zer du mi 'dod do/ /kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni bdag la yang slu zhing pha rol la yang slu la 'phags pa la slu ba yin te/ grags pa dmas pa byed pa dang / yid mi ches pa dang / yid du mi 'ong
206a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / brnyas par byed pa dang / sems yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin no/ /kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni kha mnam par byed pa dang / lus smad par byed pa dang / lha'i yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa yin no/ /kye grogs
206a3(dkon brtsegs): po brdzun du smra ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rku ba dang / dran pa rmugs par byed pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam la sgrib pa yin no/ /kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyis btsan par mi bya ba dang / yang
206a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par smra ba rnams kyi nang du tshig mi mdzes pa dang / mkhas pa rnams kyis smad pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang / brtul zhugs yongs su skong ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur
206a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /brdzun du smra ba'i kha nas ni/ /rul pa'i dri yang mnam par 'gyur/ /dgon par ji ltar bcom pa bzhin/ /sngon gyi
206a6(dkon brtsegs): dkar rnams spong bar byed/ /rmongs pas bdag dang lha rnams dang / /'phags rnams yid kyang 'byung bar byed/ /mi ni gang zhig brdzun zer ba/ /de ni rtag tu dogs par 'gyur/ /brdzun du smra bar byed pa de/ /sdig pa
206a7(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi rtsa ba dang / /dka' thub can gyi rtsa gcod dang / /ngan 'gror 'gro ba zhes kyang bya/ /gal te 'dzam gling gang ba yi/ /gser dag khyod kyis byin na yang / /kho bo chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /rtag tu brdzun ni smra mi byed/ /de
206a8(dkon brtsegs): nas brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i mis des pa brdzun zer du gzhug ma nus nas song ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo nyi 'od dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed gnyis song la brtul
206b1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs dang / dka' thub byed pa 'di ci 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhig gam/ 'on te 'dod pa don du mi gnyer ba zhig yin par rtogs shig /de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang / lha'i bu mo nyi 'od nam nangs nas phyogs gang
206b2(dkon brtsegs): na des pa 'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas des pa la tshig snyan par smras te/ des pa bzhengs/ bdag cag gnyis ni khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags so/ /des pa bdag cag gnyis kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la
206b3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs sha tshugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / lus byugs pa dang / rgyan dang / chas dang / lhab lhub dag la gzigs/ na tshod dang po'i lang tsho la bab pa la gzigs/ des pa khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 'di 'dra ba
206b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/ des pas bltas nas smras pa/ khyed gnyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du zhugs pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur
206b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin gyi lha dang mir zhugs pa dag gi ni ma yin no/ /khyed gnyis kyi lus ni sgyu ma dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur kho bos mthong ngo / /khyed gnyis kyi gzugs ni dbu ba dang / chu bur dang / smig rgyu lta bur mthong ngo / /
206b6(dkon brtsegs): khyed tsan dan gyi mde gus lus byugs pa ni spags pa rlon pa shas yog pa lta bur mthong ngo / /khyed kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub ni mi slu ba'i sgyu ma byas pa lta bur mthong ngo / /khyed kyi lang tsho ni mi rtag pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can du mthong
206b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /bsod nams ma yin par mthong ba'i phyir khyed gnyis la kho bo ma chags so/ /khyed gnyis ni spre'u dang / bud med kyi sems lta bur gyur ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi sems dran pas kun nas bsrungs pa dag
206b8(dkon brtsegs): gi ni ma yin no/ /che zhe dag 'dod pa la sten pa ni mi sdug pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni dri nga ba'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni rul ba'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni shin du sdug bsngal ba'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni bde ba thams
207a1(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su 'grib par byed pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sten pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni ngan 'gro na gnas pa'o/
207a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la sten pa ni 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dag la sten pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni mi mthun pa dang gor na gnas pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni phyin ci log skyed pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni srid pa'i
207a3(dkon brtsegs): bag la nyal ba la gnas pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni rnam par rmongs shing shin du rmongs la kun du rmongs pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni nye bar gzir cing rnam par gzir la rab tu gzir ba'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni kun du
207a4(dkon brtsegs): gdungs shing rnam par gdungs la yongs su gdungs pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug cing dge ba yongs su nyams par byed pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni mi dge ba'i
207a5(dkon brtsegs): sprin gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni srin mo dang 'dris par byed pa dang / gzugs mi sdug pa dang 'dris par byed pa dang / sha za ma dang 'dris par byed pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni ba lang dang /
207a6(dkon brtsegs): bong bu dang / khyi dang / phag dang / rnga mo dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / lug dang / wa la sten pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa la sten pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni tshul khrims dang / thos pa
207a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gtong ba yongs su 'dor ba la sten pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub 'dor ba'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni shin du bag med pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni nyon mongs pa shin du
207a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /'dod pa la sten pa ni shin du bar tu gcod par byed pa'o/ /de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'dod pa mi rtag rtag tu smad pa ste/ /shin du sdug
207b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bde ba 'jig par byed/ /rtag tu ngan songs rnams kyi khyim du gyur/ /sems rmongs gyur ba dag gis rtag tu bsten/ /'thab rtsod can de mi bde mtshang du gyur/ /rtag tu 'gyed cing mi mthun go rar gnas/ /'di dag phyin
207b2(dkon brtsegs): ci log skyed gzhi yin te/ /'dod sten sred pa 'phel byed bde ba med/ /rnam rmongs rab rmongs de bzhin kun du rmongs/ /'dod sten rtag tu gzir cing gnod pa ste/ /'di ni kun gdungs rnam gdungs yongs su gdungs/ /sdig
207b3(dkon brtsegs): par sbyor zhing dge ba chud gzon pa/ /'di ni mi dge kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /'dod sten dper na sprin gyi dra ba 'dra/ /'dod sten sha za mo dang srin mo dang / /bud med gzugs mi sdug dang 'dris byed bzhin/ /'di ni ba lang bong bu rta dag dang / /
207b4(dkon brtsegs): phag dang khyi dang wa dang rnga mo dang / /glang chen lug rnams kyis kyang bsten pa ste/ /'dod pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spangs/ /'dod sten tshul khrims thos dang gtong ba dang / /dka' thub brtul zhugs rnams ni 'joms pa
207b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ /'di la rtag tu bag med nyes pa 'phel/ /de phyir thar 'dod rtag tu bud med spong / /gal te 'jig rten 'di dag khyed 'dra ba'i/ /mdangs ldan gzugs can dag gis gang gyur kyang / /yon tan gnas pa kho bo'i
207b6(dkon brtsegs): sems gcig kyang / /'dod chags la ni nams kyang rton mi 'gyur/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang / /lha'i bu mo nyi 'od song nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ des ni 'di
207b7(dkon brtsegs): na bu med rnams kyi skyon yang dag / gang lags de dag shin du mthong bar dogs ma mchis/ /ji ltar de yi sems ni yul las log gyur pa/ /de ltar 'dod pa rnams la sems ni chags ma mchis/ /de nas
207b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa'i thad du song nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci zhig don gnyer des pa chos spyod pa/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa de ni rnam dag smros/ /'di yis nyi zla
208a1(dkon brtsegs): 'am ni yang na dbang po'am/ /tshangs pa'am lha rgyal ci zhig khyod slong byed/ /des pas smras pa/ nyi ma zla ba de bzhin brgya byin dang / /tshangs pa'am rgyal po'am 'di na gzhan dag kyang / /'gro ba rgya chen
208a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yod de dag kun/ /gar byed lta bzhin mi rtag mi brtan na/ /mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed/ /gang la skye med rga med 'chi ba med/ /sdug dang mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa'ang med/ /'gro ba grol
208a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes/ /de thob bya phyir sems kyi spyod pa des/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ phan byed khyod kyi tshig la rjes su yi rang ste/ /khyod kyis smon lam btab pa legs par grub gyur cig /bdud
208a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams sder bcas myur du nges par bcom nas ni/ /shAkya seng ge rgyal ltar byang chub thob gyur cig /de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig rnyed nas de 'di snyam
208a5(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu gyur ba 'di bdag gis mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang yin pa de la sbyin gor ma chag go snyam nas de grong bar du song ste/ thams cad
208a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na dbul po su yin pa de la rin po che 'di sbyin no zhes sgra bsgrags pa dang / dbul po mgon med pa la phal po che der 'dus te/ bdag cag dbul po yin gyis bdag cag la byin cig ces 'dzer to/ /des
208a7(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ khyed ni dbul po ma yin gyi/ mnyan yod 'di na ches dbul ba gzhan zhig yod kyis de la sbyin no/ /de dag gis smras pa/ gang yin/ des pas smras pa/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di yin no/ /de dag
208a8(dkon brtsegs): gis smras pa/ khyod de skad ma zer cig /rgyal po gsal rgyal ni phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yin gyi/ bdag cag ni dbul zhing mgon med pa yin no/ /des pas smras pa/ nor mang gis ni ci zhig bya/ /
208b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho la ni klu rnams bzhin/ /gang dag la ni chog med pa/ /ma bsdams de dag dbul po yin/ /gang dag 'dod pa rab 'phel zhing / /ya nga yid ni skye 'gyur ba/ /rmongs pa de dag tshe 'di dang / /pha rol du yang
208b2(dkon brtsegs): dbul por 'gyur/ /de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa skye bo phal po che de dag gis yongs su bskor cing nor bu rin po che de khyer nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi don bya ba'i sa ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal
208b3(dkon brtsegs): po gsal rgyal gyis kyang tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rigs dang ldan pa'i mchog lnga brgya tsam zhig g.yon chung ngu'i phyir bdog pa thams cad phrogs so/ /grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas nor bu rin po che
208b4(dkon brtsegs): de rgyal po la phul te/ rgyal po chen po nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa 'dzam bu gling thams cad ri ba bdag gis rnyed pa 'di la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang
208b5(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de la stsal to snyam mo/ /de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsam te/ khyod ni 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po lags so snyam bgyid kyis/ kye nor bu rin po che 'di bzhes su gsol/ de nas
208b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po gsal rgyal yul yul por gyur cing ngo tsha bar gyur nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa ci nga khyod pas kyang ches dbul lam/ des pas smras pa/ lha de lta lags te/
208b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag pas khyod ches dbul ba lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis dbul/ des pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi 'dod pa rab mang rnam par 'phel zhing longs spyod dag gis
208b8(dkon brtsegs): chog ma 'tshal/ /gnod pa bgyid pa'i slad du rgyal srid 'khrug cing bdag nyid kyang ni 'dor bgyid pa/ /de ni 'di na 'jig rten mi srung yon tan chung ngu dag la mchog tu 'dzin/ /de phyir 'di na de la rtag tu chos 'dod
209a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni dbul po lags par sems/ /gang zhig byams pa rab tu bsgoms te sems can rnams la tha ba ma mchis shing / rtag par rgyun du ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing 'dod pa ma mchis la/ /nyam
209a2(dkon brtsegs): thag mthong na rtag tu snying rje bgyid cing shar gnyer bgyid pa ma mchis pa/ /ni phyug cing nor bzang shin du nor che dad pa la sogs longs spyod gnas/ /gang zhig 'gro ba 'di na dbang phyug rgya chen ldan la chos srung mi bgyid dang / /
209a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig 'di na skye bo dman zhing sdug bsngal gzir pa bzung nas chad pas gcod/ /gang zhig chung ma dag gis mdun bltas dga' zhing 'jig rten pha rol mi lta ba/ /de ni chos srung mi bgyid shin du dbul zhing dman pa'i mi zhes
209a4(dkon brtsegs): rig par bgyi/ /dad pas bsam pa dri ma med cing rab brtan tshul khrims dag la yang dag gnas/ /rtag tu ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod thos pa 'dzin te gtong la dga' ba dang / /shes rab kyis ni mthar phyin blo gros ldan zhing
209a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun la lta bgyid pa/ /de dag rtag tu mi dbul thob cing chos 'dod rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa lags/ /gang dag longs spyod rnams la rab chags bde la dga' zhing gtong ba ma mchis la/ /lus dang srog la
209a6(dkon brtsegs): snying por 'dzin cing rtag par snying po don du mi gnyer dang / /gang dag glang chen myos pa lta bur rtag tu yid myos rnam par rgyu ba dang / /lha cig gang dag dran pa ma mchis de dag dbul ba nyid ni thob pa lags/ /gang dag dkon mchog
209a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dri ma med la gus pa shin du che ba dang / /lus dang srog dang nor rnams las ni rtag tu snying po sgrub pa'i mkhas pa dag /rtag tu mi brkam sdang bar mi bgyid glen pa ma lags rab tu rgyags ma mchis/ /lha
209a8(dkon brtsegs): cig gang dag chos kyis brgyan pa de dag nor che skyes bu dam pa lags/ /lha cig me ni rtag tu nags kyi sban sbun skam po sreg pas chog ma 'tshal/ /lha cig 'di na rgya mtsho chu klung rnams kyi chu 'dzin pas kyang chog ma 'tshal/ /
209b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di na nyi ma zla ba 'di dag mkha' la mthar gyis rgyu bas chog ma 'tshal/ /rgyal po brkam phyir rtag tu longs spyod dag gis chog mi mkhyen pas brlag par 'gyur/ /zhugs ni gum par gyur bas rtswa mang dag gis slar yang 'bar bar
209b2(dkon brtsegs): yod mi bgyid/ /de bzhin mkhas pa shes rab chog par mi 'dzin nyon mongs rnams kyis 'bar mi bgyid/ /chu yi thigs pa bzhin du rgyal srid dag kyang mi brtan 'jig par rab phyogs na/ /gnod pa'i rtsa bar gyur cing dge ba
209b3(dkon brtsegs): 'joms pa'i rgyal srid de ni su zhig 'tshal/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal sems 'khrugs nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa de ltar nga ni dbul la khyod ni phyug par khyod la dpang su yod/
209b4(dkon brtsegs): des pas smras pa/ lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyan yod 'di na bzhugs pa khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas mthong yang ma mthong ngo / /des pas
209b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig tu gyur cing tshad mar gyur ba ste/ de ni bdag gi dpang lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ song la de bzhin gshegs pa de spyan drongs shig dang des ji skad du lung bstan pa de
209b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ngas gzung bar bya'o/ /des pas smras pa/ ston pa de la ngan bu'am/ pho nya gzhan gtang 'os ma lags/ /'dir ni bdag gis bsam bgyis na/ /de mkhyen nas ni gshegs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di 'am pha
209b7(dkon brtsegs): rol la/ /de ni mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'/ /thugs kyis bsam pa mkhyen nas kyang / /'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /de la nga rgyal skyon mi mnga'/ /sems can rnams la
209b8(dkon brtsegs): legs dgongs pas/ /shin du ring du'ang gshegs 'gyur gyis/ /rgyal chen bdag gis gsol ba la/ /da ni legs par thugs ches mdzod/ /gang gis ston pa 'dir gshegs pa'i/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs bgyi bar
210a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ /me tog spos dang me tog phreng / /rgyal mtshan gdugs dang byug pa dang / /sil snyen sta gon mdzod cig dang / /'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur/ /des pas thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /phrag pa gcig
210a2(dkon brtsegs): tu gos gzar 'dug / pus mo sa la btsugs byas nas/ /'di skad du ni tshig kyang smras/ /kun mkhyen bden po gang gis su/ /bdag gis bsam pa mkhyen ce na/ /bden pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid kyis/ /thub pa bdag gi
210a3(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bzhugs/ /de nas tshig 'di smras nas kyang / /sa ni rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /sa gzhi rnam par brtol nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byung bar gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul dag dang ldan pa yi/ /nyan thos lnga brgyas yongs
210a4(dkon brtsegs): su bskor/ /brgya phrag bcu gnyis snyed dag gi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /skyong ba dang ni lha klu dang / /brgya byin tshangs pas mdun gyis bltas/ /de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul mthong nas ni/ /de tshe 'jig rten ngo mtshar
210a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin/ /rgyal po dpung bcas blon por bcas/ /ston pa'i zhabs la 'dud par byed/ der ni srog chags stong dag gis/ /ston pa la ni mchod pa byas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod byas nas/ /byang chub don du yid btud
210a6(dkon brtsegs): do/ /de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod 'di na
210a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khyam zhing mchis mchis pa las nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa zhig rnyed nas de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal to snyam nas de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid
210a8(dkon brtsegs): de/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni thams cad kyi nang nas ches dbul ba ste/ 'di ni pha rol gyi nor 'phrog par bgyid pas na ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /slar zhing don du gnyer bar bgyid pas na chog ma 'tshal ba
210b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /gzhan gyi longs spyod dag gis ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /sdug bsngal ba rnams la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa lags so/ /skyid pa rnams thal mar 'byin pa lags so/ /dbul po rnams rab tu phung bar
210b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa lags so/ /phyug po rnams tshar gcod pa lags so/ /shin du rab tu myos pa lags so/ /rgyal po'i longs spyod rnams dang sred pas rnam par bcings pa lags so/ /snyam nas de la bdag gis stsal na len par
210b3(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid par 'di skad du de ltar nga ni dbul la khyod ni 'byor bar khyod la dpang su yod ces kyang mchi'o/ /de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs snyoms pa/ ngo zlog mi spyod pa mi mnga' ba/ tha ba dang / dri ma dang /
210b4(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba mi mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par lung bstan par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod ni tshe 'di'i rgyal srid kyis dbang phyug gi longs spyod gser dang / nor bu
210b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mu tig dang / bai dU r+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung pu chung dang / bzhon pa dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod thob pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis
210b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag phyug go snyam du sems so/ /rgyal po chen po des pa ni sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / bzod pa dang / des pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / bag yod pa dang /
210b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dang ba dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims
210b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / thos pa dang gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang / sdom pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyug go snyam du sems so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi 'og tu gtogs pa'i sems
211a1(dkon brtsegs): can ji snyed pa de dag 'di ltar khyod dang 'dra bar nor dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag ni des pas gom pa bdun bor ba'i bar gyi tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / bag yod pa'i
211a2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/ /gsal rgyal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa bdag gnas pa
211a3(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag mang du gnas so/ /de nas rgyal po gsal
211a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyis des pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyis glengs pas kho bo'i nga rgyal nges bcom phyir/ /des pa khyod ni kho bo'i ston pa gnyis pa ste/ /rgyal srid 'di kun khyod sbyin kho bo dpung dang bcas/ /khyod kyi slob ma
211a5(dkon brtsegs): yin gyis khyod kyis bdag slobs shig / kho bo yun ring dag tu nga rgyal gyis kyang bslus/ /sdig pa'i grogs po dag gis bskor cing bzung ba las/ /des pa khyod nyid las ni chos 'di thos pas na/ /rab tu bsdams
211a6(dkon brtsegs): te kho bos chos bzhin spyad par bya/ /khyim na gnas pa brgya phrag lnga po 'di dag ni/ /nor gyi ched du kho bos go rar bcug pa ste/ /kho bos thams cad btang gis bde bar 'khod par gyis/ /phyin cad 'di
211a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba dag kho bo yong mi bgyid/ /lnga brgya btang bar gyur ba gang yin de dag kyang / /des pa la ni zhes legs par bskyed nas kyang / /sems ni skyo bar gyur cing ci la'ang mi lta bar/ /bde ba thams cad
211a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam btab/ /nga ni dbul ba ma yin khyod ni dbul po zhes/ /des pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa ste/ /des pa la ni gang zhig dbul po zhes brjod pa/ /mi de rgyal po'i khrims dang
211b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gal bar byed pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu des pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la lta bas chog ma 'tshal ba lags na bcom
211b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de'i slad du ci nas 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don mchis par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'di dag la legs par chos bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des pa rigs kyi
211b3(dkon brtsegs): bu chos bzhi dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / phangs par 'dzin pa dang / gus pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs
211b4(dkon brtsegs): pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong na bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang
211b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni slu bar mi mdzad pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad ston cing cher na rab tu grol bar bya ba'i phyir yang sems de bskyed pa dang /
211b6(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar yang sems de bskyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /gzhan yang
211b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ gzugs dben par mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben par mthong ba dang / khams bzhi nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / skye mched grong stong pa lta bur
211b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa dang / sems can med pa'i phyir sems can rnam par
212a1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir srog rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag med pa'i phyir gang zag rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /gzhan
212a2(dkon brtsegs): yang bzhi ste/ lha'i mig mngon par 'du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi mig kun du sbyong ba dang / chos kyi mig gis so sor rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan rjes su rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin
212a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs
212a4(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'i phyir shes rab kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / de'i rnam par grol ba mthong ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag
212a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ des pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par
212a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar mdzad nas dang pa'i rgyal po ltar 'khor dang bcas te bar snang la gshegs so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rigs kyi bu des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa khyod nam de bzhin
212a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe kho bo la yang sbron cig dang / kho bo yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'gro'o/ /des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de ltar bgyi'o/ /bdag ni khyod bud med dang /
212a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu dang / blon po la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa la gzigs su gshegs par 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gcig pu la phan
212b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor phal che na mdzes so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ des pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gang yin/ des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po yongs su smin
212b2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i slad du sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhan dag kyang byang chub yang dag
212b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can g.yon can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /
212b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po phyir mi zlogs par 'gyur ba'i 'dun pa drag po ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can ser sna can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa ni byang chub
212b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smyin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems
212b6(dkon brtsegs): can gnod sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can le lo can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i brtson
212b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags
212b8(dkon brtsegs): so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can 'chal ba'i shes rab can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la sems
213a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa'i byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po 'khor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying rje ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po chos kyi kun dga'
213a2(dkon brtsegs): la dga' zhing mos pa'i dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba'i btang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems
213a3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
213a4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam pa sna tshogs sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ni byang chub
213a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang mi rtsub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i mi 'phya ba dang 'thing
213a6(dkon brtsegs): slad mi bgyid pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ba'i thos pa'i yo byad sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur
213a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du slob dpon dang mkhan po la gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i thos pa 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal
213a8(dkon brtsegs): po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs
213b1(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can ma dad pa dad par 'gyur ba'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen
213b2(dkon brtsegs): po byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub par 'gyur ba'i bag yod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal
213b3(dkon brtsegs): po la 'os pa'i ras bcos bu zung stong chos la dgab pa'i phyir des pa la byin no/ /des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag la bkur sti dang mchod pa mdzad pas 'tshal to/ /gang gis bdag la 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gos
213b4(dkon brtsegs): ras rul pa'i dum bu brgya btsems pa bdag la mchis kyis bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po dpyid kyi dus na ras rul pa'i dum
213b5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i gos 'di shing gis yal ga la bkal te dgung gcig gam/ dgung gnyis sam/ dgung bcu 'am/ dgung brgyar mchis kyang de la su yang len pa ma mchis shing de la su yang chags pa'i sems skyed pa ma mchis te/ bdag
213b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bor nas mi lta bar mchi ba'i dus de mchis so/ /rgyal po chen po bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ni gang la
213b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur zhing gzhan yang 'dod pa skyed par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos bcang bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ des pa gal te de ltar ras bcos bu zung 'di dag khyod mi len na kho bo la snying
213b8(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba'i phyir rkang pas rdzis shig / des pas lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas ras bcos bu zung de dag la rkang pas brdzis te song ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ des pa ras bcos bu zung khyod kyi rkang pa'i dman mar gyur ba
214a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di rnams ni ji ltar bya/ des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can dbul po gcer bu gos ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la stsol cig /rgyal pos des pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas rgyal po'i mi'i rnams
214a2(dkon brtsegs): la bsgo ste/ de dag gis kyang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du byas so/ /ras bcos bu zung de dag dbul po de dag gis bgos ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag gis des pa la ji ltar lan glan par bya snyam pa las
214a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / des pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis de dag gis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos so/ /'dod pa bzhin du lan ni glan bya ba/ /me tog dang ni spos dang byug pa dang / /zas skom
214a4(dkon brtsegs): nor rnams kyis kyang mi nus te/ /byang chub sems kyis des pa dga' bar 'gyur/ /des pa zas dang gos 'dod ma yin te/ /rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa 'dod ma yin/ /des pa byang chub sems las chos 'dod de/ /byang chub sems
214a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis des pa dga' ba skye/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rigs kyi bu des pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang /
214a6(dkon brtsegs): khye'u dang / bu mo dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir dong ngo / /de nas mnyan yod dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'khor gyi khyams chen po bkra ba blta na
214a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa yangs shing mtho la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'di lta ste dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba lta bu zhig sprul te/ dbus su shing yongs 'du sa brtol sprul to/ /yongs
214a8(dkon brtsegs): 'du sa brtol gyi drung du yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge khri bkra ba blta na sdug cing chu zheng gab pa la lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba mngon par sprul to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stan drug
214b1(dkon brtsegs): khri dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang / lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag khyer nas sil snyan dang / pheg rdob
214b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag byed cing des pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri brgyan par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag 'ong bar thugs su chud nas gtsug lag khang nas byung ste/
214b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od la smras pa/ bzang mo tshur shog /des pa'i g.yog
214b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od kyis lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam dang thabs gcig tu rgyud kyi sgrar sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
214b5(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa/ khyod kyis bskal pa brgyar ni sngan chad dka' thub spyad/ /khyod ni bsdu ba dag dang dul dang sbyin la dgyes/ /khyod kyi sku gsung thugs rnams yongs su dag pa ste/ /srid gsum 'jig rten bla ma la ni bdag
214b6(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal/ /khyod ni tha ba mi mnga' bzod dang byams la dgyes/ /khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyi pha rol gshegs/ /khyod ni bsam gtan blo dang tshul rnams snang la dgyes/ /dri ma gsum gyi nyes pa sel
214b7(dkon brtsegs): la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sel la dgyes/ /khyod kyi thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rje ldan/ /khyod ni yang dag gsung zhing dam pa'i don yang mkhyen/ /srid pa gsum po thar
214b8(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi the tshom sel bar mdzad/ /khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' dag sel/ /khyod ni mthong ba rnams la mchog tu dga' bar mdzad/ /bdag ni rgyal
215a1(dkon brtsegs): la srog gis skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /lha'i bu mo mchog ni 'dod chags chags gyur pa/ /gang gis mthong ba de yang chos la dga' bar 'gyur/ /dga' bas dran pa shin du rgya cher thob 'gyur te/ /
215a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas sdug la 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral bar 'gyur/ /mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis dag gi rgyan rnams kyis/ /legs par brgyan pa gsal ba'i yon tan mchog mnga' ba/ /gsung
215a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog mi yi dam pa gsung ni rnam par dag / mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /'phags pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog phyag mthil sdug /thub pa'i sku stod seng ge'i 'dra zhing glang chen stabs/ /
215a4(dkon brtsegs): smin tshugs legs shing shangs legs tshems snyoms thags bzang mdzes/ /dpal gyi snying po shAkya thub mchog khyed la 'dud/ /rgyal ba yon tan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas gyur pa/ /bde gshegs shin du dga'
215a5(dkon brtsegs): ba skyed mdzad bstod pa yi/ /bsod nams yon tan mtha' yas bsgrubs pa gang lags pa/ /de yis 'dir ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas mnyam gyur cig /de nas rigs kyi bu des pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag gis
215a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rigs kyi bu des pa
215a7(dkon brtsegs): la khri'u stan bzang po bdag nyid kyis byin te 'di la 'dug cig ces byas nas rigs kyi bu des pa khri'u stan bzang po de la 'dug go/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
215a8(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/ /de nas lha'i bu gang dag gis rigs kyi bu des pa sngon ma mthong ba de dag 'di skad du dbul po gos ngan pa gyon pa 'di la 'di lta bur mchod pa byed do zhes 'dzer to/ /de
215b1(dkon brtsegs): nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag 'di la brnyas par ma byed cig /rigs kyi bu 'di yon tan gyi che ba nyid ji snyed pa dang ldan pa de ni kho bo'i mngon sum du gyur to/ /
215b2(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag khyed re shig sdod cig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi bkod pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rigs kyi bu des pas lha'i bu de dag gi bsam pa rtogs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
215b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thabs dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom
215b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od phyung ste/ 'od des des pa'i lus la reg nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ci 'dra ba de las 'bum gyur bas kyang ches lhag par gyur to/ /de nas
215b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de dag ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur te/ des pa la me tog dag gis gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa la bka' stsal pa/ des pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i
215b6(dkon brtsegs): m thu la gnas pa'i tshe yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dman par ston cing dman pa'i mthu la gnas kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mchog tu ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin
215b7(dkon brtsegs): no/ /ye shes la gnas kyang mi shes par ston cing mi shes par ston kyang shes par snang ba 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/ /ye shes ma thob pa rnams la yang lus kyi spyod pa dang / spyod lam gyi dad pa skyed par byed
215b8(dkon brtsegs): cing ye shes thob pa rnams la yang spyod pa thams cad yang dag par ston pas rdzu 'phrul ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/ /rtag tu sems la dbang byed pas ngan cing dbul bar ston kyang tshangs pas kyang mchod
216a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mchog gi bkod pa la gnas kyang skye bo phal gyis kyang mchod pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/ /sems can bsdu ba'i phyir ngan cing dbul bar yang nye bar ston la sems can rnams la mngon par

216a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa/ bzod pa gsum thob pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar byas pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa ste/ ngan cing dbul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ /

216a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa rnams ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ ming ni ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
216a8(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can don la brtson dang brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / /grags pa rgya chen dag gis bsam pa khyab byas dang / /byang chub yon tan gnas pa spyod pa ci 'dra ba/ /ngas ni khyod
216b1(dkon brtsegs): la bshad kyis kun dga' khyod nyon cig / 'di na rgyal mchod mchog phyir ni gus byed cing / /dam pa'i chos ni bsrung phyir rab tu brtson byed pa/ /des pa yi ni spyod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa/ /de dag 'dir ni bgrang bar nus
216b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol phyin pa 'di dag la ni legs par bslabs/ /mngon par shes pa dag gis sngan chad rtse bar byas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyis ni mtha' mar phyin par song / /thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod

216b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa 'am min/ /nam mkha' lta bur bcings dang grol ba med pa yin/ /snying rjer gnas shing sems kyang yongs su skyo ba med/ /shin du bsdams shing nem nur can la byams sems ldan/ /sems can
216b7(dkon brtsegs): kun la bdag dang 'dra bar sdug par lta/ /skyon la mi lta 'khrug pa dag dang ldan ma yin/ /ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa rnams la gnas/ /'di ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod par byed/ /chos nyid la
216b8(dkon brtsegs): ni chos kyi tshul gyis legs par bslabs/ /stong pa nyid la mos shing gnyis las rnam par grol/ /bzod pa gsum thob skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin te/ /sangs rgyas tshul dang yon tan dag la rab tu gnas/ /
217a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'jig rten gang du rgyu ba byed pa na/ /der ni skye bo mang po rnam par grol bar byed/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sras 'di gang du gnas pa der/ /de bzhin gshegs pas yul ni stongs pa ma yin te/ /de la
217a2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus pas/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bzhin du 'di la gus par gyis/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das nas nyams pa'i dus bab tshe/ /des pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod pa spyad nas kyang / /sngon chad gnas
217a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten khams/ /mi 'khrugs 'jig rten nyid du phyir yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /brtan po srog chags rnams la phan par bya ba dang / /zhing gi 'byor pa dag ni yongs su btsal ba dang / /

217a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe yi tshad ni lo khri thub par 'gyur/ /de yi dge 'dun shin du mang ste bgrang las 'das/ /nyan thos theg pa can gyi dge 'dun nyung bar 'gyur/ /phal cher byang chub don du brtson pa byas nas su/ /de dag thams
217a7(dkon brtsegs): cad ye shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /rnam par thar pa rnams dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med/ /gcig tu nges par chos ni legs par bshad rnams kyis/ /'jig rten khams der rtag tu sgra chen sgrogs
217a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /de na bdud rnams med cing srid par chags pa med/ /de dag thams cad yang dag rig cing rnam par dag /bde bar gshegs de yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur nas/ /lo ni brgyad cu dag las bzhi
217b1(dkon brtsegs): lhag rnams su yang / /de yi dam pa'i chos ni rab tu spyod par 'gyur/ /de tshe de yi chos kyi tshul ni 'khrugs pa med/ /des pa de yis gang dag yongs su smin byas pa/ /de dag byang chub bla na med pa'i don du spyod/ /zhing
217b2(dkon brtsegs): der sems can gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams/ /de dag thams cad skyon rnams dang ni bral ba yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa'i lung bstan pa bshad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum

217b7(dkon brtsegs): snyigs ma dang / zhing gi snyigs ma dang / tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'i dus su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas der des pas ji ltar 'dul ba las rnam pa gzhan gyis
217b8(dkon brtsegs): gdul bar mi bya'o/ /kun dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du sangs rgyas kyi 'dul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar mi byed kyi/ kun dga' bo nga ni ngan cing dbul ba dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs
218a1(dkon brtsegs): pas bsdigs pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ /kun dga' bo gal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ngas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis chos bstan cing sangs rgyas kyis yul nye bar bstan du zin na

218a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo sems can dad pa can dang / rtogs pa mang ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dad pa rnyed cing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'

218a6(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya pa las des pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba
218a7(dkon brtsegs): ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa ste

218b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed
218b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zag pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par
218b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba

218b5(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya thams cad kyang / gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe grong
218b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po mnyan yod na khyim bdag dpas byin zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor che ba/ bdag dbang ba mang ba/ nor dang yo byad mang ba/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs mang ba/ glang po che dang /
218b7(dkon brtsegs): rta dang / rnga mo dang / ra lug dang / ba lang mang ba/ bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dU r+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang /
218b8(dkon brtsegs): byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul mang ba zhig gnas pa de khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ /de dag 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe bar skabs su 'di lta bu'i gtam rjod de/ kye grogs po
219a1(dkon brtsegs): dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ mir skye ba rnyed par dka'/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/ rab tu byung ba rnyed
219a2(dkon brtsegs): par dka'/ dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/ nan tan byed pa rnyed par dka'/ sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes la gang dag byas pa chung ngu yang chud mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te de
219a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
219a4(dkon brtsegs): yid ches nas nan tan gyis sgrub pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ 'khor ba las grol ba rnyed par
219a5(dkon brtsegs): dka' na/ ci bdag cag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya 'am/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/ 'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya zhes
219a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thun par 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad de lta bu'i dpyod pa skyes nas bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma yin/
219a7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag dpas byin khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu grong khyer chen po mnyan yod nas byung
219a8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
219b1(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyed don gang gi
219b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhags/ de nas khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
219b3(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dus gcig cig na/ bdag cag khyim
219b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag lnga brgya tsam gcig tu 'dus te mchis par gyur nas de'i tshe bdag cag 'dus te mchis pa thams cad par skabs su 'di lta bu'i mchid rjod pa byung ste/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par
219b5(dkon brtsegs): dka'/ mir skye ba rnyed par dka' dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/ rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka'/ dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/ nan
219b6(dkon brtsegs): tan byed pa rnyed par dka'/ sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes la gang dag byas pa chung ngu yang chud mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin
219b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches nas nan tan gyis sgrub pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang
219b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ 'khor ba las grol ba rnyed par dka' na/ ci bdag cag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya 'am/
220a1(dkon brtsegs): 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/ 'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya zhes bka' mchid bgyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'di lta bu'i
220a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa skyes te/ bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog lags kyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma lags/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma lags pa snyam bgyid de/ bcom
220a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag cag chos kyi skyes 'di dang chas te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med
220a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de
220a5(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag rnams legs so legs so/ /khyim bdag rnams khyed 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag
220a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhags pa khyed yang legs so/ /khyim bdag rnams de'i phyir legs par rab
220a7(dkon brtsegs): tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji ltar bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas
220a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyed la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom
220b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
220b2(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya/ kun tu bsten par bya/ nges par bsten par bya/ bsgom par bya mang du bya'o/ /khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
220b3(dkon brtsegs): lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags par mi bya/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la chags par mi bya/ bzang ba dang btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang /
220b4(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba rnams la chags par mi bya/ yo byad thams cad la chags par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag rnams sems can dag ni phal cher lus dang srog la
220b5(dkon brtsegs): chags par gyur nas sdig pa'i las rnams byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa des ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o/ /sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i
