220b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed de/ lus dang srog la ma chags par byas na bde 'gro rnams su skye'o/ /khyim bdag rnams de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
220b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags par mi bya/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang bu mo rnams
220b8(dkon brtsegs): la chags par mi bya/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la chags par mi bya/ yo byad thams cad la chags par mi
221a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar yongs su btang ba mang ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par bya/ tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par bya/
221a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyis nyes pa byas pa la ji mi snyam par bzod pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs par bya/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po bgo bar bya/ rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis sems
221a3(dkon brtsegs): rtse gcig tu bya/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shes las skyes dang / shed bur lta ba dang bral bas shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas par bya/ des sbyin pa
221a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin na sems can thams cad yid la byas te sbyin pa sbyin par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te bzod pa bsgom par bya/ sems can
221a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yid la byas te brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te shes rab bsgom par bya/
221a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yid la byas te thabs la mkhas pa bslab par bya'o/ /de nas khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
221a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag cag ni lus la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ srog la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ bza' ba dang /
221a8(dkon brtsegs): btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ yo byad thams cad la lta zhing gnas pa lags na/ bcom
221b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor rtog cing lus la mi lta ba lags/ bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar srog la mi lta ba lags/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la mi lta ba
221b2(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la mi lta ba lags/ yo byad thams cad la mi lta ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan
221b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus 'di la rnam pa du mar so sor brtag
221b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /rnam pa du ma gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus 'di mthar gyis grub pa dang / mthar gyis 'jig pa dang / rdul phra rab bsags pa dang / khong stong dang / gye gu can dang / bu ga dgu dang / spu'i khung bu nas zag pa dang / grog
221b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhar ltar sbrul gdug pa'i gnas su gyur ba dang / sbrul gdug pa ltar byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ma skyes dgra'i spre'u ltar grogs la 'khu ba dang / bshes gnyen ngan pa ltar 'drid pa'i bdag nyid can dang / dbu ba rngos
221b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba dang / chu'i chu bur ltar byung nas 'jig cing 'ju ba dang / smin rgyu ltar slu ba'i bdag nyid can dang / chu shing ltar bshig na snying po med pa dang / sgyu ma ltar slu ba'i bdag nyid dang /
221b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ltar bsgo blag mang ba dang / dgra ltar glags lta ba dang / rkun po ltar yid brtan du mi rung ba dang / gshed ma ltar rjes su chags pa med pa dang / mi mdza' ba ltar mi phan par 'dod pa dang / gsod pa ltar shes
221b8(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi srog gi bar chad byed pa dang / phyir rgol ba ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang / grong stong ltar bdag dang bral ba dang / rdza mkhan gyi snod ltar mthar 'jig pa dang / sbyang ltar mi gtsang ba sna
222a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / sbrang ma'i snod ltar mi gtsang ba zag pa dang / sbrul dang mi dang / khyi'i ro ltar dri mi zhim pa dang / ngan skyugs kyi khung bu ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'byung gnas dang / rma ltar bskyod mi
222a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang / zug rngu ltar gnod pa'i bdag nyid can dang / rje bo sdang ba ltar bsnyen par dka' ba dang / khang rnying ltar bcos legs bya zhing bsten pa dang / gru rnying ltar bcos legs bya zhing spyad pa dang / bum pa so ma
222a3(dkon brtsegs): btang ba ltar nan tan gyis bag bya dgos pa dang / grogs po mi srun pa ltar rtag tu rjes su bsrung dgos pa dang / chu 'gram gyi shing ltar g.yo zhing 'gul ba dang / chu klung chen po'i rgyun ltar mthar mchi ba'i rgya mtsho la
222a4(dkon brtsegs): thug pa dang / glo bur pa'i khyim ltar sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnas su gyur ba dang / mgon med pa'i gnas khang ltar yongs su gzung ba med pa dang / btson srungs ltar gsug gis bsgrub par bya ba dang / mtha'
222a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khob kyi grong khyer ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / bye ma'i grong khyer ltar rtag tu 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can dang / me ltar chog mi shes pa dang / rgya mtsho ltar dgang dka' ba dang / sbrul gyi gzeb ltar nan
222a6(dkon brtsegs): tan gyis bag bya ba dang / byis pa chung ngu ltar rtag tu yongs su bskyang dgos pa dang / snod chag pa ltar rtag tu bag bya dgos pa dang / yul ngan pa ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / zas dug cag ltar rtag
222a7(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / re shig dgos pa'i phyir snod bsnyan ma lta bu dang / khur bkur ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu yin pa 'ba' shig blos gzung bar bya'o/ /khyim bdag rnams gzhan yang byang chub sems
222a8(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus 'di thog ma dang tha ma'i rgyu la so sor brtag par bya'o/ /pha ma'i khu chu dang khrag 'dus pa las 'byung ste/ 'di la khu chu dang khrag ni lus kyi thog ma'i rgyu yin no/ /tha ma'i rgyu ni zas 'ju ba la sogs
222b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ kham gyis bza' ba'i zas zos ma thag tu bad kan gyi gnas su 'gro'o/ /bad kan gyi gnas su phyin nas bad kan gyis rkyang rkyang por byas te shin du mi gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu mkhris pa'i gnas su 'gro
222b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ mkhris pa'i gnas su phyin nas zhu zhing skyur por gyur te/ rlung gi gnas su 'gro'o/ /zhu ste rlung gi gnas su phyin nas rlung gis tshigs ma logs shig /dngas ma logs shig tu rnam par 'byed de/ tshigs ma las gcin dang /
222b3(dkon brtsegs): ngan skyugs la sogs te dri ma rnams 'byung / dngas ma las ni khrag tu 'gyur te/ khrag las sha'o/ sha las tshil lo/ tshil las rus pa'o/ /rus pa las rkang ngo / /rkang las khu chu'o/ /khu chu las 'di ste/ de ltar thog ma
222b4(dkon brtsegs): dang tha ma'i rgyu mi gtsang ba'i phyir lus mi gtsang bar byang chub sems dpas bsam par bya'o/ /lus la mi gtsang bar lta ba na byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/ lus shes bya ba 'di ni rus pa sum brgya
222b5(dkon brtsegs): drug bcus khog pa bslang pa/ shing ngan pa'i khyim ltar tshigs sum brgyas sbyar ba/ rtsa'i dra ba bzhi brgyas glags pa/ sha sbar tshang lnga brgyas g.yogs pa/ sdom rtsa drug gis khebs pa/ rtsa bdun brgyas gang ba/ rgyus
222b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bdun brgyas 'brel ba/ chu ba bcu drug gis brten pa/ chu ba gnyis kyis khyab par dkris pa/ rgyu ma mdom phyed dang bzhis nang khrol byas pa/ long ka dang pho ba dang / 'brel ba'i gnye ma rim pa bcu drug tu 'khyil ba/ rtsa
222b7(dkon brtsegs): phran nyis stong lnga brgyas skar khung byas pa/ gshis brgya rtsa bdun gyis snod chag pa ltar shig shig por gyur pa/ spu'i khung bu bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad bcus rtsa ltar khebs pa/ dbang po lnga'i bu ga dgu yod pa/
222b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas bdun dang ldan pa/ mi gtsang bas yongs su gang ba/ glad pa snyim pa gang dang / tshil snyim pa gang dang / zhag snyim pa gsum dang / bad kan snyim pa drug dang / mkhris pa snyim pa drug dang / rlung gis mtha' dag drangs pa
223a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / khrag bre gang dang / ngan skyugs phul gang dang / de dag thams cad kyis bang ba bar chad can ltar so sor yongs su gang ba/ lpags pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ ro bro ba drug gis gso ba/ lus
223a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi me la ngan skyugs kyi sbyin sreg byed pa/ rtag tu mthar 'dzag pa/ lus kyi yan lag de dag thams cad kyis blta na mi sdug pa/ dri nga ba/ rnag gi rang bzhin yin na 'di la su zhig gus par byed de/ skad cig dgos pa'i phyir snod
223a3(dkon brtsegs): brnyan ma tsam du zad pa dang / khur bskur ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu 'ba' shig yin par chos kyi blos gzung bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang phung po'i lus la ni/ /gzugs mngon nga rgyal can gang gus
223a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ /byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du/ /mi shes ngan skyugs bum pa thogs shing 'gro/ /de yi sna nas rnag gi rnam pa 'dzag /kha nas dri mi zhim pa rtag tu 'byung / /mig rdul chags shing skye bo srin bu can/ /de la
223a5(dkon brtsegs): su zhig chags shing gus par byed/ /dper na byis pa sol ba thogs nas su/ /'di ni dkar por bya zhes 'dar byed kyang / /dkar po'i dngos por mi 'gyur zad par 'gyur/ /byis blo phyin ci log gi nga rgyal can/ /de ltar
223a6(dkon brtsegs): mi gang gtsang sbra'i blo gros can/ /nga yis lus 'di gtsang mar bya zhes te/ /bskus phyis 'bab stegs brgyar ni khrus byas kyang / /'chi bdag dbang gis zad 'gyur gtsang mi 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
223a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
223a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhis lus la brtag par bya ste/ rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus yid
223b1(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'ong ba dang / rang bzhin gyis mi mthun pa ste/ smad par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rnag zag pa ste/ dri mi zhim par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mthar 'jig pa ste/ snying po med par brtag
223b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rgyus pa'i bog res sbrel ba ste/ nyam chung bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mi gtsang ba zag pa ste/ mi gtsang bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus yang dag pa
223b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus skye bo mi mkhas pa byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'khrug par byed par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'jig pa dang / bu ga dgu'i sgo
223b4(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dzag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus zhe sdang gi mes tshig par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
223b5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi mes me lce gcig tu gyur bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis ldongs par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi
223b6(dkon brtsegs): dra bas khebs shing sred pa'i dra bar chud par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus kun nas bu gas yongs su gang bas bu ga'i gnas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gtses
223b7(dkon brtsegs): par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'chi ba'i chos nyid yin pas mi rtag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems
223b8(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus chos la rmongs pas bems po yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mthar gyis 'grub cing tha mar 'jig pas bum pa lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mya ngan gyi gnod pa
224a1(dkon brtsegs): mang pos gang bas nyam thag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar rga shir 'gyur bas rton pa med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus g.yo dang sgyu'i nye bar spyod pa dag gis
224a2(dkon brtsegs): glags par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus dgang dka' ba lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus dga' ba'i gzugs dang / bde ba'i gzugs la zhen pas me lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub
224a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis chog mi shes par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dag gis 'joms par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas
224a4(dkon brtsegs): lus sti stang dang gnod pa myong bas mi brtan par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus chu klung gi rgyun bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan 'byung bas rkyen gzhan dang gzhan du brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tshul bzhin ma yin pa
224a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis yid kyi sems pa yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar dur khrod la thug pas byas pa mi gzo bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas
224a6(dkon brtsegs): lus spyang ki dang / lce spyang dang / khyi rjen sha za ba dag gi zas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rus pa dang / rgyus pa'i bog res sbrel bas 'khrul 'khor lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
224a7(dkon brtsegs): bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mchil ma dang / snabs dang / rnag dang / khrag gis yongs su gang ba ste/ blta ba'i 'os ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus zas dang skom las byung ba ste/ rang gi kha na las
224a8(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mi rtag pa ste/ shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid yin pas don med pa'i glags pas glags par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bas
224b1(dkon brtsegs): dgra lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus yang dang yang du sdug bsngal myong bas gsod pa lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus sdug bsngal gsum gyis gtses te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di
224b2(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis te sdug bsngal gyi snod yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phung po lnga mngon par grub pas sdug bsngal gyi gong bu yin par
224b3(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rkyen tha dad pa las byung bas bdag med pa dang / bdag po med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus skyes pa dang / bud med dang bral bas srog med par brtag par
224b4(dkon brtsegs): bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyis stong par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rmi lam lta bu ste/ gsog tu brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus sgyu ma lta
224b5(dkon brtsegs): bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus smig rgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul par byed par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus brag cha lta bu ste/ slu bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
224b6(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yor lta bu ste/ slu ba'i bdag nyid du brtag par bya ste/ khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gis lus la brtag par bya'o/ /de ltar rtog pa'i byang
224b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus la lus su 'dun pa dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus bdag gir byed pa dang / lus la sred pa dang / lus la gnas pa dang / lus la zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams
224b8(dkon brtsegs): cad spong ngo / /srog la srog tu 'dun pa dang / srog la dga' ba dang / srog bdag gir byed pa dang / srog la sred pa dang / srog la gnas pa dang / srog la zhen pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang /
225a1(dkon brtsegs): chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams dang / yo byad thams cad kyi bar dag la
225a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa dang / dga' ba dang / bdag gir byed pa dang / sred pa dang / gnas pa dang / zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ste/ de lus dang srog la mi lta'o/ /de bzhin nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu
225a3(dkon brtsegs): mo dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo pa dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la mi lta bar pha rol tu phyin pa drug myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
225a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
225a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis lus rgya cher yongs su bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /mi rnyed shin du rnyed dka' rnyed pa la/ /lus kyi phyir ni sdig pa ma byed cig /'di ni dur khrod pa ste lce spyang
225a6(dkon brtsegs): zas/ /lus kyi phyir ni ya ngar ma 'jug cig /g.yo ldan lus la sred pa bskyed nas ni/ /byis pa rtag tu rnam par rmongs te 'khyam/ /lus 'di byas pa mi gzo dngos yin pas/ /nyin dang mtshan du sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /
225a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu nang 'dra sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor te/ /lus 'di ngan skyugs rnams dang mchil mas gang / /bkres dang skom pas rtag tu mngon par gtses/ /mkhas pa su zhig lus la sred pa skyed/ /lus ni sa gting 'dra
225a8(dkon brtsegs): ste chog mi shes/ /gshed ma mi mdza' 'dra yang byis pas gos/ /lus kyi ched du sdig pa'i las kyang byed/ /de phyir de dag sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /lus 'di rdo rje lta bur sra ma yin/ /lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed
225b1(dkon brtsegs): cig / 'chi bar rtogs nas bsod nams myur du byos/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa skyed/ /zas dang skom dang byug pa gos rnams kyis/ /lus 'di ji srid yun ring bsnyen bkur te/ /brtan par byas kyang 'jig
225b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur yin na/ /'di la 'bad pa don med ci phyir bya/ /bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /thub pa'i 'byung 'di khyer kyis rnyed pa la/ /sangs rgyas bstan la de bzhin dad pa skyed/ /shin du 'jigs
225b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngan gror ma 'gro shig / lo stong bye bar su zhig 'tsho gyur pa/ /des kyang chags pa yongs su spang bya na/ /su zhig lo brgya thub par mi 'gyur ba/ /de phyir dga' ba mi rnyed smos ci dgos/ /ma bsdams mi rnams kha cig
225b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du/ /mir rnyed shin tu dka' ba rnyed pa la/ /gzhon tshe rtse mo dag dang dga' bya zhing / /nor btsal bde ba myong bar bya zhes zer/ /nor tshol ba la bde ba ga la yod/ /bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /
225b5(dkon brtsegs): de phyir mkhas pas chags pa yongs spangs la/ /ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos/ /longs spyod sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs/ /'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'drid pa yin/ /skad cig 'byung zhing skad cig 'jig
225b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa su zhig longs spyod srid pa skyed/ /sgyu ma 'dra zhing gar mkhan lta dang mtshungs/ /dri za'i grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba/ /longs spyod de dag 'di 'dra byis pa 'drid/ /de ltar log pa tshol zhing byis pa
225b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khyam/ /sdug bsngal brgya yis longs spyod btsal btsal ba/ /lus la gnod pa mtshungs med bskyed byas nas/ /rgyal po'i mthu yis de dag phrogs gyur pa/ /de dag la ni mkhas gang dga' ba skyed/ /bu dang chung ma'i
225b8(dkon brtsegs): dbang du mi 'gyur bar/ /rgyal pos nyes pa byung ba'i nor phrogs pa/ /nyes pa de dag 'di 'dra rig nas su/ /mkhas pa rnams ni khyim la srid mi skyed/ /rtag tu brnab cing longs spyod tshol byed pa/ /de ni pha dang ma la mi gus
226a1(dkon brtsegs): shing / /bu dang chung ma rnams la mi byams par/ /de dag rtag tu chags la 'jug par byed/ /bdag gi longs spyod 'grib par 'gyur 'ong zhes/ /brnab mo byas gzo nams kyang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /g.yo dang sgyus
226a2(dkon brtsegs): ni nor rnams tshol byed pa/ /brnab mo dag la mkhas pa yid mi rton/ /sems can brnab mo g.yo ldan 'drid pa nyid/ /yid gzhan sems la tshig gis dga' bar byed/ /yid brtan kyang ni de la yid mi rton/ /'on kyang bu
226a3(dkon brtsegs): 'drar sdug par ston par byed/ /sems can brnab mo 'jig rten gang rgyu ba/ /sman dang bstan bcos dag la mkhas ston cing / /smad 'tshong lta bur tshig gis 'drid byed la/ /khong nas mi bde shin du rtsub pa yin/ /brnab mo
226a4(dkon brtsegs): dag la mdza' bo nams kyang med/ /nye du med cing snying slebs grogs kyang med/ /'on kyang de dag nor phyir sten par byed/ /skye bo brnab la mkhas pa yid mi rton/ /brnab mo longs spyod ched du bya min byed/ /shin tu mi bzad sems
226a5(dkon brtsegs): ni kun tu skyed/ /de phyir mkhas pas yang dag rtogs byas la/ /ngan ngon ci yang rung bas chog shes gyis/ /gser dang mu tig nor bu byi ru dang / /las dges de dag lbu ba las kyang 'byung / /de dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas/ /
226a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag phyir ni 'thab cing rtsod pa byed/ /byams pa zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'byung ba'i tshe/ /sa 'di gser gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ /de yi tshe na de ni ga las 'byung / /'dod pa'i yon
226a7(dkon brtsegs): tan lnga dag 'byung ba ste/ /brdzun pa'i chos can 'khrul byed rmongs par byed/ /dper na sos ka'i nyi ma gung dus na/ /smig rgyu chur snang 'dod pa de bzhin no/ /bskal pa gcig lon nas ni 'jig rten 'di/ /nam mkha'i rang
226a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nam mkhar 'gyur bar 'ong / /lhun po dag kyang 'tshig cing rnam par 'jig /de dag gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro/ /chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho rnams/ /de dag med 'gyur skams 'gyur 'byung bar
226b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'dod pa gsog ste snying po med/ /mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed/ /mkhas pa gang dag blo yi stobs ldan pa/ /de dag rtag tu khyim gyi skyon la rtog /'di la ro myong byed pa su yod na/ /'di dag ci phyir khyim ni spong mi
226b2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /'dren ma'i las kyis longs spyod tshol byed cing / /bu dang de bzhin chung ma gso bar byed/ /shin tu sdug bsngal gyur ba de dus na/ /bu dang chung ma skyabs su 'gyur ma yin/ /ji ltar sna tshogs las byas blangs pa bzhin/ /
226b3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang chung ma dag kyang 'dor bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid gcig pus sdug bsngal myong bar 'ong / /de dag de tshe bdag gi skal mi len/ /mya ngan rnams kyis bde phyir de dag blangs/ /'di na de dag sdug bsngal mya ngan 'gyur/ /srid
226b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum 'jigs pa 'di na bshes kyang med/ /de bzhin bu dang chung ma rtsa lag med/ /pha ma spun dang bu dang chung ma dang / /bran dang nor dang rtsa lag tshogs kyi rnams/ /shi ba'i gshin phyir de dag 'gro ba med/ /las rnams rjes
226b5(dkon brtsegs): su 'brang zhing byes pa 'gro/ /las ni rjes su 'brang zhing mi kun 'dong / /las kyis gnas pa 'jig rten rnam par rgyu/ /skye 'di las kyi bdag nyid rig gyur nas/ /mkhas pa dag ni dge ba'i las rnams byed/ /mnar med song
226b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe de dag skyabs min pas/ /pha ma spun dang snying sdug bu rnams dang / /rtsa lag nye du snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / /de dag ched du mkhas pa sdig mi byed/ /las de yongs su zad pa ma gtogs par/ /rab tu mi bzang
226b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs las mi mi 'grol/ /de phyir sdig pas 'jigs pa'i mi rnams kyis/ /bsgrims te sdig pa yongs su spang bar bya/ /ji ltar las rnams byas pa ma gtogs par/ /gshin rje dang ni gshin rje'i rang rta dang / /mdza'
226b8(dkon brtsegs): bshes dag dang rtsa lag tshogs dang spun/ /pha ma bu dang chung ma srung mi byed/ /khyod kyis mi yi lus ni thob gyur la/ /thob nas sdig pa spang ba ma byas pas/ /kye ma da ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong / /'di ni mi dge'i
227a1(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam smin yin/ /las kyi rnam par smin la yid ma ches/ /khyod ni rang gi sems kyis mi dge byas/ /'di la ngas ni ci yang ma lan zhes/ /de la chos rgyal gshin rje de skad smra/ /rang gis las byas rang la rnam par smin/ /
227a2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi las kyis khyod ni 'dir 'ongs kyis/ /ji ltar sngon chad mi 'dod las byas pa/ /sdug bsngal de ni nyid kyis myong bar gyis/ /de tshe pha ma rang gi chung ma rnams/ /sdug bsngal nyen pa yongs su thar mi byed/ /legs pa'i las byas
227a3(dkon brtsegs): pas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de ltar khyim ni yongs su spang bar bya/ /khu sgo dbyug pa ltung gi chad pa rnams/ /su zhig spong 'dod zhi ba don gnyer bas/ /khyim la 'jigs par gyis te spang byos la/ /'jig rten mkhas pa'i
227a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan la chos spyod cig / khyim ni rab 'bar sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa/ /sems las byung ba rnams kyis rtag tu 'bar/ /me mur 'obs 'dra 'jigs par byed pa la/ /mkhas pa su zhig de la sred pa skyed/ /khyim gnas
227a5(dkon brtsegs): bu dang chung ma'i mya ngan byed/ /khyim gnas de bzhin longs spyod mya ngan byed/ /nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang dpag med de/ /de ltas khyim ni yongs su spang bar bya/ /'dren pa rnams kyi bstan la dga' byed pa/ /ma btab ma rmos
227a6(dkon brtsegs): bde dang yid bde'i rgyu/ /sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyim 'di la/ /blun po dga' yi mkhas pa gzhar mi dga'/ /lpags pa chu rgyus sha dang rus pa'i lus/ /'di ni nga'i chung ma 'du shes bskyed/ /byis pa rmongs pa 'dod chags
227a7(dkon brtsegs): skyed par byed/ /bud med sgyu ma lta bur yong ma shes/ /shes rab ldan pas khyim gyi nyes rig nas/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun spangs te/ /chos la sman gyi 'du shes gzhag byas nas/ /ma chags khyim nas myur
227a8(dkon brtsegs): du 'byung bar byed/ /de nas khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de dag bzod pa thob nas mchog tu dga'
227b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mgu bar gyur te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sangs rgyas chos la 'dod gyur nas/ /gang dag gis ni sems bskyed pa/ /kye ma rnyed pa rnyed pa che/ /'di ni rnyed pa kun gyi mchog /byang chub sems ni dga' ba ste/ /
227b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bde bgyid pa'i/ /sems 'dir su dag dga' skyed pa/ /de dag 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho/ /sems can kun la phan bgyid pa'i/ /sems 'di gang dag bskyed gyur pa/ /de dag sems can thams cad dga'/ /de dag mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ /
227b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems la su dga' ba/ /de dag lus ni gser 'dra zhing / /mtshan gyis shin du spras pa dang / /'jig rten snang bar byed par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni sems che ste/ /sems kun nang na dge ba mchog /yon tan thams
227b4(dkon brtsegs): cad phun sum tshogs/ /nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid/ /sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams/ /byang chub sems ni 'dod mi bgyid/ /'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa/ /byang chub sems kyis skyo bar 'gyur/ /byang chub
227b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi bsod nams gang / /de la gal te gzugs mchis na/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/ /de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis/ /rin chen dag
227b6(dkon brtsegs): gis rab bkang ste/ /'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/ /gang gis thal mo sbyar bgyis te/ /byang chub tu ni sems btud na/ /mchod pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags/ /de la mtha' ni ma mchis so/ /byang chub sems ni ci 'dra
227b7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ /drang srong mchog gis bstan mdzad pa'i/ /de 'dra'i mchod pa gzhan ma mchis/ /dpal yang gzhan ni mchis ma lags/ /sman gyi dam pa nang ma mchis/ /byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan/ /nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid/ /
227b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid/ /me gsum dag gis gdungs pa yi/ /sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/ /bskal pa dpag tu med par spyod/ /mkhas rnams skyo bar yod mi 'gyur/ /gang dag byang chub spyad spyod
228a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /dpa' bo sman pa'i rgyal po 'dra/ /de dag sems can sdug bsngal skyob/ /skyo ba rtag tu rnam par spangs/ /dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos 'tshal ba/ /'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du/ /sems de 'dor bar mi bgyid
228a2(dkon brtsegs): cing / /de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston/ /sems 'di la ni gang dga' ba/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /sangs rgyas ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur/ /bdag cag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum
228a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma
228a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag ste/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig
228a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste nyi zla rnams kyi gzi brjid zad par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
228a6(dkon brtsegs): bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
228a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/
228a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to/ /rgyu ma mchis par rnam 'dren rgyal ba mchog /sangs rgyas skyob pa 'dzum pa mi ston na/ /ci slad bcom ldan khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'jig rten phan dgongs
228b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs brtse bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyis ci slad de ring 'dzum bstan gsungs/ /bka' mchid che ldan nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ /dbul po gyur ba nor dang ldan par mdzod/ /'jig rten ldongs la myur du mig
228b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang stsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
228b3(dkon brtsegs): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du lhags pa'i khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
228b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par
228b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dag ste/ khyim bdag 'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas nam du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing phyis
228b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong nas mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed de sti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par
228b7(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur/ rim 'gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed de sti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun
228b8(dkon brtsegs): par byed par 'gyur/ rim 'gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/
229a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lnga na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
229a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
229a3(dkon brtsegs): bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'di ltar rgya che ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar
229a4(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig /dpas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar
229a5(dkon brtsegs): yang zung shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin
229a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las khyim bdag
229a7(dkon brtsegs): dpas byin gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar
229a8(dkon brtsegs): chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu dgu pa ste bad sa'i rgyal po 'char
229b1(dkon brtsegs): byed kyis zhus pa/ bam po gcig pa/ @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya u da ya na bad sa rA dzA pa ri pri ts+tshA nA ma pa ri bar ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u/
229b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das kau sham+bI na/ dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong
229b3(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na ma du'i bu mo btsun mo dpe med phrag dog dang / ser snas zin pas btsun mo sngo sangs
229b4(dkon brtsegs): can la lhag par dmigs nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ btsun mo sngo sangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya ni dge sbyong gau ta ma dang lhan cig tu rab tu skyon chags par bgyid
229b5(dkon brtsegs): de/ de'i slad du bdag gis lha la gsol ba lags kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du mdzad du gsol zhes brdzun gyi tshig gis dbyen byas par gyur to/ /de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed ma du'i bu mo btsun
229b6(dkon brtsegs): mo dpe med kyis dbyen byas pas bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la tha ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / khro ba skyes par gyur to/ /de yi ma rangs shing khro ba dang / rngam pas zil gyis non pas btsun
229b7(dkon brtsegs): mo sngo sangs can gsad pa'i phyir gzhu bdungs nas mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma blangs te 'phangs so/ /de nas de'i mod la btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
229b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas shing bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa brjod nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus
230a1(dkon brtsegs): mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma de de nas phyir log ste/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed de nyid kyi mgo'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched de 'bar zhing me lce gcig
230a2(dkon brtsegs): tu gyur te phar 'gro tshur 'gro zhing 'dug 'dug nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed ga la ba der song nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyi g.yon rol logs su 'dug par gyur te/ de lus la ni ma phog go/ /lan gnyis
230a3(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum du de ltar gyur ba dang / de nas btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po de lta lags pas gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
230a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal na khyod la yang bde legs su 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed 'jigs shing dngangs la sgyid lug cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur te sa la 'gyel nas btsun mo sngos sangs can la
230a5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni lha mo 'am dri za mo/ /sha za mo 'am srin mo 'am/ /ngas ni ji ltar gzung bar bya/ /nga yis dris pa de smros shig /gang la mtshon gyis mi gnod pa'i/ /bud med 'ga'
230a6(dkon brtsegs): yang yod min te/ /ngas ni 'di la gang du yang / /thos sam mthong ngam shes pa'ang med/ /nga ni stobs ldan brtson 'grus can/ /'phong gi shes pa legs bslabs pas/ /nga yi mda' ni gdon mi za/ /nam yang
230a7(dkon brtsegs): mi phog yod min te/ /spre'u 'am yang na bya dang ni/ /mi 'am yang na 'ben kyang rung / /gang la nga yis mda' 'phangs pa/ /nam yang mi phog yod min na/ /de ring mda' 'di 'phangs pa ni/ /bzlog pa'i tshul du phyir
230a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs te/ /lus la gnod pa med par ni/ /nga yi mdun du 'dug par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi tshig ni mnyan nas kyang / /nga ni khyod la bsod 'dod pa/ /nga ni khyod la skyabs su 'gro/ /sdug bsngal gyur ba nga la skyobs/ /
230b1(dkon brtsegs): phyin cad 'di 'dra mi byed kyis/ /sdug bsngal ba la deng bzod gyis/ /khyod sngon dga' ba dran byos la/ /dang bar gyis shig khro thul cig /de nas btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char
230b2(dkon brtsegs): byed la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni lha min dri za min/ /sha za mo min srin mo min/ /bdag ni btsun mo sngo sangs can/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nyan thos ma/ /lha khyod la ni snying brtse
230b3(dkon brtsegs): bas/ /bdag gi sems ni mnyam bzhag gis/ /khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la/ /thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ /gang gis byams pa legs bsgoms
230b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ /byams la gnas pa'i skyes bu dang / /bud med dag ni mi song gsungs/ /gang zhig lo tog smin pa la/ /ser ltar yang dag ji bzhin mkhyen/ /bud med rnams kyis gnod med pa/ /de yi bstan la
230b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dga' lags/ /'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyis/ /bud med rnams ni smad par gsungs/ /bud med rnams la mi lta ba/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsngags/ /sangs rgyas
230b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang rang sangs rgyas/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnams/ /bud med bsten par mi mdzad de/ /de ni byis pa'i spyod yul lags/ /bud med rnams la bsten pa ni/ /kun nas bdud kyi
230b7(dkon brtsegs): zhags par gsungs/ /sdigs pa rnams la chags pa ni/ /kun 'joms dkrugs pa'i shul dang 'dra/ /mi mkhas bud med chags pa dang / /sdig pa'i las ni bgyis pa dang / /ye shes spong bar 'tshal
230b8(dkon brtsegs): ba yis/ /sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror khrid/ /mkhas pa thar par 'tshal ba yis/ /bud med bsten par mi bgyi ste/ /zhugs gtam du ba ma mchis pa'i/ /dong du mchongs pa mi dong lags/ /yid 'ong bka' mchis bgyis
231a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /bltas pas kyang ni 'ching bgyid cing / /mi bzad dmyal bar ltung bas na/ /khyod ni bud med tshig ma gsan/ /bdag ni khro ba ma mchis te/ /bdag gi yid ni rab tu dang / /khyab bdag 'jig rten
231a2(dkon brtsegs): mgon po la/ /thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod/ /rgyal po chen po bzhud mdzod de/ /khyod kyis rkang gnyis mchog gzigs la/ /de yis chos ni gang bstan pa/ /g.yel ma mchis par khyod kyi gson/ /de nas bad
231a3(dkon brtsegs): sa'i rgyal po 'char byed btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bskul bas rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po ches yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas brtad cing myur ba
231a4(dkon brtsegs): myur bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dang bar 'gyur pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas kyi mchog dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ bsam gtan
231a5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa rnams kyi pha rol du gshegs pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me lhan ne lhang nge ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par
231a6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
231a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas pa mthong bar gyur to/ /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
231a8(dkon brtsegs): la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon ma mthong ba'i rmad du byung ba zhig mthong ba bcom ldan 'das la gsol bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
231b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la skabs dbye bar ci gnang / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig /
231b2(dkon brtsegs): zlos shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pas deng ma du'i bu mo dpe
231b3(dkon brtsegs): med kyi tshig gis khros shing rngam pas zil gyis non nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems kyang bskyed/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo sangs can dgum
231b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma zhig 'phangs na/ de bar snang la 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched de 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur nas bzlog pa'i tshul du slar log ste bdag gi g.yon rol logs su mchis
231b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cing lus la ni ma phog nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo sangs can gyi sug pa rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ mchis brang sngo sangs can la 'di skad du khyod lha mo zhig gam 'on te klu
231b6(dkon brtsegs): mo 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ srin mo 'am/ su zhig lags shes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha mo yang ma lags/ klu mo yang ma lags/ dri za mo yang ma lags/ sha za
231b7(dkon brtsegs): mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma lags te/ khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i slad du sems
231b8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bzhag pa lags so zhes mchi nas/ de nas mchis brang sngo sangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngag pa rnam grangs du mas brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das
232a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma 'di yang de lta bu'i snying rje'i bsam pa dang / de lta bu'i byams pa thob pa dang / de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
232a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mthu che ba dang / de ltar dbang che bar grags pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam du sems par gyur lags te/
232a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di ltar byis pa lta bu dang / 'di ltar rmongs pa dang / 'di ltar mi gsal ba dang / 'di ltar mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bdag gis tha ba dang zhe sdang
232a4(dkon brtsegs): gi sems bskyed pa de bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol zhing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun du yang nongs pa 'chags shing mchis na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis nongs pa nongs par bshags pa de bcom ldan
232a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis legs par rjes su gzung bar gsol/ deng slan chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po khyod longs la rang gi stan gang yin pa la 'dug shig ces bad sa'i rgyal po
232a6(dkon brtsegs): 'char byed kyis nyes pa bshags pa rjes su gzung bar gnang ngo / /de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig
232a7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gtum zhing gzu lums che la drag shul can lags pas bdag gis bud med
232a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig gis sdig pa'i sug las mngon par 'dus bgyis pa des bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar bdag gis yang dag par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du
232b1(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang bdag slan chad bud med kyi dbang du mchis nas sdig pa'i sug las mngon par 'du bgyid par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad la yun ring po'i don dang
232b2(dkon brtsegs): sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyi skyon de dag legs par yang dag par rab tu bshad cing bud med kyi spyod pa rnams dang / bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi sgyu rnams
232b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bu med kyi g.yo rnams dang / bud med kyi gya gyu rnams dang / bud med kyi mi brtan pa rnams dang / bud med kyi 'gyur ldog rnams dang / bud med kyi sten pa rnams dang / bud med kyi tshig rnams dang / bud med kyi 'khrul
232b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams yang dag par rab tu bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po gnas de lta bu yongs
232b5(dkon brtsegs): su zhus pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bcom ldan 'das bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bud med kyi dbang du mchis par gyur na bud med ni ma rungs
232b6(dkon brtsegs): ma/ 'khon can/ gtum mo drag shul can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bud med de ni bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar bgyid 'tshal ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das las bdag don de nyid nyan par
232b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis je rang gi skyon rnams yongs su rtogs shig dang /
232b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas phyis bud med kyi skyon rnams yongs su rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs
233a1(dkon brtsegs): so legs so/ /skyes pa skyon ji lta bu dag dang ldan na skyes pa bud med kyi dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyon rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la yang dag par rab tu bshad du gsol/
233a2(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod
233a3(dkon brtsegs): la bshad par bya'o/ /bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal
233a4(dkon brtsegs): po chen po skyes pa skyon gang dag dang ldan na skyes ba bud med kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon ni bzhi po 'di dag yin no/ /bzhi po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po 'di la skyes pa 'dod
233a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la chags par gyu cing / de 'dod pa rnams la bag med par gyur nas phyir zhing bud med la lta 'dod de/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze
233a6(dkon brtsegs): dag la lta bar mi 'dod cing / des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag mthong na bsnyen par mi byed/ bsten par mi byed/ bsnyen bkur mi byed pas
233a7(dkon brtsegs): de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis yongs su spangs pas dad pa las yongs su nyams/ tshul khrims las yongs su nyams/ gtong ba
233a8(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su nyams/ shes rab las yongs su nyams shing dad pa dang bral ba/ tshul khrims 'chal ba/ thos pa nyung ba/ ser sna can du gyur pa/ yi dags kyi yon tan gyi chos la kun tu spyod pa/ shes rab
233b1(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa/ rma la chags pa/ btsog pa'i spyod yul can/ bshul bar mnam pa la mngon par dga' ba/ mi gtsang ba la dga' ba/ bud med la dad che ba/ zhi ba yongs su mi tshol ba chags pa'i spyod yul can/ 'gro bar bya
233b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin par song ba/ smad par 'os pa/ mi gtsang ba'i srin bu dang 'dra ba/ snyigs ma len pa/ 'dod pa la brkam pa/ khrel dang ngo tsha bor ba/ lha dang mi'i chos las nyams pa/ ngan par smad pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho ba/
233b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas smad pa/ byis pa'i skye bo la sten pa/ sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po la sten pa/ sdig pa la kun tu 'jug pa/ sdig pa la gzhol ba/ bud med kyi thul 'og tu chud pa bud med
233b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'khol ba/ bud med kyi dbang du song ba bud med la gzhol ba/ bud med dang gnas pa/ rma'i sgo'i spyod yul can/ rma'i sgo la sten pa/ rma'i sgo la gnas pa/ kha chu dang / snabs dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang /
233b5(dkon brtsegs): rnag dang / she'u rul dang / glad rgyas dang / mi gtsang ba'i spyod yul can/ lug dang / ba lang dang / bya gag dang / khyi dang / phag pa dang / wa dang / bong bu'i chos spyod pa/ gnod pas 'tsho ba/ pha ma la phangs par mi 'dzin
233b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sbyin gnas la phangs par mi 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dang ba yongs su nyams pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba la yongs su nyams pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
233b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la zhugs shing gzhol ba seng ge dang / nam mkha' lding gi lus la yang dag par zhugs pa/ lcags kyi shing shal ma li mthon po dang / me ma mur la gzhol ba/ sems can dmyal ba yang
233b8(dkon brtsegs): sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'jom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs pa ni bud med kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos kyang bud med
234a1(dkon brtsegs): la chags shing bud med dang sten pas bgad pa dang / ngus pa dang / ca co 'don 'dod pa dang / bro brdungs pa dang / glu blangs pa dang / rol mo byas pa dag rjes su dran par byed cing skyo ba mi skyed yid byung bar
234a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed de/ rgyal po chen po byis pa'i chos la kun tu spyod cing kun tu spyod pa de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa la sten cing / ngan 'gror
234a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon dang po yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dod pa dri nga mi gtsang smad par 'os pa dang / /mi mthun 'jigs
234a4(dkon brtsegs): byed mi rtag las byung sdug bsngal byed/ /don med phung bar byed cing dman pa yin pas na/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la sten par byed/ /btsog pas gang ba'i chab khung dri nga lta bu dang / /mnam par gyur
234a5(dkon brtsegs): cing rul pa'i khyim rnams ji bzhin dang / /shi ba dur khrod sa na shin tu smad pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'dod pa rnams kyang mchog tu smad pa yin/ /sbrang bu rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang / /phag ni ngan skyugs mthong
234a6(dkon brtsegs): na rgyug pa ci 'dra dang / /khyi ni sha yi don du shen sar 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin mi mkhas bud med dag la dga' bar byed/ /grags pa med cing mi snyan yon tan 'bri ba dang / /de las tshul khrims dag ni nyams
234a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / /mtho ris nyams shing dmyal ba dag tu ltung bas na/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la sten par byed/ /ji ltar ha la ha la'i dug ni zos pa na/ /lus ngag rmya zhing rmongs pa skye ba 'gyur
234a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'di na byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i rgyus/ /rang gi lus kyi dbyibs ni dug tu mi rigs go/ /ji ltar sgyu ma shin tu bslabs pa'i mi zhig gis/ /rnam par 'phrul pas sems can brgya dag
234b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' byed ltar/ /de bzhin byis pa bdag la bde bar 'dod pa rnams/ /'dod la dga' ba'i rgyu las ngan 'gror rab tu ltung / /zas skom ston mo bzang po tha dad pa dag dang / /glu bro sil snyan bzang po tha dad pa dag gis/ /
234b2(dkon brtsegs): khang pa mchog nas byung ba'i chung ma len pa ni/ /gnod pa rnyed pa yin zhing sdug bsngal sogs pa yin/ /'dod pa'i dga' la brkam pa dag ni gnod yin te/ /mi gtsang mtshon 'dra rmongs gyur dag la bsngags
234b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rjod/ /'dod pa dman pa dag la bsngags shing sten pas ni/ /dman pa de dag ngan 'gror rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /gnod pa 'dod pa dag gis yul rnams rab bsngags shing / /'dod pa gnod pa yid la dga'
234b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byis pa rnams/ /de dag don med 'tsho ba rnams par spangs nas ni/ /mi bzad g.yang sa chen por rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /nga rgyal rmongs pas bcom pa'i skyes bu 'di dag ni/ /rgya mtsho'i pha rol ma mthong ba yi bya
234b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ /lcags kyi me lce lnga po dag la chags gyur nas/ /byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'bar zhing 'khyam par 'gyur/ /'di ni byis pa myos shing shin tu rmongs pa rnams/ /shel du mi mthong snod mchog yin par
234b6(dkon brtsegs): sems pa ltar/ /lam la rnam par rmongs rnams 'dod pa'i ched kyi phyir/ /rtag tu 'dir gnas 'di ni gya nom yin zhes 'dzer/ /gang phyir rnam pa sna tshogs las dag mi shes pas/ /'gro ba thams cad rab nyams
234b7(dkon brtsegs): gus pa yod min pas/ /pha dang ma dang bu dang bu mo dag la ni/ /don gyis mchod pa mi byed gnod pa thob pa yin/ /de dag rtag tu bud med 'dris pa rjod byed pa'i/ /de 'dra'i las kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /
234b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag gti mug dra ba sdig pa rab sogs shing / /ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam yang sogs par byed/ /mi rnams de dag der chags bde bar 'du shes shing / /pha dang ma yang yongs su rab tu spong bar byed/ /de
235a1(dkon brtsegs): dag mchod 'os rnams la mchod pa mi byed cing / /smad par 'os pa'i 'dod pa dag la sten par byed/ /phan tshun gdungs par 'gyur ba la ni gzhol byed cing / /rnam rtog mu yis nges bcom mi rnams nyon
235a2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa/ /bkur sti yongs su tshol la dga' zhing ma 'phags rnams/ /chos ma yin par 'jig rten rab tu 'dzud par byed/ /gzhi de las ni mtshon cha dag dang lcags rnams dang / /de bzhin bcing ba dang ni 'thab
235a3(dkon brtsegs): cing rtsod pa dang / /nges par 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur/ /shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'jigs su rung bar 'gro/ /tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin sdug bsngal 'byung 'gyur zhing / /nor nyams snying du sdug pa rab
235a4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'jig 'gyur la/ /mtho ris nyams shing dmyal bar rab tu ltung bas na/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i 'du shes skyes par byed/ /lcags las grub pa'i nags tshal sngon po'i khrod dag tu/ /mkhas pas bdag nyid
235a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bor ba de sla zhing / /'dzangs pa spu gri'i so yis bcad pa byas sla la/ /ral gri dag gi khrod du mal yang bcas sla zhing / /rab tu me 'bar thu lum bzung ba de sla la/ /de bzhin lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba za sla zhing / /
235a6(dkon brtsegs): me dong 'jigs su rung ba rnams la reg sla yi/ /lag pa gnyis kyis nam yang bud med reg mi bya/ /mis ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa rnam sten pa/ /de lta de ltar bde ba thams cad rab spong zhing / /'di ltar 'dod
235a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams gcig tu sdug bsngal mi gtsang bas/ /'dod pa sdug bsngal mi gtsang ba dag rnam par spongs/ /'dod pa sdug bsngal kun kyi gzhi bor gyur ba dang / /gang phyir nor ni chud zar 'gyur bar byed pa dang / /yid
235a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ong skye bo rnams kyi nyams pa'i rtsa ba bas/ /bud med nges par sten pa gnod pa thob pa yin/ /skyes bu gang gis de 'dra'i chos tshul rig nas ni/ /bud med rnams la rab tu bag med mi 'gyur ba/ /des ni rtag tu mtho ris lam
235b1(dkon brtsegs): yang rnam sbyangs shing / /des ni byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' ma yin/ /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang mi'i pha ma dag ni dka' ba byed pa dag yin te/ zla ba dgu 'am zla ba bcur mngal na bzung ste shin tu sdug bsngal
235b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gsos shing / gcin dang phyi sa yang 'phyi bar byed/ pang du blangs nas nu zho ldud par byed/ phung po rnams skyed par byed/ khams rnams gso bar byed/ 'jig rten ston par byed/ 'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston
235b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ don du 'dod/ phan par 'dod/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod/ 'jig rten la yang phan par 'dod pa ste sbyin pa'i gnas yin la/ bu la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pas de dag gis rang gi nor gyi tshogs kyis
235b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi khyim nas gzhan gyi bu mo blangs pa dang / de de la chags shing myos la 'chums shing brgyal ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par zhen cing 'dug par gyur nas/ gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med
235b5(dkon brtsegs): de la chags shing myos pas sbyin pa'i gnas pha ma rgas 'khogs pa/ gtugs la lus nyam chung zhing mig mi mthong ba dag la brnyas shing longs spyod med pa dang / nor med par byas nas rang gi khyim nas phyung
235b6(dkon brtsegs): ste skrod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po 'di ltar pha ma dga' ba byed byed pa sbyin pa'i gnas la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag pa'i bde bas sti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ rjed par bya/ mchod par bya ba'i rigs na/ des
235b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe pha ma dag rang gi khyim nas phyung ste bskrad nas gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med la bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing sti stang du byed/ gces su byed/ rim gro byed la
235b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byed cing yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi pha ma la ni mi byed pa'i mi snying brtse ba med pa dang / mi lta ba dang / ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa la ltos/ rgyal po chen po des bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang
236a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni spangs la/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa'i mi de la yang ltos/ rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa rnams la sten cing pha ma la
236a2(dkon brtsegs): brnyas pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes ba'i skyes bu'i skyon gnyis pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa
236a3(dkon brtsegs): ni/ /de dag rtag tu bde zhing yid kyang bde 'gyur la/ /'di la lha dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang / /de bzhin 'di la tshangs par bcas pa'i rigs su 'gyur/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag song na phyir
236a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba yang 'grub 'gyur zhing / /rgya mtsho chen po nas kyang bde zhing legs 'ong ste/ /de ltar byed pa dag ni rab mchog rnyed pa yin/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa yi/ /tshong pa de dag yon tan kun gyi gtsor
236a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin zhing las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs 'byung ste/ /bsod nams bgrang ba'i don du brjod par mi nus so/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag khur rnams khyer ba'i rnga mo rnams dang
236a6(dkon brtsegs): yang / /yang na glang dang bong bu dag tu'ang mi 'gyur te/ /mi rnams de dag spu gri'i so la rdzi mi 'gyur/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag chu bo rab med dang ni me mur dang / /spu gri so dang ldan pa la yang mi rgal te/ /
236a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag zangs khu bskol ba 'thung bar yong mi 'gyur/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag nor dang 'bru ni mi nyung ba dag dang / /chung ma dang ni bu dang bu mo dag dang yang / /bai dUr+ya dang rin chen sa le sbram yang rnyed/ /gang
236a8(dkon brtsegs): dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag rab 'phrul lha yi pho brang dag dang ni/ /rtsub 'gyur dang ni 'dres pa'i tshal yang mthong 'gyur te/ /lha rnams du mas rtag tu mdun du bdar bar 'gyur/ /mi yi gtso bor gyur cing lha yi
236b1(dkon brtsegs): lhar gyur pa/ /thub pa chen po 'di 'dra'i gsung ni thos gyur na/ /rgas shing dbang po shin tu nyam chung gyur ba yi/ /pha ma sbyin gnas dam pa su zhig gso mi byed/ /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa ni skyes bu dam pa
236b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i las byed cing log par lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba gang yin zhes bdag gi don mi shes shing mi brtan pa yin pas skye bo mang po rnams mi dga' zhing byis pa'i skye bos bsngags pa
236b3(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dga' ba dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag gis rmongs par gyur ba dang / skyes bu 'dzangs pa dag gis smad pa dang / khro bas zil gyis non cing sdig pa'i las byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
236b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang / longs spyod kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang / ser sna can du gyur ba dang / gzhan la gnod par mngon par dga' zhing chos sgom par mi dga' ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa skyes
236b5(dkon brtsegs): bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las la mngon par dga' zhing skyes bu dam pa'i las la mi dga' ba de la ltos/ rgyal po chen po 'dod pa rnams la sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes ba'i skyes bu'i skyon gsum pa yin no/ /de
236b6(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dod pa rnams kyi gzhis ni skyes bu rnam nyams shing / /gzhi de las ni sdig pa dag kyang rab tu byed/ /log par lta bas rmongs nas 'dir ni 'khyam
236b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / /de ni rnam par 'khrul pas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /log dang ldan pas yon tan kun gyis rnam spangs shing / /de ni rtog pa med cing blo yang nor ba yin/ /gang dag chu klung dag tu ud pal rtswa chol ltar/ /log
236b8(dkon brtsegs): par lta bas yongs su 'khor bar byed pa yin/ /bde ba'i don tu bdag nyid yongs su skyong byed cing / /chos ma yin la chags pa'i mi rnams mang po dag /de bzhin bde ba'i rgyu phyir 'dod pa rnams tshol ba/ /de dag gti mug rmongs
237a1(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /gang dag 'dod pa rnams kyi don du rtag tu ni/ /de bzhin sems la gcags pa'i skyes bu tha ma dang / /'dod pa'i bdag nyid can dang skye bo sdig can dang / /'du shes log pa
237a2(dkon brtsegs): dag la bde ba ga la yod/ /mi rnams de dag byas pa mi gzo sdig bcas shing / /dad pa rnam nyams tshul 'chos gus pa med pa dang / /'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rtag tu rnam par spangs pas na/ /dmyal ba bzad brlag shin tu
237a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs su rung bar ltung / /gzugs dang sgra dang ro la chags pa'i mi rnams ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mkhas pa mi mchod cing / /log par lta bas chos kyang nyan par mi byed la/ /lan 'ga'ang dge 'dun legs
237a4(dkon brtsegs): par mchod par mi byed pas/ /'phags pa rnams kyis rnam spangs ngan song ltung bas na/ /de phyir mi yi srid pa 'di ni rnyed pa la/ /sbyin dul gang dag sdom pa nges par sten cig dang / /de las byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob
237a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes pa ni bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi gnas sna tshogs 'di dag gis 'tsho bar byed de/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yi ge'am/ rtsis sam/ grangs sam/ lag rtsis sam/
237a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshon cha 'am/ rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba 'am/ zhing las sam/ tshong byed pa 'am/ ba lang 'tsho ba 'am/ de lta bu'i bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed cing 'di lta ste/ nor gyi
237a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir lam ma yin par yang 'gro bar byed/ lam ngan par yang 'gro bar byed/ gcong rong dang chu klung can gyi lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ mtshon cha'i lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ rgya mtshor 'jug par yang 'jug par byed/
237a8(dkon brtsegs): grang ba'i dus na yang lhags pas gnod par byed/ dro ba'i dus na yang tsha bas gnod par byed cing bkres pa dang / skom pa dag gis gnod bzhin du 'gro ba la yang spro bar byed de/ longs spyod yongs su tshol ba na de lta bu'i
237b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dag gis longs spyod yongs su btsal nas kyang rang gi 'tsho ba dag gi phyir nye bar sgrub par byed pas dge sbyong dang bram ze dag dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slongs mo pa dag la sbyin pa sbyin par mi
237b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing bud med rnams kyis dbang du byas pa dang / bud med rnams kyis thul 'og tu chud pa dang / bud med rnams kyis bskol ba dang / bud med rnams la byams pa de nyid kyis bud med de dag nyid gso pa'i phyir sbyin
237b3(dkon brtsegs): pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi nus shing de de la chags la bud med rnams kyis spyos pa bzod par byed cing bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang / bltas pa dang / brgyab pa dag kyang bzod par byed de/
237b4(dkon brtsegs): de skyes par gyur kyang bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang du len cing / mi dga' ba med par de'i ngor lta bar byed pa ni 'dod pa'i gzhis bud med kyi dbang du song ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po bud med la sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar
237b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa de ni skyes pa bud med la brkam zhing ngan skyugs kyi sgo la gdu ba dang / mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang / shes bzhin med par spyod pa'i skyes bu'i skyon bzhi pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po skyon de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa
237b6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dod pa rnams ni tshol ba dang / /rab tu myos pa ga la bde/ /'dod pa dman pa rnams
237b7(dkon brtsegs): sten pa/ /de ni gang gis bde bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i/ /las rnams byed cing mi sdom la/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags tshol byed pa/ /de dag rab nyams chud kyang za/ /mi rnams gang dag mi mkhas
237b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /rnga mo bong bu'i chos spyod cing / /bud med mthong na rab snyeg pa/ /ngan skyugs gnas la phag rnams bzhin/ /gang la byis pa gus bcas pa'i/ /'dod rnams dri nga mi gtsang yang / /'dod pa'i skyon rnams
238a1(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong ba/ /sa yi steng na dmus long bzhin/ /gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings pa rnams/ /'dod pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug /byis pa 'dod rnams sten pa dag /khyi dang wa rnams ji bzhin
238a2(dkon brtsegs): no/ /sgra dri ro dang reg rnams kyis/ /gang la so so'i skye bo rnams/ /byis pa 'khor ba yongs 'khor ba/ /spre'u rnams phur la btags pa bzhin/ /byis pa ma rig khebs pa rnams/ /mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs gyur cing / /
238a3(dkon brtsegs): bud med rnams la chags pa ni/ /mi gtsang gnas la khwa bzhin no/ /gang gis ngan 'gror rab 'jug pa/ /de ni bdud kyi spyod yul yin/ /ro myang 'du shes chags gyur pa/ /ngan skyugs gnas la srin bu bzhin/ /
238a4(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba'i gshed ma rnams kyis ni/ /ji ltar mi zhig bor ba ltar/ /shes na thar pa thob 'gyur zhing / /bud med dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa bud med lta byed pa'i/ /kun tu sbyor las 'jigs pa skye/ /byis
238a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams/ /'dod pa'i sred pa rab tu 'phel/ /sos ka'i dus na mi zhig ni/ /dgon pa chen por song gyur nas/ /byis pas lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs na/ /skom pa phyir zhing rab skyed ltar/ /
238a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i / /byis pa rmongs pas 'tsho ba rnams/ /'di na phyir zhing bud med la/ /'dod pa'i sred pa brtan par 'gyur/ /ji ltar mi lus mdze can la/ /srog chags rnams ni za ba
238a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ /'dod brkam so so'i skye bo rnams/ /de bzhin bud med rnams kyis zos/ /mi gtsang bum pa khra bo zhig /kha dog ldan par snang mod kyi/ /nang na ha la ha la'i dug /drag po chen po yod pa
238a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ /de bzhin bud med brgyan pa dag /gang dang gang na snang ba yang / /gcin dang phyi sas gang ba yi/ /rkyal pa rlung gis gang ba bzhin/ /'bru mar gyis ni bdar ba'i mtshon/ /gos kyis dkris pa ji bzhin
238b1(dkon brtsegs): du/ /de bzhin bud med brgyan pa yang / /ral gri rling ba g.yogs pa bzhin/ /ji ltar me dong gang gyur la/ /du ba med cing 'bar ldan ltar/ /bud med de bzhin me 'dra zhing / /srin bu gtum po bzhin du g.yo/ /sreg
238b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bskal pa 'dir byung na/ /sa 'di kun tu 'bar gyur la/ /rtswa dang gel ba 'jig 'gyur zhing / /chu klung dag kyang skams par 'gyur/ /'byung po chen po'i gnas gyur pa/ /rgya mtsho yang ni skam 'gyur zhing / /ri
238b3(dkon brtsegs): bo chen po rnams sreg la/ /de bzhin lhun po'ang 'jig par 'gyur/ /rgyal chen 'byung po 'dzin pa yi/ /sa 'di'ang rnam par 'jig 'gyur zhing / /brag chen rnams ni 'jig 'gyur yang / /skyob par byed
238b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yod ma yin/ /ji ltar me yis rir bcas dang / /rgya mtshor bcas pa sreg pa ltar/ /de bzhin bud med me 'dra ste/ /gtum zhing skyes bu g.yo bar byed/ /snabs dang mchil ma kha chu dang / /glad rgyas rul pa'i
238b5(dkon brtsegs): glad pa dang / /lus las dri nga 'jag de la/ /byis pa rnams ni sbrang rtsi bzhin/ /kha sgo rus pas gang ba dang / /sha dang lpags la sogs bsags shing / /de bzhin lus ni 'bras 'dra ste/ /dri nga smad par bya ba
238b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ /mi gtsang sna tshogs gang ba dang / /'bras ni smin par gyur ba ltar/ /de ltar lus 'di mi gtsang ba/ /sna tshogs rnams kyi snod yin no/ /lto ni gnye ma mtsher ba dang / /glo bas gang zhing mkhal ma
238b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /khrag dang mkhris pas gang gyur la/ /glad rgyas kyis ni glad pa gang / /khong pa'i nang na srin bu'i rigs/ /brgyad khri po dag gnas gyur kyang / /gti mug dra bas bsgribs pa yi/ /byis pa rnams
238b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi mthong ngo / /rma sgo dgu nas rtag tu ni/ /mi gtsang rul ba zag gyur kyang / /smra ba dag dang lta ba la/ /byis pa rnams ni mtshan mar 'dzin/ /gang zhing kun gyis smad pa'i yul/ /chags pa rnams kyis phyis
239a1(dkon brtsegs): mi shes/ /mi gtsang spyod yul byis pa rnams/ /snabs dang mchil ma za bar byed/ /smad par 'os la chags byed pa/ /sbrang bu rnams kyis rma mthong bzhin/ /mchan khung dag nas rdul
239a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzag cing / /smad pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /byis pa sdug bsngal chags byed pa/ /de dag bdag la gnod phyir g.yo/ /des ni myur du phongs gyur te/ /nya rnams chu nas bton pa bzhin/ /'jigs rung lag na
239a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshon thogs kyis/ /ji ltar mi zhig gtses pa ltar/ /mtshon 'dra'i bud med sdig can gyis/ /'dod la chags rnams de bzhin no/ /rnam rgyal lag na mtshon thogs pas/ /ji ltar rgyal po gtses pa
239a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ /'dod chags me dang 'dra ba yis/ /'dod la chags rnams de bzhin sreg /shan pa'i gnas la khyi rnams ltar/ /myang bar 'du shes byis pa rnams/ /ji ltar sgra yis skrag pa ltar/ /myur
239a5(dkon brtsegs): du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /rang gi las kyi nyes pa yis/ /de la skyob pa med pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gi nyes pa yis/ /sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos spangs nas/ /
239a6(dkon brtsegs): bud med rnams kyi rnag la sten/ /sems ni ro la chags gyur pa/ /de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar spre'u zhig shing las ni/ /shing gzhan du ni rgyu ba'i tshe/ /de ni gnas der gtses gyur na/ /de nyid
239a7(dkon brtsegs): du ni sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'dod la brkam pa dang / /sdug bsngal 'dod chags sten pa dang / /gti mug rgya la thogs pa rnams/ /dus ni yang dang yang du 'da'/ /mi bkren rnams ni gsal
239a8(dkon brtsegs): shing la/ /rab du btsugs nas 'phyang pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'dod la chags pa rnams/ /shal ma li ni mtho la 'phyang / /ji ltar mon sran sde'u dang gre'u/ /lcags zangs rnams su
239b1(dkon brtsegs): blugs byas nas/ /mes ni rab tu bsregs pa na/ /dbu bar bcas shing khol ba ltar/ /de bzhin dge ba ma mthong zhing / /'dod la chags pa'i skye bo rnams/ /shi nas ngan song 'gro 'gyur
239b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing / /lcags zangs rnams su btso bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i/ /sems can sdig pa rnams kyi gnas/ /zangs ni bye ba drug bcu dang / /gzhan yang bzhi po dag
239b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /zangs ni so so re re la/ /tshad ni dmigs su yod min zhing / /me yi phung por ldan rnams su/ /bskal pa du mar btso bar 'gyur/ /kha cig zangs rnams de dag tu/ /rang gi
239b4(dkon brtsegs): las kyis bskal brgya 'am/ /nyis brgya sum brgya tshang bar 'tshed/ /yang na bzhi brgyar btso bar 'gyur/ /phra skam rnon po rnams kyis ni/ /bzung zhing yang dang yang smyugs pas/ /de
239b5(dkon brtsegs): dag sha ni yod min zhing / /dung ltar dkar ba rnams su 'gyur/ /lcags kyi gzhong bar 'dug nas ni/ /rab tu tsha zhing 'dren pa med/ /shi zhing shi zhing skye 'gyur te/ /
239b6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi las kyis gnas par 'gyur/ /gang tshe dmyal ba'i srungs rnams kyis/ /ngan pa'i mi rnams de dag ni/ /gtun la sogs pas brdungs pas na/ /sha rkang rus pa phye mar 'gyur/ /
239b7(dkon brtsegs): de yis tshe na de dag la/ /shin du grang ba'i rlung yang ldang / /des ni dmyal ba'i sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal gyur ba de las 'tsho/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ /gtun pu
239b8(dkon brtsegs): drag po rnams kyis 'joms/ /sta re rnams kyis gsheg pa dang / /de bzhin gsal shing 'jugs par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i/ /sems can rnams kyi
240a1(dkon brtsegs): lus la ni/ /lcags mdung rtse mo bzhi pa dang / /rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga 'bab/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ /ral gri mchu can khwa rnams kyis/ /mgo dang glad
240a2(dkon brtsegs): pa btogs 'gyur zhing / /wa dang spyang kis zos par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ /ngan skyugs rul pa dri nga zhing / /kun gyis smad par ltung 'gyur la/ /spu gri'i chu klung
240a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams su ltung / /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ /rab tu tsha bar sreg 'gyur zhing / /ngu 'bod dang ni ngu 'bod che/ /thig nag tu yang sreg par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag
240a4(dkon brtsegs): sdig byed pa/ /thig nag tu ni skyes nas kyang / /yang dang yang du me mur dang / /spu gri'i chu klung rnams su ltung / /gang tshe lcags kyi zangs po cher/ /mi rnams de dag
240a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshed pa na/ /khyi rnams kyis ni gtses gyur nas/ /de dag bde ba tshol bar byed/ /mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ /dmyal ba drag po chen por ni/ /lhung nas dpung
240a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyen yod min zhing / /lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams sdig pa byed pa dag /lcags las grub pa'i brag chen dang / /mi sdug ri bo rnams kyis ni/ /de tshe kun nas
240a7(dkon brtsegs): lus 'joms byed/ /des ni rang gis las byas pa'i/ /'bras bu de 'dra thob gyur zhing / /de yis tshor ba myong bas na/ /de la skyob pa 'ga' yang med/ /ji snyed rten pa thams cad ni/ /bdag gi mdun der 'ga' yang med/ /
240a8(dkon brtsegs): der ni mgon med bdag gcig pu/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar byed/ /gang dag bde phyir don min par/ /sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang / /pha ma de dag de ring ni/ /rnam par grol ba'i mthu yang med/ /gang dag bde phyir don min par/ /sngan
240b1(dkon brtsegs): chad nyes par spyad byas kyang / /bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams/ /de ring bdag la 'grel mi nus/ /gang dag bde phyir don min par/ /sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang / /mdza' bshes nye du de dag kun/ /rnam par dgrol bar yong mi nus/ /
240b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bde phyir don min par/ /sngan chad nyes pa spyad byas kyang / /bdag gi rtsa lag de dag kun/ /de rang 'grol bar mi nus so/ /'dod pa dman pa rnams sten cing / /dman pa'i chos rnams bsten nas ni/ /nyes pa'i las
240b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams byed pa dag / de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /shes rab 'chal ba mnar med par/ /song nas sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dag /phyi sa'i dri ltar dman par bsgrags/ /de phyir dman pa
240b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang ni/ /dman pa'i bud med rnams sten pa/ /byis pa de ni phyi sa yi/ /rkyal pa bzung nas gnas pa yin/ /ci 'dra'i las ni byed pa ltar/ /de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur te/ /rgyal po yi ni chad pa dang / /sdug bsngal bcing ba'ang myong
240b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /bud med gzhi las skyes pa yang / /gsad dang bcing ba myong 'gyur zhing / /dmyal srungs rnams kyis sreg pa dang / /nges par 'ching ba'ang myong bar 'gyur/ /bud med rnams la brkam pa yi/ /blo ngan de dag bde mi
240b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /gsal shing mthon po rnams su ni/ /btsugs shing chur yang bcug par 'gyur/ /sa yi ser kar bcug nas ni/ /de bzhin ral gris gdab par 'gyur/ /de 'dra ba dag thos nas ni/ /de dag
240b7(dkon brtsegs): yi chad bde mi 'gyur/ /rmongs pa bud med lhan cig tu/ /yang dang yang du 'du 'dzi byed/ /sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnams sten cing / /smad pa rnams kyang smra bar byed/ /rmongs pa rnams kyis chos thos nas/ /
240b8(dkon brtsegs): dge bar gsungs shes rjod byed kyang / /de sems bud med phyi bzhin song / /byi ba la ni byi la bzhin/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas/ /yud tsam zhig ni yid byung yang / /ha la ha la'i dug 'dra ba'i/ /'dod chags kyis ni de yang
241a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs/ /ji ltar phag ni yud tsam zhig /dngangs shing skrag par byung gyur kyang / /des ni phyi sa mthong na yang / /chags pa skyes par byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin byis pa bde 'dod rnams/ /rgyal ba'i
241a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa spangs nas ni/ /'dod pa dman pa rnams bsten pas/ /des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams la chags myos nas/ /shin du sdig pa'i las byas shing / /tshul khrims can dag bslus byas
241a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /phyis ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /shes rab can gyis dal rnyed cing / /de 'dra'i chos ni thos gyur nas/ /'dod kun spangs nas 'di la ni/ /mkhas pa mngon par rab byung shig /rgyal po chen po skyes pa
241a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la sten pa rnams kyi skyon ni de dag yin te/ 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i rma dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa rnams ni sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen
241a5(dkon brtsegs): po de lta bas na khyod kyis rtag par rgyun tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /khyod kyis lus su gtogs pa'i sems rjes su dran pa bsgom pa bya'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char
241a6(dkon brtsegs): byed la de lta de ltar chos bstan par mdzad de/ chos bstan pa des bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
241a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skyes pa dang /
241a8(dkon brtsegs): bud med rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar de dag bka' stsal cing legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das da bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun
241b1(dkon brtsegs): la skyabs su mchi ste/ mtshon cha spangs shing dbyug pa spangs la ngo tsha mchis shing srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse bar zhugs pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dge bsnyen du
241b2(dkon brtsegs): gzung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar
241b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las bad sa'i rgyal po
241b4(dkon brtsegs): 'char byed kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tshA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur
241b5(dkon brtsegs): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /@#/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum bcu pa ste bu mo blo gros bzang mos
241b6(dkon brtsegs): zhus pa lung bstan pa/ bam po phyed pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su ma ti dA ri ka pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
241b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyid brgya lnga bcu'i
241b8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na khyim bdag drag shul can
242a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu mo blo gros bzang mo zhes bya ba btsas nas lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag
242a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
242a3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig 'dug pa de 'khor dang bcas pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
242a4(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gal te skabs phye bdag gis ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis
242a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog / 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /yid la ci 'dod thams cad ni/ /bu mo khyod kyis dri bar gyis/ /byang chub
242a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa kun/ /ci 'dra khyod la bstan par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang gis su ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /gang gis nor ni
