242a7(dkon brtsegs): che ba dang / /mi phyed 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur/ /thub pas 'di ni bdag la gsungs/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni/ /gang gis rdzus te skye 'gyur zhing / /'dab ma stong ldan pad+ma la/ /mchis par yang ni
242a8(dkon brtsegs): gda' ba dang / /zhing rnams bye ba dpag yas par/ /sangs rgyas phyag bgyir mchi ba yi/ /rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin 'gyur ba'i/ /spyod pa rgyal bas lung bstan gsol/ /dgra zla ma mchis gang gis 'gyur/ /tshig
242b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang btsun par 'gyur ba dang / /las kyi sgrib pa ma mchis dang / /bdud kyi las kun ma mchis dang / /'chi ba'i dus ni bgyid pa na/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /de las chos kyang nyan pa dang / /
242b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal tshor ba myong mi 'gyur/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar
242b3(dkon brtsegs): sems pa legs so legs so/ /bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /bu mo blo gros bzang mos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan
242b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tha na dgra la
242b5(dkon brtsegs): yang khro bar mi byed pa dang / byams pa la gnas pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mdzes par
242b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa'i rtsa ba khro ba 'phel mi byed/ /byams la gnas par byed dang chos 'dod dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas na ni/ /mdzes par 'gyur te blta bar
242b7(dkon brtsegs): 'os pa yin/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na nor che bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su sbyin pa dang / 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang / rnam par
242b8(dkon brtsegs): smyin pa mi re bar sbyin pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na nor che bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dus su byin dang 'gyod pa med pa dang / /yid 'ong sbyin dang rnam smin mi
243a1(dkon brtsegs): re ba/ /dpa' bo rnams ni las 'di byas pas na/ /rtag tu longs spyod chen po thob pa yin/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
243a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ phra ma'i tshig spangs pa dang / sems can log par lta ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos srung
243a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /
243a4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phra ma de bzhin log par lta ba spong / /dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe na srung ba byed/ /sems can byang chub yang dag 'dzin 'jug na/ /'khor rnams mi phyed phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /
243a5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thang du rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phye ma 'am/ me tog
243a6(dkon brtsegs): ud pa la 'am/ pad+ma 'am/ ku mu da 'am/ pad+ma dkar pos lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'bul ba dang / gzhan dag la yang
243a7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems mi skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la nges pa rgya cher mos pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
243a8(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thang du rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phye ma me tog bkang ste 'bul ba dang
243b1(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems spong zhing sku gzugs byed pa dang / mos pa rgya chen la ni gnas byed na/ /rgyal ba dag gi thang du rdzus te skye/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi
243b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag chos nyan pa la bar chad mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
243b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar
243b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba dag gi bar chad mi byed dang / /gzhan gyi chos gtam dag la mi smod dang / /rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul/ /ting 'dzin bsgoms pas de ni zhing du
243b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dgra zla med par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la sten pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser
243b6(dkon brtsegs): sna mi byed pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba dang gnas pa thams cad la khong khro bar mi byed cing mi snyan pa mi sgrogs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
243b7(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dgra zla med par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la de g.yo med/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la dga' zhing ser sna med/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
243b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod la mi smod na/ /rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod par 'gyur/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang
244a1(dkon brtsegs): mdza' bo dag la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab pa dang / glan ka mi tshol bar chos nyan pa dang / gzhan chos smra ba dag la dpya skur mi byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
244a2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / /mdza' la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab cing / /glan ka mi tshol chos ni nyan byed na/ /
244a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med cing tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing / yongs su dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyur te/
244a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bsgrubs pas sdom pa gsum yang dag par len pa dang / mdo sde zab mo rnams mi spong ba dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
244a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na las kyi sgrib pa med par

249b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o snyam du sems lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni nams kyang ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ mtho ris
250a1(dkon brtsegs): su mchi ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog kyang de lta bu'i dbyings can lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
250a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog khyod ci yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis mi skye ba la smras te/ khyod
250a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes de skad bgyis na ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog
250a4(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas yin na de ci zhig lan 'debs par 'gyur/ gang gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad ni mya ngan
250a5(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
250a6(dkon brtsegs): gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags na gang gA'i mchog khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes da ci zhig smra ste/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis sprul pa la smras te/
250a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes de skad bgyis na ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/
250a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i smra bas smras lags sam/
250b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khor 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'du ba dag yod de/ de dag gi don chen por 'gyur bas
250b2(dkon brtsegs): dris so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gA'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos nyid ces bya ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na gang de las byung ba'i chos yongs su mya ngan las
250b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la gnas pa lta ga la yod/ gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid ces bgyi ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ de las byung ba'i chos lta gang
250b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig mchis par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi slad du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog gang
250b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni gang gi tshe yang dag par sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro/ /gang gi tshe
250b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi ba
250b7(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog chos 'di ni sems pas thob par bya ba ma yin te/
250b8(dkon brtsegs): sems pas thob par byar mi nus/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di la ni sems nyid kyang mi dmigs na gang sems las rab tu byung ba'i chos lta ga la yod/ gang gA'i mchog sems mi dmigs pa ni bsam gyis
251a1(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de ni thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/ shes pa ma yin/ mngon sum du byas pa ma yin te/
251a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni thob par bya ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin rnam par byang ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gA'i mchog 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad nam
251a3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' ltar nges par thugs su chud de/ gang gA'i mchog chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad nam
251a4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs shes btags pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa
251a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes btags pa dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang /
251a6(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes btags pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog 'di
251a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na bdag bdag ces 'dogs kyang bdag gang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gang gA'i mchog ngas gzugs shes btags te gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin
251a8(dkon brtsegs): du ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes btags te rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so/ /phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang /
251b1(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan
251b2(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa zhes bya ba yang ngas btags te mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gang gA'i mchog 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu rnams la ni chu yod med de mi dmigs so/ /
251b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gA'i mchog de bzhin du ngas gzugs shes bya bar btags kyang gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so/ /ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes
251b4(dkon brtsegs): btags kyang rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so/ /phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag
251b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar ngas btags kyang don dam par na de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs
251b6(dkon brtsegs): so/ /gang gA'i mchog gang chos la mchog tu 'dzin pa med par tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de lta bu ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yin no/ /gang
251b7(dkon brtsegs): gA'i mchog mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gnas dmigs nas tshangs par spyad par spyod pa de dag gi tshangs par spyod pa de ni yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes nga smra'o/ /gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su
251b8(dkon brtsegs): ma dag pa de dag ni zab mo rgyud chad pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos na dngangs skrag par 'gyur te/ de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
252a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su mi 'grol te/ de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi skal pa can du 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o/ /gang gA'i mchog da ltar ram
252a2(dkon brtsegs): nga 'das pa'i phyin yang rung ste/ gang dag zab mo rgyud chad pa 'di lta bu'i chos ston pa de dag la mi gti mug pa dag gsod pa po'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag log
252a3(dkon brtsegs): par zin pas bsad pa'i zhe sdang bskyed nas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyud chad pa rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du rgyud chad
252a4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog chos 'di ni rgyud gcad pa 'am/ dbye ba 'am/ rnam par gzhig pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir rgyud chad pa zhes bya ste/
252a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhe bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas
252a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis
252a7(dkon brtsegs): ' jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas te 'od kyis khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
252a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgor nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
252b1(dkon brtsegs): ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang
252b2(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis gang gA'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge bsnyen ma
252b3(dkon brtsegs): sha stag las brtsams te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do/ /dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas phung po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /
252b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
252b5(dkon brtsegs): bstsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dri ma med pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dri ma med pa zhes bya bar zung shig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na dge slong bdun brgya dang / dge slong
252b6(dkon brtsegs): ma bzhi brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams
252b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar grong khyer mnyan yod na dge bsnyen ma 'di lta bu gnas la de de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig tu smra yang de'i lus
252b8(dkon brtsegs): ngal bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yang gang gA'i mchog 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yun ring po nas dge ba spyad pa dang / yun ring po nas
253a1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to zhes smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/
253a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yun ring du tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge bsnyen
253a3(dkon brtsegs): ma gang gA'i mchog dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
253a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las gang gA'i mchog gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //
253a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /
253a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa ste 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa/ bam po gcig pa/

253a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge
253b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la
253b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/ mi gnas par chos ston pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
253b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
253b4(dkon brtsegs): rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lags bsgreng dang / byang chub sems
253b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang /

253b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / skyes bu dam pa brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang
254a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu lha'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros yangs pa dang / byang chub sems
254a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' blo gros khyad par can dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom

254a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru
254a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
254a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang
254a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs
254b1(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod snyoms
254b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir rgyu zhing mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang na bu mo mya ngan med
254b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba
254b4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de rang gi pha'i khang bzangs na khri gser gyi rkang pa can yod pa
254b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong na khri de las ma langs te sur yang mi 'gro/ phyag kyang mi byed/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan yang mi 'ding
254b6(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms yang mi 'bul bar kha rog ste 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs shes thos nas rang gi khang bzangs kyi snga khang ga la ba der
254b7(dkon brtsegs): song ste phyin nas nyan thos chen po de dag la mchog tu sdug par 'dzin pas mngon par dga' zhing stan yang bting ngo / /rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po
254b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste 'dug pa mthong nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
255a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba bdag gi don
255a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying
255a3(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba'i phyir bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba khyod kyis mi shes sam/ ci na khyod kyis de dag mthong la/ mthong bzhin du khri las kyang mi ldang / bsu bar yang mi byed phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi
255a4(dkon brtsegs): zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan mi 'dren/ dad pa dang gus pa yang mi skyed par ci'i phyir ma gus par ston cing kha rog ste 'dug /khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong / de skad ces smras pa
255a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ ci 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal phran la ldang ba 'am/ bsur
255a6(dkon brtsegs): mchi ba nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab ci lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang ba 'am/ sur mchi 'am/
255a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab ci mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ sur mchi 'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos
255a8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / chu mig dang / mtsho bran dang / lteng ka dang / khron pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /
255b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ yab ci ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan dag la 'dud pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos
255b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ yab ci nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs srin bu me khyer gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/
255b3(dkon brtsegs): yab ci ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge wa la ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du su zhig
255b4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la dman pa la mos pa'i nyan thos wa lta bur gyur ba byams
255b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur sti bgyid/ yab chos kyi rgyal po chen po su zhig chos kyi
255b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor tam/ skor bar bgyid pa na nyan thos dman pa/ zhan pa zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dud
255b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bgyid/ yab lha'i bdag po lha'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don du gnyer pa na dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal
255b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi bar bgyid/ yab mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i snga khang bla na med pa don du gnyer ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba
256a1(dkon brtsegs): chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ sur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa mi mnyam pa dang
256a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ sur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/
256a3(dkon brtsegs): yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba na yungs 'bru lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan
256a4(dkon brtsegs): thos dag la ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dud pa 'am/ 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba nyid shes rab dang / bsod
256a5(dkon brtsegs): nams dang / ye shes dang / yon tan nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu med pa lta bu thos nas srin bu me khyer gyi 'od lta bu rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag gi
256a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang nyan thos rnams la phyag mi 'tshal na bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smros/ de ci'i slad
256a7(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang te srin bu me khyer la phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab gang nyan thos la sten pa ni nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag
256a8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sten na thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che'i sems bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces
256b1(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du mi ldang zhing bsur mi 'gro la phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed de/ 'di dag stan dang / bsod snyoms la spyan mi 'dren pa ni bu
256b2(dkon brtsegs): mo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yag bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so/ /
256b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab khyod nyid grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la mi bzhengs/ bsur mi bzhud/ stan mi 'dings pa las na khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags pa snyam bgyid do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/
256b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo de dag ni nga dang mtshungs pa ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so/ /
256b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam/ bu mos smras pa/ yab byang chub sems dpa'
256b6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i slad du sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /yab nyan thos chen
256b7(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag la ni 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa bsal bar bgyi ba ma mchis/ spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba 'phel bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis te/ yab nyan thos
256b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis nyan thos kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed pa'i chos bstan du lags kyang / yab de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang ga las
257a1(dkon brtsegs): mchi/ ting nge 'dzin kyang ga las mchi/ shes rab kyang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba yang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang ga las mchi/ yab 'di lta ste
257a2(dkon brtsegs): dper na bum pa chab kyis gtams pa'i nang du char bab na der chab kyi thigs pa gcig kyang mi len la/ der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yab de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la gal te sangs rgyas 'bum
257a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis chos bshad du lags kyang de dag 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur la tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de dag la gnas
257a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yab 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing der gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad
257a5(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /yab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/ chos bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin
257a6(dkon brtsegs): cing chos bstan pa thams cad da la yang dag par gnas so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod de ni mi mnyam pa
257a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur ba ni/ /mya ngan med byin yon tan gzi brjid brgyan/ /nyan thos lnga brgya dag ni lhags gyur kyang / /de la phyag bya'i phyir
257a8(dkon brtsegs): ni de ma langs/ /ma skyes dgra yis de la smras pa ni/ /bu mo don 'di nga las mnyan par gyis/ /khyod kyis nyan thos lnga brgya mthong bzhin du/ /phyag bya'i phyir na ci phyir ldang mi byed/ /bu mo mya ngan med
257b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin na re/ /nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na/ /ci phyir phyag 'tshal bsam pa mi skye ba/ /bdag mchis yab cig tshig ni gsan par gsol/ /dper na mi zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas
257b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /rin chen 'byung khung nas ni mching bu blangs/ /de bzhin bdag ni nyan thos thams cad kyang / /ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid/ /dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug po/ /sa
257b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/ /kAr Sha pA Na gcig tsam gsol na ni/ /de yis rgyal po bsten pa don ma mchis/ /gang gis 'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/ /bye ba phrag
257b4(dkon brtsegs): stong gsol ba bgyis na ni/ /des ni dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid/ /des ni rgyal po legs par bsten pa lags/ /kAr Sha pA Na slong ba'i mi bzhin du/ /gang gis sangs rgyas yon tan mtha'
257b5(dkon brtsegs): yas rnams/ /thos nas theg pa dman la 'dod skyed pa/ /nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid/ /nor rnams sgrub bgyid mi ni ji lta ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste/ /rgyal po chos
257b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing / /byang chub reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid/ /dper na nad pa nad brgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis/ /grol bgyid de bzhin gzhan gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba yi/ /
257b7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid/ /sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang nas ni/ /sos gyur sems can la
257b8(dkon brtsegs): ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na/ /sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ /'di ltar nad pa sos par gyur ba thams cad la/ /sman pa dag
258a1(dkon brtsegs): gis gso bar nus par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par gyur ba la/ /sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do/ /'di na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis
258a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid la/ /gso bar sems kyi sems can gzhan la ma lags te/ /de 'dra'i bdag nyid 'gengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal gyi/ /sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed/ /sman pa gang
258a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyid ji lta bar/ /de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad las grol bgyid pa/ /de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang / /'jig rten kun gyis 'dud par bgyi ba'i
258a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang lags/ /gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/ /bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags/ /de ni sman pa bdag nyid grol bar bgyi ba ltar/ /mkhas
258a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis mchod par bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags/ /gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/ /sems can grangs med sdug bsngal dag las grol bgyid pa/ /de dag byang chub
258a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste/ /de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags/ /e ran da yi shing sdong mdzes pa ma lags la/ /de dag rnams kyi grib ma yangs pa ma lags te/ /
258a7(dkon brtsegs): e ran da yi shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi/ /rnam par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar bsten ma lags/ /tsan dan mchog gi sdong chen dag ni tsha ba yis/ /gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi nye bar bsten
258a8(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/ /de bzhin bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gi don bgyid snyam/ /ba lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags/ /tsha bas gdungs pa zhi ba mi
258b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid la/ /gang gA'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong / /tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi/ /ba lang rmig rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun/ /sems can kun gyi tsha ba zhi mi bgyid/ /gang gA'i
258b2(dkon brtsegs): klung 'dra byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid/ /ji ltar rin chen char ni 'bab pa na/ /dbul po dag ni mgron bu len par bgyid/ /gang zhig nor mang
258b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag blangs nas ni/ /sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid/ /de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'bebs/ /nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las/ /chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub
258b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams/ /sems can don slad mang du len par bgyid/ /ji ltar sems can dag ni ri rab kyi/ /drung du mchis na gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/ /ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na/ /
258b5(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi kha dog can du yongs mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin/ /gang dag mthus ni lhar bcas skye dgu rnams/ /rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur/ /nyan thos
258b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid/ /yab cig ji ltar rtswa bran rtse mo yi/ /zil pa'i thigs pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid/ /rab tu khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'di/ /tshim par bgyid cing lo tog
258b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar bgyid/ /nyan thos thams cad zil ba'i thigs pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab khebs sprin dang 'dra/ /snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni/ /stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par
258b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ /ka ra bi ra'i me tog dri mchog min/ /des ni skyes pa bud med dga' mi 'gyur/ /tsam pa ka yi me tog dri la dga'/ /ud pal bal shi ka yang de bzhin no/ /nyan thos ka ra bi ra'i dri bzhin
259a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ /de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur/ /kun mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la/ /lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /gcig pu mchi ba de la mtshar ci mchi/ /
259a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa rmad/ /nyan thos mi ring gcig pu mchi ba bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ded dpon 'dra/ /'gron zhig gzhan gyis stsal pa 'tshal ba dang / /
259a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun 'gron bzhin/ /sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni 'gron dang 'dra/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun la 'gron bgyid bzhin/ /gzings la brten pas chu bo chen po las/ /gzhan
259a4(dkon brtsegs): dag bsgral bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi/ /brtan bgyis gru yi nang du zhugs nas ni/ /sems can bye ba mang po sgrol bar bgyid/ /nyan thos gzings la brten pa lta bu ste/ /sems can gzhan dag
259a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrol bar ji ltar nus/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur zhugs byang chub sems/ /sdug bsngal mtsho las sems can sgrol bar bgyid/ /ji ltar g.yul ngor bong bu zhon na ni/ /dgra las rgyal bar nus
259a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur gyi/ /glang chen rta dang shing rta zhon na ni/ /g.yul du lhags pa'i dgra rnams choms par nus/ /nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' glang chen zhon
259a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ste/ /sems can kun la phan dang bde slad du/ /de dag shing dbang drung du bdud kyang 'joms/ /ji ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang / /de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur/ /zla ba rab
259a8(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyas pa shar bas ni/ /mtshan mo mkha' la thig le bzhin du mdzes/ /yab cig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra/ /rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin/ /gang dag sems can kun la sman slad du/ /
259b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes shar bas skye bo snang bar bgyid/ /yab cig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis/ /las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyi/ /'dzam gling 'di na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis/ /bya ba sna tshogs brgya dag
259b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid par 'gyur/ /nyan thos 'di dag srin bu me khyer 'dra/ /de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu yi/ /shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems can 'grel/ /yab
259b3(dkon brtsegs): cig wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang / /ri dgas tshogs rnams 'drog par mi 'gyur gyi/ /seng ge'i skad kyis glang chen ri dgas dang / /byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs su 'byer bar 'gyur/ /yab cig
259b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nyan thos wa 'drar gzigs/ /de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skrag mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyad pas/ /bdud dang de bzhin bdud ris skrag par 'gyur/ /yab cig rgyu 'di
259b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mthong bas na/ /theg pa dman pa dag la 'dod mi skyed/ /su zhig bla med byang chub spangs nas ni/ /theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ /gang zhig byang chub dam pa yongs spangs nas/ /
259b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ /de dag 'tsho ngan rnyed pa thob ma gyur/ /de dag mir skyes pa ni nyes par mchis/ /gang dag lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du/ /byang chub mchog la 'dun pa
259b7(dkon brtsegs): skyed par bgyid/ /de dag legs 'tsho rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /de dag mi lus thob pa legs par mchis/ /gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang / /'jig rten sman slad las bgyid yid kyang
259b8(dkon brtsegs): rton/ /gang dag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson/ /de dag u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag thos nas
260a1(dkon brtsegs): cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhig na/ ci bzod pa thob pa 'am ma thob pa bdag gis/
260a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di brtag par byar nges so snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/
260a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa ma yin no/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smras pa ma yin no/ /bu mo khyod ci zhig don du gnyer na 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed/ bu mos smras pa/
260a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te bdag chos 'ga' zhig don du gnyer na ni bdag seng ge'i sgra ci yang mi sgrog pa zhig na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang don du mi gnyer te/ de'i
260a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu yang gang 'di skad du ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam zhes zer ba ni btsun pa shA ri'i bus chos gang mngon du
260a6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i chos de la ci nyan thos shes bya ba 'am rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i theg pa rnam gzhag pa yod dam/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/
260a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo de dag la ni theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/ chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
260a8(dkon brtsegs): la don du gnyer ba ci zhig yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni don du gnyer ba ci yang med do/ /gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces
260b1(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dben pa
260b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la
260b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med pa de bzhin du btsun pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang
260b4(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' dang bla gab med pa la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
260b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / so so skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/ /gnas brtan shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bu
260b6(dkon brtsegs): mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo ci khyod de skad ces zer ba las na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu ches lhag pa zhig tu mthong la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams ni shin tu
260b7(dkon brtsegs): dman par mthong ngam ci na khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ bsur yang mi 'gro/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan 'dren
260b8(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen
261a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na skar ma'i gzugs su gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa shes sam/ maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo snyoms par zhugs na ni kho bos grangs shes
261a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi snyoms par ma zhugs na ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni lan gcig mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
261a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa yang rab tu mkhyen na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
261a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can gyi lta ci smos te/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ 'di ni tha dad du dbye ba
261a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'chags pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ maud gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo
261a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma byon pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ da ltar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod
261a7(dkon brtsegs): shes sam/ maud gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ zhe sdang la spyod pa ni ji snyed
261a8(dkon brtsegs): cig yod/ gti mug la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ cha mnyam pa la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ maud gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal
261b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/
261b2(dkon brtsegs): maud gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
261b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ maud gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun
261b4(dkon brtsegs): pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes
261b5(dkon brtsegs): sam/ maud gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni de dag dang gzhan yang de'i gong du gang nyan thos
261b6(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen na/ sems can gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma'i
261b7(dkon brtsegs): khyad par yin no/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan gyis/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'jig
261b8(dkon brtsegs): r ten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te
262a1(dkon brtsegs): ' tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na shing ljon pa thams cad las tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i spos gang gis
262a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba yod pa der song shig / gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ming yang kho bos
262a3(dkon brtsegs): da gdod thos na sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/ de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas khri de las ma langs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras te/
262a4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa lta na/ bden
262a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des bdag nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur cig /
262a6(dkon brtsegs): tsan dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bden pa'i byin
262a7(dkon brtsegs): g yi brlabs des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis de nyid kyi tshe 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
262a8(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos ston cing bzhugs par mthong bar 'gyur ba
262b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i 'od sku las bkye'o/ /chos bstan pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so/ /tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
262b2(dkon brtsegs): khyabs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des kyang gsung gi yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin
262b3(dkon brtsegs): pas ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de nas byang chub sems
262b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas pas tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri tshor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tsan dan sbrul gyi snying
262b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i dri 'di ga las byung lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin
262b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dis nyan thos chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/ des nyan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs
262b7(dkon brtsegs): pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs pa yang bstan/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri
262b8(dkon brtsegs): des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so/ /de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po
263a1(dkon brtsegs): m khas pa su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam thos na nyan thos dman
263a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ zhan pa/ zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba 'am/ bsur 'gro ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ btsun pa maud gal gyis bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de ji
263a3(dkon brtsegs): tsam du thag ring ba shes sam/ maud gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gal te khyod 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha stag gis stong gsum
263a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras sA lu'i zhing bzhin du mtshams med par gang bar gyur nas de dag
263a5(dkon brtsegs): t hams cad kyi bskal par rtsis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa bgrang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par mi nus
263a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis 'od de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung
263a7(dkon brtsegs): chen pos bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon
263a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong / /gang dag nga la sgrar shes
263b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /log pas spong bar zhugs pa ste/ /skye bo de dag nga mi mthong / /sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta/ /'dren pa rnams ni chos nyid sku/ /chos nyid shes par bya min pas/ /de ni rnam par shes
263b2(dkon brtsegs): mi nus/ /zhes ma gsungs sam/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
263b3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa de sngon mthong ngam zhes de skad zer ba ni btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mod kyi/ sha'i mig gis ma yin te gzugs su ma yin no/ /lha'i mig gis
263b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te tshor bar ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te 'du shes su ma yin no/ /chos kyi mig gis ma yin te 'du byed du ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te rnam par
263b5(dkon brtsegs): shes par ma yin no/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no/ /
263b6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhin no/ /gnas brtan 'od srung chen
263b7(dkon brtsegs): pos smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar ma rig pa dang / srid pa la sred pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni med pa yin no/ /chos gang med pa de ni blta bar mi nus so/ /bu mo mya ngan
263b8(dkon brtsegs): med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no/ /chos thams cad ni med pa yin te/ de dag ni blta bar mi nus so/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ci sangs
264a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos kyang med dam/ bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dod dam/
264a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang yongs su grub par mi 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta la ci smos/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen
264a3(dkon brtsegs): po chos gang dag yongs su grub pa med pa'i chos de dag ci yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo med pa de dag ni med pa yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od
264a4(dkon brtsegs): srung chen po de bas na chos thams cad ni med pa nyid do/ /med pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnam par spyad par bya ba med do/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la
264a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas ni bdag la blta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya'o/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag la lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag par gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen
264a6(dkon brtsegs): po gang gi tshe bdag rang bzhin med pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du mos na de tsam gyis na bdag la blta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag gi rang
264a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ci yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang yin no/ /rang bzhin med pa des bdag dben
264a8(dkon brtsegs): no/ /rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben no/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis su la chos thos na 'di ltar khyod kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur/ bu mo yang dag pa'i lta ba
264b1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis yod de/ gzhan gyi sgra dang bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las 'byung ngo zhes de skad gsungs so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag
264b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can de dag ni gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa las lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan
264b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi sgra mi tshol lo/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo gang gi tshe dge slong
264b4(dkon brtsegs): ji skad thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin
264b5(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang lhan cig gnas kyang sems can du 'du shes skyed par mi byed pa de ltar
264b6(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/ /chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i
264b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/ /chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na de tsam
264b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo chos de dag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar de bzhin
265a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid la sbyor ba yang med/ mi sbyor ba yang med par mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong
265a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos thams cad gnyis su med par mthong la mi byed cing 'jig par yang mi byed na de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no/ /btsun pa 'od
265a3(dkon brtsegs): srung chen po mthong zhes bya ba de ni mthong ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen pos ji ltar mthong
265a4(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ni bdag dang bdag gi ma mthong ngo / /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen pos ji ltar bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de
265a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bya'o/ /gtam de skad brjod pa'i skabs su gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod kyis spobs pa 'di 'dra ba
265a6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor rnyed pa las ni spobs par mi 'gyur gyi gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa de spobs pa dang ldan zhing
265a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis nang ngam phyi rol ci yang mi dmigs pa de spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gang ma rnyed na spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan ma
265a8(dkon brtsegs): yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas
265b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma rnyed la so so'i skye bo'i chos
265b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs shing 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te sangs rgyas kyi chos mi dmigs na/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras
265b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ji ltar spobs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ji ltar chos thams cad ma rnyed pa de bzhin du de spobs par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis gnas brtan nyon mongs pa
265b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid de ci brjod cing smrar rung ngam/ nyon mongs pa med pa de dang chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la ci spobs pa ci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
265b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / de bzhin nyid ni bstan pa 'am brjod par mi nus so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na khyod kyis bu mo khyod spobs pa 'di lta
265b6(dkon brtsegs): bu dang ldan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs pas ston te/ bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab
265b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor chos thams cad la brag cha lta bur mos sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo mos so/ /bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ci brag cha la spobs pa ci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor
265b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ bu mo de ni med de/ bu mo rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra 'byung bar zad do/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de la ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci yang
266a1(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang brten nas 'byung ba de la ni skye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos thams cad ni brten nas 'byung ba'o/ /bu mos
266a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin na bcom ldan 'das
266a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das te gshegs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed ni ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i
266a4(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed ni da ltar bzhugs so zhes ci'i phyir bstan/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor mi skye ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni skye ba
266a5(dkon brtsegs): 'am nub par 'gyur ba mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa don dam pa'i tshig ston to/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bstan pa thams cad ni bstan
266a6(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa'o/ /ci'i phyir bstan pa thams cad bstan du med ce na/ de ni bstan kyang rung / ma bstan kyang rung dngos po ma yin te/ dngos po med pa dang brjod du med pa'i mtha' mi spong ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
266a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod khyim na gnas bzhin du 'di lta bu'i chos la gnas shing 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dag ston pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
266a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po la ni khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni bsam pas phye ba yin/ shes rab kyis phye ba yin/ ye shes kyi phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa
266b1(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shod cig dang kho bos mnyan to/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
266b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
266b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ro/ /
266b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa yang yin no/ /'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa yang yin
266b5(dkon brtsegs): no/ /lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i phyir btang snyoms la gnas pa yang yin no/ /yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thams la mkhas pa yang yin no/ /lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir
266b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las nges par byung ba yang yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol ba la brtson pas chog mi shes pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin no/ /bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i phyir ma
266b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan par shes pa yang yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang / gang
266b8(dkon brtsegs): gis gnas kyang thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod mal khri gser gyi rkang pa
267a1(dkon brtsegs): can la 'dug cing stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug nas nyan thos chen po dag dang gtam zer ba de ni rung ba ma yin par gnas pa yin no/ /bu mo mi na bar
267a2(dkon brtsegs): stan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug pas chos bshad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ci khyod kyis ma thos sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa
267a3(dkon brtsegs): sgra gcan zin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba ma yin pa khyod kyis shes sam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras
267a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bu mo kho bos shes te/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob cing bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o/ /gang dag bslab pa de las 'gal bar byed pa de dag
267a5(dkon brtsegs): ni rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin thong de skad ma zer cig /btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag
267a6(dkon brtsegs): ni rung ba ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni rtog cing rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa
267a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra gcan zin rung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas yin te/ de dag ni bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
267a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni phyir yang bslab pa 'dod pa ma yin pas de ni rung ba yin no/ /de dag ni khams gsum du phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ de dag ni bslab pa las
267b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ mi slob pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na de dag gi bslab pa ni mi dmigs te/ khams gsum pa btags pa tsam du shes so/ /de'i phyir de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o/ /
267b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo rung ba dang / rung ba ma yin pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di lta ste dper na gser dngul rgyan du byas pa dang /
267b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyan du ma byas pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci yod/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin de bzhin du rung ba dang / rung ba ma yin
267b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang yi ge'i tha snyad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ci dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin gyis kun
267b5(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no/ /btsun pa sgra gcan zin yang 'di skad du stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug ste chos nyan tam zhes zer ba la byang chub sems dpa' ni rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba
267b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'dug pa yin no/ /sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de skad smra/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpas gang la 'dug
267b7(dkon brtsegs): ste byang chub thob par gyur/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rtswa bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub thob bo/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin ci byang chub sems dpas rtswa bting ba la 'dug
267b8(dkon brtsegs): pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa 'am/ brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ngam/ de las gzhan pa 'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lus
268a1(dkon brtsegs): btud de thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la gtug par byed dam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /
268a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras / btsun pa sgra gcan zin de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin gyi/
268a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa ni de lta ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo btsun pa
268a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra gcan zin ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi sras yin te/ bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin na ci khyod kyis mi shes sam/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/
268a5(dkon brtsegs): yab thong shig thong shig /'di ltar btsun pa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma gsung shig /ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can con pan btags
268a6(dkon brtsegs): pa lta bu wa skyed par gyur ba nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal
268a7(dkon brtsegs): lta bus gshegs pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i zhabs 'bring ba ni nyan thos mdzes ma lags so/ /yab de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas gang smra
268a8(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin no zhes de dag yang dag pa'i smra bas smra'o/ /yab de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
268b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /gtam 'di brjod pa'i skabs su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas btsun mo nyi shus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
268b2(dkon brtsegs): tu sems bskyed do/ /lha'i bu brgya tham pas kyang bu mo de'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de tshig 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams 'das
268b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang smras so/ /lha'i bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa
268b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor to/ /de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa khri gser gyi rkang pa can las babs te nyan thos chen po
268b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / myang bar bya ba bsod pa mang po dag gis bkur sti byas te/ dad pa dang gus pas rang gi
268b6(dkon brtsegs): lag nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas 'di skad du btsun pa dag rang dgar slad dro bcom ldan 'das chos nyan du bzhud cig / btsun pa dag bdag kyang mchi bar 'tshal lo zhes kyang
268b7(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang / skye bo phal po ches yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
268b8(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnang ste phyogs gcig tu
269a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do/ /nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
269a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu bu mo 'dis ni thog ma nyid du
269a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub don du gnyer ba na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bu mo 'dis bud med kyi
269a4(dkon brtsegs): lus ma bsgyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med do snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o/ /byang chub sems
269a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dag ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyis bdag nyid bud med kyi gzugs su ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs byas
269a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs gang gis chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa lta na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig /thams cad dang
269a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang mthong bar gyur cig / tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bud med kyi mtshan ma mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur nas steng gi bar snang la tal bdun
269a8(dkon brtsegs): srid tsam du 'phags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa steng gi bar snang
269b1(dkon brtsegs): la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya
269b2(dkon brtsegs): n gan med kyis byin pa 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan
269b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyar 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur te/ phyir
269b4(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams de yang bai dUr+ya las grub pa rin po che sna bdun gyis bkra bar byas shing
269b5(dkon brtsegs): mig mangs ris su bres la rin po che'i pad+mas khebs pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod dag kyang khyad par med de/ shA ri'i bu dga'
269b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi yang der de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i ma rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i
269b7(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo dam pa/ zla ba can zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di dgung zla dgur rum na bzung
269b8(dkon brtsegs): ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
270a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od de nyid du 'di'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig / de nas bcom
270a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu btsun mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom
270a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing lha'i bu
270a4(dkon brtsegs): rin chen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub thob par gyur ba de'i tshe rgyal po dung zhes bya ba de'i bu rgyal po gzhon nu mthong na
270a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas te rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /des de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dam pa'i chos thog ma dang / bar dang /
270a6(dkon brtsegs): tha ma'i bar du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de
270a7(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pas byang chub thob pa na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa
270a8(dkon brtsegs): dag byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer zhes bya bar
270b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can gyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te tshangs
270b2(dkon brtsegs): par spyod par rgyal pos gnang nas bslab pa'i gzhi dag bzung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas lhas phul ba'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis bcom
270b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dang 'khor thams cad la gtor to/ /de nas bar snang las babs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshig 'di skad du bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi byang chub thob pa na byang
270b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad rdzus te skye zhing chos gos ngur smrig gyon la rin po che'i pad+ma dag la skyil mo dkrung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ba lta na/ bden pa dang bden
270b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig des dper na dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgyad lon pa'i spyod lam ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gnas par gyur cig ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan
270b6(dkon brtsegs): med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs byas ma thag tu dge slong gi spyod lam dang ldan par snang bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas
270b7(dkon brtsegs): pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab 'di ltar chos thams cad ni bcos ma ste rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su brtags pa las langs
270b8(dkon brtsegs): pa med bzhin du phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po gzigs shig dang de ring kho na'i gdugs gcig la bu mo'i gzugs su yang gzigs khye'u'i gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs/ da ni
271a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la dge slong gi gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs na 'di la gang yang dag pa'i gzugs lags/ rgyal po chen po de ltar na ya ma brla'i chos thams cad la 'di na kha cig lta ba'i kun nas
271a2(dkon brtsegs): dkris pas kun nas glags shing mchis te/ rang gi rgyud la mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis yongs su sreg go/ /yongs su bsregs pas chos 'dul ba 'di ma 'tshal te 'gyod pa
271a3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa la 'gyod par sems so/ /rgyal po chen po de ltar na khyod kyis bag yod par mdzod la/ rgyal srid nyam nga ba na bzhugs bzhin du rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du bzhud
271a4(dkon brtsegs): cig dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas khyod kyi yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i 'gyod pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po khyod ni bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang ba lags kyis
271a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhud cig / de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / btsun mo zla ba can dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / dge slong gi
271a6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bgyi ba mang zhing bgyid pa mang ba lags kyis bdag cag mchi'o/ /
271a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po da de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig ces bka' stsal nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra btsun mo zla ba can la sogs pa btsun mo'i 'khor
271a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po dag dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod
271b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig / chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
271b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
271b3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig /gzhan dag la yang ston cig /
271b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na rna lam
271b5(dkon brtsegs): du thos na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed na gang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rjod pa dang / lung ji skad phog pa bzhin du nan tan du grub pa
