271b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang /
271b7(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs
271b8(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / //
272a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /
272a2(dkon brtsegs): @##/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum bcu rtsa gsum pa ste 'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa lung bstan
272a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi ma la data ta pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
272a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
272a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang
272a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid
272a7(dkon brtsegs): par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma
272a8(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu phal cher thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/
272b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i
272b2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / byams pa dang / mya ngan med kyis byin dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / gom pa 'dor
272b3(dkon brtsegs): pa don yod dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song spong dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / yon tan rin po che'i me tog gis rtag tu brgyan dang / gser gyi phreng ba'i 'od
272b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dpal can dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems thogs pa med pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang yang thabs gcig go/ /de nas tshe
272b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang
272b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems
272b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ngan song spong dang / rin po che'i tog dang / mthong ba don yod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang /
272b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te/
273a1(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du zhugs nas/ de dag lam gyi bar skabs su gtam 'di skad ces/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis 'phags pa'i
273a2(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i gtam thos par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o zhes rjod par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ gang gis
273a3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi shes rab thogs pa med de/ de dag gi shes rab la mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la/
273a4(dkon brtsegs): kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la bdud kyi las rnams 'byung bar mi
273a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ ci nas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /
273a6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tsho ba pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag grong khyer na 'khod pa de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge
273a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang
273a8(dkon brtsegs): d ag bdag cag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed pa 'khod pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la thug gi bar du longs spyod zad mi shes pa rnyed par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i
273b1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa
273b2(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan rab nam grus smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i
273b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags
273b4(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nad med pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo/ snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug
273b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
273b6(dkon brtsegs): kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur bas smras pa/ ci nas kyang gang gis grong khyer na sgo dang / skar khung dang / rtsig pa dang / snod dang /
273b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan dang / shing dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gos rnams las stong pa nyid gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /
273b8(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong gis
274a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung du myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho
274a2(dkon brtsegs): bos bsam par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis
274a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog gis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer
274a4(dkon brtsegs): na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
274a5(dkon brtsegs): bas smras pa/ gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par
274a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang / gsad par bkri ba de dag thams cad thar pa
274a7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jig pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/
274a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa
274b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam
274b2(dkon brtsegs): na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bo'i bsam par bya'o/ /de nas nyan thos
274b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnam pa de lta bu'i gtam 'di brjod cing mnyen yod kyi grong khyer chen por phyin to/ /yang de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu
274b4(dkon brtsegs): mo dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan
274b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga po thob pa zhig yod de bu mo des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag mthong zhing de dag
274b6(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang thos so/ /bu mo de yang gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan
274b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ pha ma dang nang mi la byams pa/ btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa ste/ de dpyid zla tha chungs tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par pha mas dge mtshan dang / bkra
274b8(dkon brtsegs): shis byed du gnang nas bram ze zho dang / rtswa ku sha dang / me tog dang / yam sreg shing dang / mar dang / bum pa thogs pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te khrus bya bar khrid
275a1(dkon brtsegs): ba las bram ze de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bkra mi shis so snyam pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas par gyur to/ /
275a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bram ze de dag gi nang nas bram ze ches 'gras tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba des bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo dge slong dag mdun na 'khod pa ni bkra mi
275a3(dkon brtsegs): shis te/ de dag mthong na dgos pa 'am/ nor ram/ brtul zhugs sam/ mchod sbyin nam/ bkra shis kyang rung ste mi 'grub kyis grong khyer du bzhud do/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis
275a4(dkon brtsegs): byin pas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di dag chags med mchog tu dge shis pa/ /skye bo mang po'i sdig pa 'jig par byed/ /'di dag rnam par dag
275a5(dkon brtsegs): cing bden bzhi mthong / /dul la grol bar gyur cing mnyam par bzhag /'di dag rkang gnyis dam pa bsod nams zhing / /'di la yon phul mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'di la
275a6(dkon brtsegs): yon phul 'bras bu 'chi med 'thob/ /byin nas sems can ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /tshul khrims dang ni dul bar ldan pa yin/ /'dod las rgal cing sdig med re ba med/ /'di
275a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sman pa mchog ste 'jig rten rgyu/ /sdug bsngal gzir ba'i srog chags thar par byed/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje/ /de sras 'di dag rdul med nyon mongs med/ /
275a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang med/ /shes rab ldan mis 'di dag ji ltar spang / /'di dag brtul zhugs spyad cing 'dod chags zhi/ /bkra shis gyur cing mkhas pa sbyin char
275b1(dkon brtsegs): phab/ /'di dag rnams la bkur bsti chung byas kyang / /mi rnams chos dang de bzhin nor yang 'grub/ /'di dag mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs dge shes ldan/ /'di dag zhing mchog rnam dag
275b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang ldan/ /bram ze 'di la su zhig dad byed pa/ /de ni bsod nams mang po skyed par 'gyur/ /de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la tshigs su bcad de slar smras
275b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ byis pa'i sems kyi dbang du ma bzhud cig /mchod sbyin dus 'dir dge slong ma gzigs shig /ngur smrig gos can de bzhin mgo bregs pa/ /de dag don 'dod pas ni blta mi bgyi/ /
275b4(dkon brtsegs): yab dang yum yang dgyes par mi 'gyur zhing / /bdag kyang mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/ /khyod kyang mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur gyis/ /de bas dge slong rnams ni shin tu spongs/ /de
275b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ yon tan ldan pa 'di dag ma gtogs par/ /pha dang ma yang kho mo'i skyabs ma yin/ /
275b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyen gyi tshogs dang nor dang lang tsho min/ 'di dag 'khor bar byid pa rnams kyi skyabs/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' bas lus btang zhing / /de bzhin srog dang longs spyod rnams kyang btang / /
275b7(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum nyid skyabs yin ma gtogs par/ /kho mo'i skyabs rten sems can 'di na med/ /de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo
275b8(dkon brtsegs): btsas nas khyod kyis sngon sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs/ sngon chos kyang ma gsan/ sngon dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur kyang ma mdzad na khyod ci'i slad du sangs rgyas la dad par gyur/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas
276a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na tsan dan gyi khang bzangs kyi nang na gser gyi khri la bzhag pa'i tshe lha'i bu lnga brgya steng gi bar snang la 'dod pa kho mos mthong ste/ de dag rnam grangs
276a2(dkon brtsegs): du mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rjod/ chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rjod pa kho mos thos so/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gi nang nas gang gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba gcig po de la lha'i bu rnams
276a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis dris pa/ grogs po de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig /de ni ji ltar shes par bya/ de nas lha'i bu des kho mo'i bsam pa shes nas lha'i bu de dag kyang dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
276a4(dkon brtsegs): de yi dbu skra dri med snum zhing mdzes/ /gtsang 'jam g.yas su 'khyil ba'i lcang lo can/ /zhal mdog pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra/ /zla nya mtshan mo nam mkhar mdzes pa bzhin/ /de yi mdzod spu kha ba shel mdog bzang / /smin mtshan
276a5(dkon brtsegs): bar nas 'khyil cing shin tu mdzes/ /de yis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug /rgyal ba'i zhal yang shin tu mdzes par byed/ /mi dbang spyan mdzes 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra/ /sems stobs mi zhum tshems
276a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam thags kyang bzang / /de yi ljags che zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs/ /de yi zhal ni dri med rnam par mdzes/ /de yi gsung ni phan zhing snyan la ran/ /tshig rtsub spangs shing mi 'byed sdig pa med/ /skye bo dpag tu med
276a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dad mdzad cing / /'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i gsung yang sgrogs/ /de yi mgur ni dung dang mtshungs shing 'dra/ /de bzhin mi dbang phyag gi sor mo ring / /de yi phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra/ /brang yangs dri med lte ba gzhol
276a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing zab/ /rta mchog lta bur 'doms kyi sba ba nub/ /de bzhin spu yi khung bu gser dang 'dra/ /brla yi dbyibs ni glang po'i lag dang mtshungs/ /zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa e ne'i 'dra/ /thub pa'i dbang po bden
276b1(dkon brtsegs): gsung rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral/ /ngan ltas bcom pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i lta ba 'jig /'khor gyi nang du dri ba bye ba dris byas kyang / /'khrul med skyon dang bral bas sems can kun tshim mdzad/ /gya gyu med drang
276b2(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis lus ni tshim mdzad cing / /mya ngan 'das pa bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag zhi/ /skyo bo kun gyi yid 'ong mya ngan 'das ston cing / /mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston/ /de ni rang gis
276b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gyur ba ste/ /bdag nyid rgal cing pha rol rnams kyang sgrol/ /'gro ba'i skyob dang skyabs dang dge shis shing / /'jig rten kun la thugs brtse phan pa mdzad/ /ston pa de yi yon tan 'di dag dang / /
276b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mtha' yas kho bos de ma brjod/ /thos nas lha rnams yid dga' dang gyur nas/ /rgyal ba la ni dang ba'i yid kyang sgom/ /de nas bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bram
276b5(dkon brtsegs): ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos so/ /mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis
276b6(dkon brtsegs): non par ma gyur to/ /nam yang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma byas so/ /mngon
276b7(dkon brtsegs): par dran te de tshun chad nam yang pha la dga' ba 'am/ ma la dga' ba 'am/ ming po la dga' ba 'am/ spun la dga' ba 'am nye du la dga' ba 'am/ nor la dga' ba 'am/ rgyan la dga' ba 'am/ gos la dga' ba 'am/
276b8(dkon brtsegs): lus la dga' ba 'am/ srog la dga' ba 'am/ grong khyer la dga' ba 'am/ skye mched la dga' ba ma bskyed kyi/ bram ze gzhan du na sangs rgyas nyid rnam pas rjes su dran no/ /bram ze kho mos ni gsum sems la yid
277a1(dkon brtsegs): la bya ba yid la byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gang na bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bshad pa de thams cad kho mos legs par yongs su bzung zhing kho mos
277a2(dkon brtsegs): don tam tshig 'bru las yi ge dang tshig gcig kyang chud ma zos par byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba kho mos nam yang yid la ma byas par ma gyur to/ /kho mos
277a3(dkon brtsegs): nyin mtshan gang du yang sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang / chos ma thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur to/ /bram ze kho mo ni sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dge 'dun
277a4(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur bya bas chog pa med do/ /de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod song la lo rgyus 'di rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol cig de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rings
277a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul du song ste ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyus thams cad rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol to/ /bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas kyang ji ltar bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla
277a6(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa shing rta las babs
277a7(dkon brtsegs): nas bram ze de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas/ rje sa dang
277a8(dkon brtsegs): bcas par tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu bud med
277b1(dkon brtsegs): ni shes rab sor gnyis pa/ nyon mongs pa drag pa/ bag med pa mang ba/ dman pa la mos pa/ tshul bzhin ma lag pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du mchis pa lags na/ bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste ci nas bdag
277b2(dkon brtsegs): gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du btsun pas de ltar bdag la chos legs par bstan du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gtam byung ba 'di dang / bram ze'i tshig thos nas
277b3(dkon brtsegs): myur ba'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te/ des nyan thos de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag byas nas rang gi bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod na re kho mo nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis
277b4(dkon brtsegs): non par ma gyur to/ /nam yang dga' ba dang rtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do zhes zer ba de ltar khyod bde ba dang yid bde ba la brtson nam/ 'on te 'di ltar yid byung ba'i tshul gyis smra/ de nas rgyal po gsal
277b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyi rang gi bu mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyi gzugs byad lha yi bu mo mtshungs shing 'dra/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni de nyid chas pa'i cha byad 'dzin/ /ji ltar khyod ni nam yang gnyid kyis ma non pa/ /
277b6(dkon brtsegs): ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid byung gyur/ /khyod kyi rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu legs par 'byor/ /ma ni rtag tu khyod kyis dbang du gyur ba yin/ /bu mo dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod na/ /de yis khyod
277b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi lus ni dga' ba rnyed ma gyur/ /sdug cing phangs la yid du 'ong ba ste/ /skye bo kun la dga' ba skyed yin na/ /yon tan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa khyod/ /ci yi phyir na khyim 'dir dga' ba med/ /bu mo khyod kyis
277b8(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig thos gyur cing / /ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid mi bde/ /yongs su nyams shing yid byung sems su gyur/ /khyod kyi 'dod pa ci 'dra nga la smros/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal
278a1(dkon brtsegs): po gsal rgyal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab cig phung po nyes dmigs snod rnams dang / /khyim gyi skyon rnams thugs su ma chud dam/ /'khor ba'i gnas ni gar la lta dang mtshungs/ /'tsho
278a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'jig rten mi gnas 'jig pa can/ /sbrul gdug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di la/ /gnyid dang 'dod pa'i 'dun pa ga la mchis/ /khams 'di dag ni gdug pa'i sbrul bzhi ste/ /srid pa sems pa bde
278a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ga la mchis/ /mi mdza' tshogs kyis rab tu gtses gyur cing / /dgon par phyin la dga' ba ga la mchis/ /kun nas nyon mongs dgra yis yongs bskor ba/ /ji ltar bde 'thob rgyal po bka' stsol cig /
278a4(dkon brtsegs): dug 'thungs pa la bde ba ga la mchis/ /gsad par bkri la dga' ba ga la mchis/ /g.yang sa chen 'dir su zhig yid rton bgyid/ /rgyal po 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten de dang mtshungs/ /blo ngan dag gis lus
278a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams bor ba ni/ /ri rab tsam gyi phung por gyur to zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dpe ni bka' stsal na/ /'dus byas slu ba'i chos la su yid rton/ /pha dang ma dang sdug dang ming po dang / /bu dang rtsa lag gnyen tshogs
278a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun/ /'dus byas thams cad me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /'di 'dra'i mi sdug gang la su yid rton/ /gang tshe bdag gis rang byung rgyal ba mthong / /de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam sems kyang skye/ /byang chub sems
278a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni/ /yab cig bdag gis ma thos ma mthong ngo / /bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba blta 'tshal gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos/ /rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sras
278a8(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag mthong / /yab cig ji ltar 'dod pa bsten par bgyi/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig 'di thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pha cang mi smra bar gyur
278b1(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod la zhu ba zhus thugs brtse bar dgongs te lan gdab tu gsol/ 'di ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis
278b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci shes rab de 'dus byas lags sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas lags/ de gal te 'dus byas lags na de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas
278b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ /ci ste 'dus ma byas lags na/ 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la ni phrad pa ma mchis na/ phrad pa ma
278b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab chen po zhes bgyi/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
278b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ /shA ri'i bu bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ni 'dus byas mi 'dri'i/ bu mos ni skye ba med pa dris te/ de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/ /de nas bu mo dri ma
278b6(dkon brtsegs): med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/
278b7(dkon brtsegs): ci tshe dang ldan pa sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston tam/ 'on te chos su 'du shes pa gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston/ gal te sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na sems can ni ma mchis pa ste/ de
278b8(dkon brtsegs): lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o/ /'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam pa rtog pa ma mchis na rnam par mi rtogs pas ji ltar
279a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul 'byor bar gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
279a2(dkon brtsegs): maud gal gyi bu chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /maud gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo ni 'gyur ba mi 'dri'i/ bu mos ni 'gyur ba med pa dris te/ 'gyur ba med pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang
279a3(dkon brtsegs): chub yin pas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gang po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu
279a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa lags na/ ci tshe dang ldan pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston tam/ 'on te dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston/ gal te dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston na ni khyod byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs
279a5(dkon brtsegs): so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byis pa so so skye bo thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i slad du ste/ de lta bas na btsun pa yang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags so/ /ci ste dmigs pa ma
279a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i chos ston na ni chos smra ba nyid dngos po ma mchis par 'gyur te mi 'thad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
279a7(dkon brtsegs): gang po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /tshe dang ldan pa gang pos smras pa/ bu mo ni kun rdzob mi 'dri'i/ bu mo ni don dam pa dris te/ de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan
279a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar btsun pa 'od srung chen po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas langs te gzhan dag la chos ston cing gang dag las tha na gzar bu gang tsam
279b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi bsod snyoms yongs su blangs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ de ci btsun pas lus kyis sbyin pa spyod dam/ 'on te sems kyis sbyin pa spyod/ gal te lus kyis spyod na lus ni bems po g.yo
279b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa byed pa ma mchis pa ste/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa'i chos lta bu mig yor dang mtshungs pas des kyang spyod par mi nus so/ /ci ste sems kyis spyod na sems ni sgyu ma lta bu gnas pa ma mchis
279b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ des kyang spyod par mi nus so/ /ci ste lus dang sems kyi phyi rol gyis spyod na de ni ma mchis pa ste/ ma mchis pas ji ltar spyad par bgyid/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang cang mi
279b4(dkon brtsegs): smra bar gyur to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ni len pa mi 'dri'i/ bu mos ni len pa med pa dris shing
279b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dri bas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar btsun pa rab 'byor ni bcom
279b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci nyon mongs pa med pa de dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te chos nyid kyis rab tu
279b7(dkon brtsegs): phye ba lags/ gal te dngos po rab tu phye ba lags na ni 'dus byas su 'gyur ro/ /ci ste chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags na ni chos nyid ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
279b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do/ /mnyam pa nyid gang lags
280a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o/ /'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma mchis pa'o/ /tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni
280a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang lags pa de ni bstan tu ma mchis pa'o/ /bstan tu ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /dngos po ma mchis pa gang lags pa
280a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni ma byung ba'o/ /ma byung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams mi ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
280a4(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di la brjod du ci yang med/ cang mi smra ba de 'thob byed/ /spros pa med pa'i chos 'di dag /bu mo yongs su 'dri
280a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ /ji srid dngos po skye yod pa/ /de srid skyon gyis gos par 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyings ni tha snyad med/ /'di ni nyon mongs med pa'i tshul/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la
280a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam/ 'on te sems ma
280a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ gal te sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na sems ni brjod du ma mchis shing sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa lags na/ ci
280a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam/ ci ste sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na ni rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / rdo la
280b1(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa byung ba dang zhig pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin tu 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni sems ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas
280b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig /nam grus smras pa/ bu mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs
280b3(dkon brtsegs): su 'dri ste/ de ni nyan thos rnams kyis bstan par mi nus so/ /bu mos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang gzhan la/ nyan thos rnams kyi yang gzhan lags
280b4(dkon brtsegs): sam/ gal te chos kyi dbyings gzhan lags na ni tha dad du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su ma mchis te/ de bas na de bzhin nyid dang gnyis ni bye brag ma mchis na ci'i slad du tshe dang ldan pa nam gru de skad
280b5(dkon brtsegs): gsung nam gru yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig
280b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na lha'i mig gis dngos po gzigs sam/ 'on te dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs/ gal te dngos po gzigs na ni rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste dngos po ma
280b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa gzigs na ni chad par lta bar 'gyur te de yang mi rigs so/ /ma 'gags pa yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad
280b8(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/ bus mos ni shes rab kun tu 'jom pa dris pas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/ /
281a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa
281a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci mang du thos pa nyid de don du blta 'am/ 'on te tshig 'brur blta/ gal te don du blta na don ni brjod du ma mchis shing bsnyad du ma mchis pa ste/ de
281a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ rnam pa de lta bu gang lags pa de ni bstan tu ma mchis pa'o/ /
281a4(dkon brtsegs): ci ste tshig 'brur blta na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'brur rton pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pas de bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mang du thos pa nyid ni rton pa
281a5(dkon brtsegs): ma lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
281a6(dkon brtsegs): bo bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig / kun dga' bos smras pa/ bu mo ni yi ge dang bral ba 'dri ste/ de ni sgras tshim par byed par mi nus so/ /bu mo ni sems dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'dri ste/ slob pa rnams kyis ma yin
281a7(dkon brtsegs): na de ji ltar bstan par bya ste/ chos kyi mnga' bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu dgos pa'o/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod ni
281a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas zab mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab bam/ 'on te ngo bo nyid zab pas zab/ gal te
281b1(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab na ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni song ba ma lags/
281b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba ma lags te/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags shing gnyis
281b3(dkon brtsegs): su ma mchis la kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /ci ste ngo bo nyid zab pas zab na ni ngo bo nyid gang yang sus kyang brtag par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pas kho
281b4(dkon brtsegs): bo zab bo/ /bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par shes pas 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo yang
281b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs su med pa'i tshigs bla dgas so/ /bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal dmigs su ma mchis pa ni gang gi tshig bla dgas kyang ma lags te/ dmigs
281b6(dkon brtsegs): su ma mchis pa ni tshig bla dgas las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ji ltar gzhan dag la bstan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub
281b7(dkon brtsegs): ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te/ de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod
281b8(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin
282a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa de ci de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad dam/ 'on te chos kyi
282a2(dkon brtsegs): skur mthong bar mdzad/ gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di skad du/ gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong / /gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa/ /
282a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa 'dod chags ldan pa ste/ /skye bo de dag nga mi mthong zhes gsungs so/ /ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na chos kyi sku ni bstan du mi nus pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin
282a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa ste blta bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o/ /mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gis
282a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ mthong ba don yod bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig /mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'dri ste de ni bstan par mi nus so/ /bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ bdag ni dngos po 'am dngos po
282a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa mi 'dri'o/ /bstan pa slobs la de nas ston cig /mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs
282a7(dkon brtsegs): k yi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci zang zing dang bcas pa'i phan
282a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs par mdzad dam/ 'on te zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs par mdzad/ gal te zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad
282b1(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dga' ba ni zang zing dang bcas pa'i slad du'o/ /ci ste zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs par mdzad na zang zing ma mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma mchis pa lags so/ /rin po che tog
282b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer 'di na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong
282b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas las ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du
282b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa de ni khyod kyis bsam par mi spyod do/ /gal te spyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bsam par mi spyod na mi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong bar 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la
282b5(dkon brtsegs): yang zhing chung ngu myong bar ji ltar mdzad do/ /bdag po ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la bdag po rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te de ltar mdzad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /ngan song spong gis
282b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ kho bos ni smon lam gyi dbang gis mang du myong bar 'gyur ba'i las nyung ngu myong bar 'gyur bar byed do/ /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur du mi
282b7(dkon brtsegs): nus lags so/ /gal te nus par gyur na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i dgongs pa de smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar mi 'grub ste/ rnam grangs 'dis na smon
282b8(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur bar mi nus par rigs par bgyi'o/ /ngan song spong yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad
283a1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam
283a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci ting nge 'dzin de bdag la rag las pa lags sam/ 'on te gzhan la rag las pa lags/ gal te bdag la rag las pa lags na ni mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags
283a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ ji ltar khyod snyoms par zhugs pas gzhan dag gi sgrib pa rnams rab tu zhi bar mdzad/ ci ste gzhan la rag las pa lags na ni ting nge 'dzin de khyod kyi ma lags so/ /gang khyod kyi ma lags pa des ni gzhan la phan par
283a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad par mi spyod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ bu mo kho bo'i sbyor ba 'di ni byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas
283a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas lags na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sems can dag la sgrib pa rnams kyis gnod pa yang ma mchis so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
283a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par sel ba yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer
283a7(dkon brtsegs): na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang / gsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa dang / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs
283a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de ci khyod kyi sbyor ba 'di len pa dang bcas pa lags sam/ 'on te len pa ma mchis pa lags/ gal te sbyor ba de len pa dang bcas pa lags na ni byis pa so so skye bo rnams kyang len pa dang bcas pa lags te/ byis pa
283b1(dkon brtsegs): so so skye bo rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na yang mi rigs so/ /ci ste sbyor ba de len pa ma mchis pa lags na ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni nye bar sgrub pa ma
283b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad
283b3(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo ni skye ba dang 'gag pa mi 'dri ste de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/ /bu mo dri ma med
283b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pas smras pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo gang na skye ba med cing 'gag
283b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa de ni yi ge 'jug pa med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag yi ge dang 'jug pa mi ston te/ yi ge rnams la mi chags so/ /chags pa ma mchis pa
283b6(dkon brtsegs): ni chos kyi dbyings te/ de la ni rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma mchis so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa
283b7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa yang
283b8(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar sgrub pa gang lags pa de ci rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags sam/ 'on te rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags/
284a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags na ni 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags te/ de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba
284a2(dkon brtsegs): lags na ni ma byung ba la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad spobs pa thob par
284a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces bya ba'i kho bo'i smon lam 'di ni dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste btab bo/ /bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam btab pa'i sems bskyed pa de
284a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis sam/ 'on te mchis/ gal te mchis na ni rtag par lta ba lags so/ /ci ste ma mchis na ni chad par lta ba lags te/ de gsung na ni khyod kyi gsung ba log pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa
284a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsegs kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang
284a6(dkon brtsegs): d ag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa
284a7(dkon brtsegs): de ci byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi/ gal te mchis na ni rtag pa ste yod pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so/ /ci ste ma mchis na ni chad pa ste med pa'i
284a8(dkon brtsegs): mthar 'dzin pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ ci
284b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes de skye bas rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags/ 'on te skye bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa
284b2(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba 'dus byas su 'gyur te/ shes pa de ni byis pa rnams kyi lags so/ /ci ste zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni de la dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gang la dmigs pa ma mchis pa de la 'di ni so so'i skye
284b3(dkon brtsegs): bo'o zhe 'am/ nyan thos so zhe 'am/ rang sangs rgyas so zhe 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'o zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags na byis
284b4(dkon brtsegs): pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni byang chub la rnam par rtog ste/ mkhas pa rnams ni mi rtog pa'i slad du'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis
284b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par mi bya'i slar 'dong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ deng bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa las chos thos pa gang yin pa 'di ni
284b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i zas yin pas chog par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ chos kyi zas bza' bar bya'o/ /de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gang na gdeg
284b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa de la ci zhig khyod kyis btsal bar sems/ btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi tshul ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags kyi spros pa la dga' ba'i ni ma lags so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor dge
284b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi chos ni gnas pa ma mchis pa/ gnas par mi bgyis pa lags te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni mi 'khrugs pa lags so// // bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ de nas nyan thos chen
285a1(dkon brtsegs): po brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po de dag dang / bram ze lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / de las gzhan pa skye
285a2(dkon brtsegs): bo phal po che rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas
285a3(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas te gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
285a4(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ ting 'dzin stobs ldan grags pa mtha' yas mnga'/ /'jig rten mgon po bdud rtsi dga' stsol ba/ /mtshungs med ye shes
285a5(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs khyod la zhu/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar spyad pa spyod/ /ji ltar shing dbang drung mchis bdud rnams 'joms/ /ji ltar rir bcas sa rnams g.yo bar bgyid/ /grags pa mtha' yas
285a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'od zer gtong / /byang chub spyod tshul legs par bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas nor gyi gzungs ni ji ltar 'thob/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba dam pa ji ltar bsgom/ /mi yis rdzu 'phrul stobs ni ji ltar
285a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thob/ /sems can rin chen rnams kyi spyod pa gsungs/ /gang gis dran dang rtogs dang blo gros 'gyur/ /spobs pa mdzes dang ldan par gang gis 'gyur/ /gang dang rab tu ldan na 'khor nang du/ /snyan
285a8(dkon brtsegs): cing shin tu mdzes pa smra bar bgyid/ /gang gis mi ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /dri ma ma mchis lha yi mig kyang 'thob/ /lha rna 'thob cing pha rol sems tshul rig /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing rnams brgyad
285b1(dkon brtsegs): yang mchi/ /ji ltar sbyin pa gtong la brtson par 'gyur/ /rtag tu tshul khrims dag cing bzod la dga'/ /ji ltar brtson 'grus bsam gtan mkhas par 'gyur/ /shes rab la yang ji ltar shin tu
285b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson/ /mngal gyi gnas ni ji ltar rnam spangs nas/ /pad ma las ni rtag tu rdzus te skye/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar mchis par bgyid/ /bdag med stong pa nyid kyi sgra yang brjod/ /ji ltar de yid dga'
285b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dga' mtshungs/ /sred pa spangs shing tha ba zhe sdang spong / /mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems ma mchis/ /sems brtan g.yo ba ma mchis ri rab mtshungs/ /rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags dang /
285b4(dkon brtsegs): bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal dang / /ji ltar 'jig rten chos rnams zil mnan gnas/ /'jig rten kun na zla ba lta bur spyod/ /nga yi ma mchis tshul 'chos g.yo ma mchis/ /ji ltar rdul bral nga
285b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal rgyags pa spong / /zhi dang rab tu zhi dang zhi gnas brtson/ /blo ldan ji ltar ye shes mchog tu 'gyur/ /chung ma bu nor mang la dga' ma mchis/ /ji ltar bas mtha'i mal la mngon par dga'/ /rtag tu
285b6(dkon brtsegs): bya dang mtshungs shing zla ba 'dra/ /ji ltar chos kyi nor la dga' zhing mos/ /chu dang mtshungs shing sa 'dra rlung dang mtshungs/ /mkhas pa ji ltar me dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu ci yang ma mchis mi rtog lags/ /
285b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid la dga' zhing nam mkha' tshungs/ /ji ltar rtag tu chos ni spong mi bgyid/ /bdag 'dor bgyid kyi chos mchog yongs mi gtong / /'jig rten dag tu ston pa'i sems bskyed nas/ /ji ltar
285b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas te byang chub 'jug par bgyi/ /zhing gi bkod pa ji ltar gnas par 'gyur/ /dge 'dun dag par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/ /ji ltar dus gsum du yang chos thos shing / /ji ltar tshe ring
286a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can bde bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu sred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son/ /dgra bcom dul bar bden bzhi ji ltar mthong / /sems can brgya dag byang chub 'jog par bgyid/ /spyod cing rtag tu
286a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' mos ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang gis shin tu mdzes par 'gyur/ /brdzus te skye bar gang gis 'gyur/ /longs spyod tshe dang shes rab che/ /kun mkhyen rtogs par khong du chud/ /gang gis sum bcu
286a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu 'thob/ /bsod nams kun la mkhas pa lags/ /spobs pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur/ /zhing ni ji ltar dag 'gyur lags/ /dge slong dge 'dun
286a4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs/ /gang du de yis smon btab pa/ /der ni ji ltar skye 'gyur lags/ /tshe rabs dran par ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ /ngan 'gror
286a5(dkon brtsegs): mchi bar mi 'gyur lags/ /rnam par 'dren pa ji ltar na/ /mdog dang gzi brjid snyan grags 'thob/ /stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus rnams/ /ji ltar thub par mi 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas
286a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang yang / /dge 'dun la ni skyabs su mchi/ /lus dang srog ni gtong bgyid kyi/ /de dag chos ni 'dor mi bgyid/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod bgyid cing / /the tshom ma mchis ji ltar 'gyur/ /'gyod pa thams
286a7(dkon brtsegs): cad spangs nas su/ /srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston/ /khyod la mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'/ /thub chen khyod ni thams cad mkhyen/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang lags/ /go rims bzhin du bstan
286a8(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo legs so legs so/ /bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa la don
286b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni khyod yang legs so/ /bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das la legs so
286b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed de/ bzhi gang
286b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang / phra mo'i tshig yongs su spong ba dang / skye bo mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i byams pa sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems
286b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phrag dog mi bya phra ma smra mi bya/ /skye bo mang po dge ba rnams la sbyar/ /phyogs bcu rnams su byams pa bsgom byas na/ /
286b5(dkon brtsegs): bdud 'dir btul nas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin
286b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / chos zab mo la mos pa dang / yi dam la brtan pa dang / skye bo mang po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi
286b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /mkhas pa zab mo'i chos la bzod/ /yi dam la yang shin tu brtan/ /dkar po'i chos la 'dzud par
286b8(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med la/ /skye bo mang po dga' bar byed/ /de ltar chos bzhi de dag gis/ /zhing rnams bye ba g.yo bar byed/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas
287a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mar me sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can bag med par gyur cing mi khom
287a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur ba rnams kyi gan du song ste chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rin po che'i dra bas 'gegs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas
287a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mar me byin pas 'od ni rnam par dag /zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs su 'dzin/ /bag med gyur ba rnams la chos sbyin
287a4(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /mchod rten dag la rin chen dra ba 'bul/ /des na bye ba bsam yas zhing 'gro zhing / /byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong bar byed/ /reg nas sems can bde dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa byang chub
287a5(dkon brtsegs): bla med don du gnyer/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyan sna tshogs gtsang zhing dag pa sbyin pa dang / bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'dod pa
287a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang
287a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan na gzungs 'thob bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sna tshogs byin pas gzungs ni thob par 'gyur/ /slong ba rnams la bu mo brgyan te sbyin/ /rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod/ /rgyal ba'i
287a8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes don du shes rab bsgom/ /chos bzhi 'di dag gis ni gzungs 'thob 'gyur/ /bskal pa brgyar yang thos pa chud mi za/ /phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'chad pa/ /de dag thams
287b1(dkon brtsegs): cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la yid 'byung ba mang ba dang / gcig pur kun tu dga' zhing mgu
287b2(dkon brtsegs): la mos pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / las kyi mthar shin tu yongs su mthar phyin pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /de la 'di
287b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ srid pa'i 'gro ba kun la yid kyang 'byung / /bse ru lta bur gcig bur spyod la dga'/ /rtag tu shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ /de'i las rtag shin tu mthar yang phyin/ /rtag tu
287b4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi dag la zhugs nas su/ /byang chub spyod pa zhi ba myur tshol byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin la gor 'thob/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul byang chub rtogs/ /bu mo byang chub
287b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yang ba dang / sems yang ba dang / chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / khams bzhi nam mkha'i
287b6(dkon brtsegs): khams dang mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'thob bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lus yang ba dang de bzhin
287b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang yang / /chos rnams kun la gnas pa med pa nyid/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs shing 'dra nyid du/ /khams bzhi po dag byin gyis rlob par byed/ /chos bzhi 'di dag nges par
287b8(dkon brtsegs): bsten byas na/ /blo ldan de yis rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas 'thob/ /skad cig gcig la zhing rnams stong du 'gro/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyang mthong / /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos
288a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khro ba med de rtsod pa dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'phyag par mngon par brtson par 'gyur
288a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes rtag tu smra ba dang / chos smra ba rnams la khro gnyer dang bral zhing zhes 'gras pa'i sems med pa yin te/
288a3(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan la khro dang khon tu 'dzin mi byed/ /nga rgyal rgyags dang tha ba zhe sdang bral/
288a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa med la dga' zhing snyan par smra/ /gus par rgyal ba'i mchod rten 'phyag par byed/ /de ni tshul khrims rnam dag rtag tu srung / /de ni rtag tu legs par 'ong zhes smras/ /chos smra rnams la de ni tha ba med/ /
288a5(dkon brtsegs): de yi sems ni rdo rje ri rab mtshungs/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad ma'i steng na bzhugs pa byed du
288a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug cing me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mngon par 'thor ba dang / phan pa'i
288a7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po mang zhing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can dang / gzhan dag gi skyon mi 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i
288a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas sku gzugs
288b1(dkon brtsegs): pad ma mchog bzhugs byed du 'jug / chu skyes me tog lag pa bkang ste 'bul bar byed/ /pha rol dag la dga' ba skyed pa'i tshig kyang smra/ /dga' bar byad la mngon par brtson gyi skyon mi 'dzin/ /
288b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams yongs su sngo/ /thub mchog rnams kyi sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa shes/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i yon tan 'di bzhi bsten na de/ /rgyal ba
288b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog rnams drung du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ brnyas pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can dang / /chags
288b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / mos pa mang ba dang / lta bar gyur ba thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur
288b5(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ des pa brnyas pa med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ /de ni dngos po kun la rtag tu 'dzin pa med/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa bskyed byas na/ /de ni phyir zhing
288b6(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod chen po thob par 'gyur/ /dad dang ldan par 'gyur zhing g.yo med sgyu yang med/ /pha rol dag gi skyon ni 'dzin par yong mi byed/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas gang gi lta ba drang gyur pa/ /des
288b7(dkon brtsegs): na de 'dir longs spyod bzang po rnams dang ldan/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la ser sna mi byed pa dang / mi mthun
288b8(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'jug pas 'gyod pa sel ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdams ngag ston pa dang / stong pa nyid bsgom pa la mang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
289a1(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa nam yang ser sna yong mi byed/ /mi mthun 'jug pa med pas 'gyod pa sel/ /yang dag
289a2(dkon brtsegs): rab ldan gdams ngag ston par byed/ /rgyal ba'i spyod pa gang yin stong nyid sgom/ /chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/ /rgyal bas bzhed pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob/ /sangs rgyas
289a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bstan nas bslab byas nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas de 'gyur ro/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lung nod
289a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang kha ton la brtson pa rnams lung mnos pa dang gdams ngag brjed nas yun ring du lon te gsol ba 'debs pa la lung 'bog cing dran par byed pa dang / 'di ltar kun dga' ba'i tshig gis gzhan
289a5(dkon brtsegs): dag la dang ba nye bar sgrubs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par 'byung ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la chos ston pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la
289a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par brtson zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma la mkhas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lung mnos
289a7(dkon brtsegs): kha ton brjed la dran bar byed/ /gzhan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang sgrogs/ /skyo ba med par chos kyang rjod par byed/ /ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i mtshan ma legs par 'dzin/ /chos bzhi 'di
289a8(dkon brtsegs): dag nges par bsten byas na/ /mthu chen ldan pa tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /bskal pa stong phrag bsam yas rjes su dran/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i mchog nyid myur du 'thob/ /bu mo
289b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spong ba dang / srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang mi
289b2(dkon brtsegs): sten pa dang / srog gi phyir yang chos smra ba la skur ba mi 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas
289b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub gya tshom spong mi byed/ /chos smra ba la skur ba yongs mi 'debs/ /des na sdig pa'i grogs rnams rnam par spong / /g.yel ba med par rtag tu
289b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dran/ /chos bzhi'i 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/ /bde gshegs rnams dang phrad pa des 'thob bo/ /bla med byang chub ma thob bar du yang / /'dren pa gang na bzhugs pa der de skye/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
289b5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshun sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rin po che spar gyis 'thor ba dang / 'bru
289b6(dkon brtsegs): mar dri zhim po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'khru bar byed pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'khor gyis mkhan po dang / slob dpon la bsnyen
289b7(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya bas rim gro byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po dag 'thob bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mchod rten la ni spar
289b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis dbyig rnams 'thor/ /dri zhim 'bru mar rnams kyis mchod rten 'khru/ /spos dang me tog sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul/ /yid du 'ong bas mkhan po slob dpon sten/ /de'i lus sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ /
290a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mdzes shing yon tan kun dang ldan/ /gang gis shes rab mchog ldan rgyal mdzes pa/ /chos de dag gis skyes chen mtshan du 'gyur/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dpe byad
290a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po brgyad bcu po dag 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul ba dang / gzhan la sti stang byed pas mi skyo ba dang / chos smra ba la 'thab mo mi rgol ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub yang
290a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu po dag 'thob bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul/ /gzhan
290a4(dkon brtsegs): la sti stang byed pas skyo ba med/ /chos smra ba la 'thab mo yong mi rgol/ /sems can rnams ni byang chub 'dzin du 'jug /'di bzhis lus la dpe byad bzang po rnams/ /'di ni de yis rnyed par dka' ba med/ /yon
290a5(dkon brtsegs): tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di na brgyan par 'gyur/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin
290a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nyin mtshan du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kha ton byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa skye ba med cing 'gag pa med par nges pa la
290a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas 'dzin pa dang / lus dang srog dang yo byad rnams la mi lta ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na spobs pa 'thob bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /byang
290a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/ /nyin mtshan rab tu 'don par byed/ /'jig rten kun dang mi mthun pa/ /skyo ba med par rab tu sgrogs/ /mchog tu dga' ba rnyed gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin par
290b1(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /lus dang srog la mi lta bar/ /de ni byang chub lta bar byed/ /bzhi po 'di dag bsten byas na/ /de yi spobs pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun/ /sna tshogs phreng 'dras tshim par byed/ /bu
290b2(dkon brtsegs): mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / 'khor
290b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dre ba med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi rnyed la nam yang phrag dog med/ /mthong nas
290b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur te ser sna med/ /sems can kun la de yi sems kyang snyoms/ /'khor dang 'dre bar de ni yong mi byed/ /chos bzhi 'dis ni zhing gi bkod 'thob cing / /myur du byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /bu mo
290b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / mi mthun pa rnams kyi sdums byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang kha ton byed du 'jug pas
290b6(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs pa dang / phra ma'i tshig yongs su spong ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi 'khor ni nam yang
290b7(dkon brtsegs): yong mi 'byed/ /skye bo mi mthun pa dag 'dun par byed/ /lung nod kha ton byed la yang dag 'dzud/ /pha rol dag la dbyen gyi tshig mi smra/ /chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/ /dge 'dun rgya chen rnam dag thob par 'gyur/ /
290b8(dkon brtsegs): de bas dge 'dun rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pas chos 'di rtag tu bsten par bya/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan
291a1(dkon brtsegs): dag gi shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol du phyin pa drug po yongs su dag pa yongs su tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du
291a2(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed de tha na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang sti stang byed pa dang / shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
291a3(dkon brtsegs): na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan la mchod pa mthong na phrag dog med/ /pha rol phyin pa dag pa yongs su 'tshol/ /byang chub sems dpa' ston par rtag tu sems/ /
291a4(dkon brtsegs): shes khe bde ba'i don du tshul 'chos med/ /yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de phrad 'gyur/ /zhing gang dag tu smon lam btab byas pa/ /'dod pa bzhin du zhing der skye bar 'gyur/ /
291a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar chos btags pa 'di dag bdag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas par ma
291a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyis na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad bslus bar gyur cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi
291a7(dkon brtsegs): bu chen pos bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod de skad smra ba ni ngo mtshar te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub dka' bar mi shes sam/ de nas
291a8(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar da ltar de
291b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar brtags pa'i chos 'di dag kyang yang dag
291b2(dkon brtsegs): par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cig /sems can gang la yang gnod pa med par
291b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig / bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des lha'i me tog gi char mngon
291b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'bab par gyur cig / ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra 'byin par gyur cig /bdag kyang bud med kyi lus las gyur te skyes pa'i lus su red cing lo bcu drug lon pa 'dra bar gyur cig /smon
291b5(dkon brtsegs): lam de skad btab cing bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di byas ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag
291b6(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong gi sgra yang byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa yang bud med kyi lus mi snang bar gyur te skyes ba'i dbang po thob nas lo bcu drug lon pa tsam gyi gzhon
291b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'dra bar snang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngo mtshar che ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
291b8(dkon brtsegs): dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di'i bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis rgyu 'di dag so sor yongs
292a1(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal
292a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang sbyin gnas
292a3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang
292a4(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi
292a5(dkon brtsegs): kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od des 'jig rten gyis khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par mdzad nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te slar log nas bcom ldan
292a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
292a7(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol bas/ lha dang tshangs pa'i sgra dang mi mjed bdag po'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dbyangs ldan ba/ /mgon po lha sgra
292a8(dkon brtsegs): yid 'ong ldan zhing 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi bar mdzad pa po/ /gti mug spong ba 'jig rten dag na dga' ba bzang po gzhal yas skyed mdzad pa/ /stobs bcu yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba gang gi don
292b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'od btang bstan du gsol/ /rir bcas nags 'tshal bcas shing chab dang bcas pa'i sa rnams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /lha rnams nam mkhar gnas shing lha yi me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char ba 'bebs/ /
292b2(dkon brtsegs): seng ges wa pham bgyis pa bzhin du khyod kyis mu stegs gzhan kun pham par mdzad/ /dpa' bo gang gi don du 'od kyi ltas 'di bstan pa mdzad pa bka' stsal gsol/ /nyi zla bye ba stong gis 'od bkye ba dang
292b3(dkon brtsegs): glog dang nor bu rnams 'od dang / /lha dang klu dang dri za gnod sbyin dag gi 'od rnams 'bar ba gang lags pa/ /shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas dge zhing dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang mjal gyur nas/ /'od rnams thams
292b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mog mog bgyis na sangs rgyas 'od ni phyogs bcu rnams su mdzes/ /khyod kyi smin mtshams bar gyi mdzod spur rab mdzes dkar zhing dri ma ma mchis bzang / /'bar zhing pad ma'i rtsa dang dung dang me tog kun
292b5(dkon brtsegs): da 'dra bas phyogs gsal bgyid/ /thams cad mog mog bgyis nas gdugs kyis srin bu me khyer bzhin du rgyal ba mdzes/ /mi yi seng ge thub 'di gang gi don chen bzang por de 'gyur bstan du gsol/ /de skad
292b6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di byin gyi brlabs gang gis bud med kyi dngos po
292b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur te skyes pa'i dbang po thob par gyur ba mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa
