297b7(dkon brtsegs): blo zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni grags pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
297b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spobs pa dpag med bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i blo de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad
298a1(dkon brtsegs): cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
298a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yang 'gyur ro/ /ngan song gsum po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang
298a3(dkon brtsegs): der ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar par byed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs
298a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa/ /de yi yon tan bgrang bar mi nus shing / /de ni byang chub 'thob par the tshom med/ /de la the tshom med par gzungs skye'o/ /yon tan rin chen me tog gun du rgyas pa shar lho'i mtshams
298a5(dkon brtsegs): k yi phyogs na shin du mdzes pa bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig da ltar
298a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i
298a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra skad kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po
298a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / snying rje chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu 'thob
298b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyi tshe rjes nas skyes pa'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di 'dzin byed pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpas yon tan 'di dang gzhan/ /bsam gyis
298b2(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas mang po mthong / /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs na bkod pa dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi
298b3(dkon brtsegs): khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni chos thams
298b4(dkon brtsegs): cad skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa
298b5(dkon brtsegs): can de mtshan thos pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag dgu mnyes par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu gang gis na sems
298b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed ces bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur zhing de chos ston pa na ting nge 'dzin de'i chos nyid thob pas
298b7(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
298b8(dkon brtsegs): yid 'ong gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can rnams gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing sems can ngan song du skyes pa thams cad yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ de dag de nas yongs su grol nas lha dang mi'i lus thob par
299a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gser mchog 'od dpal gyi ni mtshan 'dzin pa/ /de la gzi brjid dpal mdog stobs
299a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang bo/ /tshe rabs kun du rnyed par dka' ma yin/ /de la blo thogs med pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa nub byang mtshams na sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de
299a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni khyim rgyas pa
299a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa
299a5(dkon brtsegs): can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs
299a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu'i chos ston pa yang thos par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'di
299a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa/ /tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas zhing du de/ /de ni tshe dpag med ldan chos shes 'gyur/ /skye gcig thogs pas byang chub rdzogs 'tshang rgya/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs
299a8(dkon brtsegs): n a mya ngan thams cad las rgal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba
299b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med
299b2(dkon brtsegs): p ar byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu rnam pa drug bcu dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par
299b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgra dbyangs yan lag drug bcu phun tshogs ldan/ /de ni kun du shes pa 'ang pha rol phyin/ /
299b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba bye ba brgyad bcu mchod byed pa'i/ /bsod nams gang yin bsam yas des 'thob 'gyur/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa steng gi phyogs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'jig rten
299b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang / nam mkha' dge bar sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
299b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni tshad med len ces bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang / nam mkha' nges par sgrogs
299b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang /
299b8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /sa nas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
300a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig gzung bar 'os pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /spobs pa bul ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
300a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /yi ge dang sgra'i brda yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs mthon po dang rigs chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa lnga yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par yang
300a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni yan lag brgyad dbyangs phun sum 'thob/ /de ni sangs
300a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bral bar yang mi skye/ /mi de mi thogs byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa 'og gi phyogs na/ tha dad pa med pa nyid la dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs
300a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni ye
300a6(dkon brtsegs): shes kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin
300a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de'i tshe rjes ma thag tu sangs rgyas yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba gcig gis thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par
300a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /thos nas kyang thams cad kun du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
300b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mtshan 'dzin sangs rgyas bye ba phrag /dgu bcu rnams kyi chos bstan thos 'gyur zhing / /skye ba gcig thogs bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems
300b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyis gzungs thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems
300b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob bo/ /lha dang mi'i skye dgu sum khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bcom
300b4(dkon brtsegs): bcas ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa dang / tham cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
300b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yon tan rin chen
300b6(dkon brtsegs): me tog kun du rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te
300b7(dkon brtsegs): gtan la phab pa/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum bcu rtsa lnga pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyi mi khyab pa lung bstan pa/
300b8(dkon brtsegs): bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsin t+ya bud d+ha bi Sha yA nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
301a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong du tshang
301a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang yang thabs gcig go/ /
301a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /yang de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ /lha'i bu dpal bzang
301a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ngas khyod la bskul kyis/ khyod kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam las rtsoms
301a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ lha'i 'khor 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la spobs par gyis shig /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
301a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul las brtsams te spobs par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gang mig gis yul ma lags pa dang / gzugs
301a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul ma lags pa dang / rna ba'i yul ma lags pa dang / sgra'i yul ma lags pa dang / sna'i yul ma lags pa dang / dri'i yul ma lags pa dang / lce'i yul ma lags pa dang / ro'i yul ma lags pa dang / lus
301a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul ma lags pa dang / reg bya'i yul ma lags pa dang / yid kyi yul ma lags pa dang / chos kyi yul ma lags pa ste/ de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yul khyad par ma mchis
301b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'tshal bas/ khong du chud pa ma mchis pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi yul de ltar khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /

301b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma med pa ni yul lo/ /khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir smon pa med pa ni yul lo/ /'du byed mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni yul lo/ /'dus byas mnyam pa

301b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la mngon par brjod pa ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das mngon par brjod pa ma mchis pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du
301b7(dkon brtsegs): btsal bar bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su btsal bar bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
301b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma lags kyi/ gang 'di sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa de ni sangs
302a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa 'am ldog pa yod dam ce na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa
302a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams las yongs su btsal/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'jug pa ma mchis ldog pa ma mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa med cing
302a3(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa med na sangs rgyas kyi yul ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su shes/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis pa

302a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin kyang gzhan zhig lags na ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes kyang bstan par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
302a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs
302a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas so zhes ston lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid du gang gis gnas pa shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
302b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas nas/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun du 'byung
302b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mnyam pa nyid des de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas te 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun du 'byung /
302b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid des de bzhin gshegs pa gnas pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci stong pa
302b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchis pa gang gis stong pa nyid mchis pa'i mchis pa des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags so/ bka'
302b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal yod pa gang gis stong pa nyid yod cing yod pa gang gis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yod/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yi ge dang / skad dang / sgra dang / brjod pa'i mchis
302b6(dkon brtsegs): pas stong pa nyid mchis lags so/ /yi ge dang / skad dang / sgra dang / brjod pa'i mchis pas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
302b7(dkon brtsegs): skad du dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/ dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang /
302b8(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni med pa ma yin no/ /
303a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag gal te ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa med du zin na/ skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /
303a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed
303a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni yod de/ de'i phyir skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags so zhes bka' stsal pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gal
303a4(dkon brtsegs): te stong pa nyid ma mchis su lags na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni mchis te/ de'i slad
303a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams las 'byung bar gdags lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa de de lta yin du zin na/ gang su
303a6(dkon brtsegs): dag stong pa nyid la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las
303a7(dkon brtsegs): gud du stong pa nyid tshol ba de ni rnal 'byor la mi spyod pa lags te/ rnal 'byor ma lags pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las gud du stong pa nyid btsal bar bgyi
303a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyid stong pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas pa
303b1(dkon brtsegs): yin nam/ 'on te 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de dang bdag
303b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam ste/ gang mnyam pa nyid de thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ zhe sdang dang bral ba yang ma lags/ gti mug
303b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ gti mug dang bral ba yang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong dang / bram ze gang dag bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral bar yang
303b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rjes su lta zhing pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de dag ni lta bar gyur ba gnyis la chags pa lags so/ /gnyis
303b5(dkon brtsegs): gang lags she na/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag
303b6(dkon brtsegs): gi chad par lta ba lags so/ /gang pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi rtag par lta ba lags so/ /yang bcom ldan
303b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong ni pha rol dman pa dang / bdag khyad par du 'phags par yang dag par rjes su mi lta lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de gang du
303b8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yang dag par zhugs pa de ni gang du yang zhugs pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de lam la zhugs
304a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang lam la zhugs pa de ni 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa lags te/ gang 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa de mnyam pa nyid du ga la 'gyur lags/ de ci'i
304a2(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus bgyis na skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa dang ldan pa'i slad du'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus ma byas la grangs gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
304a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma bgyis la grangs gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma bgyis la grangs mchis par gyur na de 'dus bgyis nyid du 'gyur gyi 'dus ma bgyis ma lags so/ /bka' stsal
304a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal gang 'dus ma byas thob pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la grangs gang yang yod par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams la grangs gang yang ma mchis te/
304a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams ni grangs ma mchis pa/ grangs dang bral ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te 'phags pa ma yin pa'i
304a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags so/ /ci lags gang bcom ldan 'das
304a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sprul pa de 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags sam/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i
304a8(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bstan pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de lta'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos
304b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis mtshan nyid lags na bdag kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags te/ de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang
304b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yang ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci dang ldan/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba dang ldan lags so/ /bka'
304b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul rnyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis brnyes na bdag gis kyang rnyed lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
304b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yul ma brnyes sam/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi yul gang yang rnyed
304b5(dkon brtsegs): dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/ yul rnyed pa yang med do/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang
304b6(dkon brtsegs): med/ yul brnyes pa yang med do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ni rjes su bsrung ba med par chos ston te/ khyod ni las dang po pa rnams rjes su mi bsrung ngo / /smras pa/ de bas na gnas brtan nyid
304b7(dkon brtsegs): la yongs su dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du lan thob shig / btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sman pa mkhas pas nad pa yongs su srung zhing kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / tsha ba'i
304b8(dkon brtsegs): sman ma byin na ci des nad pa de la nad med pa'i bde ba byin pa yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du gang chos smra bas las dang po pa yongs su srung zhing zab
305a1(dkon brtsegs): mo'i gtam bcabs te/ gtam sna tshogs bstan na des de yang dang yang 'chi ba las thar par byas par mi 'gyur/ shin du bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu bzhag par mi 'gyur ro/ /bstan pa 'di
305a2(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /lha'i bu brgyad brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /lha'i bu bdun brgyas 'jam dpal
305a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur ba'i spobs pa thob nas 'dod cing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces
305a4(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas sems can 'dul na/ ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol te/ btsun
305a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yang yin/ kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba'ang yin no/ /
305a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci nyan thos sam/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas sam/ 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos yin te/ pha rol las mnyan pa'i
305a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra la sbyor bar brtson pa ni ma yin no/ /kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yin te/ snying rje chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni ma yin no/ /kho bo ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te bya ba'i rgyun bcad pa
305a8(dkon brtsegs): ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar nyan thos yin/ smras pa/ chos ma thos pa mnyan pa/ sems can thams cad la thos par byed de/ des na kho bo nyan thos yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal
305b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod ji ltar rang sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ kho bo chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rtogs te/ des na kho bo rang sangs rgyas so/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/
305b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ kho bos chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par khong du chud de/ des na kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
305b3(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gang la nges pa yin par gzung bar bya/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni sa thams cad la nges pa yin par zung shig /
305b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod so so skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya 'am/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa
305b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du nges par nges pa'o/ /nges pa des sems can thams cad kyang nges pa ste/ kho bo yang nges pa der nges pa nyid do/ /des na kho bo so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam
305b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gal te/ chos thams cad la yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa yin na 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o/ /'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /'di ni byang chub sems
305b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes sa rnam par gzhag pa gdags par ga la 'gyur/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' la 'di ni shar phyogs kyi nam
305b8(dkon brtsegs): mkha'o/ /'di ni lho phyogs kyi'o/ /'di ni nub phyogs kyi'o/ /'di ni byang phyogs kyi'o/ /'di ni shar lho yi'o/ /'di ni lho nub kyi'o/ /'di ni nub byang gi'o/ /'di ni byang shar gyi'o/ /'di ni 'og gi'o/ /'di ni steng gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'o zhes brjod
306a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang phyogs cha la tha dad pa yod kyi/ nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa med do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thabs la mkhas pas 'di ni so so'i skye bo
306a2(dkon brtsegs): 'i sa'o/ /'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes sa rnam par 'jog kyang sa rnam par gzhag pa la tha dad pa yod kyi yang dag pa nyid du nges
306a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni tha dad pa med do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam/ smras pa/ zhugs pa yang yin la/ byung ba yang yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na khyod zhugs pa yang yin la/ byung
306a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes blta bar bya ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig bshad pa'i don
306a5(dkon brtsegs): dpes shes par 'gyur ba yod de/ de'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slob dpon chen po zhig la sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ blta na sdug pa'i bu gcig pa zhig
306a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang yod/ de la mi sdug pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba/ phyir rgol ba zhig kyang yod pa las/ des bu gcig pa de thag ring po lam gol ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du de ni bdag la phyir rgol ba yin no snyam du
306a7(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes te/ des de gsad pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs nas 'phangs ma thag tu bu gcig pa yin pa'i 'du shes skyes te/ de sngon goms pa byas pas shin du brgyugs te/ mda' de bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog pa nyid du lag
306a8(dkon brtsegs): gis 'dzin pa 'di ni don rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa'o/ /'di la don du blta ba gang zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phong gi slob dpon zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor
306b1(dkon brtsegs): bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no/ /gsod pa'i phyir rgol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshig
306b2(dkon brtsegs): bla dgas so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon gyis mda' 'phangs la bu
306b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa'i lus la ma phog par shin du brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par
306b4(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog go/ /yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs bskyed pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
306b5(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dzud do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi yul yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang
306b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang dang / 'jig rten na yang spyod la 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis kyang mi gos shing 'jig rten na yang snang la chos thams cad la snang ba med pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub
306b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa thams cad la yang snang las ngan pa la yang mi gnas pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
306b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang pa'i phyir yang brtson la/ chos kyi dbyings zad par ni yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang
307a1(dkon brtsegs): dag 'dus byas las kyang bskyod la 'dus ma byas kyang yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor ba la bskyed mos tshal dang gzhal med
307a2(dkon brtsegs): khang du yang 'du shes la mya ngan las 'das pa yang don du gnyer zhing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag med pa'i bzod pa yang thob la sems
307a3(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
307a4(dkon brtsegs): su dag par bya ba la yang brtson pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par yang mthong la/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
307a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyan gyi phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o/ /
307a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su shes pa dang ldan yang 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos
307a7(dkon brtsegs): ston to/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba las rtsoms te spobs par gyis shig /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par
307a8(dkon brtsegs): 'da'/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /
307b1(dkon brtsegs): de la gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o/ /tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o/ /'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni chu shing lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /
307b2(dkon brtsegs): dbu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / smig rgyu dang / chu shing dang / sgyu ma gang yin pa de la 'jig rten yang med/ 'jig rten du gdags pa yang med/ phung po rnams kyang med/ phung por gdags pa yang med par
307b3(dkon brtsegs): gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar mos pa de ni yang dag par zhugs pa'o/ /gang yang dag par zhugs pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /gang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma
307b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa de 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de la gnyis su med do/ /gang
307b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med/ nga yir 'dzin pa med do/ /gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de la chags pa med de/ chags pa med pa rnyed pa ni 'jig rten las yang
307b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'da'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus pa'o/ /gang dag rkyen la rag lus pa de dag rag lus pa med pa'o/ /gang dag rag lus pa med pa de dag bdag po
307b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o/ /gang dag bdag po med pa de dag bdag gi ba med pa'o gang dag bdag gi ba med pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med do/ /gang la
307b8(dkon brtsegs): 'thab pa med pa de la rtsod pa med do/ /gang la rtsod pa med pa de dag dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa'o/ /gang dag dge sbyong gi chos mi rtsod pa de dag nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs te/ chos thams
308a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs par shes nas 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o/ /chos
308a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyang dbyings med pa ste/ gang dbyings med pa de la mig gi khams med do/ /gzugs kyi khams med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /rna ba'i khams med do/ /sgra'i khams
308a3(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /sna'i khams med do/ /dri'i khams med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /lce'i khams med do/ /ro'i khams med do/ /lce'i
308a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /lus kyi khams med do/ /reg pa'i khams med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /yid kyi khams med do/ /chos kyi khams med do/ /yid kyi rnam par
308a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams med do/ /gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do/ /chu'i khams med do/ /me'i khams med do/ /rlung gi khams med do/ /nam mkha'i khams med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams
308a6(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /'dod pa'i khams med do/ /gzugs kyi khams med do/ /gzugs med pa'i khams med do/ /'dus byas kyi khams med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams med do/ /gang khams med pa de la bdag
308a7(dkon brtsegs): med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gso ba med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes med/ shed bu med de/ gang gis de dag rjes su rtogs pa med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de 'jig
308a8(dkon brtsegs): rten las yang dag par 'da'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de las dge slong stong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de dag sems rnam par grol nas rang
308b1(dkon brtsegs): rang gi bla gos kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag ni thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs
308b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med do zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs/ dge slong de dag gis
308b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa/ mngon par rtogs pa med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba nyid do/ /mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
308b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni rlom sems nyid do/ /g.yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi las so/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni bdag gis thob bo/ /bdag gis mngon par rtogs so zhes 'di lta bu 'di
308b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi tshul du rnam par rtog par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams shes sam/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das mkhyen pa dang ldan pas mkhyen te/ bdag cag
308b6(dkon brtsegs): ni ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid ma shes par bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes smra ba lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya zhing kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lam
308b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtshan nyid mi shes pa bdag gis lam bsgoms so zhes smra ba lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o snyam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang / kun 'byung gi mtshan nyid dang /
308b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam
309a1(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'o/ /chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de la ni gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes so/ /gang kun 'byung ba spong ngo / /gang 'gog pa mngon du byed do/ /gang
309a2(dkon brtsegs): lam sgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di thos nas skrag pa de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la
309a3(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
309a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba nyid las zab mo chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos te/ chos zab mo mnyan pa de nyid kyi rgyus 'di ltar mngon par shes pa myur bar gyur to/ /
309a5(dkon brtsegs): zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di la yang rjes su 'thun par gyur te mi mthun pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ma gtogs par gang dag nga'i
309a6(dkon brtsegs): g sung rab 'di la chos zab mo bstan pa 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang lhag par mos pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la 'dus pa gsum gyi grangs su gtogs par rig
309a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /gang yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de ni bzod pa gang yang rung ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces
309a8(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod rgyun du 'dzam bu'i gling na chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhud do/ /der dga' ldan gyi ris kyis lha rnams la chos bstan du gsol/ de na lha'i bu
309b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yod de/ de dag yul phun sum tshogs pas bag med pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das dang / khyod la chos nyan du mi 'ong bas na de dag
309b2(dkon brtsegs): chos mi nyan pas yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ de dag khyod las chos thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas de'i tshe gang gis lha'i bu
309b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal bzangs dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang / nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang /
309b4(dkon brtsegs): nyams dga' ba'i rdzing dang / nyams dga' ba'i bskyed mos tshal dang / rim pa bdun dang / brgyad dang / bcu dang / nyi shu pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsil khang dang / ba gam dang / stegs bu dang /
309b5(dkon brtsegs): rta babs dang / skar khung dang ldan pa de dag kyang snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo rkang lag 'jam zhing mnyen pa/ gser gyi dra ba ltar 'od rnam par dag pa/ smin ma legs pa/ 'phral ba legs pa/ bzhin legs pa
309b6(dkon brtsegs): mig pad ma mdab ma brgyad pa sngon po lta bur mdzes shing dri ma med pa shin du yangs pa/ 'dod pa'i sems bskyed pa/ zla ba tshes pa ltar mngon par dga' ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas pa de dag rgyud
309b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa dang / pi bang dang / sgra snyan dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / rnga zlum dang / rdza rnga dang / rda snyan pa dang / gling bu dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / gar dang / bzhad gad dang / 'jo ba dang
309b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rtse bas rgyags shing dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so/ /de 'dra ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas
310a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis rang gi gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang mthong / rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams kyang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la
310a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal bdag cag 'di ltar myur du dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin te/ nyams dga' ba'i kun dga'i ra ba 'di dag dang zhes bya ba nas/ dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dang /
310a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi rang gi gnas 'di dang rang gi g.yog ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar te/ 'di dag snang ba ngo mtshar to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu dpal bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi
310a4(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos la/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang ma phyin te/ lha'i bu 'on kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang /
310a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu kho bo cag kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi
310a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi brlabs
310a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'di ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis phyogs 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos par 'di snyam du bdag cag dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to snyam pa ni ngo mtshar
310a8(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig ngas shes pa las khyod kyis ji tsam zhig shes te/ lha'i bu 'jam
310b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad zhing gcig tu yang dag par ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye
310b2(dkon brtsegs): ma snyed gang dag yod pa/ de dag gtsug phud kyis phug ste/ steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'jog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na rgya mtsho chen por gyur ba'i chu'i phung po gang dag yod pa de dag thams
310b3(dkon brtsegs): cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu blugs kyang chu'i sems can rnams la gnod pa med de/ thams cad kyang rang rang gi rgya mtsho chen po na gnas par bdag nyid kyis shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na ri'i rgyal po
310b4(dkon brtsegs): ri rab gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ ri de dag yungs dkar gyi 'bru'i nang du bcug kyang ri rab la gnas pa'i lha de dag la yang gnod pa med de/ thams cad
310b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod par bdag nyid kyis shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag
310b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar sbyar ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu dag de dag la sgrub bo/ /gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye
310b7(dkon brtsegs): ma snyed sreg par byed pa'i me de dag thams cad mar me'i snying po gcig gi me lce tsam gyi mer byin gyi rlob ste des bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i
310b8(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma rnyed dag na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig gi 'od kyis zil tu rlag par byed do/ /lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i
311a1(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul las brtsams nas nga bskal ba 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang chos ston te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba ni rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di
311a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dang ldan no/ / // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bdud sdig can 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug ste/ des bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das
311a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul de dag gis blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das tshig tsam du gsungs pas ci sman kyis
311a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la mngon sum du gyur cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can du mkhyen bzhin du sems can tshad med pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad
311a5(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal ngas khyod la bskul gyis khyod kyis 'khor 'di dag la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang cho 'phrul ston cig dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur
311a6(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul par shes nas chos thams cad sems kyis dbang sgyur ba rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal
311a7(dkon brtsegs): g zhon nur gyur bas chos thams cad sems kyis dbang sgyur ba rnam par 'phrul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jam dpal gzhon nur
311a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / mi mang bar mthong ngo / /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis cho 'phrul de mthong
311b1(dkon brtsegs): nas ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /sangs rgyas byung ba legs so legs so/ /sangs rgyas byung ba ni sems can rnams la don chen por nye bar gnas so/ /de byung bas skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang 'jig rten du byung
311b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ /cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu yang 'jig rten na snang ba yin no zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyi cho 'phrul de mthong ste/ ngo mtshar du gyur nas thal mo sbyar te 'jam
311b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste ngo mtshar to/ /sems can gang dag cho 'phrul bshad pa
311b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas mos pa de dag ngo mtshar che bar bdag gis bsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdud sdig can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur kyang de ltar mos pa'i sems can de la bar chad bgyi ba'i rngo mi thog
311b5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can bdag ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba dang / sems can rnams la yang gtse bar sems pa dang / brtson pa'i
311b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du yang zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam
311b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa der kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mig gis mi rtsol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag mi mchi bar bdag yi dam de lta bu blang bar bgyi'o/ /gang dag 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang /
311b8(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dang / so sor rtog pa dang / sgrub pa de la ston pa la bgyi ba ltar gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'on du lags kyang bdag gi 'khor gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i bar chad bgyi ba dang / brtson
312a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams g.yengs par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa dag mchis te/ de dag chad pas dgum pa'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par
312a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ /ta d+ya thA/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ s+thi ta twe/ a ga la ma nirdzi ta sha tru/ dza ye dza ya ba ti/ b+hu ta ma ti/ sha me/ shAn ti/ a phu me/ phu phu me/ d+hi re/ a khe ma khe/ kha khe/ mi si le/ a ga me/ phu la te/ phu la/ phu le/
312a3(dkon brtsegs): pha shu me/ shu shu me/ d+hi d+he re/ a na pa na te/ s+thi ta tre/ kr-i tA ra the/ kr-i ta bir+ya/ bai ro tsa na sad d+harma b+ha Na ko s+ya sU tra s+ya d+ha ri ka /a b+h+ra mu ga ta i ba sUr+ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba gang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams
312a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis kun du bsrungs pa de la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bar chad bgyi ba ni gnas ma lags shing skabs ma lags te/ de ni gnas ma mchis kyi steng du de la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos
312a5(dkon brtsegs): sman dang / yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub pa dang / spro bar bgyi ba dang / spobs par bgyi bar spro bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod
312a6(dkon brtsegs): pas g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i rgyud kyis gdugs mtshan 'das par bgyid pa de dag lha rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
312a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur te/ de dag la slar rgol ba 'am mi mdzad pa gang gis glags bltas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
312a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdud sdig can la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sdig can legs so legs so/ /'dir khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa brjod pas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos
312b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ khyod kyi spobs pa de thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs
312b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di bstan pa dang / bdud kyi gsang sngags kyi stobs dang / rig sngags kyi stobs bstan pa na srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal
312b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur bas rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu khyod dga' ldan gyi gnas su song la dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams sdus shig dang kho bo yang der 'ong
312b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad dang / nyan thos
312b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge 'dun la bskor ba byas nas 'khor dang bcas par 'khor de nas mi snang bar gyur te dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to/ /de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la smras
312b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'o bu cag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong gis de la dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha khyed dga' ba dang / rtse ba la bag med pa 'or te bag yod par
312b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la chos nyan du shog shig / de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi dbus su lha'i yid las
312b8(dkon brtsegs): byung ba rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams mchur shar nub tu dpag tshad sum khri nyis stong yod la/ zheng lho byang du dpag tshad khri drug stong yod pa byas te/ der seng ge'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/
313a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba stong phrag du ma byas so/ /de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dag dang / seng ge'i khri rnams kyang
313a2(dkon brtsegs): byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa bgyis lags na da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na
313a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs su gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dang / nyan thos kyi mchog lnga brgya dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za stong phrag du ma dag dang
313a4(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar
313a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams der rang gi khri ji ltar bshams pa la 'dug go/ /byang
313a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab
313a7(dkon brtsegs): bral dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang bdud kyi ris rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i tshangs ris kyi lha nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pa/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhon
313a8(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur ba dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'brel ba'i chos kyi gtam chen po smra bar 'gyur gyis bdag cag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir nges par der 'dong bar bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag mthong ba ni legs par mthong ba'o/ /
313b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag las chos thos pa ni legs par thos pa'o zhes sgra thos nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu tshad med grangs med pa dag rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi
313b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas su phyin to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas de lta bu'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyi brlabs pas des lha'i 'khor de tsam du tshad med pa dag rin po che bkod pa'i khyams kyi 'khor de nyid du go skabs yangs par gnas par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu
313b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal lha'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus lags na chos kyi bka' mchid las brtsams te spobs par mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
313b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas lha'i bu dpal bzangs dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams
313b5(dkon brtsegs): cad sdud par 'gyur ba dag go/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul khrims la gnas pa'i thos pa dang / bsam gtan la gnas pa'i shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa la gnas pa'i ye shes dang / thabs la mkhas
313b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bag yod pa ste/ grogs po dag chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o/ /grogs po dag de la yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul
313b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims la 'jug ste/ yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / ngag dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / sems dag pa'i
313b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pas 'jug pa dang / bsam pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / 'tsho ba dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /
314a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhog slongs dang / thob kyis 'jal ba thams cad rnam par spong ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i
314a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pas 'jug pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul khrims la 'jug go/ /grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis thos pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam
314a3(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma la gus pas yongs su dag pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pas yongs su dag pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin thob pas yongs su dag pa dang /
314a4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa mi g.yeng bas yongs su dag pa dang / bstan pa dang rab tu bshad pas yongs su dag pa dang / bdag la mi stod
314a5(dkon brtsegs): cing gzhan la mi smod pas yongs su dag pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos sgrub pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs
314a6(dkon brtsegs): po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis thos pa yongs su dag go/ /grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
314a7(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas shing dben pa la dga' bas yongs su dag pa dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas yongs su dag pa dang / yul dang mi 'dre bas yongs su dag pa dang / lus dang sems las su rung bas
314a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / kha zas bsnyungs te lus 'tsho bas yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jog pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgra dang mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pas yongs su dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
314b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang zang zing med par so sor yang dag par 'ged pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag go/ /grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su
314b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / khams la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag
314b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / rnam
314b4(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa'i sgo gsum la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / bag la nyal dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / lta ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag
314b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag go/ /grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa med par gzugs
314b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mthong bas lha'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med par sgra thams cad thos pas lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta bas pha rol gyi
314b7(dkon brtsegs): sems shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med cing chags pa med par sngon gyi mtha' rjes su dran pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas
314b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro bas rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba yongs su dag pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad pa shes pas bsal cing dus ma yin pa yongs su spangs pas zag pa zad pa yongs su dag pa dang /
315a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba dang / rlom sems thams cad dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / ji ltar sngon dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pas shes pa bstan pa yongs su dag
315a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag go/ /grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga yongs su shes pas
315a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sred pa shin du spong bas kun 'byung ba shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / brten nas skyes pa la skye ba med par so sor rtog pas 'gog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'dus byas
315a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas lam shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bas rgyu shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso
315a5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pas rkyen shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su gcod pas dus gsum shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ye shes thams cad la 'jug pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
315a6(dkon brtsegs): shes yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag go/ /grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi
315a7(dkon brtsegs): bas yongs su dag pa dang / phyi rol du mi rgyu bas yongs su dag pa dang / khams gsum la mi gnas pas yongs su dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'thun pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med
315a8(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par so sor rtogs pas yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med par so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis shin du mi 'khrugs
315b1(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag 'di ni rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bag yod pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul
315b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / thos pa yongs su byang bas yongs su dag pa dang / bsam gtan de la ma chags pas yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab dang gsung rab kyis yongs su dag pa dang / mngon
315b3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa las ma nyams pas yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes kyis rlom sems med pas yongs su dag pa dang / nges par sems pas rtsod pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba'i chos chud mi za bas yongs su dag
315b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ grogs po dag rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis bag yod pa yongs su dag go/ /grogs po dag de lta bas na khyed bag yod par gyis shig /bag yod pa la rton pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bde ba gsum las yongs
315b5(dkon brtsegs): su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i bde ba dang / bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'o/ /ngan song gsum las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di
315b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten te gsum po de dag go/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / rga ba'i
315b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal te gsum po de dag go/ /'jigs pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa
315b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'khor la bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa ste gsum po de dag go/ /srid pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i srid pa dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o/ /dri ma gsum sbyong
316a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'dod chags kyi dri ma dang / zhe sdang gi dri ma dang / gti mug gi dri ma'o/ /bslab pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab bo/ /
316a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa gsum thob par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa'o/ bsod nams bya ba las byung ba'i dngos po gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sbyin
316a3(dkon brtsegs): pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom par byed de/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /rigs gsum rgyun mi
316a4(dkon brtsegs): gcod de/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gsum gsum rab tu spong ste/ ser sna'i dri ma dang / ser sna'i kun du sbyor ba dang /
316a5(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims las zlog pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa las zlog pa dang / bzod pa
316a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus las zlog pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan las zlog pa dang / bsam gtan dang ldan
316a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab las zlog pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ston pa gsum gsum gyis nye bar ston te/ gsum
316a8(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa

316b4(dkon brtsegs): na khyed cag bag yod par gyis shig / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang / de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas 'thob bo/ /grogs po

316b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / tshor ba'i gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi gnas med cing rten med pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa zhes bya'o/ /tshegs chung ngus yang dag pa'i spong
316b7(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma
316b8(dkon brtsegs): 'thon pa dang / mngon par ma grub par yang so sor rtog cing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par
317a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par yang so sor rtog cing / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i phyir
317a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing
317a3(dkon brtsegs): sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du yang mos la dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems
317a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par grol bar yang yid ches la/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang / nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba dang / phyir zhing 'phel bar

317a6(dkon brtsegs): chos gang gi skye ba yang med/ 'gog pa yang med pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang lus
317a7(dkon brtsegs): dang sems las su rung ba ste/ de sems las su rung bas dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yang mi 'dor la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang mngon par brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin

317b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dbang po drug la rten par mi byed cing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin par bya'i phyir shes pa yang gtong la/ gcig tu gnas pa yang thob par 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dad pas kyang
317b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gro ba dang / thams cad kyang yongs su thob la/ blang ba yang med cing dor ba yang med pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam la yang rmongs pa med la/ dran pa yang med cing yid la byed pa yang med pa dang / chos thams

317b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yang yang dag par chad pa 'di ni de'i dbang po bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de stobs lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang /
317b6(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba dang / dran pa'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad du mi 'phrogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrib pa rnams kyis mi
317b7(dkon brtsegs): non pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lta bar gyur ba rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/ de ltar stobs lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa
317b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar
318a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi
