318a5(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lam bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa dang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe
318a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgom pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pa'i yang dag pa'i ngag bsgom pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhog slongs dang / thob
318a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jal ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba bsgom pa dang / lus dang sems nyam chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' bsgom pa dang / bdag la stod pa dang / gzhan la smod pa dang bral ba'i yang
318a8(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i rtsol ba bsgom pa dang / gti mug dang rmongs pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni
318b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o/ /des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang / de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas
318b2(dkon brtsegs): thob ces bya'o/ /grogs po dag de ltar na bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di dag la 'jug go/ /zhugs nas 'du byed thams cad kyi 'dam las rgal
318b3(dkon brtsegs): lo/ /rgal nas kyang rnam par lta ste/ rnam par bltas na mi mthong ngo / /mi mthar ro/ /shin du nye bar zhi ste rnam par 'khrul bar mi byed do/ /shin du nye bar zhi ba gang zhe na/ gang nye bar ma bsgrubs pa de ma byas pa'o/ /gang
318b4(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa de myong ba med pa'o/ /gang myong ba med pa de la gdags pa med do/ /gdags pa med pa ni shin du nye bar zhi ba'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma
318b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' lam ji ltar sgom/ smras pa/ lha'i bu byang
318b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba yang mi spong la/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so/ /'dus ma byas su yang mi ltung la/ 'dus ma byas kyi yon tan rnams kyang myong ngo / /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam
318b7(dkon brtsegs): yang sgom la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang snang ngo / /lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni stong pa nyid kyis rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ lta bar gyur ba la yang mkhas
318b8(dkon brtsegs): shing lta bar gyur ba la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /mtshan ma med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ mtshan ma la yang mkhas shing mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /smon pa med pas rnam par dag
319a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang yin la/ khams gsum pa la yang mkhas shing khams gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ skye ba dang 'jig
319a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang mkhas shing skye ba dang 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa rnams ni sems can chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam pa'i lta bar
319a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur bar zhugs pa/ lta bar gyur ba bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi lta bar gyur ba spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la/ lta bar gyur ba de dag kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems
319a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems nges par sems pa ni mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos thams cad la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rjes su 'thun
319a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig par lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de yang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pa nyid du mthong ste/ 'di
319a6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
319a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'gro ba ni sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la'o/ /'ong ba ni so so ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa skyed pa'i phyir ro/ /'ong ba ni 'dod pa'i
319a8(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi sems can gyi nang du skye ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'phags pa'i lam du'o/ /'ong ba ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'gro ba ni
319b1(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'ong ba ni bzod pa de sems can gyi khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa la'o/ /'ong ba ni 'byung
319b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /'ong ba ni 'khor ba na sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'gro ba ni gang du
319b3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med par so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ong ba ni chos khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'gro ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
319b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro/ /'ong ba ni rnam par rtog pa gsum spang bar chos ston pa'i phyir ro/ /'gro ba ni dam bcas pa brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'ong ba ni dam bcas
319b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'ong ba ni byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i phyir te/ lha'i bu 'di
319b6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/ /de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis
319b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bgyi ba zhig thos na 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams yon
319b8(dkon brtsegs): tan thams cad kyi 'od de phyogs gang na mchis/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig chos ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
320a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
320a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po zhes bya ba chos ston to/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
320a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kun du bzang po de blta bar bgyi'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba snyoms par
320a4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs ma thag tu lus las de dang 'thun pa'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed po de dag snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de yang snang ba
320a5(dkon brtsegs): chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa de dag gis 'od de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo
320a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'di ltar yongs su dag pa 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
320a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
320a8(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /'tsho 'o/ /gzhes so/ /chos kyang ston to/ /de na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba zhes bya ba dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
320b1(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs te/ de'i lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab po/ /des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab po/ /gsol pa/ bcom
320b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la blta bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
320b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang pos zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong byung ste/ 'od zer de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye
320b4(dkon brtsegs): ma snyed las 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing / bcom ldan
320b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyang mthong ngo / /byang
320b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de mthong zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du
320b7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de ltar
320b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gtam chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na/ khyed kyi nang nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'gro bar spro ba su yod/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin ces bya ba der 'dus te 'dug par
321a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba des bcom ldan 'das de la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi bar spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas
321a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes sgron ma 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
321a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la sangs
321a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i mdun gyi steng gi bar snang la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par phyin to/ /de'i g.yog
321a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa legs par gnas pa rnams su phyin to/ /de dag rang rang gi stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kyang
321a6(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /'jam dpal bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po des khyod la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
321a7(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dir btang ngo / /khyod kyis 'od bkye ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/ /de na 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong
321a8(dkon brtsegs): nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma ji tsam du 'di ltar myur bar 'od zer 'di 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin pa dang / ji ltar myur bar byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa 'di ni
321b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa de dag gi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
321b2(dkon brtsegs): g yur bas lha'i 'khor chen po de ltar 'dus pa de la ci nas kyang lha khrag khrig phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta de ltar chos
321b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba ji srid du dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha rnams kyi don bya ba de srid du byas nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag dang lhan cig /rang gi 'khor dang
321b4(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ sems kyi 'gyu ba tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
321b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ phyogs gcig tu rang rang gi stan la
321b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
321b7(dkon brtsegs): lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po
321b8(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa chung ngam / nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad
322a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par rab tu gzeng bstod de yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /yang dag
322a2(dkon brtsegs): par dga' bar mdzad cing yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la yang dag par gzeng bstod de/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag skyes
322a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dam pa 'di dag dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs dang / sems can
322a4(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pa dang / thabs dang / rigs pa dang / ye shes dang / shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba dang spobs pa la ltos/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bskal pa
322a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa dag go/ /sems can gang dag gis dbang po drug po dag la skyes bu dam pa 'di dag mngon par 'gyur ba de
322a6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni phyis bdud kyi yul la gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
322a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir phyin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las chos thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub
322a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos par
322b1(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
322b2(dkon brtsegs): bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig / chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung
322b3(dkon brtsegs): lags na 'di'i ming ji skad bgyi bar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal gyi le'u dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab
322b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
322b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las sangs rgyas kyi
322b6(dkon brtsegs): yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad
322b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum bcu rtsa drug pa ste/ 'phags pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus
322b8(dkon brtsegs): pa lung bstan pa/ bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su s+thi ta ma ti de ba pu tra pa ri pri ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
323a1(dkon brtsegs): mdo| sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
323a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa dgra bcom pa sha stag dang / 'jam dpal dang / seng ge'i rtog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi
323a3(dkon brtsegs): khri nyis stong la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / lhun po
323a4(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / rab tu mi sgul dang / don rab sems dang / legs par bsam pa sems dang / sems dpa' ba dang / sems kyi blo gros dang / sems bzang po dang / nor
323a5(dkon brtsegs): bu brtsegs dang / ri 'jigs rgyal po dang / lag na rin po che dang / sems pa rin po che dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag bteg dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / rtag tu brtson dang / sems
323a6(dkon brtsegs): can sgrol dang / brtson 'grus mos pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa la gnas pa dang / smon lam 'phags dang / lag na sgron ma dang / sems mnyam dang / ngan song spong ba dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa
323a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'joms pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / dpag med rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo gnas kyis rnam par gnon
323a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / blo gros dam pa dang / khyad par blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel dang / 'gro grub dang / sa 'dzin dang / zla 'od dang / zla ba'i tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / snang ba thob pas
323b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gnon dang / seng ge ltar rnam par gnon pas mngon par bsgrags pa'i nga ro dang / spobs pa thogs med dang / spobs pa bzhad pa dang / spobs pa dpa' ba dang / rnam par gnon dang / nyi zla'i 'od
323b2(dkon brtsegs): zer mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang / dmigs med dang / blo gros dpe med dang / rtag tu bzhad dgyes dbang po dang / nor bu dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / bud med rnam sgyur go cha dang /
323b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu snang ba dang / rnam par snang byed dang / mes byin dang / tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs zab mo dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub
323b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag dang
323b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs gcig go/ /lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang / de dag
323b6(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri sum stong dang yang thabs gcig go/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po
323b7(dkon brtsegs): lhun po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po nyi khri dang yang thabs gcig go/ /klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i
323b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zla ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po drug khri dang yang thabs gcig go/ /de dag
324a1(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma
324a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /de'i tshe na 'jam dpal
324a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur ba rang gi gnas na 'dug pa/ gcig pu dben par gyur cing nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems med cing sems dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
324a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba langs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs
324a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/
324a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni brgya la brgya lam na ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig
324a7(dkon brtsegs): rten du 'byung ba de bzhin du gang dag skye ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba gsal ba/ brtag tu med pa/ rtog ge ba dang bral ba/ zab pa/ shes par dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs
324a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na ni chos mnyan pa yang med do/ /chos mnyan pa med na ni sems
324b1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad pa yang med pas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/ zhu ba zhus pa ji lta bus sems can rnams
324b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la nem nur med cing the tshom med par 'gyur ba
324b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can 'di dag ni 'dod chags che ba/ zhe sdang che ba/ gti mug che ba/ dkar po'i chos dang bral ba/
324b4(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa/ glen pa/ blun pa/ mi gus pa/ sangs rgyas dang bral ba/ chos dang bral ba/ dge 'dun dang bral ba sha stag yin pas ci nas kyang sems can 'di dag gis chos thos nas shes
324b5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba zhu'o snyam mo/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de
324b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag zab mo'i bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe 'jam
324b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur ba kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
324b8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mnyan pa/ 'jam pa/ rnam par dag pa/ 'od gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ yongs su dag pa'i 'od
325a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /'od de dang / snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag dang / ri'i rtse mo dang / shing ljon pa dang / ri dang /

325a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba dag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i
325a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od 'di ltar yid du mchi ba/ 'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba 'di bcom ldan 'das rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'dis bdag

325a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / nam mkha' lding gi sgra dang / dri za'i sgra dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
325a8(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / mi'i sgra dang / mi ma yin pa'i sgra dang / bya'i sgra dang / ri dgas kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur to/ /rlung gi sgra dang / chu'i phung po'i sgra dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i shugs kyi

325b5(dkon brtsegs): gsung gi phrin las brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin gsung zhing de dag gis gsung gi phrin las sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus pa de lta bu des bsnyen bkur
325b6(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag la bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsung brjod pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun du gang bar gyur te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po
325b7(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang sgra mngon par 'byin cing rol mo'i sgra dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra grag par gyur to/ /rol mo'i sgra de dag las mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung zhing stong pa
325b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i

326a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / btang snyoms thams cad kyis yongs su bsgos pas yongs su tshim par byed pa ste/ 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bsngags pa

326b7(dkon brtsegs): y od pa dang bral ba nyon mongs pa can gyi las la spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas

328b1(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog phreng dang / spos kyi char dag dang / me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / skya snar dang / d+he nu ska ri dang /

328b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sgra dbyangs kyis go bar byed cing lhags te/ de lta bu'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

328b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gang ji snyed
329a1(dkon brtsegs): yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur to/ /sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin/ phrag dog
329a2(dkon brtsegs): gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ 'chab pas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ yongs su gdung bas ma yin te/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i sems dang ldan
329a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
329a4(dkon brtsegs): b com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
329a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la lus mi snang bar byas te/ lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting
329a6(dkon brtsegs): n ge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i pad ma kha dog sna tshogs 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po dag la skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug par
329a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de dang / me tog gi char dang / spos kyi char dang / phye ma'i char de dag dang / sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po sgra
329a8(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa de dag dang / snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur ba yang mthong / 'khor phal po che lha dang / klu dang /
329b1(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyi lus
329b2(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
329b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin du dri ma med pa'i zhal/ /mi yi dam pa stobs bcu
329b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan brgya dag des bsags pa/ /bsam yas gzhal du ma mchis yid gnyis mun pa sel ba po/ /sa bla lha yul rnam par rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar sbyin dang dul
329b5(dkon brtsegs): ba legs par spyad/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis/ /bzod stobs shin du stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i stobs ldan pa/ /yon tan mnga' ba mdzum mdzad bdag
329b6(dkon brtsegs): gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ /sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bskal pa brgya dag rnam spyad kyang / /skyo zhing spong ba mi mnga' dgyes pa gzhal du ma mchis brnyes/ /sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid
329b7(dkon brtsegs): spyan dang sna tshogs gtang / /spyan dgyes thams cad gtong ba bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ /khyod kyis sngon chad chibs dang glang po shing rta dpung chung bstsal/ /gtong la dgyes pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig
329b8(dkon brtsegs): brgya yang gtang / /thub pas zhal zas stsang nan de bzhin pho brang dkor yang bstsal/ /sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs khyod la zhu/ /stong pa'i chos rnams nges par bsten cing thugs la legs
330a1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pas/ /rdul bral sku lus gtubs kyang sdug bsngal 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing / /gsungs shes zhus na bzod pa gsung ba'i stobs la brtson pa yi/ /yon tan mnga' ba rdul
330a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba khyod la zhu ba 'tshal/ /'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris la/ /bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni/ /thugs rje bskyed nas bskal
330a3(dkon brtsegs): pa brgya dag srid pa 'dir spyad pa/ /dpa' bo lam rab ston par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig /bde gshegs legs pa mdzad pa khyod ni 'gro la thogs mi mnga'/ /spyad pa legs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul
330a4(dkon brtsegs): zhabs dang ye shes brnyes/ /bdag dang sems can rnam par gshig cing stong pa'i chos la brtson/ /shin du dri ma ma mchis bsam bsgom bdag gi the tshom khum/ /khyod kyis sngon ni sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa rtson
330a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab snying rje byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bsten/ /khyod kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin/ /'byung gnas bzang po shin du gnas pa bdag gi skyabs
330a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig / rdul bral khyod kyis sku lus dum bu dum bur bcad cing ni/ /srang la gcal ba mdzad cing dam dum lhag rol ma lus par/ /sku kun ril gyis btang ste phug ron phrug gu gcig ma btang / /rdul
330a7(dkon brtsegs): bral 'od mdzad thugs rje mnga' ba the tshom bcad du gsol/ /lha tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo g.yos shing dgung ni rdib gyur la/ /lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mtsho bas gyur cing / /mkha' la gnas
330a8(dkon brtsegs): shing rgyu ba'i dgung zla dog sar lhung gyur kyang / /rgyal ba drang po mdzad pa khyod ni log pa'i tshig mi gsung / /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon
330b1(dkon brtsegs): par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung zhing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags
330b2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyod la ci zhig bya thong
330b3(dkon brtsegs): shig / 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin no/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par gyur na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs shing bslad par
330b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
330b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung de'i phyir legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das
330b6(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung 'di na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
330b7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis snang bar byas nas 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs
330b8(dkon brtsegs): phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yang dag par bskul te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas de dag gis da bzod nga'i rkang pa la
331a1(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag byas te/ nga la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la tal bdun srid tsam na pad ma dag la 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad
331a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag mang
331a3(dkon brtsegs): po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos
331a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang mi gda'o/ /
331a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'di ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang
331a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po gang dang / byams pa chen po gang dang / phan par 'dod pa gang dang / spyod pa gang la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa
331a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gang la gnas pa de la mi gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang la spyod pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de la yang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung byang
331a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs
331b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis gzigs pa kho nar zad do/ /'od srung rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang re
331b2(dkon brtsegs): shig mi mthong na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces
331b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dag dang / spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob
331b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bcu
331b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang /
331b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing de la rlom sems med pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmigs pa med cing de las ye shes yongs su tshol ba dang / lus dang
331b7(dkon brtsegs): srog kyang yongs su gtong na dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / tshogs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin cing tshogs des rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul
331b8(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing pha rol du phyin pa de dag la rtog pa med pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad
332a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bkod nas phyis byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang byang chub mi dmigs pa ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
332a2(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
332a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang sems 'ga' yang ma bskyed pa'i legs par gsungs pa gsung pa ni bcom ldan
332a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams la yang dgod par bgyi na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lta smos kyang ci mtshal lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
332a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de lta bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mi nus te/ ting nge 'dzin de'i ming yang ma shes na snyoms
332a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems
332a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
332a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'ongs kyi bar du khyod re shig sdod cig dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las ldang zhing de'i 'og tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de lta mod kyi khyod nyid ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob
332b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa rtogs shig / de nas gnas brten 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta
332b2(dkon brtsegs): bus gnas pa blta ba'i phyir de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
332b3(dkon brtsegs): gi 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba yang ma shes/ de dag gi gnas dang rab tu gnas pa yang ma shes/ ci byed pa dang / ci ston pa dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du ma shes ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
332b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das
332b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa shin du ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag da dung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs
332b6(dkon brtsegs): pas kyang de lta lags na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo su zhig bla na med pa
332b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi slad du go cha 'tshal
332b8(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid pa ni go cha legs par 'tshal ba lags pas ting nge 'dzin 'di ni slad kyis kyang yongs su btang bar mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras
333a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin te/ 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang ma yin na sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
333a2(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas gnas brtan
333a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin sum khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag gi mtshan ma yang shes par mi nus so/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor
333a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi stobs
333a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag gis 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba yang ma shes/ 'greng ba yang ma mthong / 'chag pa yang ma mthong / 'dug pa yang
333a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong / nyal bar yang ma mthong ste/ de dag blta bar ma nus so/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
333a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te/ bdag zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa lags pas bcom
333a8(dkon brtsegs): l dan 'das bdag gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur cing gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig shos kyang rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu
333b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ der mi la la zhig skyes nas der ri rab tsam gyi rnga shing thogs te/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i mdun du mchis nas sug las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal pa'i bar du rgyun mi
333b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chad par rnga bo che de gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i slad du de ltar bsgrubs te/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa la re shig bskal
333b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'das par gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi sgra de dag bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par rig pa tsam du yang grags par mi 'gyur na des ting nge 'dzin de las slongs pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma
333b4(dkon brtsegs): m chis lags na bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan zhing ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la
333b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ de dag gi gnas kyang ma 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes de lta bu yongs
333b6(dkon brtsegs): s u tshol ba na sems can re re'i slad du bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par gyur kyang spro bar bgyi zhing bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
333b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur
333b8(dkon brtsegs): na ni bdag slad ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar spyod cing de lta bu'i theg pa chen po yang yongs su spong bar mi bgyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la legs so zhes
334a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus tshig de skad smras pa legs so legs so/ /rab 'byor khyod gal te phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
334a2(dkon brtsegs): b ar ma gyur du zin na khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyas srid gang gA'i klu gi bye ma snyed du 'jug cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
334a3(dkon brtsegs): bar yang 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ /bde bar
334a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mang lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor yongs su brtag pa'i phyir gal te sems can de dag thams cad dge slong rab 'byor dang / shA ri'i bu dang / 'od srung chen po ci 'dra ba
334a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan par gyur la/ rab 'byor nyan thos chen po de lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar brtags kyang
334a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang dag la spyod pa de dag la mi spyod pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
334a7(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
334a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba gnas de nyid na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po 'di dag
334b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus kyis/ bdag gis lha 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas na 'di lta
334b2(dkon brtsegs): bur 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pas pad ma'i shing rta'i phang lo tsam 'dab ma ni gser/ sdong bu ni dngul snying po ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po/ ze ba ni bai dUr+ya las byas
334b3(dkon brtsegs): p a bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul cing pad ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dpal

339b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to/ /lha'i bu smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang na bzhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so/ /lha'i

340a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i slad du de skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to/ /de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so zhes gsung / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ kho bo'i
340a3(dkon brtsegs): mdun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin snyam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i khams
340a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir nam mkha' ji lta bu yin pa de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang de lta bu yin pas nam mkha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa
340a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu de lta bas na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod na mtha' 'di khong du chud par bya zhing cung zad kyang rnam par brtag par mi bya'o/ /de nas yang
340a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas de'i tshe khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin du mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ sum khri nyis stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs
340a7(dkon brtsegs): p a de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan lha'i dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing khri stan re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
340a8(dkon brtsegs): sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dag sprul to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas ji lta bu'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs na 'di lta bur gyur ba'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs
340b1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni rnam par spyod pa'i pad ma gang dag yin pa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom
340b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar byed cing phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar

340b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod/ /byang chub mchog gi spyad pa btsal mdzad pas/ /de slad mi mchog khyod ni mdzes pa lags/ /thub pa mtshan gyis yongs su spras gyur pa/ /sku mchog srid pa gsum na lhang nge ste/ /'dren
340b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang la mi dang srog dang ni/ /gang zag ma mchis chos ni 'gro la ston/ /rnam par 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad/ /bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bsten/ /khyod kyi shes rab srid
340b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum thogs mi mnga'/ /ye shes mthar byon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig chos rje lha dang mis mchod pa'i/ /'jig rten 'dren pa la ni 'dud 'gyur zhing / /stong pa nyid la mos par bgyid pa
340b8(dkon brtsegs): yi/ /mi de 'jig rten dag gi 'dren par 'gyur/ /gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /gang dag phyogs rnams bzhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag /de dag gis ni mtshan med ston pa'i chos/ /rang
341a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis rtag tu bsgoms/ /'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni/ /skye dang mchi ba dmigs su ma mchis shing / /'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis te/ /chos rnams

341a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba mang por zas skom dang / /shing rta dpung chung khri stan sbyin bgyis kyang / /des ni 'di la grol ba mi 'thob bo/ /mi mchog gang dag mya ngan 'das pa dang / /de dag gis kyang sems can mang bkrol ba/ /

341b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong sum brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri
341b8(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /dge slong ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /dge bsnyen bdun stong dang / dge bsnyen ma stong dang / /lha'i bu nyi khri bdun

345a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / khams gsum pa rnam par 'jig cing khams gsum pa la dmigs pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ste/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu

350b6(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam shes ni/ /sgyu ma lta bur rtogs par byed/ /lnga phung rmi lam lta ba dang / /mtshan nyid med par mtshan gcig par/ /rtogs kyang rtogs snyam mi rtog pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/ /nang ni byung ba ma yin
350b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ /spros pa med cing 'dus ma byas/ /de dag ming gis bstan pa ste/ /ming de dngos po yod ma yin/ /'dod chags zhe sdang kun rtog gis/ /kun nas bslang bar rtogs par byed/ /rtog pa de yang 'byung min te/ /gtan
350b8(dkon brtsegs): du dngos po med pa yin/ /gti mug rnam par rtog las byung / /rnam par rtog pa rgyu las skye/ /rgyu yang lta bas bskyed pa ste/ /lta ba de yang dmigs su med/ /khams gsum thams cad stong pa ste/ /de ni med par rtogs par
351a1(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /'di na 'pho ba 'ga' med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/ /'dod khams grub pa ma yin te/ /rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslad/ /gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin te/ /de dag thams cad
351a2(dkon brtsegs): yod ma yin/ /'dod chags spyod dang zhe sdang spyod/ /de bzhin gti mug spyod pa dang / /sems can spyod pa gang yin pa/ /thams cad mkhas pas rtogs par byed/ /sems can thams cad sems can gcig /sems can de
351a3(dkon brtsegs): yang yod min par/ /shes rab can gyis de rtogs kyang / /sems can de la rlom sems med/ /chos rnams kun gyi 'byung ba ni/ /phyin ci log las skye ba ste/ /gang dag phyin ci log rtogs pa/ /de ni log pa'i mtshan
351a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid do/ /shes pa kun la mkhas pa ni/ /gang gi sgra la'ang chags pa med/ /chags pa med par rtogs gyur pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/ /rang gi sha rnams gtong byed kyang / /de la gnas pa yod min zhing / /ji
351a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rjes su rtogs gyur pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin gyur kyang / /tshul khrims la ni rlom sems med/ /sangs rgyas tshul don gang yin pa/ /skye med 'byung ba med pa yin/ /byams
351a6(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can khyab byed kyang / /sems can dmigs su yod ma yin/ /sems can don ni rjes rtogs pa/ /de ni ming gis bstan pa yin/ /'dus byas kun la rnam sems pa'i/ /brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas gyur cig /
351a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten stong par rig nas ni/ /byang chub dam pa rtogs par byed/ /de ni bsam gtan sgom byed kyang / /de la rten pa yod min zhing / /gnas med dmigs pa yod min
351a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /de ltar mkhas pa sgom par byed/ /bag chags lta ba'i nyon mongs rnams/ /shes rab mtshon gyis gcod byed kyang / /chos kyi dbyings la dbye ba dang / gcod pa'i rlom sems yod ma yin/ /
